projectDesc.p: This is the transcribed text of Abhyankar’ edition, corrected in the light of texts that have been incorrectly quoted or for other reasons. In such cases Abhyankar’s text is mentioned in a footnote, often with an explanation why the change is necessary. The resulting text is the one underlying my forthcoming translation of the Sarvadarśanasaṃgraha.

encodingDesc.p: The published edition from which this e-text was transcribed is printed in the Devanāgarī script. The electronic text below is in a lossless transliteration using the Latin alphabet. The transliteration scheme used is the IAST (The International Alphabet of Sanskrit Transliteration). IAST differs in small ways from ISO 15919, but is preferred by most working Sanskrit scholars. Conversion of this file to ISO 15919 can be achieved by performing the following replacements throughout the file: ṛ -> r̥ and ṃ -> ṁ

div.label: [l. 1.1]
div.p: nityajñānāśrayaṃ vande niḥśreyasanidhiṃ śivam/
yenaiva jātaṃ mahyādi tenaivedaṃ sakartṛkam //1//
pāraṃ gataṃ sakaladarśanasāgarāṇām
ātmocitārthacaritārthitasarvalokam/
śrīśārṅgapāṇitanayaṃ nikhilāgamajñaṃ
sarvajñaviṣṇugurum anvaham āśraye ’ham //2//
śrīmatsāyaṇadugdhābdhikaustubhena mahaujasā/
kriyate mādhavāryeṇa sarvadarśanasaṃgrahaḥ //3//
pūrveṣām atidustarāṇi sutarām āloḍya śāstrāṇy asau
śrīmatsāyaṇamādhavaḥ prabhur upanyāsyat satāṃ prītaye/
dūrotsāritamatsareṇa manasā śṛṇvantu tat sajjanā
mālyaṃ kasya vicitrapuṣparacitaṃ prītyai na saṃjāyate //4//
cārvākadarśanam //1//
div.label: [l. 1.13]
div.p: atha kathaṃ parameśvarasya niḥśreyasapradatvam abhidhīyate/ bṛhaspatimatānusāriṇā nāstikaśiromaṇinā cārvākeṇa tasya dūrotsāritatvāt/ durucchedaṃ hi cārvākasya ceṣṭitam/ prāyeṇa sarvaprāṇinas tāvat

quote.p: yāvajjīvaṃ sukhaṃ jīven nāsti mṛtyor agocaraḥ/

div.p: iti lokagāthām anurundhānā nītikāmaśāstrānusāreṇārthakāmāv eva puruṣārthau manyamānāḥ pāralaukikam artham apahnuvānāś cārvākamatam anuvartamānā evānubhūyante/ ata eva tasya cārvākamatasya lokāyatam ity anvartham aparaṃ nāmadheyam/
div.label: [l. 1.23]
div.p: tatra pṛthivyādīni bhūtāni catvāri tattvāni/ tebhya eva dehākārapariṇatebhyaḥ kiṇvādibhyo madaśaktivac caitanyam upajāyate/ teṣu vinaṣṭeṣu satsu svayaṃ vinaśyati/ tad āhuḥ: vijñānaghana evaitebhyo bhūtebhyaḥ samutthāya tāny evānuvinaśyati na pretya saṃjñāsti iti/ taccaitanyaviśiṣṭadeha evātmā/ dehātirikta ātmani pramāṇābhāvāt/ pratyakṣaikapramāṇavāditayānumānāder anaṅgīkāreṇa prāmāṇyābhāvāt/ aṅganādyāliṅganādijanyaṃ sukham eva puruṣārthaḥ/ na cāsya duḥkhasaṃbhinnatayā puruṣārthatvam eva nāstīti mantavyam/ avarjanīyatayā prāptasya duḥkhasya parihāreṇa sukhamātrasyaiva bhoktavyatvāt/ tad yathā matsyārthī saśalkān sakaṇṭakān matsyān upādatte sa yāvad ādeyaṃ tāvad ādāya nivartate/ yathā vā dhānyārthī sapalālāni dhānyāny āharati sa yāvad ādeyaṃ tāvad ādāya nivartate/ tasmād duḥkhabhayān nānukūlavedanīyaṃ sukhaṃ tyaktum ucitam/ na hi mṛgāḥ santīti śālayo nopyante/ na hi bhikṣukāḥ santīti sthālyo nādhiśrīyante/ yadi kaścid bhīrur dṛṣṭaṃ sukhaṃ tyajet tarhi sa paśuvan mūrkho bhavet/ tad uktam:

quote.p: ko nāma bhos tuṣakaṇopahitān hitārthī// iti

div.label: [l. 1.43]
div.p: nanu pāralaukikasukhābhāve bahuvittavyayaśarīrāyāsasādhye ´gnihotrādau vidyāvṛddhāḥ kathaṃ pravartiṣyanta iti cet tad api na pramāṇakoṭiṃ praveṣṭum īṣṭe/ anṛtavyāghātapunaruktadoṣair dūṣitatayā vaidikaṃmanyaiṛ eva dhūrtabakaiḥ parasparaṃ karmakāṇḍaprāmāṇyavādibhir jñānakāṇḍasya jñānakāṇḍaprāmāṇyavādibhiḥ karmakāṇḍasya ca pratikṣiptatvena trayyā dhūrtapralāpamātratvenāgnihotrāder jīvikāmātraprayojanatvāt/ tathā cābhāṇakaḥ:
div.label: [l. 1.52]
div.p: ata eva kaṇṭakādijanyaṃ duḥkham eva narakaḥ/ lokasiddho rājā parameśvaraḥ/ dehocchedo mokṣaḥ/ dehātmavāde ca sthūlo ’haṃ kṛśo ’haṃ kṛṣṇo ’ham ityādi sāmānādhikaraṇyopapattiḥ/ mama śarīram iti vyavahāro rāhoḥ śira ityādivad aupacārikaḥ/ tad etat sarvaṃ samagrāhi:
div.label: [l. 1.56]

quote.p: lokasiddho bhaved rājā pareśo nāparaḥ smṛtaḥ/
dehasya nāśo muktis tu na jñānān muktir iṣyate //2//
dehaḥ sthaulyādiyogāc ca sa evātmā na cāparaḥ/
mama deho ´yam ity uktiḥ saṃbhaved aupacārikī //5// iti

div.label: [l. 1.66]
div.p: syād etat/ syād eṣa manoratho yady anumānādeḥ prāmāṇyaṃ na syāt/ asti ca prāmāṇyam/ katham anyathā dhūmopalambhānantaraṃ dhūmadhvaje prekṣāvatāṃ pravṛttir upapadyeta/ nadyās tīre phalāni santīti vacanaśravaṇasamanantaraṃ phalārthināṃ nadītīre pravṛttir iti/

tad etan manorājyavijṛmbhaṇam/ vyāptipakṣadharmatāśāli hi liṅgaṃ gamakam abhyugatam anumānaprāmāṇyavādibhiḥ/ vyāptiś cobhayavidhopādhividhuraḥ saṃbandhaḥ/ sa ca sattayā cakṣurādivan nāṅgabhāvaṃ bhajate/ kiṃ tu jñātatayā/ kaḥ khalu jñānopāyo bhavet/ na tāvat pratyakṣam/ tac ca bāhyam āntaraṃ vābhimatam/ na prathamaḥ/ tasya saṃprayuktaviṣayajñānajanakatvena bhavati prasarasaṃbhave ’pi bhūtabhaviṣyatos tadasaṃbhavena sarvopasaṃhāravatyā vyāpter durjñānatvāt/ na ca vyāptijñānaṃ sāmānyagocaram iti mantavyam/ vyaktyor avinābhāvābhāvaprasaṅgāt/ nāpi caramaḥ/ antaḥkaraṇasya bahirindriyatantratvena bāhye ’rthe svātantryeṇa pravṛttyanupapatteḥ/ tad uktam:
div.label: [l. 1.80]
div.p: nāpy anumānaṃ vyāptijñānopāyaḥ/ tatra tatrāpy evam ity anavasthādauḥsthyaprasaṅgāt/ nāpi śabdas tadupāyaḥ/ kāṇādamatānusāreṇānumāna evāntarbhāvāt/ anantarbhāve vā vṛddhavyavahārarūpaliṅgāvagatisāpekṣatayā prāguktadūṣaṇalaṅghanājaṅghālatvāt/ dhūmadhūmadhvajayor avinābhāvo ´stīti vacanamātre manvādivad viśvāsābhāvāc ca/ anupadiṣṭāvinābhāvasya puruṣasyārthāntaradarśanenārthāntarānumityabhāve svārthānumānakathāyāḥ kathāśeṣatvaprasaṅgāc ca kaiva kathā parārthānumānasya/ upamānādikaṃ tu dūrāpāstam/ teṣāṃ saṃjñāsaṃjñisaṃbandhādibodhakatvenānaupādhika-saṃbandhabodhakatvāsaṃbhavāt/
div.label: [l. 1.90]
div.p: kiṃ ca, upādhyabhāvo ´pi duravagamaḥ/ upādhīnāṃ pratyakṣatvaniyamāsaṃbhavena pratyakṣāṇām abhāvasya pratyakṣatve ´py apratyakṣāṇām abhāvasyāpratyakṣatayānumānādyapekṣāyām uktadūṣaṇānativṛtteḥ/ api ca sādhanāvyāpakatve sati sādhyasamavyāptir iti tallakṣaṇaṃ kakṣīkartavyam/ tad uktam:
div.label: [l. 1.94]

quote.p: avyāptasādhano yaḥ sādhyasamavyāptir ucyate sa upādhiḥ/

śabde ´nityatve
'nityatve ] IV and v.l. in ASS; 'nitye A. sādhye sakartṛkatvaṃ ghaṭatvam aśravatāṃ ca/
vyāvartayitum upāttāny atra kramato viśeṣaṇāni trīṇi/
tasmād idam anavadyaṃ samāsametyādinoktam ācāryaiś ca// iti

div.label: [l. 1.98]
div.p: tatra vidhyadhyavasāyapūrvakatvān niṣedhādhyavasāyasyopādhijñāne jāte tadabhāvaviśiṣṭasaṃbandharūpavyāptijñānaṃ vyāptijñānādhīnaṃ copādhijñānam iti parasparāśrayavajraprahāradoṣo vajralepāyate/ tasmād avinābhāvasya durbodhatayā nānumānādyavakāśaḥ/ dhūmādijñānānantaram agnyādijñāne pravṛttiḥ pratyakṣamūlatayā bhrāntyā vā yujyate/ kvacit phalapratilambhas tu maṇimantrauṣadhādivad yādṛcchikaḥ/ atas tatsādhyam adṛṣṭādikam api nāsti/
nanv adṛṣṭāniṣṭau jagadvaicitryam ākasmikaṃ syād iti cen
na tad bhadram/ svabhāvād eva tadupapatteḥ/ tad uktam:

quote.p: agnir uṣṇo jalaṃ śītaṃ samasparśas tathānilaḥ/
kenedaṃ citritaṃ tasmāt svabhāvāt tadvyavasthitiḥ// iti/

div.label: [l. 1.109]
div.p: tad etat sarvaṃ bṛhaspatināpy uktam:

quote.p: na svargo nāpavargo vā naivātmā pāralaukikaḥ/
paśuś cen nihataḥ svargaṃ jyotiṣṭome gamiṣyati/
svapitā yajamānena tatra kasmān na hiṃsyate //3//
mṛtānām api jantūnāṃ śrāddhaṃ cet tṛptikāraṇam/

gehasthakṛtaśrāddhena pathi tṛptir avāritā //5//
The second halves of verses 4 and 5 are absent from all earlier editions; see Bhattacharya 2011.
svargasthitā yadā tṛptiṃ gaccheyus tatra dānataḥ/
yāvaj jīvet sukhaṃ jīved ṛṇaṃ kṛtvā ghṛtaṃ pibet/
yadi gacchet paraṃ lokaṃ dehād eṣa vinirgataḥ/
tataś ca jīvanopāyo brāhmaṇair vihitas tv iha/
mṛtānāṃ pretakāryāṇi na tv anyad vidyate kvacit //9//
aśvasyātra hi śiśnaṃ tu patnīgrāhyaṃ prakīrtitam/
bhaṇḍais tadvat paraṃ caiva grāhyajātaṃ prakīrtitam //11//

div.p: tasmād bahūnāṃ prāṇinām anugrahārthaṃ cārvākamatam āśrayaṇīyam iti ramaṇīyam//

div.head: atha bauddhadarśanam //2//
div.label: [l. 2.1]
div.p: atra bauddhair abhidhīyate/ yad abhyadhāyi avinābhāvo durbodha iti tad asādhīyaḥ/ tādātmyatadutpattibhyām avinābhāvasya sujñānatvāt/ tad uktam:
div.label: [l. 2.6]
div.p: anvayavyatirekāv avinābhāvaniścāyakāv iti pakṣe sādhyasādhanayor avyabhicāro duravadhāraṇo bhavet/ bhūte bhaviṣyati vartamāne cānupalabhyamāne ´rthe vyabhicāraśaṅkāyā anivāraṇāt/
nanu tathāvidhasthale tāvake ´pi mate vyabhicāraśaṅkā duṣparihāreti cet

māivaṃ vocaḥ/ vināpi kāraṇaṃ kāryam utpadyatām ity evaṃvidhāyāḥ śaṅkāyā vyāghātāvadhikatayā nivṛttatvāt/ tad eva hy āśaṅkyeta yasminn āśaṅkyamāne vyāghātādayo nāvatareyuḥ/ tad uktam: vyāghātāvadhir āśaṅkā iti/ tasmāt tadutpattiniścayenāvinābhāvo niścīyate/ tadutpattiniścayaś ca kāryahetvoḥ pratyakṣopalambhānupalambhapañcakanibandhanaḥ/ (1) kāryasyotpatteḥ prāg anupalambhaḥ (2-3) kāraṇopalambhe saty upalambhaḥ (4-5) upalabdhasya paścāt kāraṇānupalambhād anupalambhaḥ iti pañcakāraṇyā dhūmadhūmadhvajayoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvo niścīyate/ tathā tādātmyaniścayenāpy avinābhāvo niścīyate/ yadi śiṃśapā vṛkṣatvam atipatet svātmānam eva jahyād iti vipakṣe bādhakapravṛtteḥ/ apravṛtte tu bādhake bhūyaḥ sahabhāvopalambhe ´pi vyabhicāraśaṅkāyāḥ ko nivārayitā/ śiṃśapāvṛkṣayoś ca tādātmyaniścayo vṛkṣo ´yaṃ śiṃśapeti sāmānādhikaraṇyabalād upapadyate/ na hy atyantābhede tat saṃbhavati/ paryāyatvena yugapat prayogāyogāt/ nāpy atyantabhede/ gavāśvayor anupalambhāt/ tasmāt kāryātmānau kāraṇātmānāv anumāpayata iti siddham/
div.label: [l. 2.25]
div.p: yadi kaścit prāmāṇyam anumānasya nāṅgīkuryāt taṃ prati brūyāt/ anumānaṃ pramāṇaṃ na bhavatīty etāvanmātram ucyate tatra na kiṃcana sādhanam upanyasyata upanyasyate vā/ na prathamaḥ/ aśiraskavacanasyopanyāse sādhyāsiddheḥ/

quote.p: ekākinī pratijñā hi pratijñātaṃ na sādhayet/

div.p: iti nyāyāt/ nāpi caramaḥ/ anumānaṃ pramāṇaṃ na bhavatīti bruvāṇena vacanapramāṇam anabhyupagacchatā tvayā svaparakīyaśāstre prāmāṇyenopagṛhītasya vacanasyopanyāse mama mātā vandhyetivad vyāghātāpātāt/ kiṃ ca pramāṇatadābhāsavyavasthāpanaṃ tatsamānajātīyatvād iti vadatā bhavataiva svīkṛtaṃ svabhāvānumānam/ paragatā vipratipattis tu vacanaliṅgeneti bruvatā kāryaliṅgakam anumānam/ anupalabdhyā kaṃcid arthaṃ pratiṣedhayatānupalabdhiliṅgakam anumānam/ tathā coktaṃ tathāgataiḥ:
parākrāntaṃ cātra sūribhir iti granthabhūyastvabhayād uparamyate/
div.label: [l. 2.41]
div.p: te ca bauddhāś caturvidhayā bhāvanayā paramapuruṣārthaṃ kathayanti/ te ca mādhyamikayogācārasautrāntikavaibhāṣikasaṃjñābhiḥ prasiddhā bauddhā yathākramaṃ sarvaśūnyatvabāhyārthaśūnyatvabāhyārthānumeyatvabāhyārtha-pratyakṣatvavādān ātiṣṭhante/ yady api bhagavān buddha eka eva bodhayitā tathāpi boddhavyānāṃ buddhibhedāc cāturvidhyam/ yathā gato ´stam arka ity ukte jāracaurānūcānādayaḥ sveṣṭānusāreṇābhisaraṇaparasvaharaṇasadācaraṇādisamayaṃ budhyante/
sarvaṃ kṣaṇikaṃ kṣaṇikaṃ duḥkhaṃ duḥkhaṃ svalakṣaṇaṃ svalakṣaṇaṃ śūnyaṃ śūnyam iti bhāvanācatuṣṭayam upadiṣtaṃ draṣṭavyam/
div.label: [l. 2.48]
div.p: tatra kṣaṇikatvaṃ nīlādikṣaṇānāṃ sattvenānumātavyaṃ yat sat tat kṣaṇikaṃ yathā jaladharapaṭalaṃ santaś cāmī bhāvā iti/ na cāyam asiddho hetuḥ/ arthakriyākāritvalakṣaṇasya sattvasya nīlādikṣaṇānāṃ pratyakṣasiddhatvāt/ vyāpakavyāvṛttyā vyāpyavyāvṛttir iti nyāyena vyāpakakramākramavyāvṛttāv akṣaṇikāt sattvavyāvṛtteḥ siddhatvāc ca/ tac cārthakriyākāritvaṃ kramākramābhyām vyāptam/ na ca kramākramābhyām anyaḥ prakāraḥ saṃbhavati/
iti nyāyena vyāghātasyodbhaṭatvāt/ tau ca kramākramau sthāyinaḥ sakāśād vyāvartamānāv arthakriyām api vyāvartayantau kṣaṇikatvapakṣa eva sattvaṃ vyavasthāpayata iti siddham/
div.label: [l. 2.60]
div.p: nanv akṣaṇikasyārthakriyākāritvaṃ kiṃ na syād iti cet
tad ayuktam/ vikalpāsahatvāt/ tathā hi: vartamānārthakriyākaraṇakāle ´tītānāgatayoḥ kim arthakriyayoḥ sthāyinaḥ sāmarthyam asti no vā/
i) ādye tayor anirākaraṇaprasaṅgaḥ/ samarthasya kṣepāyogāt/ yad yadā yatkaraṇasamarthaṃ tat tadā tat karoty eva yathā sāmagrī svakāryaṃ samarthaś cāyaṃ bhāva iti prasaṅgānumānāc ca/

(ii) dvitīye kadāpi na kuryāt/ sāmarthyamātrānubandhitvād arthakriyākāritvasya/ yad yadā yan na karoti tat tadā tatrāsamarthaṃ yathā hi śilāśakalam aṅkure/ na caiṣa vartamānārthakriyākaraṇakāle vṛttavartiṣyamāṇe arthakriye karotīti tadviparyayāc ca/
nanu kramavatsahakārilābhāt sthāyino ’tītānāgatayoḥ krameṇa karaṇam upapadyata iti cet
tatredaṃ bhavān pṛṣṭo vyācaṣṭām/ sahakāriṇaḥ kiṃ bhāvasyopakurvanti na vā/
(A) na cen nāpekṣaṇīyās te/ akiṃcitkurvatāṃ teṣāṃ tādarthyāyogāt/ [atha bhāvas taiḥ sahakāribhiḥ sahaiva kāryaṃ karotīti svabhāva iti cet/

aṅga tarhi sahakāriṇo na jahyāt/ pratyuta palāyamānān api gale pāśena baddhvā kṛtyaṃ kāryaṃ kuryāt/ svabhāvasyānapāyāt/]
This passage is situated immediately after the verse varṣātapābhyāṃ ... in IV (p. 10).
(B) upakārakatvapakṣe so ’yam upakāraḥ kiṃ bhāvād bhidyate na vā/
(B1) bhedapakṣa āgantukasyaiva tasya kāraṇatvaṃ syāt/ na bhāvasyākṣaṇikasya/ āgantukātiśayānvayavyatirekānuvidhāyitvāt kāryasya/ tad uktam:

quote.p: varṣātapābhyāṃ kiṃ vyomnaś carmaṇy asti tayoḥ phalam/
carmopamaś cet so ’nityaḥ khatulyaś ced asatphalaḥ// iti/

div.label: [l. 2.80]
div.p: kiṃ ca sahakārijanyo ´tiśayaḥ kim atiśayāntaram ārabhate na vā/ ubhayathāpi dūṣaṇapāṣāṇavarṣaṇaprasaṅgaḥ/ atiśayāntarārambhapakṣe bahumukhānavasthādauḥsthyam api syāt/ atiśaye janayitavye sahakāryantarāpekṣāyāṃ tatparamparāpāta ity ekānavasthāstheyā/ tathā sahakāribhiḥ salilapavanādibhiḥ padārthasārthair ādhīyamāne bījasyātiśaye bījam utpādakam abhyupeyam/ aparathā tadabhāve ´py atiśayaḥ prādurbhavet/ bījaṃ cātiśayam ādadhānaṃ sahakārisāpekṣam evādhatte/ anyathā sarvadopakārāpattāv aṅkurasyāpi sadodayaḥ prasajyeta/ tasmād atiśayārtham apekṣyamāṇaiḥ sahakāribhir atiśayāntaram ādheyaṃ bīje/ tasminn apy upakāre pūrvanyāyena sahakārisāpekṣasya bījasya janakatve sahakārisaṃpādyabījagatātiśayānavasthā prathamā vyavasthitā/

athopakāraḥ kāryārtham apekṣyamāṇo ´pi bījādinirapekṣaṃ kāryaṃ janayati tatsāpekṣaṃ vā/ prathame bījāder ahetutvam āpatet/ dvitīye ´pekṣyamāṇena bījādinopakāre ´tiśaya ādheyaḥ/evaṃ tatra tatrāpīti bījādijanyātiśayaniṣṭhātiśayaparamparāpāta iti dvitīyānavasthā sthirā bhavet/ evam apekṣyamāṇenopakāreṇa bījādau dharmiṇy upakārāntaram ādheyam ity upakārādheyabījāśrayātiśayaparamparāpāta iti tṛtīyānavasthāduravasthā syāt/

(B2) atha bhāvād abhinno ´tiśayaḥ sahakāribhir ādhīyata ity abhyupagamyeta tarhi prācīno bhāvo ´natiśayātmā nivṛtto ´nyaś cātiśayātmā kurvadrūpādipadavedanīyo jāyata iti phalitaṃ mamāpi manorathadrumeṇa/ tasmāt krameṇākṣaṇikasyārthakriyā durghaṭā/
div.label: (l. 2.101]
div.p: nāpy akrameṇa ghaṭate/ vikalpāsahatvāt/ tathā hi/ yugapat sakalakāryakaraṇasamarthaḥ svabhāvas taduttarakālam anuvartate na vā/
prathame tatkālavat kālāntare ´pi tāvat kāryakaraṇam āpatet/ dvitīye sthāyitvavṛttyāśā mūṣikabhakṣitabījādāv aṅkurādijananaprārthanām anuharet/
yad viruddhadharmādhyastaṃ tan nānā yathā śītoṣṇe/ viruddhadharmādhyastaś cāyam iti jaladhare pratibandhasiddhiḥ/
na cāyam asiddho hetuḥ/ sthāyini kālabhedena sāmarthyāsāmarthyayoḥ prasaṅgatadviparyayasiddhatvāt/ tatrāsāmarthyasādhakau prasaṅgatadviparyayau prāg uktau/ sāmarthyasādhakāv abhidhīyete/
div.label: [1) yad yadā yajjananāsamarthaṃ tat tadā tan na karoti yathā śilāśakalam aṅkuram/ asamarthaś cāyaṃ vartamānārthakriyākaraṇakāle ´tītānāgatayor arthakriyayor iti prasaṅgaḥ/ (2) yad yadā yat karoti tat tadā tatra samarthaṃ yathā sāmagrī svakārye/ karoti cāyam atītānāgatakāle tatkālavartinyāv arthakriye bhāva iti prasaṅgavyatyayo viparyayaḥ/
div.p: tasmād vipakṣe kramayaugapadyavyāvṛttyā vyāpakānupalambhenādhigatavyatirekavyāptikaṃ prasaṅgatadviparyayabalād gṛhītānvayavyāptikaṃ ca sattvaṃ kṣaṇikatvapakṣa eva vyavasthāsyatīti siddham/ tad uktaṃ jñānaśriyā:

quote.p: yat sat tat kṣaṇikaṃ yathā jaladharaḥ santaś ca bhāvā amī
sattā śaktir ihārthakarmaṇi miteḥ siddheṣu siddhā na sā/
nāpy ekaiva vidhānyathā parakṛtenāpi kriyādir bhaved
dvedhāpi kṣaṇabhaṅgasaṃgatir ataḥ sādhye ca viśrāmyati// iti/

div.label: [l. 2.121]
div.p: na ca kaṇabhakṣākṣacaraṇādipakṣakakṣīkāreṇa sattāsāmānyayogitvam eva sattvam iti mantavyam/ sāmānyaviśeṣasamavāyānām asattvaprasaṅgāt/ na ca tatra svarūpasattānibandhanaḥ sadvyavahāraḥ/ prayojakagauravāpatteḥ/ anugatatvānanugatatvavikalpaparāhateś ca/ sarṣapamahīdharādiṣu vilakṣaṇeṣu kṣaṇeṣv anugatasyākārasya maṇiṣu sūtravad bhūtagaṇeṣu guṇavac cāpratibhāsanāc ca/ kiṃ ca sāmānyaṃ sarvagataṃ svāśrayasarvagataṃ vā/ prathame sarvavastusaṃkaraprasaṅgaḥ/ apasiddhāntāpattiś ca/ yataḥ proktaṃ praśastapādena svaviṣayasarvagatam iti/ kiṃ ca vidyamāne ghaṭe vartamānaṃ sāmānyam anyatra jāyamānena saṃbadhyamānaṃ tasmād āgacchat saṃbadhyate anāgacchad vā/ ādye dravyatvāpattiḥ/ dvitīye saṃbandhānupapattiḥ/ kiṃ ca vinaṣṭe ghaṭe sāmānyam avatiṣṭhate vinaśyati sthānāntaraṃ gacchati vā/ prathame nirādhāratvāpattiḥ/ dvitīye nityatvavācoyuktyayuktiḥ/ tṛtīye dravyatvaprasaktiḥ/ ityādidūṣaṇagrahagrastatvāt sāmānyam aprāmāṇikam/ tad uktam:
div.label: [l. 2.135]

quote.p: tasmād acalataḥ sthānād vṛttir ity atiyuktatā//
yatrāsau vartate bhāvas tena saṃbadhyate na tu/
taddeśinaṃ ca vyāpnoti kim apy etan mahādbhutam//
na yāti na ca tatrāsīd asti paścān na cāṃśavat/
jahāti pūrvaṃ nādhāram aho vyasanasaṃtatiḥ// iti/

div.label: [l. 2.141]
div.p: anuvṛttapratyayaḥ kimālambana iti cet
aṅga, anyāpohālambana eveti saṃtoṣṭavyam āyuṣmatety alam atiprasaṅgena/
div.label: [l. 2.143]
div.p: sarvasya saṃsārasya duḥkhātmakatvaṃ sarvatīrthakarasaṃmatam/ anyathā tannivivṛtsūnāṃ teṣāṃ tannivṛttyupāye pravṛttyanupapatteḥ/ tasmāt sarvaṃ duḥkhaṃ duḥkham iti bhāvanīyam/
nanu kiṃvad iti pṛṣṭe dṛṣṭāntaḥ kathanīya iti cet
maivam/ svalakṣaṇānāṃ kṣaṇānāṃ kṣaṇikatayā sālakṣaṇyābhāvād etena sadṛśam aparam iti vaktum aśakyatvāt/ tataḥ svalakṣaṇaṃ svalakṣaṇam iti bhāvanīyam/

evaṃ śūnyaṃ śūnyam ity api bhāvanīyam/ svapne jāgaraṇe ca na mayā dṛṣṭam idaṃ rajatādīti viśiṣṭaniṣedhasyopalambhāt/ yadi dṛṣṭaṃ sat tadā tadviśiṣṭasya darśanasyedaṃtāyā adhiṣṭhānasya ca tasminn adhyastasya rajatatvādes tatsaṃbandhasya ca samavāyādeḥ sattvaṃ syāt/ na caitad iṣṭaṃ kasyacid vādinaḥ/ na cārdhajaratīyam ucitam/ na hi kukkuṭyā eko bhāgaḥ pākāyāparo bhāgaḥ prasavāya kalpyatām iti kalpyate/ tasmād adhyastādhiṣṭhānatatsaṃbandhadarśanadraṣṭṝṇāṃ madhya ekasyānekasya vā asattve niṣedhaviṣayatvena sarvasyāsattvaṃ balād āpated iti bhagavatopadiṣṭe mādhyamikās tāvad uttamaprajñā ittham acīkathan: bhikṣupādaprasāraṇanyāyena kṣaṇabhaṅgādyabhidhānamukhena sthāyitvānukūlavedanīyatvānugatatvasarvasatyatvabhramavyāvartanena sarvaśūnyatāyām eva paryavasānam/ atas tattvaṃ sadasadubhayānubhayātmakacatuṣkoṭivinirmuktaṃ śūnyam eva/ tathā hi/ yadi ghaṭādeḥ sattvaṃ svabhāvas tarhi kārakavyāpāravaiyarthyam/ asattvaṃ svabhāva iti pakṣe prācīna eva doṣaḥ prāduḥṣyāt/ yathoktam:
div.label: [l. 2.162]

quote.p: na sataḥ kāraṇāpekṣā vyomāder iva yujyate/

div.p: virodhād itarau pakṣāv anupapannau/ taduktaṃ bhagavatā laṅkāvatāre:

quote.p: ato nirabhilapyās te niḥsvabhāvāś ca darśitāḥ/ iti/
yathā yathārthāś cintyante viśīryante tathā tathā// iti ca/

div.p: na kvacid api pakṣe vyavatiṣṭhata ity arthaḥ/ dṛṣṭārthavyavahāraś ca svapnavyavahāravat saṃvṛtyā saṃgacchate/ ata evoktam:
div.label: [l. 2.171]

quote.p: kuṇapaḥ kāminī bhakṣya iti tisro vikalpanāḥ// iti/

div.p: tad evaṃ bhāvanācatuṣṭayavaśān nikhilavāsanānivṛttau paranirvāṇaṃ śūnyarūpaṃ setsyatīti vayaṃ kṛtārthāḥ nāsmākam upadeśyaṃ kiṃcid astīti/ śiṣyais tāvad yogaś cācāraś ceti dvayaṃ karaṇīyam/ tatrāprāptasyārthasya prāptaye paryanuyogo yogaḥ/ gurūktasyārthasyāṅkīkaraṇam ācāraḥ/ gurūktasyāṅgīkaraṇād uttamāḥ paryanuyogasyākaraṇād adhamāś ca/ atas teṣāṃ mādhyamikā iti prasiddhiḥ/
div.label: [l. 2.179]
div.p: gurūktaṃ bhāvanācatuṣṭayaṃ bāhyārthasya śūnyatvaṃ cāṅgīkṛtyāntarasya śūnyatvaṃ cāṅgīkṛtaṃ katham iti paryanuyogasya karaṇāt keṣāṃcid yogācāraprathā/ eṣā hi teṣāṃ paribhāṣā: svayaṃvedanaṃ tāvad aṅgīkāryam/ anyathā jagadāndhyaṃ prasajyeta/ tat kīrtitaṃ dharmakīrtinā:
div.label: [l. 2.183]
div.p: bāhyaṃ grāhyaṃ nopapadyata eva/ vikalpānupapatteḥ/ artho jñānagrāhyo bhavann utpanno bhavati anutpanno vā/ na pūrvaḥ/ utpannasya sthityabhāvāt/ nāparaḥ/ anutpannasyāsattvāt/ atha manyethāḥ atīta evārtho jñānagrāhyas tajjanakatvād iti tad api bālabhāṣitam/ vartamānatāvabhāsavirodhāt/ indriyāder api jñānajanakatvena grāhyatvaprasaṅgāc ca/ kiṃ ca grāhyaḥ kiṃ paramāṇurūpo ´rtho ´vayavirūpo vā/ na caramaḥ/ kṛtsnaikadeśavikalpādinā tannirākaraṇāt/ na prathamaḥ/ atīndriyatvāt/ ṣaṭkena yugapad yogasya bādhakatvāc ca/ yathoktam:
div.label: [l. 2.192]
div.p: ṣaṭkena yugapad yogāt paramāṇoḥ ṣaḍaṃśatā/

quote.p: teṣām apy ekadeśatve piṇḍaḥ syād aṇumātrakaḥ// iti/

div.p: tasmāt svavyatiriktagrāhyavirahāt tadātmikā buddhiḥ svayam eva svātmarūpaprakāśikā prakāśavad iti siddham/ tad uktam:

grāhyagrāhakayor abhedaś cānumātavyaḥ/ yad vedyate yena vedanena tat tato na bhidyate yathā jñānenātmā/ vedyante taiś ca nīlādayaḥ/ bhede hi saty adhunānenārthasya saṃbandhitvaṃ na syāt/ tādātmyasya niyamahetor abhāvāt/ tadutpatter aniyāmakatvāt/ yaś cāyaṃ grāhyagrāhakasaṃvittīnāṃ pṛthag avabhāsaḥ sa ekasmiṃś candramasi dvitvāvabhāsa iva bhramaḥ/ atrāpy anādir avicchinnapravāhā bhedavāsanaiva nimittam/ yathoktam:
div.label: [l. 2.204]

quote.p: bhedaś ca bhrāntivijñānair dṛśyetendāv ivādvaye// iti/

div.p: na ca rasavīryavipākādi samānam āśāmodakopārjitamodakānāṃ syād iti veditavyam/ vastuto vedyavedakākāravidhurāyā api buddher vyavahartṛparijñānānurodhena vibhinnagrāhyagrāhakākārarūpavattayā timirādyupahatākṣṇāṃ keśoṇḍukanāḍījñānabhedavad anādyupaplavavāsanāsāmarthyād vyavasthopapatteḥ paryanuyogāyogāt/ yathoktam:
div.label: [l. 2.213]
div.p: tasmād buddhir evānādivāsanāvaśād anekākārāvabhāsata iti siddham/ tataś ca prāguktabhāvanāpracayabalān nikhilavāsanocchedavigalitavividhaviṣayākāropaplavaviśuddhavijñānodayo mahodaya iti/
div.label: [l. 2.220]
div.p: anye tu manyante/ yathoktaṃ bāhyaṃ vastujātaṃ nāstīti tad ayuktam/ pramāṇābhāvāt/ na ca sahopalambhaniyamaḥ pramāṇam iti vaktavyam/ vedyavedakayor abhedasādhakatvenābhimatasya tasyāprayojakatvena saṃdigdhavipakṣavyāvṛttikatvāt/

nanu bhede sahopalambhaniyamātmakaṃ sādhanaṃ na syād iti cen na/ jñānasyāntarmukhatayā jñeyasya bahirmukhatayā ca bhedena pratibhāsamānatvāt/ ekedeśatvaikakālatvalakṣaṇasahatvaniyamāsaṃbhavāc ca/ kiṃ ca nīlādyarthasya jñānākāratve ´ham iti pratibhāsaḥ syāt/ na tv idam iti pratipattiḥ/ pratyayād avyatirekāt/
athocyate jñānasvarūpo ´pi nīlākāro bhrāntyā bahirvad bhedena pratibhāsata iti na ca tatrāhamullekha iti/ tathoktam:

quote.p: paricchedāntarād yo ´yaṃ bhāgo bahir iva sthitaḥ/
yad antarjñeyatattvaṃ tad bahirvad avabhāsate/ iti ca/

div.label: [l. 2.233]
div.p: tad ayuktam/ bāhyārthābhāve tadvyutpattirahitatayā bahirvad ity upamānokter ayukteḥ/ na hi vasumitro vandhyāputravad avabhāsata iti prekṣāvān ācakṣīta/ bhedapratibhāsasya bhrāntatve ´bhedapratibhāsasya prāmāṇyaṃ tatprāmāṇye ca bhedapratibhāsasya bhrāntatvam iti parasparāśrayaprasaṅgāc ca/ avisaṃvādān nīlatādikam eva saṃvidānā bāhyam evopādadate jagaty upekṣante cāntaram iti vyavasthādarśanāc ca/ evaṃ cāyam abhedasādhako hetur gomayapāyasīyanyāyavad ābhāsatāṃ bhajet/ ato bahirvad iti vadatā bāhyaṃ grāhyam eveti bhāvanīyam iti bhavadīya eva bāṇo bhavantaṃ praharet/
div.label: [l. 2.241]
div.p: nanu jñānād bhinnakālasyārthasya grāhyatvam anupapannam iti cet
tad anupapannam/ indriyasaṃnikṛṣṭasya viṣayasyotpādye jñāne svākārasamarpakatayā samarpitena cākāreṇa tasyārthasyānumeyatopapatteḥ/ ata eva paryanuyogaparihārau samagrāhiṣātām:

quote.p: bhinnakālaṃ kathaṃ grāhyam iti ced grāhyatāṃ viduḥ/
hetutvam eva ca vyakter jñānākārārpaṇakṣamam// iti/

div.p: tathā ca yathā puṣṭyā bhojanam anumīyate yathā ca bhāṣayā deśaḥ yathā vā saṃbhrameṇa snehaḥ tathā jñānākāreṇa jñeyam anumeyam/ tad uktam:

quote.p: arthena ghaṭayaty enāṃ na hi muktvārtharūpatām/

div.label: [l. 2.251]
div.p: na hi vittisattaiva tadvedanā yuktā/ tasyāḥ sarvatrāviśeṣāt/ tāṃ tu sārūpyam āviśat sarūpayituṃ ghaṭayed iti ca/ tathā bāhyārthasadbhāve prayogaḥ: ye yasmin saty api kādācitkās te sarve tadatiriktasāpekṣāḥ/ yathā avivakṣati ajigamiṣati mayi vacanagamanapratibhāsā vivakṣujigamiṣupuruṣāntarasaṃtānasāpekṣāḥ/ tathā ca vivādādhyāsitāḥ pravṛttipratyayāḥ saty apy ālayavijñāne kadācid eva nīlādyullekhina iti/ tatrālayavijñānaṃ nāmāhamāspadaṃ vijñānam/ nīlādyullekhi ca vijñānaṃ pravṛttivijñānam/ yathoktam:

quote.p: tat syād ālayavijñānaṃ yad bhaved ahamāspadam/
tat syāt pravṛttivijñānaṃ yan nīlādikam ullikhet// iti/

div.p: tasmād ālayavijñānasaṃtānātiriktaḥ kādācitkapravṛttivijñānahetur bāhyo ´rtho grāhya eva na vāsanāparipākapratyayakādācitkatvāt kadācit utpāda iti veditavyam/
div.label: [l. 2.264]
div.p: vijñānavādinaye hi vāsanā nāmaikasaṃtānavartinām ālayavijñānānāṃ tattatpravṛttivijñānajananaśaktiḥ/ tasyāś ca svakāryotpādaṃ praty ābhimukhyaṃ paripākaḥ/ tasya ca pratyayaḥ kāraṇaṃ svasaṃtānavartipūrvakṣaṇaḥ kakṣīkriyate/ saṃtānāntaranibandhanatvānaṅgīkārāt/

tataś ca pravṛttivijñānajanakālayavijñānavartivāsanāparipākaṃ prati sarve ´py ālayavijñānavartinaḥ kṣaṇāḥ samarthā eveti vaktavyam/ na ced eko ´pi na samarthaḥ syāt/ ālayavijñānasaṃtānavartitvāviśeṣāt/ sarve samarthā iti pakṣe kālakṣepānupapattiḥ/ tataś ca kādācitkatvanirvāhāya śabdasparśarūparasagandhaviṣayāḥ sukhādiviṣayāḥ ṣaḍ api pratyayāś caturaḥ pratyayān pratītyotpadyanta iti catureṇānicchatāpy acchamatinā svānubhavam anācchādya paricchettavyam/
div.label: [l. 2.275]
div.p: te catvāraḥ pratyayāh prasiddhā ālambanasamanantarasahakāryadhipatirūpāḥ/
(i) tatra jñānapadavedanīyasya nīlādyavabhāsasya cittasya nīlād ālambanapratyayān nīlākāratā bhavati/
(ii) samanantarapratyayāt prācīnajñānād bodharūpatā/
(iii) sahakāripratyayād ālokāt spaṣṭatā/
(iv) cakṣuṣo ´dhipatipratyayād viṣayagrahaṇapratiniyamaḥ/ uditasya jñānasya rasādisādhāraṇye prāpte niyāmakaṃ cakṣur adhipatir bhavitum arhati/ loke niyāmakasyādhipatitvopalambhāt/

evaṃ cittacaittātmakaḥ skandhaḥ pañcavidho rūpavijñānavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārasaṃjñakaḥ/ tatra rūpyanta ebhir viṣayā iti rūpyanta iti ca vyutpattyā saviṣayāṇīndriyāṇi rūpaskandhaḥ/ ālayavijñānapravṛttivijñānapravāho vijñānaskandhaḥ/ prāguktaskandhadvayasaṃbandhajanyaḥ sukhaduḥkhādipratyayapravāho vedanāskandhaḥ/ gaur ityādiśabdollekhisaṃvitpravāhaḥ saṃjñāskandhaḥ/ vedanāskandhanibandhanā rāgadveṣādayaḥ kleśā upakleśāś ca madamānādayo dharmādharmau ca saṃskāraskandhaḥ/

tad idaṃ sarvaṃ duḥkhaṃ duḥkhāyatanaṃ duḥkhasādhanaṃ ceti bhāvayitvā tannirodhopāyaṃ tattvajñānaṃ saṃpādayet/ ata evoktaṃ duḥkhasamudāyanirodhamārgāś catvāra āryabuddhasyābhimatāni tattvāni/ tatra duḥkhaṃ prasiddham/ samudāyo duḥkhakāraṇam/ tad dvividhaṃ pratyayopanibandhato
pratyayopanibandhato ] so Śālistambasūtra, Bhāmatī; pratyayopanibandhano A, ASS, IV. hetūpanibandhataś
hetūpanibandhataś ] so Śālistambasūtra, Bhāmatī; hetūpanibandhanaś A, ASS, IV. ca/ tatra pratyayopanibandhasya
pratyayopanibandhasya ] so Vedāntakalpataru; pratyayopanibandhanasya A, ASS, IV. saṃgrāhakaṃ sūtram: idaṃ pratyayaphalam iti
idaṃ pratyayaphalam iti ] A, ASS; om. IV. idaṃ kāryaṃ ye anye hetavaḥ pratyayanti gacchanti teṣām ayamānānāṃ hetūnāṃ bhāvaḥ pratyayatvaṃ kāraṇasamavāyaḥ, tanmātrasya phalaṃ na cetanasya kasyacid iti sūtrārthaḥ/ yathā bījahetur aṅkuro dhātūnāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ samavāyāj jāyate/ tatra pṛthivīdhātur aṅkurasya kāṭhinyaṃ gandhaṃ ca janayati/ abdhātuḥ snehaṃ rasaṃ ca janayati/ tejodhātū rūpam auṣṇyaṃ ca/ vāyudhātuḥ sparśanaṃ calanaṃ ca/ ākāśadhātur avakāśaṃ śabdaṃ ca/ ṛtudhātur yathāyogaṃ pṛthivyādikam/

hetūpanibandhanasya
hetūpanibandhasya ] ASS v.l., Vedāntakalpataru; hetūpanibandhanasya A, ASS, IV. ca saṃgrāhakaṃ sūtram: utpādād vā tathāgatānām anutpādād vā sthitaivaiṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā dharmasthititā dharmaniyāmakatā ca pratītyasamutpādānulomatā iti/

tathāgatānāṃ buddhānāṃ mate dharmāṇāṃ kāryakāraṇarūpāṇāṃ yā dharmatā kāryakāraṇabhāvarūpā eṣotpādād anutpādād vā sthitā/ yasmin sati yad utpadyate yasminn asati yan notpadyate tat tasya kāraṇasya kāryam iti/
dharmatety asya vivaraṇaṃ dharmasthititetyādi/ dharmasya kāryasya kāraṇānatikrameṇa sthitiḥ/ svārthikas talpratyayaḥ/ dharmasya kāraṇasya kāryaṃ prati niyāmakatā/

nanv ayaṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvaś cetanam antareṇa na saṃbhavatīty ata uktaṃ pratītyeti/ kāraṇe sati tat pratītya prāpya samutpāde ´nulomatānusāritā yā saiva dharmatotpādād anutpādād vā dharmāṇāṃ sthitā/ na cātra kaścic cetano ´dhiṣṭhātopalabhyata iti sūtrārthaḥ/

pratītyasamutpādasya hetūpanibandho
hetūpanibandho ] A, ASS, IV; hetūpanibandhanaḥ ASS v.l. yathā: bījād aṅkuro ´ṅkurāt kāṇḍaṃ kāṇḍān nālo nālād garbhas tataḥ śūkaṃ tataḥ puṣpaṃ tataḥ phalam/ na cātra bāhye samudāye kāraṇaṃ bījādi kāryam aṅkurādi vā cetayate aham aṅkuraṃ nirvartayāmi ahaṃ bījena nirvartita iti/ evam ādhyātmikeṣv api kāraṇadvayam avagantavyam/
div.label: [l. 2.318]
div.p: iti nyāyenoparamyate/ tadubhayanirodhaḥ tadanantaraṃ vimalajñānodayo vā muktiḥ/ tannirodhopāyo mārgaḥ/ sa ca tattvajñānam/ tac ca prācīnabhāvanābalād bhavatīti paramaṃ rahasyam/ sūtrasyāntaṃ pṛcchatāṃ kathitaṃ bhavantaś ca sūtrasyāntaṃ pṛṣṭavantaḥ sautrāntikā bhavantv iti/ bhagavatābhihitatayā sautrāntikasaṃjñā saṃjāteti/
div.label: [l. 2.324]
div.p: kecana bauddhāḥ: bāhyeṣu gandhādiṣv āntareṣu rūpādiskandheṣu satsv api tatrānāsthām utpādayituṃ sarvaṃ śūnyam iti prāthamikān vineyān acakathad bhagavān dvitīyāṃs tu vijñānamātragrahāviṣṭān vijñānam evaikaṃ sad iti tṛtīyān ubhayaṃ satyam ity āsthitān vijñeyam anumeyam iti seyaṃ viruddhā bhāṣeti varṇayantaḥ: vaibhāṣikākhyayā khyātāḥ/ eṣā hi teṣāṃ paribhāṣā samunmiṣati/ vijñeyānumeyatvavāde prātyakṣikasya kasyacid apy arthasyābhāvena vyāptisaṃvedanasthānābhāvenānumānapravṛttyanupapattiḥ sakalalokānubhavavirodhaś ca/ tataś cārtho dvividhaḥ: grāhyo ´dhyavaseyaś ca/ tatra grahaṇaṃ nirvikalpakarūpaṃ pramāṇam/ kalpanāpoḍhatvāt/ adhyavasāyaḥ savikalpakarūpo ´pramāṇam/ tad uktam:
div.label: [l. 2.334]

quote.p: grāhyaṃ vastu pramāṇaṃ hi grahaṇaṃ yad ito ´nyathā/
na tad vastu na tan mānaṃ śabdaliṅgendriyādijam// iti ca/

div.label: [l. 2.338]
div.p: nanu savikalpakasyāprāmāṇye katham tataḥ pravṛttasyārthaprāptiḥ saṃvādaś copapadyeyātām iti cet
na tad bhadram/ maṇiprabhāviṣayamaṇivikalpanyāyena pāraṃparyeṇārthapratilambhasaṃbhavena tadupapatteḥ/ avaśiṣṭaṃ sautrāntikaprastāve prapañcitam iti neha pratanyate/
na ca vineyāśayānurodhenopadeśabhedaḥ sāṃpradāyiko na bhavatīti bhaṇitavyam/ yato bhaṇitaṃ bodhicittavivaraṇe:
div.label: [l. 2.344]

quote.p: bhidyante bahudhā loka upāyair bahubhiḥ punaḥ//

div.label: [l. 2.348]
div.p: dvādaśāyatanapūjā śreyaskarīti bauddhanaye prasiddham:

quote.p: paritaḥ pūjanīyāni kim anyair iha pūjitaiḥ//
mano buddhir iti proktaṃ dvādaśāyatanaṃ budhaiḥ// iti/

div.label: [l. 2.353]
div.p: vivekavilāse bauddhamatam ittham abhyadhāyi:

quote.p: bauddhānāṃ sugato devo viśvaṃ ca kṣaṇabhaṅguram/
duḥkham āyatanaṃ caiva tataḥ samudayo mataḥ/
mārgaś cety asya ca vyākhyā krameṇa śrūyatām ataḥ//
duḥkhaṃ saṃsāriṇaḥ skandhās te ca pañca prakīrtitāḥ/
vijñānaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskāro rūpam eva ca//
rāgādīnāṃ gaṇo yasmāt samudeti nṛṇāṃ hṛdi/
kṣaṇikāḥ sarvasaṃskārā iti yā vāsanā sthirā/
sa mārga iti vijñeyaḥ sa ca mokṣo ´bhidhīyate//
kevalāṃ saṃvidaṃ svasthāṃ manyante madhyamāḥ punaḥ//
caturṇām api bauddhānāṃ muktir eṣā prakīrtitā//

div.p: athārhatadarśanam //3//
div.label: [l. 3.1]
div.p: tad itthaṃ muktakacchānāṃ matam asahamānā vivasanāḥ kathaṃcit sthāyitvam āsthāya kṣaṇikatvapakṣaṃ pratikṣipanti/ yady ātmā kaścin nāsthīyeta sthāyī tadaihalaukikapāralaukikaphalasādhanasaṃpādanaṃ viphalaṃ bhavet/ na hy etat saṃbhavaty anyaḥ karoty anyo bhuṅkta iti/ tasmād yo ´haṃ prāk karmākaravaṃ so ´haṃ saṃprati tatphalaṃ bhuñja iti pūrvāparakālānuyāyinaḥ sthāyinas tasya spaṣṭapramāṇāvasitatayā pūrvāparabhāgavikalakālakalāvasthitilakṣaṇakṣaṇikatā parīkṣakair arhadbhir na parigrahārhā/
div.label: [l. 3.8]
div.p: atha manyethāḥ:

iti nyāyena yat sat tat kṣaṇikam ityādinā pramāṇena kṣaṇikatāyāḥ pramitatayā tadanusāreṇa samānasaṃtānavartinām eva prācīnaḥ pratyayaḥ karmakartā taduttaraḥ pratyayaḥ phalabhoktā/ na cātiprasaṅgaḥ/ kāryakāraṇabhāvasya niyāmakatvāt/ yathā madhurarasabhāvitānām āmrabījānāṃ parikarṣitāyāṃ bhūmāv uptānām aṅkurakāṇḍaskandhaśākhāpallavādiṣu taddvārā paraṃparayā phale mādhuryaniyamaḥ/ yathā vā lākṣārasāvasiktānāṃ kārpāsabījādīnām aṅkurādipāraṃparyeṇa kārpāsādau raktimaniyamaḥ/ yathoktam:

quote.p: yasminn eva hi saṃtāne āhitā karmavāsanā/
phalaṃ tatraiva badhnāti kārpāse raktatā yathā//
śaktir ādhīyate tatra kācit tāṃ kiṃ na paśyasi// iti/

div.label: [l. 3.22]
div.p: tad api kāśakuśāvalambanakalpam/ vikalpāsahatvāt/ jaladharādau dṛṣṭānte kṣaṇikatvam anena pramāṇena pramitaṃ pramāṇāntareṇa vā/ nādyaḥ/ bhavadabhimatasya kṣaṇikatvasya kvacid apy adṛṣṭacaratvena dṛṣṭāntāsiddhāv asyānumānasyānutthānāt/ na dvitīyaḥ/ tenaiva nyāyena sarvatra kṣaṇikatvasiddhau sattvānumānavaiphalyāpatteḥ/ arthakriyākāritvaṃ sattvam ity aṅgīkāre mithyāsarpadaṃśāder apy arthakriyākāritvena sattvāpātāc ca/ ata evoktam: utpādavyayadhrauvyayuktaṃ sad iti/ athocyate sāmarthyāsāmarthyalakṣaṇaviruddhadharmādhyāsāt siddhir iti tad asādhu/ syādvādinām anekāntatāvādasyeṣṭatayā virodhāsiddheḥ/
yad uktaṃ kārpāsādidṛṣṭānta iti tad uktimātram/ yukter anukteḥ/ tatrāpi niranvayanāśasyānaṅgīkārāc ca/ na ca saṃtānivyatirekeṇa saṃtānaḥ pramāṇapadavīm upāroḍhum arhati/ tad uktam:

quote.p: vyaktayas tāsu saṃtānaḥ sa caika iti gīyate// iti/

div.label: [l. 3.36]
div.p: na ca kāryakāraṇabhāvaniyamo ´tiprasaṅgaṃ bhaṅktum arhati/ tathā hy upādhyāyabuddhyanubhūtasya śiṣyabuddhiḥ smaret tadupacitakarmaphalam anubhaved vā/ tathā ca kṛtapraṇāśākṛtābhyāgamaprasaṅgaḥ/ tad uktaṃ siddhasenavākyakāreṇa:

quote.p: upekṣya sākṣāt kṣaṇabhaṅgam icchann aho mahāsāhasikaḥ paro ´sau// iti/

div.label: [l. 3.43]
div.p: kiṃ ca kṣaṇikatvapakṣe jñānakāle jñeyasyāsattvena jñeyakāle jñānasyāsattvena ca grāhyagrāhakabhāvānupapattau sakalalokayātrāstam iyāt/ na ca samasamayavartitā śaṅkanīyā/ savyetaraviṣāṇavat kāryakāraṇabhāvāsaṃbhavenāgrāhyasyālambanapratyayatvānupapatteḥ/
atha bhinnakālasyāpi tasyākārārpakatvena grāhyatvam —
tad apy apeśalam/ kṣaṇikasya jñānasyākārārpakatāśrayatāyā durvacatvena sākārajñānavādapratyādeśāt/

nirākārajñānavāde ´pi yogyatāvaśena pratikarmavyavasthāyāḥ sthitatvāt/ tathā hi pratyakṣeṇa viṣayākārarahitam eva jñānaṃ pratipuruṣam ahamahamikayā ghaṭādigrāhakam anubhūyate na tu darpaṇādivat pratibimbākrāntam/ viṣayākāradhāritve ca jñānasyārthe dūranikaṭādivyavahārāya jalāñjalir vitīryeta/

na cedam iṣṭāpādanam eṣṭavyam/ davīyān mahīdharo nedīyān madīyo
madīyo ] dīrgho ASS, IV, A. This is a tentative emendation, based on the facts that dīrgho makes no sense and that Prameyakamalamārtaṇḍa (on sūtra 1.7; p. 103 l. 14) has, in the same context: dūre parvato nikaṭe madīyo bāhuḥ. bāhur iti vyavahārasya nirābādhaṃ jāgarūkatvāt/ na cākārādhāyakasya tasya davīyastvādiśālitayā tathā vyavahāra iti kathanīyam/

darpaṇādau tathānupalambhāt/ kiṃ cārthād upajāyamānaṃ jñānaṃ yathā tasya nīlākāratām anukaroti tathā yadi jaḍatām api tarhy arthavat tad api jaḍaṃ syāt/ tathā ca vṛddhim iṣṭavato mūlam api te naṣṭaṃ syād iti mahat kaṣṭam āpannam/
athaitaddoṣaparijihīrṣayā jñānaṃ jaḍatāṃ nānukarotīti brūṣe hanta tarhi tasyā grahaṇaṃ na syād ity ekam anusaṃdhitsato ´paraṃ pracyavata iti nyāyāpātaḥ/

nanu mā bhūj jaḍatāyā grahaṇam/ kiṃ naś chinnam/ tadagrahaṇe ´pi nīlākāragrahaṇe tayor bhedo ´nekānto vā bhavet/ nīlākāragrahaṇe cāgṛhītā jaḍatā kathaṃ tasya svarūpaṃ syāt/ aparathā gṛhītasya stambhasyāgṛhītaṃ trailokyam api rūpaṃ bhavet/ tad etat prameyajātaṃ prabhācandraprabhṛtibhir arhanmatānusāribhiḥ prameyakamalamārtaṇḍādau (p. 27) prabandhe prapañcitam iti granthabhūyatvabhayān nopanyastam/
div.label: [l. 3.68]
div.p: tasmāt puruṣārthābhilāṣukaiḥ puruṣaiḥ saugatī gatir nānugantavyā/ api tv ārhaty evārhaṇīyā/
arhatsvarūpaṃ ca hemacandrasūribhir āptaniścayālaṃkāre niraṭaṅki/
div.label: [l. 3.73]
div.p: nanu na kaścit puruṣaviśeṣaḥ sarvajñapadavedanīyaḥ pramāṇapaddhatim adhyāste/ tatsadbhāvagrāhakasya pramāṇapañcakasya tatrānupalambhāt/ tathā coktaṃ tautātitaiḥ:

quote.p: dṛṣṭo na caikadeśo ´sti liṅgaṃ vā yo ´numāpayet//1//
na ca tatrārthavādānāṃ tātparyam api kalpyate//2//
na cānuvadituṃ śakyaḥ pūrvam anyair abodhitaḥ//3//
anāder āgamasyārtho na ca sarvajña ādimān/
kṛtrimeṇa tv asatyena sa kathaṃ pratipādyate//4//
kathaṃ tad ubhayaṃ sidhyet siddhamūlāntarād ṛte//6//
sarvajñam avagacchantaḥ svavākyāt kiṃ na jānate//7//
evam arthāpattir api pramāṇaṃ nātra yujyate/
upadeśasya satyatvaṃ yato nādhyakṣam īkṣyate//10// ityādi/

div.label: [l. 3.96]
div.p: atra vidhīyate/ yad abhyadhāyi tatsadbhāvagrāhakasya pramāṇapañcakasya tatrānupalambhād iti tad ayuktam/ tatsadbhāvāvedakasyānumānādeḥ sadbhāvāt[/] tathā hi kaścid ātmā sakalapadārthasākṣātkārī tadgrahaṇasvabhāvatve sati prakṣīṇapratibandhapratyayatvāt/ yad yadgrahaṇasvabhāvatve sati prakṣīṇapratibandhapratyayaṃ tat tatsākṣātkāri yathāpagatatimirādipratibandhaṃ locanavijñānaṃ rūpasākṣātkāri/ tadgrahaṇasvabhāvatve sati prakṣīṇapratibandhapratyayaś ca kaścid ātmā/ tasmāt sakalapadārthasākṣātkārīti/ na tāvad aśeṣārthagrahaṇasvabhāvatvam ātmano ´siddham/ codanābalān nikhilārthajñānotpattyanyathānupapattyā sarvam anekāntātmakaṃ sattvād iti vyāptijñānotpatteś ca/ codanā hi bhūtaṃ bhavantaṃ bhaviṣyantaṃ sūkṣmaṃ vyavahitaṃ viprakṛṣṭam ity evaṃjātīyakam artham avagamayatīty evaṃjātīyakair adhvaramīmāṃsāgurubhir vidhipratiṣedhavicāraṇānibandhanaṃ sakalārthaviṣayajñānaṃ pratipadyamānaiḥ sakalārthagrahaṇasvabhāvakatvam ātmano ´bhyupagatam/ na cākhilārthapratibandhakāvaraṇaprakṣayānupapattiḥ/ samyagdarśanāditrayalakṣaṇasyāvaraṇaprakṣayahetubhūtasya sāmagrīviśeṣasya pratītatvāt/ anayā mudrayāpi kṣudropadravā vidrāvyāḥ/
div.label: [l. 3.112]
div.p: nanv āvaraṇaprakṣayavaśād aśeṣaviṣayaṃ vijñānaṃ viśadaṃ mukhyapratyakṣaṃ prabhavatīty uktaṃ tad ayuktam/ tasya sarvajñasyānādimuktatvenāvaraṇasyaivāsaṃbhavād iti cet
tan na/ anādimuktatvasyaivāsiddheḥ/ na sarvajño ´nādimuktaḥ/ muktatvād itaramuktavat/ baddhāpekṣayā ca muktavyapadeśaḥ/ tadrahite cāsyāpy abhāvaḥ syād ākāśavat/
nanv anādeḥ kṣityādikāryaparaṃparāyāḥ kartṛtvena tatsiddhiḥ/ tathā hi: kṣityādikaṃ sakartṛkaṃ kāryatvād ghaṭavad iti/

tad apy asamīcīnam/ kāryatvasyaivāsiddheḥ/ na ca sāvayavatvena tatsādhanam ity abhidhātavyam/ yasmād idaṃ vikalpajālam avatarati/ sāvayavatvaṃ kim avayavasaṃyogitvam avayavasamavāyitvam avayavajanyatvaṃ samavetadravyatvaṃ sāvayavabuddhiviṣayatvaṃ vā/ na prathamaḥ/ ākāśādāv anaikāntyāt/ na dvitīyaḥ/ sāmānyādau vyabhicārāt/ na tṛtīyaḥ/ sādhyāviśiṣṭatvāt/ na caturthaḥ/ vikalpayugalārgalagrastagalatvāt
vikalpayugalārgalagrastagalatvāt ] vikalpayugalārgalagrahagalatvāt ASS, IV, A. The expression remains obscure. / samavāyasaṃbandhamātravad dravyatvaṃ samavetadravyatvam anyatra samavetadravyatvaṃ vā vivakṣitaṃ hetūkriyate/ ādye gaganādau vyabhicāraḥ/ tasyāpi guṇādisamavāyavattvadravyatvayoḥ saṃbhavāt/ dvitīye sādhyāviśiṣṭatā/ anyaśabdārtheṣu samavāyikāraṇabhūteṣv
samavāyikāraṇa°]; samavāyakāraṇa° ASS, IV, A. avayaveṣu samavāyasya sādhanīyatvāt/ abhyupagamyaitad abhāṇi/ vastutas tu samavāya eva na samasti/ pramāṇābhāvāt/ nāpi pañcamaḥ/ ātmādinānaikāntyāt/ tasya sāvayavabuddhiviṣayatve ´pi kāryatvābhāvāt/ na ca niravayavatve ´py asya sāvayavārthasaṃbandhena sāvayavabuddhiviṣayatvam aupacārikam ity eṣṭavyam/ niravayavatve vyāpitvavirodhāt paramāṇuvat/ kiṃ ca kim ekaḥ kartā sādhyate kiṃ vāneke/ prathame prāsādādau vyabhicāraḥ/ sthapatyādīnāṃ bahūnāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ tatra kartṛtvopalambhāt/ dvitīye bahūnāṃ viśvanirmātṛtve teṣu mitho vaimatyasaṃbhāvanāyā anivāryatvād ekaikasya vastuno ´nyānyarūpatayā nirmāṇe sarvam asamañjasam āpadyeta/ sarveṣāṃ sāmarthyasāmyenaikenaiva sakalajagadutpattisiddhāv itaravaiyarthyaṃ ca/
div.label: [l. 3.138]
div.p: tad uktaṃ vītarāgastutau :

quote.p: sa sarvagaḥ sa svavaśaḥ sa nityaḥ/
teṣāṃ na yeṣām anuśāsakas tvam// iti/

div.p: anyatrāpi:

quote.p: kartā na tāvad iha ko ´pi yathecchayā vā
kāryaṃ kim atra bhavatāpi ca takṣakādyair
āhatya ca tribhuvanaṃ puruṣaḥ karoti// iti/

div.label: [l. 3.148]
div.p: tasmāt prāguktakāraṇatritayabalād āvaraṇaprakṣaye sārvajñyaṃ yuktam/ na cāsyopadeṣṭrantarābhāvāt samyagdarśanāditritayānupapattir iti bhaṇanīyam/ pūrvasarvajñapraṇītāgamaprabhavatvād amuṣyāśeṣārthajñānasya/ na cānyonāśrayādidoṣaḥ/ āgamasarvajñaparaṃparāyā bījāṅkuravad anāditvāṅgīkārād ity alam/
div.label: [l. 3.153]
div.p: ratnatrayapadavedanīyatayā prasiddhaṃ samyagdarśanāditritayam arhatpravacanasaṃgrahapare paramāgamasāre prarūpitaṃ samyagdarśanajñānacāritrāṇi mokṣamārga iti/ vivṛtaṃ ca yogadevena/ yena rūpeṇa jīvādyartho vyavasthitas tena rūpeṇārhatā pratipādite tattvārthe viparītābhiniveśarahitatvādyaparaparyāyaṃ śraddhānaṃ samyagdarśanam/ tathā ca tattvārthasūtraṃ: tattvārthaṃ śraddhānaṃ samyagdarśanam iti/ anyad api:

quote.p: jāyate tannisargeṇa guror adhigamena vā// iti/

div.p: paropadeśanirapekṣam ātmasvarūpaṃ nisargaḥ/ vyākhyānādirūpaparopadeśajanitaṃ jñānam adhigamaḥ/
div.label: [l. 3.163]
div.p: yena svabhāvena jīvādayaḥ padārthā vyavasthitās tena svabhāvena mohasaṃśayarahitatvenāvagamaḥ samyagjñānam/ yathoktam:

quote.p: yo ´vabodhas tam atrāhuḥ samyagjñānaṃ manīṣiṇaḥ// iti/

div.p:
taj jñānaṃ pañcavidhaṃ matiśrutāvadhimanaḥparyāyakevalabhedena/ tad uktam: matiśrutāvadhimanaḥparyāyakevalāni jñānam iti/ asyārthaḥ: jñānāvaraṇakṣayopaśame satīndriyamanasī puraskṛtya vyāpṛtaḥ san yathārthaṃ manute sā matiḥ/ jñānāvaraṇakṣayopaśame sati matijanitaṃ spaṣṭaṃ jñānaṃ śrutam/ samyagdarśanādiguṇajanitakṣayopaśamanimittam avacchinnaviṣayaṃ jñānam avadhiḥ/ īrṣyāntarāyajñānāvaraṇakṣayopaśame sati paramanogatasyārthasya sphuṭaṃ paricchedakaṃ jñānaṃ manaḥparyāyaḥ/ tapaḥkriyāviśeṣān yadarthaṃ sevante tapasvinas tajjñānam anyajñānāsaṃsṛṣṭaṃ kevalam/ tatrādye
tatrādye ] ASS; tatrādyaṃ A. parokṣaṃ pratyakṣam anyat/ tad uktam:

quote.p: pratyakṣaṃ ca parokṣaṃ ca dvidhā meyaviniścayāt// iti/

div.p: antargaṇikabhedas tu savistaras tatraivāgame ´vagantavyaḥ/
div.label: [l. 3.179]
div.p: saṃsaraṇakarmocchittāv udyatasya śraddadhānasya jñānavataḥ pāpagamanakāraṇakriyānirvṛttiḥ samyakcāritram/ tad etat saprapañcam uktam arhatā:

quote.p: carāṇāṃ sthāvarāṇāṃ ca tad ahiṃsāvrataṃ matam/
priyaṃ pathyaṃ vacas tathyaṃ sūnṛtaṃ vratam ucyate//
tat tathyam api no tathyam apriyaṃ cāhitaṃ ca yat/
bāhyāḥ prāṇā nṛṇām artho haratā taṃ hatā hi te/
yad asatsv api jāyeta mūrchayā cittaviplavaḥ//
mahāvratāni lokasya sādhayanty avyayaṃ padam// iti/

div.p: bhāvanāpañcakaprapañcanaṃ ca prarūpitam:
ityādinā/ etāni samyagdarśanajñānacāritrāṇi militāni mokṣakāraṇaṃ na pratyekam/ yathā rasāyanam/ tathā cātra jñānaśraddhānācaraṇāni saṃbhūya phalaṃ sādhayanti na pratyekam/
div.label: [l. 3.202]
div.p: atra saṃkṣepatas tāvaj jīvājīvākhye dve tattve staḥ/ tatra bodhātmako jīvaḥ/ abodhātmakas tv ajīvaḥ/ tad uktaṃ padmanandinā:

quote.p: cid acid dve pare tattve vivekas tadvivecanam/
upādeyam upādeyaṃ heyaṃ heyaṃ ca kurvataḥ//

div.p: sahajacidrūpapariṇatiṃ svīkurvāṇe jñānadarśane upayogaḥ/ sa parasparapradeśānāṃ pradeśabandhāt karmaṇaikībhūtasyātmano ´nyatvapratipattikāraṇaṃ bhavati/ sakalajīvasādhāraṇaṃ caitanyam upaśamakṣayakṣayopaśamavaśād aupaśamikakṣayātmakakṣāyaupaśamikabhāvena karmodayavaśāt kaluṣānyākāreṇa ca pariṇatajīvaparyāyavivakṣāyāṃ jīvasvarūpaṃ bhavati/ yad avocad vācakācāryaḥ: aupaśamikakṣāyikau bhāvau miśraś ca jīvasya svatattvam audayikapāriṇāmikau ca iti/ anudayaprāptirūpe karmaṇa upaśame sati jīvasyotpadyamāno bhāva aupaśamikaḥ/ yathā paṅke kaluṣatāṃ kurvati katakādidravyasaṃbandhād adhaḥpatite jalasya svacchatā/ ārhatatattvānusaṃdhānavaśād rāgādipaṅkakṣālanena nirmalatāpādakaḥ kṣāyiko bhāvaḥ/ karmaṇaḥ kṣaye sati jāyamāno bhāvaḥ kṣāyikaḥ yathā paṅkāt pṛthagbhūtasya nirmalasya sphāṭikādibhājanāntargatasya jalasya svacchatā/ yathā mokṣaḥ/ ubhayātmā bhāvo miśraḥ/ yathā jalasyārdhasvacchatā/ karmodaye sati bhavan bhāva audayikaḥ/ karmopaśamādyanapekṣaḥ sahajo bhāvaś cetanatvādiḥ pāriṇāmikaḥ/ tad etad yathāsaṃbhavaṃ bhavyasyābhavyasya vā jīvasya svarūpam iti sūtrārthaḥ/ tad uktaṃ svarūpasaṃbodhane:

quote.p: jñānād bhinno na nābhinno bhinnābhinnaḥ kathaṃcana/
jñānaṃ pūrvāparībhūtaṃ so ´yam ātmeti kīrtitaḥ// iti/

div.label: [l. 3.226]
div.p: nanu bhedābhedayoḥ parasparaparihāreṇāvasthānād anyatarasyaiva vāstavatvād ubhayātmakatvam ayuktam iti cet
tad ayuktam/ bādhe pramāṇābhāvāt/ anupalambho hi bādhakaṃ pramāṇam/ na so ´sti/ samasteṣu vastuṣv anekāntātmakatvasya syādvādino mate suprasiddhatvād ity alam/
div.label: [l. 3.230]
div.p: apare punar jīvājīvayor aparaṃ prapañcam ācakṣate jīvākāśadharmādharmapudgalāstikāyabhedāt/ eteṣu pañcasu tattveṣu kālatrayasaṃbandhitayāstīti sthitivyapadeśaḥ/ anekapradeśatvena śarīravat kāyavyapadeśaḥ/ tatra jīvā dvividhāḥ saṃsāriṇo muktāś ca/ bhavād bhavāntaraprāptimantaḥ saṃsāriṇaḥ/ te ca dvividhāḥ, samanaskā amanaskāś ca/ tatra saṃjñinaḥ samanaskāḥ/ śikṣākriyālāpagrahaṇarūpā saṃjñā/ tadvidhurās tv amanaskāḥ/ te cāmanaskā dvividhāḥ, trasasthāvarabhedāt/ tatra dvīndriyādayaḥ śaṅkhagaṇḍolakaprabhṛtayaś caturvidhās trasāḥ/ pṛthivyaptejovāyuvanaspatayaḥ sthāvarāḥ/ tatra mārgagatadhūliḥ pṛthivī/ iṣṭakādiḥ pṛthivīkāyaḥ/ pṛthivī kāyatvena yena gṛhītā sa pṛthivīkāyikaḥ/ pṛthivīṃ kāyatvena yo grahīṣyati sa pṛthivījīvaḥ/ evam abādiṣv api bhedacatuṣṭayaṃ yojyam/ tatra pṛthivyādi kāyatvena gṛhītavanto grahīṣyantaś ca sthāvarā gṛhyante na pṛthivyādipṛthivīkāyādayaḥ/ teṣām ajīvatvāt/ te ca sthāvarāḥ sparśanaikendriyāḥ/
div.label: [l. 3.244]
div.p: bhavāntaraprāptividhurā muktāḥ/

dharmādharmākāśāstikāyās ta ekatvaśālino niṣkriyāś ca dravyasya deśāntaraprāptihetavaḥ/ tatra dharmādharmau prasiddhau/ ālokenāvacchinne nabhasi lokākāśapadavedanīye tayoḥ sarvatrāvasthitiḥ/ gatisthityupagraho dharmādharmayor upakāraḥ/ ata eva dharmāstikāyaḥ pravṛttyanumeyaḥ/ adharmāstikāyaḥ sthityanumeyaḥ/ anyavastupradeśamadhye ´nyasya vastuno praveśo ´vagāhaḥ/ tad ākāśakṛtyam/
div.label: [l. 3.250]
div.p: sparśarasagandhavarṇavantaḥ pudgalāḥ/ te ca dvividhā aṇavaḥ skandhāś ca/ bhoktum aśakyā aṇavaḥ/ dvyaṇukādayaḥ skandhāḥ/ tatra dvyaṇukādiskandhabhedād aṇvādir utpadyate/ aṇvādisaṃghātād dvyaṇukādir utpadyate/ kvacid bhedasaṃghātābhyāṃ skandhotpattiḥ/ ata eva pūrayanti galantīti pudgalāḥ/ kālasyānekapradeśatvābhāvenāstikāyatvābhāve ´pi dravyatvam asti/ tallakṣaṇayogāt/ tad uktaṃ guṇaparyāyavad dravyam iti dravyāśrayā nirguṇā guṇāḥ/ yathā jīvasya jñānatvādidharmarūpāḥ pudgalasya rūpatvādisāmānyasvabhāvāḥ/ dharmādharmākāśakālānāṃ yathāsaṃbhavaṃ gatisthityavagāhavartanāhetutvādisāmānyāni guṇāḥ/ tasya dravyasyoktarūpeṇa bhavanaṃ paryāyaḥ/ utpādas tadbhāvaḥ pariṇāmaḥ paryāya iti paryāyāḥ/ yathā jīvasya ghaṭādijñānasukhakleśādayaḥ/ pudgalasya mṛtpiṇḍaghaṭādayaḥ/ dharmādīnāṃ gatyādiviśeṣāḥ/ ata eva ṣaḍ dravyāṇīti prasiddhiḥ/
div.label: [l. 3.263]
div.p:
kecana sapta tattvānīti varṇayanti/ tad āha: jīvājīvāsravabandhasaṃvaranirjarā
°nirjarā° ] Tattvārthasūtra 1.4; °nirjara° ASS, IV, A. mokṣās tattvāni iti/ tatra jīvājīvau nirūpitau/ āsravo nirūpyate: audārikādikāyādicalanadvāreṇātmanaś calanaṃ yogapadavedanīyaṃ āsravaḥ/ yathā salilāvagāhi dvāraṃ jalādyāsravaṇakāraṇatvād āsrava iti nigadyate tathā yogapraṇāḍikayā karmāsravatīti sa yoga āsravaḥ/ yathārdraṃ vastraṃ samantād vātānītaṃ reṇujātam upādatte tathā kaṣāyajalārdra ātmā yogānītaṃ karma sarvapradeśair gṛhṇāti/ yathā vā niṣṭaptāyaḥpiṇḍo jale kṣipto ´mbhaḥ samantād gṛhṇāti tathā kaṣāyoṣṇo jīvo yogānītaṃ karma samantād ādatte/ kaṣati hinasty ātmānaṃ kugatiprāpaṇād iti kaṣāyaḥ krodho māno māyā lobhaś ca/ sa dvividhaḥ śubhāśubhabhedāt/ atrāhiṃsādiḥ śubhaḥ kāyayogaḥ/ satyamitahitabhāṣaṇādiḥ śubho vāgyogaḥ/ arhatsiddhācāryopādhyāyasādhunāmadheya-pañcaparameṣṭhibhaktitaporuciśrutavinayādiḥ śubho manoyogaḥ/ etadviparītas tv aśubhas trividho yogaḥ/ tad etad āsravabhedaprabhedajātaṃ kāyavāṅmanaḥkarma yogaḥ/ sa āsravaḥ/ śubhaḥ puṇyasya/ aśubhaḥ pāpasya ityādinā sūtrasaṃdarbheṇa sasaṃrambham abhāṇi/ apare tv evaṃ menire: āsravayati puruṣaṃ viṣayeṣv indriyapravṛttir āsravaḥ/ indriyadvārā hi pauruṣaṃ jyotir viṣayān spṛśad rūpādijñānarūpeṇa pariṇamata iti/
div.label: [l. 3.282]
div.p:
mithyādarśanāviratipramādakaṣāyavaśād yogavaśāc cātmā sūkṣmaikakṣetrāvagāhinām anantapradeśānāṃ pudgalānāṃ karmabhāvayogyānām
karmabhāva° ]; karmabandha° A, ASS, IV. This correction is justified by the next line. Material particles (pudgala) are not capable of binding karma; they are rather capable of becoming karma. ādānam upaśleṣaṇaṃ yat karoti sa bandhaḥ/ tad uktaṃ sakaṣāyatvāj jīvaḥ karmabhāvayogyān pudgalān ādatte sa bandhaḥ iti/ tatra kaṣāyagrahaṇaṃ sarvabandhahetūpalakṣaṇārtham/ bandhahetūn papāṭha vācakācāryaḥ: mithyādarśanāviratipramādakaṣāyayogā bandhahetavaḥ iti/

mithyādarśanaṃ dvividhaṃ mithyākarmodayāt paropadeśānapekṣaṃ tattvāśraddhānaṃ naisargikam ekam/ aparaṃ paropadeśajam/ pṛthivyādiṣaṭkopādānaṃ ṣaḍindriyāsaṃyamanaṃ cāviratiḥ/ pañcasamititriguptiṣv anutsāhaḥ pramādaḥ/ kaṣāyaḥ krodhādiḥ/ tatra kaṣāyāntāḥ sthityanubhavabandhahetavaḥ prakṛtipradeśabandhahetur yoga iti vibhāgaḥ/ bandhaś caturvidha ity uktaṃ prakṛtisthityanubhavapradeśās tadvidhayaḥ iti/ yathā nimbaguḍādes tiktatvamadhuratvādisvabhāva evam āvaraṇīyasya jñānadarśanāvaraṇatvam ādityaprabhācchādakāmbhodharavat pradīpaprabhātirodhāyakakumbhavac ca/ sadasadvedanīyasya sukhaduḥkhotpādakatvam asidhārāmadhulehanavat/ darśane mohanīyasya tattvārthāśraddhānakāritvaṃ durjanasaṅgavat/ cāritre mohanīyasyāsaṃyamahetutvaṃ madyamadavat/ āyuṣo dehabandhakartṛtvaṃ jalavat/ nāmno vicitranāmakāritraṃ citrikavat/ gotrasyoccanīcakāritraṃ kumbhakāravat/ dānādīnāṃ vighnanidānatvam antarāyasya svabhāvaḥ kośādhyakṣavat/ so ´yaṃ prakṛtibandho ´ṣṭavidho dravyakarmāvāntarabhedamūlaprakṛtivedanīyaḥ/ tathāvocad umāsvātivācakācāryaḥ: ādyo jñānadarśanāvaraṇavedanīyamohanīyāyurnāmagotrāntarāyāḥ iti/ tadbhedaṃ ca samagṛhṇāt pañcanavadvyaṣṭāviṃśaticaturdvicatvāriṃśaddvipañcabhedā yathākramam iti/ etac ca sarvaṃ vidyānandādibhir vivṛtam iti vistarabhayān na prastūyate/ yathājāgomahiṣyādikṣīrāṇām etāvantam anehasaṃ mādhuryasvabhāvād apracyutisthitis tathā jñānāvaraṇādīnāṃ mūlaprakṛtīnām “āditas tisṛṇām antarāyasya ca triṃśatsāgaropamakoṭikoṭyaḥ parā sthitiḥ” ityādyuktakālā durdāntavat svīyasvabhāvād apracyutisthitiḥ/ yathājāgomahiṣyādikṣīrāṇāṃ tīvramandādibhāvena svakāryakaraṇe sāmaṛthyaviśeṣo ´nubhāvas tathā karmapudgalānāṃ svakāryakaraṇe sāmarthyaviśeṣo ´nubhāvaḥ/ karmabhāvapariṇatapudgalaskandhānām anantānantapradeśānām ātmapradeśānupraveśaḥ pradeśabandhaḥ/
div.label: [l. 3.315]
div.p: āsravanirodhaḥ saṃvaraḥ/ yenātmani praviśat karma pratiṣidhyate sa guptisamityādiḥ saṃvaraḥ/ saṃcārakāraṇāyogād ātmano gopanaṃ guptiḥ/ sā trividhā kāyavāṅmanonigrahabhedāt/ prāṇipīḍāparihāreṇa samyagayanaṃ samitiḥ/ seryābhāṣādibhedāt pañcadhā/ prapañcitaṃ ca hemacandrācāryaiḥ:
div.label: [l. 3.320]

quote.p: janturakṣārtham ālokya gatir īryā matā satām//
munir yad annam ādatte saiṣaṇāsamitir matā//
yatnād yad utsṛjet sādhuḥ sotsargasamitir bhavet//

div.label: [l. 3.330]
div.p: ata eva:
iti nirāhuḥ/ tad uktam abhiyuktaiḥ:

quote.p: itīyam ārhatī sṛṣṭir anyad asyāḥ prapañcanam//

div.p: arjitasya karmaṇas tapaḥprabhṛtibhir nirjaraṇaṃ nirjarākhyaṃ tattvam/ cirakālapravṛttakaṣāyakalāpaṃ puṇyaṃ sukhaduḥkhe ca dehena jarayati nāśayati keśolluñcanādikaṃ tapa ucyate/ sā nirjarā dvividhā yathākālaupakramikabhedāt/ tatra prathamā yasmin kāle yat karma phalapradatvenābhimataṃ tasminn eva kāle phaladānād bhavantī nirjarā kāmādipākajeti ca jegīyate/ yat karma tapobalāt svakāmanayodayāvaliṃ praveśya prapadyate saupakramikanirjarā/ yad āha:

quote.p: smṛtā sakāmā yaminām akāmā tv anyadehinām// iti

div.label: [l. 3.345]
div.p: mithyādarśanādīnāṃ bandhahetūnāṃ nirodhe ’bhinavakarmābhāvān nirjarā hetusannidhānenārjitasya karmaṇo nirasanād ātyantikakarmamokṣaṇaṃ mokṣaḥ/ tad āha: bandhahetvabhāvanirjarābhyāṃ kṛtsnakarmavipramokṣaṇaṃ mokṣaḥ iti/ tadanantaram ūrdhvaṃ gacchaty ā lokāntāt/ yathā hastadaṇḍādibhramipreritaṃ kulālacakram uparate ´pi tasmiṃs tadbalād evāsaṃskārakṣayaṃ bhramati tathā bhavasthenātmanāpavargaprāptaye bahuśo yat kṛtaṃ praṇidhānaṃ muktasya tadabhāve ´pi pūrvasaṃskārāt ālokāntaṃ gamanam upapadyate/ yathā vā mṛttikālepakṛtagauravam alābudravyaṃ jale ´dhaḥ patati punar apetamṛttikābandham ūrdhvaṃ gacchati tathā karmarahita ātmā asaṅgatvād ūrdhvaṃ gacchati/ bandhacchedād eraṇḍabījavac cordhvaṃ gatisvabhāvāc cāgniśikhāvat/ anyonyaṃ pradeśānupraveśe saty avibhāgenāvasthānaṃ bandhaḥ/ parasparaprāptimātraṃ saṅgaḥ/ tad uktaṃ pūrvaprayogād asaṅgatvād bandhacchedāt tathā gatipariṇāmāc ca/ āviddhakulālacakravad vyapagatalepālābuvad eraṇḍabījavad agniśikhāvac ca/ ata eva paṭhanti:

quote.p: adyāpi na nivartante tv alokākāśam āgatāḥ// iti

div.label: [l. 3.362]
div.p: anye tu gatasamastakleśatadvāsanasyānāvaraṇajñānasya sukhaikatānasyātmana uparideśāvasthānaṃ muktir ity āsthiṣata/ evam uktāni sukhaduḥkhasādhanābhyāṃ puṇyapāpābhyāṃ sahitāni nava padārthān kecanāṅgīcakruḥ/ tad uktaṃ siddhānte jīvājīvau puṇyapāpayutāv āsravaḥ saṃvaro nirjaraṇaṃ bandho mokṣaś ca nava tattvānīti/ saṃgrahe pravṛttā vayam uparatāḥ smaḥ/
div.label: [l. 3.368]
div.p: atra sarvatra saptabhaṅginayākhyaṃ nyāyam avatārayanti jaināḥ/ syād asti syān nāsti syād asti ca nāsti ca syād avaktavyaḥ syād asti cāvaktavyaḥ syān nāsti cāvaktavyaḥ syād asti ca nāsti cāvaktavya iti/
div.label: [l. 3.371]
div.p: tat sarvam anantavīryaḥ pratyapīpadat:

quote.p: syān nāstīti prayogaḥ syāt tanniṣedhe vivakṣite//
samuccayena yuktaś ca saptamo bhaṅga ucyate// iti/

div.p: syācchabdaḥ khalv ayaṃ nipātas tiṅantapratirūpako ´nekāntadyotakaḥ/
div.label: [l. 3.380]
div.p: yathoktam:

yadi punar ekāntadyotakaḥ syācchabdo ’yaṃ syāt tadā syād astīti vākye syātpadam anarthakaṃ syāt/ anekāntadyotakatve tu syād asti kathaṃcid astīti syātpadāt kathaṃcid ity ayam artho labhyata iti nānarthakyam/ tad āha:
div.label: [l. 3.389]
div.p: yadi vastv asty ekāntataḥ sarvathā sarvadā sarvatra sarvātmanāstīti nopāditsājihāsābhyāṃ kvacit kadācit kenacit pravarteta nivarteta vā/ prāptāprāpaṇīyatvād aheyahānānupapatteś ca/ anekāntapakṣe tu kathaṃcit kvacit kenacit sattvena hānopādāne prekṣāvatām upapadyete/ kiṃ ca vastunaḥ sattvaṃ svabhāvaḥ, asattvaṃ vetyādi praṣṭavyam/ na tāvad astitvaṃ vastunaḥ svabhāva iti samasti/ ghaṭo ’stīty anayoḥ paryāyatayā yugapat prayogāyogāt/ nāstīti prayogavirodhāc ca/ evam anyatrāpi yojyam/ yathoktam:

quote.p: ghaṭo ’stīti na vaktavyaṃ sann eva hi yato ghaṭaḥ/
nāstīty api na vaktavyaṃ virodhāt sadasattvayoḥ// ityādi/

div.p:
tasmād itthaṃ vaktavyam/
vaktavam/ ] vaktavyaṃ ASS, IV, A. sadasatsadasadanirvacanīyavādabhedena prativādinaś caturvidhāḥ/ punar apy anirvacanīyamatena miśritāni sadasadādimatānīti trividhāḥ/ tān prati kiṃ vastv astītyādiparyanuyoge kathaṃcid astītyādiprativacanasaṃbhavena te vādinaḥ sarve nirviṇṇāḥ santas tūṣṇīm āsata iti saṃpūrṇārthaviniścāyinaḥ syādvādam aṅgīkurvatas tatra tatra vijaya iti sarvam upapannam/ yad avocad ācāryaḥ syādvādamañjaryām:
div.label: [l. 3.405]
[l. 3.414]
div.p: jinadattasūriṇā jainaṃ matam ittham uktam:

quote.p: śoko mithyātvam ete ’ṣṭādaśa doṣā na yasya saḥ //2//
syādvādasya pramāṇe dve pratyakṣam anumāpi ca/
nityānityātmakaṃ sarvaṃ nava tattvāni sapta vā //4//
ūrdhvāśino gṛhe dātur dvitīyāḥ syur jinarṣayah //11//
bhuṅkte na kevalī na strī mokṣam eti digambaraḥ/
prāhur eṣām ayaṃ bhedo mahāñ śvetāmbaraiḥ saha //12// iti/

div.head: [atha rāmānujadarśanam //4//]
div.label: [l. 4.1]
div.p: tad etad ārhatamataṃ prāmāṇikagarhaṇam arhati/ na hy ekasmin vastuni paramārthe sati paramārthasatāṃ yugapat sadasattvādidharmāṇāṃ samāveśo saṃbhavati/ na ca sadasattvayoḥ parasparaviruddhayoḥ samuccayāsaṃbhave vikalpaḥ kiṃ na syād iti vaditavyam/ kriyā hi vikalpyate na vastv iti nyāyāt/ na ca
iti dṛṣṭāntāvaṣṭambhavaśād eṣṭavyam/ ekasmin deśe gajatvaṃ siṃhatvaṃ vāparasmin naratvam iti deśabhedena virodhābhāvena tasyaikasmin deśa eva sattvāsattvādinānekāntatvābhidhāne dṛṣṭāntānupapatteḥ/
div.label: [l. 4.9]
div.p: nanu dravyātmanā sattvaṃ paryāyātmanā tadabhāva ity ubhayam apy upapannam iti cen maivam/ kālabhedena hi kasyacit sattvam asattvaṃ ca svabhāva iti na kaścid doṣaḥ/ na caikasya hrasvadīrghatvavad anekāntatvaṃ jagataḥ syād iti vācyam/ pratiyogibhedena virodhābhāvāt/ tasmāt pramāṇābhāvād yugapat sattvāsattve parasparaviruddhe naikasmin vastuni vastuṃ yukte/ evam anyāsām api bhaṅgīnāṃ bhaṅgo ’vagantavyaḥ/ kiṃ ca sarvasyāsya mūlabhūtaḥ saptabhaṅginayaḥ svayam ekānto ’nekānto vā/ ādye sarvam anekāntam iti pratijñāvyāghātaḥ/ dvitīye vivakṣitārthāsiddhiḥ/ anekāntatvenāsādhakatvāt/ tathā ceyam ubhayataḥpāśā rajjuḥ syādvādinaḥ syāt/ api ca navatvasaptatvādinirdhāraṇasya phalasya tannirdhārayituḥ pramātuś ca tatkaraṇasya pramāṇasya prameyasya ca navatvāder aniyame sādhu samarthitam ātmanas tīrthakaratvaṃ devānāṃpriyeṇārhatamatapravartakena/ tathā jīvasya dehānurūpaparimāṇatvāṅgīkāre yogabalād anekadehaparigrāhakayogiśarīreṣu pratiśarīraṃ jīvavicchedaḥ prasajyeta/ manujaśarīraparimāṇo jīvo mataṅgajadehaṃ kṛtsnaṃ praveṣṭuṃ na prabhavet/ kiṃ ca gajādiśarīraṃ parityajya pipīlikāśarīraṃ viśataḥ prācīnaśarīrasaṃniveśavināśo ’pi prāpnuyāt/ na ca yathā pradīpaprabhāviśeṣaḥ prapāprāsādādyudaravartisaṃkocavikāśavāṃs tathā jīvo ’pi manujamataṅgajādiśarīreṣu syād ity eṣitavyam/ pradīpavad eva savikāratvenānityatvaprāptau kṛtapraṇāśākṛtābhyāgamaprasaṅgāt/ evaṃ pradhānamallanirbarhaṇanyāyena jīvapadārthadūṣaṇābhidhānadiśānyatrāpi dūṣaṇam utprekṣaṇīyam/ tasmān nityanirdoṣaśrutiviruddhatvād idam upādeyaṃ na bhavati/ tad uktaṃ bhagavatā vyāsena naikasminn asaṃbhavāt iti/ rāmānujena ca jainamatanirākaraṇaparatvena tad idaṃ sūtraṃ vyākāri/
div.label: [l. 4.33]
div.p: eṣa hi tasya siddhāntaḥ: cidacidīśvarabhedena bhoktṛbhogyaniyāmakabhedena ca vyavasthitās trayaḥ padārthā iti/ taduktam:

quote.p: īśvaraś cid acic ceti padārthatritayaṃ hariḥ/
īśvaraś cid iti prokto jīvo dṛśyaṃ acit punaḥ// iti/

div.label: [l. 4.37]
div.p: apare punar aśeṣaviśeṣapratyanīkaṃ cinmātraṃ brahmaiva paramārthaḥ/ tac ca nityaśuddhabuddhamuktasvabhāvam api tat tvam asi ityādisāmānādhikaraṇyādhigatajīvaikyaṃ badhyate mucyate ca/ tadatiriktanānāvidhabhoktṛbhoktavyādibhedaprapañcaḥ sarvo ’pi tasminn avidyayā parikalpitaḥ sad eva somyedam agra āsīd ekam evādvitīyam ityādivacananicayaprāmāṇyād iti bruvāṇās tarati śokam ātmavit ityādiśrutiśiraḥśatavaśena nirviśeṣabrahmātmaikatvavidyayānādyavidyānivṛttim aṅgīkurvāṇāḥ

quote.p: mṛtyoḥ sa mṛtyum āpnoti ya iha nāneva paśyati/

div.p: iti bhedanindāśravaṇena pāramārthikaṃ bhedaṃ nirācakṣāṇā vicakṣaṇaṃmanyās tam imaṃ vibhāgaṃ na sahante/
div.label: [l. 4.48]
div.p: tatrāyaṃ samādhir abhidhīyate/ bhaved etad evaṃ yady avidyāyāṃ pramāṇaṃ vidyeta/ nanv idam anādi bhāvarūpaṃ jñānanivartyam ajñānam aham ajño mām anyaṃ ca na jānāmīti pratyakṣapramāṇasiddham/ tad uktam:

quote.p: tad ajñānam iti prājñā lakṣaṇaṃ saṃpracakṣate// iti/

div.p: na caitaj jñānābhāvaviṣayam ity āśaṅkanīyam/ ko hy evaṃ brūyāt prabhākarakarāvalambī bhaṭṭadattahasto vā/
nādyaḥ

quote.p: vastuni jñāyate kiṃcit kaiścid rūpaṃ kadācana/ /
bhāvāntaram abhāvo hi kayācit tu vyapekṣayā/

div.p: iti vadatā bhāvavyatiriktasyābhāvasyānabhyupagamāt/

na dvitīyaḥ/ abhāvasya ṣaṣṭhapramāṇagocaratvena jñānasya nityānumeyatvena ca tadabhāvasya pratyakṣaviṣayatvānupapatteḥ/ yadi punaḥ pratyakṣābhāvavādī kaścid evam ācakṣīta taṃ pratyācakṣīta/ aham ajña ity asminn anubhave ’ham ity ātmano ’bhāvadharmitayā jñānasya pratiyogitayā cāvagatir asti na vā/ asti ced virodhād eva na jñānābhāvānubhavaḥ/ na ced dharmipratiyogijñānasāpekṣo jñānābhāvānubhavaḥ sutarāṃ na saṃbhavati/ tasyājñānasya bhāvarūpatve prāguktadūṣaṇābhāvād ayam anubhavo bhāvarūpājñānagocara evābhyupagantavya iti/
div.label: [l. 4.68]
div.p: tad etad gaganaromanthāyitam/ bhāvarūpasyājñānasya jñānābhāvena samānayogakṣematvāt/ tathā hi: viṣayatvenāśrayatvena cājñānasya vyāvartakatayā pratyagarthaḥ pratipanno na vā/ pratipannaś cet svarūpajñānanivartyaṃ tad ajñānam iti tasmin pratipanne kathaṃkāram avatiṣṭhate/ apratipannaś ced vyāvartakāśrayaviṣayaśūnyam ajñānaṃ katham anubhūyeta/ atha viśadaḥ svarūpāvabhāsa evājñānavirodhī nājñānena saha bhāsata ity āśrayaviṣayajñāne saty api nājñānānubhavavirodha iti hanta tarhi jñānābhāve ’pi samānam etad anyatrābhiniveśāt/ tasmād ubhayābhyupagatajñānābhāva evāham ajño mām anyaṃ ca na jānāmīty anubhavagocara ity abhyupagantavyam/
div.label: [l. 4.77]
div.p: astu tarhy anumānaṃ mānaṃ — vivādāspadaṃ pramāṇajñānaṃ svaprāgabhāvavyatiriktasvaviṣayāvaraṇasvanivartyasvadeśagatavastvantara-pūrvakam aprakāśitārthaprakāśakatvād andhakāre prathamotpannapradīpaprabhāvad iti/
div.label: [l. 4.80]
div.p: tad api kṣodakṣamam/ ajñāne’ py anabhimatājñānāntarasādhane ’pasiddhāntāpātāt/ tadasādhane ’naikāntikatvāt/ dṛṣṭāntasya sādhanavikalatvāc ca/ na hi pradīpaprabhāyā aprakāśitārthaprakāśakatvaṃ saṃbhavati/ jñānasyaiva prakāśakatvāt/ saty api pradīpe jñānena viṣayaprakāśasaṃbhavāt/ pradīpaprabhāyās tu cakṣurindriyasya jñānaṃ samutpādayato virodhisaṃtamasanirasanadvāreṇopakārakatvamātram evety alam ativistareṇa/
div.label: [l. 4.86]
div.p: pratiprayogaś ca vivādādhyāsitam ajñānaṃ na jñānamātrabrahmāśritam ajñānatvāc chuktikādyajñānavad iti/ nanu śuktikādyajñānasyāśrayasya pratyagarthasya jñānamātrasvabhāvatvam eveti cen maivaṃ śaṅkiṣthāḥ/ anubhūtir hi svasadbhāvenaiva kasyacid vastuno vyavahārānuguṇatvāpādanasvabhāvo jñānāvagatisaṃvidādyaparanāmā sakarmako ’nubhavitur ātmano dharmaviśeṣaḥ/ anubhavitur ātmatvam ātmavṛttiguṇaviśeṣasya jñānatvam ity āśrayaṇāt/ nanu jñānarūpasyātmanaḥ kathaṃ jñānaguṇakatvam iti cet tad asāram/ yathā hi maṇidyumaṇiprabhṛti tejodravyaṃ prabhāvadrūpeṇāvatiṣṭhamānaṃ prabhārūpaguṇāśrayaḥ/ svāśrayād anyatrāpi vartamānatvena rūpavattvena ca prabhā dravyarūpāpi taccheṣatvanibandhanaguṇavyavahārā/ evam ayam ātmā svaprakāśacidrūpa eva caitanyaguṇaḥ/ tathā ca śrutiḥ: sa yathā saindhavaghano ’nantaro ’bāhyaḥ kṛtsno rasaghana evaivaṃ vā are ’yam ātmānantaro ’bāhyaḥ kṛtsnaḥ prajñānaghana eva/ atrāyaṃ puruṣaḥ svayaṃjyotir bhavati/ na hi vijñātur vijñāter viparilopo vidyate atha yo vededaṃ jighrāṇīti sa ātmā yo ’yaṃ vijñānamayaḥ prāṇeṣu hṛdy antarjyotiḥ puruṣaḥ/ eṣa hi draṣṭā spraṣṭā śrotā ghrātā rasayitā mantā boddhā kartā vijñānātmā puruṣaḥ ityādikā/
div.label: [l. 4.105]
div.p: na ca anṛtena hi pratyūḍhāḥ iti śrutir avidyāyāṃ pramāṇam ity āśrayituṃ śakyam/ ṛtetaraviṣayo hy anṛtaśabdaḥ/ ṛtaśabdaś ca karmavacanaḥ/ ṛtaṃ pibantau iti vacanāt/ ṛtaṃ karma phalābhisaṃdhirahitaṃ paramapuruṣārādhanaveṣaṃ tatprāptiphalam/ atra tadvyatiriktaṃ sāṃsārikālpaphalaṃ karmānṛtaṃ brahmaprāptivirodhi/ ya etaṃ brahmalokaṃ na vindanti anṛtena hi pratyūḍhāḥ iti vacanāt/ māyāṃ tu prakṛtiṃ vidyāt ityādau māyāśabdo vicitrārthasargakaratriguṇātmakaprakṛtyabhidhāyako nānirvacanīyājñānavacanaḥ/
div.label: [l. 4.114]
div.p: ityādau vicitrārthasargasamarthasya pāramārthikasyaivāsurādyastraviśeṣasyaiva māyāśabdābhidheyatvopalambhāt/ ato na kadācid api śrutyā anirvacanīyājñānapratipādanam/
div.label: [l. 4.119]
div.p:
nāpy aikyopadeśānyathānupapattyā/ tattvaṃpadayoḥ saviśeṣabrahmābhidhāyitvena niruddhayor jīvaparayoḥ svarūpaikyasya pratipattum aśakyatayārthāpatter anudayadoṣadūṣitatvāt/ tathā hi: tatpadaṃ nirastasamastadoṣam anavadhikātiśayāsaṃkhyeyakalyāṇaguṇāspadaṃ jagadudayavibhavalayalīlaṃ brahma pratipādayati/ tad aikṣata bahu syāṃ prajāyeya ityādiṣu tasyaiva prakṛtatvāt/ tatsamānādhikaraṇaṃ tvaṃpadaṃ ca
ca ] ASS v.l.; cā A, ASS; vā IV. cidviśiṣṭajīvaśarīrakaṃ brahmācaṣṭe/ prakāradvayaviśiṣṭaikavastuparatvāt sāmānādhikaraṇyasya/
div.label: [l. 4.127]
div.p: nanu so ’yaṃ devadatta itivat tat tvam iti padayor viruddhabhāgatyāgalakṣaṇayā nirviśeṣasvarūpam ātmaikyaṃ sāmānādhikaraṇyārthaḥ kiṃ na syāt/ yathā so ’yam ity atra tacchabdena deśāntarakālāntarasaṃbandhī puruṣaḥ pratīyate/ idaṃśabdena ca saṃnihitadeśavartamānakālasaṃbandhī/ tayoḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyenaikyam avagamyate/ tatraikasya yugapad viruddhadeśakālapratītir na saṃbhavatīti dvayor api padayoḥ svarūpaparatve svarūpasya caikyaṃ pratipattuṃ śakyam/ evam atrāpi kiṃcijjñatvasarvajñatvādiviruddhāṃśaprahāṇenākhaṇḍasvarūpaṃ lakṣyata iti cet
div.label: [l. 4.135]
div.p: viṣamo ’yam upanyāsaḥ/ dṛṣṭānte ’pi virodhavaidhuryeṇa lakṣaṇāgandhāsaṃbhavāt/ ekasya tāvad bhūtavartamānakāladvayasaṃbandho na viruddhaḥ/ deśāntarastitir bhūtā saṃnihitadeśasthitir vartata iti deśabhedasaṃbandhavirodhaś ca kālabhedena pariharaṇīyaḥ/ lakṣaṇāpakṣe ’py ekasyaiva padasya lakṣakatvāśrayaṇena virodhaparihāre padadvayasya lākṣaṇikatvasvīkāro na saṃgacchate/ itarathaikasya vastunas tattedaṃtāviśiṣṭatvāvagāhanena pratyabhijñāyāḥ prāmāṇyānaṅgīkāre sthāyitvāsiddhau kṣaṇabhaṅgavādī bauddho vijayeta/ evam atrāpi jīvaparamātmanoḥ śarīrātmabhāvena tādātmyaṃ na viruddham iti pratipāditam/ jīvātmā hi brahmaṇaḥ śarīratayā prakāratvād brahmātmakaḥ/ ya ātmani tiṣṭhann ātmano ’ntaro yam ātmā na veda yasyātmā śarīram iti śrutyantarāt/
div.label: [l. 4.146]
div.p: atyalpam idam ucyate/ sarve śabdāḥ paramātmana eva vācakāḥ/ na ca paryāyatvam/ dvārabhedasaṃbhavāt/ tathā hi jīvasya śarīratayā prakārabhūtāni devamanuṣyādisaṃsthānānīva sarvāṇi vastūnīti brahmātmakāni tāni sarvāṇi/ ataḥ

quote.p: pakṣī vṛkṣo latā kāṣṭhaṃ śilā tṛṇaṃ ghaṭaḥ pataḥ//

div.p: ityādayaḥ sarve śabdāḥ prakṛtipratyayayogenābhidhāyakatayā prasiddhā loke tadvācyatayā pratīyamānatattatsaṃsthānavadvastumukhena tadabhimānijīvatadantaryāmiparamātmaparyantasaṃghātasya vācakāḥ/ devādiśabdānāṃ paramātmaparyantatvam uktaṃ tattvamuktāvalyāṃ caturthasare:

quote.p:
niṣkarṣābhāvayukto
niṣkarṣābhāvayukto ] ASS, Abhyankar's commentary; niṣkarṣābhāvayuktād° A, Tattvamuktākalāpa; niṣkarṣākūtayukto IV, ASS v.l. bahur iha ca dṛḍho lokavedaprayogaḥ/
jīvātmānupraveśāj jagati vibhur api vyākaron nāmarūpe// iti/

div.label: [l. 4.161]
div.p: anena devādiśabdānāṃ śarīraviśiṣṭajīvaparyantatvaṃ pratipādya saṃsthānaikyādyabhāve ityādinā śarīralakṣaṇaṃ darśayitvā śabdais tanvaṃśarūpaprabhṛtibhiḥ ityādinā viśvasyeśvarād apṛthaksiddhatvam upapādya niṣkarṣākūta ityādinā padyena sarveṣāṃ śabdānāṃ paramātmaparyantatvaṃ pratipāditaṃ tat sarvaṃ tata evāvadhāryam/ ayam evārthaḥ samarthito vedārthasaṃgrahe nāmarūpaśrutivyākaraṇasamaye rāmānujena/
div.label: [l. 4.168]
div.p: kiṃ ca sarvapramāṇasya saviśeṣaviṣayatayā nirviśeṣavastuni na kim api pramāṇaṃ samasti/ nirvikalpakapratyakṣe ’pi saviśeṣam eva vastu pratīyate/ anyathā savikalpake so ’yam iti pūrvapratipannaprakāraviśiṣṭapratītyanupapatteḥ/
div.label: [l. 4.172]
div.p:
kiṃ ca tattvamasyādivākyaṃ na prapañcasya bādhakam/ bhrāntimūlakatvāt bhrāntiprayuktarajjusarpavākyavat/ nāpi brahmātmaikyajñānaṃ nivartakam/ tatra pramāṇābhāvasya prāg evopapādanāt/ na ca prapañcasya satyatvapratiṣṭhāpanapakṣa ekavijñānena sarvavijñānapratijñāvyākopaḥ/ prakṛtipuruṣamahadahaṃkāratanmātrabhūtendriyacaturdaśabhuvanātmaka-brahmāṇḍatadantarvartidevatiryaṅmanuṣyasthāvarādisarvaprakārasaṃsthāna-saṃsthitaṃ kāryam api sarvaṃ brahmaiveti kāraṇabhūtabrahmātmajñānād
°brahmātmavijñānād ]; °brahmātmajñānād ASS, IV, A. eva sarvavijñānaṃ bhavatīty ekavijñānena sarvavijñānasyopapannataratvāt/ api ca brahmavyatiriktasya sarvasya mithyātve sarvasyāsattvād evaikavijñānena sarvavijñānapratijñā bādhyeta/ nāmarūpavibhāgānarhasūkṣmadaśāvat prakṛtipuruṣaśarīraṃ brahma kāraṇāvastham/ jagatas tadāpattir eva pralayaḥ/ nāmarūpavibhāgavibhaktasthūlacidacidvastuśarīraṃ brahma kāryāvastham/ brahmaṇas tathāvidhasthūlabhāvaś ca sṛṣṭir ity abhidhīyate evaṃ ca kāryakāraṇayor ananyatvam apy ārambhaṇādhikaraṇe pratipāditam upapannataraṃ bhavati/
div.label: [l. 4.186]
div.p: nirguṇavādāś ca prākṛtaheyaguṇaniṣedhaviṣayatayā vyavasthitāḥ/ nānātvaniṣedhavādāś caikasyaiva brahmaṇaḥ śarīratayā prakārabhūtaṃ sarvaṃ cetanācetanātmakaṃ vastv iti sarvasyātmatayā sarvaprakāraṃ brahmaivāvasthitam iti sarvātmakabrahmapṛthagbhūtavastusadbhāvaniṣedhaparatvābhyupagamena pratipāditāḥ/
div.label: [l. 4.191]
div.p: kim atra tattvaṃ bhedo ’bheda ubhayātmakaṃ vā/ sarvaṃ tattvam/ tatra sarvaśarīratayā sarvaprakāraṃ brahmaivāvasthitam ity abhedo ’bhyupeyate/ ekam eva brahma nānābhūtacidacitprakārān nānātvenāvasthitam iti bhedābhedau/ cidacidīśvarāṇāṃ svarūpasvabhāvavailakṣaṇyād asaṃkarāc ca bhedaḥ/ tatra cidrūpāṇāṃ jīvātmanām asaṃkucitāparicchinnanirmalajñānarūpāṇām anādikarmarūpāvidyāveṣṭitānāṃ tattatkarmānurūpajñānasaṃkocavikāsau bhogyabhūtācitsaṃsargas tadanuguṇasukhaduḥkhopabhogadvayarūpā bhoktṛtā bhagavatpratipattir bhagavatpadaprāptir ityādayaḥ svabhāvāḥ/ acidvastūnāṃ tu bhogyabhūtānām acetanatvam apuruṣārthatvaṃ vikārāspadatvam ityādayaḥ/ parasyeśvarasya bhoktṛbhogyayor antaryāmirūpeṇāvasthānam aparicchedyajñānaiśvaryavīryaśaktitejaḥprabhṛtyanavadhikātiśayāsaṃkhyeya-kalyāṇaguṇagaṇatā svasaṃkalpapravṛttasvetarasamastacidacidvastujātatā svābhimatasvānurūpaikarūpadivyarūpaniratiśayavividhānantabhūṣaṇa-tetyādayaḥ/
div.label: [l. 4.204]
div.p: veṅkaṭanāthena tv itthaṃ niraṭaṅki padārthavibhāgaḥ:

quote.p: dravyādravyaprabhedān mitam ubhayavidhaṃ tadvidas tattvam āhuḥ
dravyaṃ dvedhā vibhaktaṃ jaḍam ajaḍam iti prācyam avyaktakālau/
antyaṃ pratyak parāk ca prathamam ubhayathā tatra jīveśabhedāt
nityā bhūtir matiś cety aparam iha jaḍām ādimāṃ kecid āhuḥ//
tatra dravyaṃ daśāvat prakṛtir iha guṇaiḥ sattvapūrvair upetā
kālo 'bdādyākṛtiḥ syād aṇur avagatimāñ jīva īśo ’nya ātmā/
jñātur jñeyāvabhāso matir iti kathitaṃ saṃgrahād dravyalakṣma//

div.p: ityādinā/
div.label: [l. 4.215]
div.p: tatra cicchabdavācyā jīvātmānaḥ paramātmanaḥ sakāśād bhinnā nityāś ca/ tathā ca śrutiḥ: dvā suparṇā sayujā sakhāyā ityādikā/ ata evoktaṃ nānātmāno vyavasthātaḥ iti/ tannityatvam api śrutiprasiddham/

quote.p: na jāyate mriyate vā vipaścin nāyaṃ bhūtvā bhavitā vā na bhūyaḥ/
ajo nityaḥ śāśvato ’yaṃ purāṇo na hanyate hanyamāne śarīre// iti

div.p: aparathā kṛtapraṇāśākṛtābhyāgamaprasaṅgaḥ/ ata evoktaṃ vītarāgajanmādarśanāt iti/ tadaṇutvam api śrutiprasiddham:

quote.p: bhāgo jīvaḥ sa vijñeyaḥ sa cānantyāya kalpate//

div.p: iti/ ārāgramātraḥ puruṣaḥ aṇur ātmā cetasā veditavyaḥ iti ca/
div.label: [l. 4.229]
div.p: acicchabdavācyaṃ dṛśyaṃ jaḍaṃ jagat trividhaṃ bhogyabhogopakaraṇabhogāyatanabhedāt/
tasya jagataḥ kartopādānaṃ ceśvarapadārthaḥ puruṣottamo vāsudevādipadavedanīyaḥ/ tad apy uktam:

sa eva vāsudevaḥ paramakāruṇiko bhaktavatsalaḥ paramapuruṣas tadupāsakānuguṇatattatphalapradānāya svalīlāvaśād arcāvibhavavyūhasūkṣmāntaryāmibhedena pañcadhāvatiṣṭhate/ tatrārcā nāma pratimādayaḥ/ rāmādyavatāro vibhavaḥ/ vyūhaś caturvidho vāsudevasaṃkarṣaṇapradyumnātiruddhasaṃjñakaḥ/ sūkṣmaṃ saṃpūrṇaṣaḍguṇaṃ vāsudevākhyaṃ paraṃ brahma/ guṇā apahatapāpmatvādayaḥ/ so 'pahatapāpmā vijaro vimṛtyur viśoko vijighatso ’pipāsaḥ satyakāmaḥ satyasaṃkalpaḥ iti śruteḥ/ antaryāmī sakalajīvaniyāmakaḥ/ ya ātmani tiṣṭhann ātmānam antaro yamayati iti śruteḥ/
div.label: [l. 4.244]
div.p: tatra pūrvapūrvamūrtyupāsanayā puruṣārthaparipanthiduritanicayakṣaye saty uttarottaramūrtyupāstyadhikāraḥ/ tad uktam:

quote.p: tadarthaṃ līlayā svīyāḥ pañca mūrtīḥ karoti vai/
pratimādikam arcā syād avatārās tu vaibhavāḥ//
tad eva vāsudevākhyaṃ paraṃ brahma nigadyate/
sūkṣme tadanu śaktaḥ syād antaryāmiṇam īkṣitum// iti/

div.label: [l. 4.258]
div.p: tadupāsanaṃ ca pañcavidham abhigamanam upādānam ijyā svādhyāyo yoga iti śrīpañcarātre ’bhihitam/ tatrābhigamanaṃ nāma devatāsthānamārgasya saṃmārjanopalepanādi/ upādānaṃ gandhapuṣpādipūjāsādhanasaṃpādanam/ ijyā nāma devatāpūjanam/ svādhyāyo nāma arthānusaṃdhānapūrvako mantrajapo vaiṣṇavasūktastotrapāṭho nāmasaṃkīrtanaṃ tattvapratipādakaśāstrābhyāsaś ca/ yogo nāma devatānusaṃdhānam/
div.label: [l. 4.264]
div.p: evam upāsanākarmasamuccitena vijñānena draṣṭṛdarśane naṣṭe bhagavadbhaktasya tanniṣṭhasya bhaktavatsalaḥ paramakāruṇikaḥ puruṣottamaḥ svayāthātmyānubhavānugūṇaniravadhikānandarūpaṃ punarāvṛttirahitaṃ svapadaṃ prayacchati/ tathā ca smṛtiḥ:

quote.p: nāpnuvanti mahātmānaḥ saṃsiddhiṃ paramāṃ gatāḥ// iti/
punarāvṛttirahitaṃ svīyaṃ dhāma prayacchati// iti ca/

div.p: tad etat sarvaṃ hṛdi nidhāya mahopaniṣanmatāvalambanena bhagavadbaudhāyanācāryakṛtāṃ brahmasūtravṛttiṃ vistīrṇām ālakṣya rāmānujaḥ śārīrakamīmāṃsābhāṣyam akārṣīt/ tatrāthāto brahmajijñāsā iti prathamasūtrasyāyam arthaḥ:

atrāthaśabdaḥ pūrvavṛttakarmādhigamanānantaryārthaḥ/ tad uktaṃ vṛttikāreṇa: vṛttāt karmādhigamād anantaraṃ brahma vividiṣatīti/ ataḥśabdo hetvarthaḥ/ adhītasāṅgavedasyādhigatatadarthasya vinaśvaraphalāt karmaṇo viraktatvād dhetoḥ sthiramokṣābhilāṣukasya tadupāyabhūtabrahmajijñāsā bhavati/ brahmaśabdena svabhāvato nirastasamastadoṣānavadhikātiśayāsaṃkhyeyakalyāṇaguṇaḥ puruṣottamo ’bhidhīyate/ evaṃ ca karmajñānasya tadanuṣṭḥānasya ca vairāgyotpādanadvārā cittakalmaṣāpanayadvārā ca brahmajñānaṃ prati sādhanatvena tayoḥ kāryakāraṇatvena pūrvottaramīmāṃsayor ekaśāstratvam/ ata eva vṛttikārā ekam evedaṃ śāstraṃ jaiminīyena ṣoḍaśalakṣaṇenety āhuḥ/
div.label: [l. 4.286]
div.p: karmaphalasya kṣayitvaṃ brahmajñānaphalasya cākṣayitvaṃ "parīkṣya lokān karmacitān brāhmaṇo nirvedam āyān nāsty akṛtaḥ kṛtena" ityādiśrutibhir anumānārthāpattyupabṛṃhitābhiḥ pratyapādi/ ekaikanindayā karmaviśiṣṭasya jñānasya mokṣasādhanatvaṃ darśayati śrutiḥ:

quote.p: tato bhūya iva te tamo ya u vidyāyāṃ ratāḥ//
vidyāṃ cāvidyāṃ ca yas tad vedobhayaṃ saha/

div.p: ityādi/ tad uktaṃ pāñcarātrarahasye:

quote.p: yad āśrityaiva cidvargas tat taj jñeyaṃ prapadyate//
evaṃ guṇāḥ samānāḥ syur muktānām īśvarasya ca/
muktās tu śeṣiṇi brahmaṇy aśeṣe śeṣarūpiṇaḥ/
sarvān aśnuvate kāmān saha tena vipaścitā// iti/

div.label: [l. 4.312]
div.p:
tasmāt tāpatrayāturair amṛtatvāya puruṣottamādipadavedanīyaṃ brahma jijñāsitavyam ity uktaṃ bhavati/ prakṛtipratyayau pratyayārthaprādhānyena saha brūta itaḥ sanonyatreti vacanabalād icchāyā iṣyamāṇapradhānatvād iṣyamāṇaṃ jñānam iha vidheyam/ tac ca dhyānopāsanādiśabdavācyaṃ vedanaṃ na tu vākyajanyam āpātajñānam/ padasaṃdarbhaśrāviṇo vyutpannasya vidhānam antareṇāpi prāptatvāt/ ātmā vā are draṣṭavyaḥ śrotavyo mantavyo nididhāsitavyaḥ ātmety evopāsīta vijñāya prajñāṃ kurvīta anuvidya vijānāti ityādiśrutibhyaḥ/ atra śrotavya ity anuvādaḥ/ adhyayanavidhinā sāṅgasya svādhyāyasya grahaṇe ’dhītavedasya puruṣasya prayojanavadarthadarśanāt tannirṇayāya svarasata eva śravaṇe pravartamānatayā tasya prāptatvāt/ mantavya iti cānuvādaḥ/ śravaṇapratiṣṭhārthatvena mananasyāpi prāptatvāt/ aprāpte śāstram arthavad iti nyāyāt/ dhyānaṃ ca tailadhārāvad avicchinnasmṛtisaṃtānarūpā
°saṃtānarūpā ] ASS v.l., IV; °saṃtānarūpam A, ASS. dhruvā smṛtiḥ smṛtipratilambhe sarvagranthīnāṃ vipramokṣa iti dhruvāyāḥ smṛter eva mokṣopāyatvaśravaṇāt/ sā ca smṛtir darśanasamānākārā

quote.p: kṣīyante cāsya karmāṇi tasmin dṛṣṭe parāvare//

div.p: ity anenaikavākyatvāt/ tathā ca ātmā vā are draṣṭavyaḥ ity anenāsyā darśanarūpatā vidhīyate/ bhavati ca bhāvanāprakarṣāt smṛter darśanarūpatvam/ vākyakāreṇaitat sarvaṃ prapañcitaṃ vedanam upāsanaṃ syād ityādinā/ tad eva dhyānaṃ viśinaṣṭi śrutiḥ:

quote.p: nāyam ātmā pravacanena labhyo na medhayā na bahunā śrutena/
yam evaiṣa vṛṇute tena labhyas tasyaiṣa ātmā vivṛṇute tanūṃ svām// iti/

div.p: priyatama eva hi varaṇīyo bhavati/ yathāyaṃ priyatama ātmānaṃ prāpnoti tathā svayam eva bhagavān prayatata iti bhagavataivābhihitam:

quote.p: dadāmi buddhiyogaṃ taṃ yena mām upayānti te// iti/
puruṣaḥ sa paraḥ pārtha bhaktyā labhyas tv ananyayā/ iti ca/

div.label: [l. 4.344]
div.p: bhaktis tu niratiśayānandapriyānanyaprayojanasakaletaravaitṛṣṇyavajjñānaviśeṣa eva/ tatsiddhiś ca vivekādibhyo bhavatīti vākyakāreṇoktaṃ tallabdhir vivekavimokābhyāsakriyākalyāṇānavasādānuddharṣebhyaḥ saṃbhavān nirvacanāc ceti/ tatra viveko nāmāduṣṭād annāt sattvaśuddhiḥ/ atra nirvacanam: āhāraśuddheḥ sattvaśuddhiḥ sattvaśuddhyā dhruvā smṛtir iti/ vimokaḥ kāmānabhiṣvaṅgaḥ/ śānta upāsīteti nirvacanam/ punaḥ punaḥ saṃśīlanam abhyāsaḥ/ nirvacanaṃ ca smārtam udāhṛtaṃ bhāṣyakāreṇa "sadā tadbhāvabhāvitaḥ" iti/ śrautasmārtakarmānuṣṭhānaṃ śaktitaḥ kriyā/ kriyāvān eṣa brahmavidāṃ variṣṭha iti nirvacanam/ satyārjavadayādānādīni kalyāṇāni/ satyena labhyata ityādi nirvacanam/ dainyaviparyayo ’navasādaḥ/ nāyam ātmā balahīnena labhyaḥ iti nirvacanam/ tadviparyayajā tuṣṭir uddharṣaḥ/ tadviparyayo ’nuddharṣaḥ/ śānto dānta iti nirvacanam/
div.label: [l. 4.357]
div.p:
tad evam evaṃvidhaniyamaviśeṣasamāsāditapuruṣottamaprasādavidhvastatamaḥ-svāntasyānanyaprayojanānavarataniratiśayapriyaviśadātmapratyayāvabhāsatā-pannadhyānarūpayā bhaktyā puruṣottamapadaṃ labhyata iti siddham/ tad uktaṃ yāmunena: ubhayaparikarmitasvāntasyaikāntikātyantikabhaktiyogalabhya
°yogalabhya ] IV; °yogo labhya A, ASS. iti/ jñānakarmayogasaṃskṛtāntaḥkaraṇasyety arthaḥ/
div.label: [l. 4.362]
div.p: kiṃ punar brahma jijñāsitavyam ity apekṣāyāṃ lakṣaṇam uktaṃ "janmādy asya yataḥ" iti/ janmādīti sṛṣtisthitipralayam/ tadguṇasaṃvijñāno bahuvrīhiḥ/ asyācintyavividhavicitraracanasya niyatadeśakālabhogabrahmādistambaparyantakṣetrajñamiśrasya jagato yato yasmāt sarveśvarān nikhilaheyapratyanīkasvarūpāt satyasaṃkalpādyanavadhikātiśayāsaṃkhyeyakalyāṇaguṇāt sarvajñāt sarvaśakteḥ puṃsaḥ sṛṣṭisthitipralayāḥ pravartanta iti sūtrārthaḥ/
div.label: [l. 4.369]
div.p: itthaṃbhūte brahmaṇi kiṃ pramāṇam iti jijñāsāyāṃ śāstram eva pramāṇam ity uktaṃ śāstrayonitvāt iti/ śāstraṃ yoniḥ kāraṇaṃ pramāṇaṃ yasya tac chāstrayoni/ tasya bhāvas tattvaṃ tasmāt/ brahmajñānakāraṇatvāc chāstrasya tadyonitvaṃ brahmaṇa ity arthaḥ/ na ca brahmaṇaḥ pramāṇāntaragamyatvaṃ śaṅkituṃ śakyam/ atīndriyatvena pratyakṣasya tatra pravṛttyanupapatteḥ/ nāpi mahārṇavādikaṃ sakartṛkaṃ kāryatvād ghaṭavad ity anumānam/ tasya pūtikūṣmāṇḍāyamānatvāt/ tallakṣaṇaṃ brahma "yato vā imāni bhūtāni" ityādivākyaṃ pratipādayatīti sthitam/
div.label: [l. 4.377]
div.p: yady api brahma pramāṇāntaragocaratāṃ nāvatarati tathāpi pravṛttinivṛttiparatvābhāve siddharūpaṃ brahma na śāstraṃ pratipādayituṃ prabhavatīty etatparyanuyogaparihārāyoktaṃ: tat tu samanvayāt iti/ tuśabdaḥ prasaktāśaṅkāvyāvṛttyarthaḥ/ tacchāstrapramāṇakatvaṃ brahmaṇaḥ saṃbhavaty eva/ kutaḥ/ samanvayāt/ paramapuruṣārthabhūtasyaiva brahmaṇo ’bhidheyatayānvayād ity arthaḥ/ na ca pravṛttinivṛttyor anyataravirahiṇaḥ prayojanaśūnyatvam/ svarūpapareṣv api putras te jāto nāyaṃ sarpa ityādiṣu harṣaprāptibhayanivṛttirūpaprayojanavattvaṃ dṛṣṭam eveti na kiṃcid anupapannam/ diṅmātram atra pradarśitam/ vistaras tv ākarād evāvagantavya iti vistarabhīruṇodāsyata iti sarvam anākulam//
//iti sarvadarśanasaṃgrahe rāmānujadarśanam//

div.head: [atha pūrṇaprajñadarśanam //5//]
div.label: [l. 5.1]
div.p: tad etad rāmānujamataṃ jīvāṇutvadāsatvavedāpauruṣeyatvasiddhārthabodhakatvasvataḥpramāṇatva-pramāṇatritvapañcarātropajīvyatvaprapañcabhedasatyatvādisāmye 'pi parasparaviruddhabhedādipakṣatrayakakṣīkāreṇa kṣapaṇakapakṣanikṣiptam ity upekṣamāṇaḥ sa ātmā tat tvam asi ityādivedāntavākyajātasya bhaṅgyantareṇārthāntaraparatvam upapādya brahmamīmāṃsāvivaraṇavyājenānandatīrthaḥ prasthānāntaram āsthiṣata/
div.label: [l. 5.7]
div.p: tanmate hi dvividhaṃ tattvaṃ svatantraparatantrabhedāt/
tad uktaṃ tattvaviveke —

quote.p: svatantraṃ paratantraṃ ca dvividhaṃ tattvam iṣyate/

div.label: [l. 5.11]
div.p: nanu sajātīyavijātīyasvagatanānātvaśūnyaṃ brahmatattvam iti pratipādakeṣu vedānteṣu jāgarūkeṣu katham aśeṣasadguṇatvaṃ tasya kathyata iti cen
maivam/ bhedapramāpakabahupramāṇavirodhena teṣāṃ tatra prāmāṇyānupapatteḥ/ tathā hi — pratyakṣaṃ tāvad idam asmād bhinnam iti nīlapītāder bhedam adhyakṣayati/
div.label: [l. 5.16]
div.p: atha manyethāḥ — kiṃ pratyakṣaṃ bhedam evāvagāhate kiṃ vā dharmipratiyogighaṭitam/ na prathamaḥ/ dharmipratiyogipratipattim antareṇa tatsāpekṣasya bhedasyāśakyādhyavasāyatvāt/ dvitīye 'pi dharmipratiyogigrahaṇapuraḥsaraṃ bhedagrahaṇam atha vā yugapat tatsarvagrahaṇam/ na pūrvaḥ/ buddher viramya vyāpārābhāvāt/ anyonyāśrayaprasaṅgāc ca/ nāpi caramaḥ/ kāryakāraṇabuddhyor yaugapadyābhāvāt/ dharmipratītir hi bhedapratyayasya kāraṇam/ evaṃ pratiyogipratītir api/ saṃnihite 'pi dharmiṇi vyavahitapratiyogijñānam antareṇa bhedasyājñātatvenānvayavyatirekābhyāṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvāvagamāt/ tasmān na bhedapratyakṣaṃ suprasaram iti cet —
div.label: [l. 5.25]
div.p: kiṃ vastusvarūpabhedavādinaṃ pratīmāni dūṣaṇāny udghuṣyante kiṃ vā dharmabhedavādinaṃ prati/ prathame corāparādhān māṇḍavyanigrahanyāyāpātaḥ/ bhavadabhidhīyamānadūṣaṇānāṃ tadaviṣayatvāt/ nanu vastusvarūpasyaiva bhedatve pratiyogisāpekṣatvaṃ na ghaṭate ghaṭavat/ pratiyogisāpekṣa eva sarvatra bhedaḥ prathata iti cen na/ prathamaṃ sarvato vilakṣaṇatayā vastusvarūpe jñāyamāne pratiyogyapekṣayā viśiṣṭavyavahāropapatteḥ/ tathā hi/ parimāṇaghaṭitaṃ vastusvarūpaṃ prathamam avagamyate/ paścāt pratiyogiviśeṣāpekṣayā hrasvaṃ dīrgham iti tad eva viśiṣya vyavahārabhājanaṃ bhavati/ tad uktaṃ viṣṇutattvanirṇaye —

na ca viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyatayā bhedasiddhiḥ/ viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvaś ca bhedāpekṣaḥ/ dharmipratiyogyapekṣayā bhedasiddhiḥ/ bhedāpekṣaṃ ca dharmipratiyogitvam ity anyonyāśrayatayā bhedasyāyuktiḥ/ padārthasvarūpatvād bhedasya —
