ityādinā/ ata eva gavārthino gavayadarśanān na pravartante gośabdaṃ ca na smaranti/ na ca nīrakṣīrādau svarūpe gṛhyamāṇe bhedapratibhāso 'pi syād iti bhaṇanīyam/ samānābhihārādipratibandhakabalād bhedabhānavyavahārābhāvopapatteḥ/ tad uktam —

quote.p: saukṣmyād vyavadhānād abhibhavāt samānābhihārāc ca// iti/

div.label: [l. 5.43]
div.p: atidūrād giriśikharavartitarvādau, atisāmīpyāl locanāñjanādau, indriyaghātād vidyudādau, manonavasthānāt kāmādyupaplutamanaskasya sphītālokavartini ghaṭādau, saukṣmyāt paramāṇvādau vyavadhānāt kuḍyādyantarhite abhibhavād divā pradīpaprabhādau samānābhihārān nīrakṣīrādau yathāvad grahaṇaṃ nāstīty arthaḥ/
div.label: [l. 5.48]
div.p: bhavatu vā dharmabhedavādas tathāpi na kaścid doṣaḥ/ dharmipratiyogigrahaṇe sati paścāt tadghaṭitabhedagrahaṇopapatteḥ/ na ca parasparāśrayaprasaṅgaḥ/ parān anapekṣya prabhedaśālino vastuno grahaṇe sati dharmabhedabhānasaṃbhavāt/ na ca dharmabhedavāde tasya tasya bhedasya bhedāntarabhedyatvenānavasthā duravasthā syād ity āstheyam/ bhedāntaraprasaktau mūlābhāvāt/ bhedabhedinau bhinnāv iti vyavahārādarśanāt/ na caikabhedabalenānyabhedānumānam/ dṛṣṭāntabhedāvighātenotthāne doṣābhāvāt/ so 'yaṃ piṇyākayācanārthaṃ gatasya khārikātailadātṛtvābhyupagama iva/ dṛṣṭāntabhedavimarde tv anutthānam eva/ na hi varavighātāya kanyodvāhaḥ/ tasmān mūlakṣayābhāvād anavasthā na doṣāya/
div.label: [l. 5.58]
div.p: anumānenāpi bhedo 'vasīyate/ parameśvaro jīvād bhinnaḥ/ taṃ prati sevyatvāt/ yo yaṃ prati sevyaḥ sa tasmād bhinnaḥ/ yathā bhṛtyād rājā/ na hi sukhaṃ me syād duḥkhaṃ me na manāg api — iti puruṣārtham arthayamānāḥ puruṣāḥ sthapatipadaṃ kāmayamānāḥ satkārabhājo bhaveyuḥ/ pratyuta sarvānarthabhājanaṃ bhavanti/ yaḥ svasyātmano hīnatvaṃ parasya guṇotkarṣaṃ ca kathayati sa stutyaḥ prītaḥ stāvakasya tasyābhīṣṭaṃ prayacchati/
div.label: [l. 5.64]
div.p: tad āha —

quote.p: ghātayanti hi rājāno rājāham iti vādinaḥ/
dadaty akhilam iṣṭaṃ ca svaguṇotkarṣavādinām// iti/

div.label: [l. 5.67]
div.p: evaṃ ca parameśvarābhedatṛṣṇayā viṣṇor guṇotkarṣasya mṛgatṛṣṇikāsamatvābhidhānaṃ vipulakadalīphalalipsayā jihvācchedanam anusarati/ etādṛśaviṣṇuvidveṣaṇād andhatamasapraveśaprasaṅgāt/ tad etat pratipāditaṃ madhyamandireṇa mahābhāratatātparyanirṇaye —

quote.p: tamasy andhe pātayati daityān ante viniścayāt// iti/

div.label: [l. 5.74]
div.p: sā ca sevā — aṅkananāmakaraṇabhajanabhedāt trividhā/ tatrāṅkanaṃ nārāyaṇāyudhādīnāṃ tadrūpasmaraṇārtham apekṣitārthasiddhyarthaṃ ca/ tathā ca śākalyasaṃhitāpariśiṣṭam —

quote.p: tad viṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padaṃ yena gacchanti lāñchitāḥ/
urukramasya cihnair aṅkitā loke subhagā bhavāmaḥ// iti/

div.p:
ataptatanūr na tadāmo aśnute śṛtāsa
śṛtāsa ] Taittirīya Āraṇyaka; śritāsa A, ASS, IV. id vahantas tat samāśata
samāśata ] Taittirīya Āraṇyaka; samāsata A, ASS, IV. / iti taittirīyakopaniṣac ca/ sthānaviśeṣaś cāgneyapurāṇe darśitaḥ —

quote.p: dakṣiṇe tu kare vipro bibhṛyāc ca sudarśanam/
savyena śaṅkhaṃ bibhṛyād iti brahmavido viduḥ// iti/

div.label: [l. 5.91]
div.p: anyatra cakradhāraṇe mantraviśeṣaś ca darśitaḥ/

quote.p: ajñānāndhasya me nityaṃ viṣṇor mārgaṃ pradarśaya//
tvaṃ purā sāgarotpanno viṣṇunā vidhṛtaḥ kare/
namitaḥ sarvadevaiś ca pāñcajanya namo 'stu te// iti/

div.label: [l. 5.96]
div.p: nāmakaraṇaṃ putrādīnāṃ keśavādināmnā vyavahāraḥ sarvadā tannāmānusmaraṇārtham/
div.label: [l. 5.98]
div.p: bhajanaṃ daśavidhaṃ vācā satyaṃ hitaṃ priyaṃ svādhyāyaḥ kāyena dānaṃ paritrāṇaṃ parirakṣaṇaṃ manasā dayā spṛhā śraddhā ceti/ atraikaikaṃ niṣpādya nārāyaṇe samarpaṇaṃ bhajanam/ tad uktam —

quote.p: aṅkanaṃ nāmakaraṇaṃ bhajanaṃ daśadhā ca tat/ iti/

div.p: evaṃ jñeyatvādināpi bhedo 'numātavyaḥ/
div.label: [l. 5.104]
div.p: tathā śrutyāpi bhedo 'vagantavyaḥ/ satyam enam anu viśve madanti rātiṃ devasya gṛṇato maghonaḥ/ satyaḥ so asya mahimā gṛṇe śavo yajñeṣu viprarājye/ satya ātmā satyo jīvaḥ satyaṃ bhidā satyaṃ bhidā satyaṃ bhidā maivāruvaṇyo maivāruvaṇyo maivāruvaṇya iti mokṣānandabhedapratipādakaśrutibhyaḥ/

quote.p: idaṃ jñānam upāśritya mama sādharmyam āgatāḥ/
sarge 'pi nopajāyante pralaye na vyathanti ca//

div.p: jagadvyāpāravarjam/ prakaraṇād asaṃnihitatvāc ca ityādibhyaś ca/ na ca brahma veda brahmaiva bhavati iti śrutibalāj jīvasya pāramaiśvaryaṃ śakyaśaṅkam/

quote.p: saṃpūjya brāhmaṇaṃ bhaktyā śūdro 'pi brāhmaṇo bhavet/

div.p: itivad bṛṃhito bhavatīty arthaparatvāt/
div.label: [l. 5.116]
div.p: nanu

quote.p: prapañco yadi vidyeta nivarteta na saṃśayaḥ/

div.p: iti vacanād dvaitasya kalpitatvam avagamyata iti cet —

satyam/ bhāvam anabhisaṃdhāyābhidhānāt/ tathā hi yady ayam utpadyeta tarhi nivarteta na saṃśayaḥ/ tasmād anādir evāyaṃ prakṛṣṭaḥ pañcavidho bhedaprapañcaḥ/ na cāyam avidyamānaḥ/ māyāmātratvāt/ māyeti bhagavadicchocyate/
div.label: [l. 5.123]

quote.p: a ity ukto haris tasya māyāvidyeti saṃjñitā//
māyety uktā prakṛṣṭatvāt prakṛṣṭe hi mayābhidhā/
viṣṇoḥ prajñaptir evaikā śabdair etair udīryate//
prajñaptirūpo hi hariḥ sā ca svānandalakṣaṇā//

div.p: ityādivacananicayaprāmāṇyabalāt/ saiva prajñā mānatrāṇakartrī ca yasya tan māyāmātram/ tataś ca parameśvareṇa jñātatvād rakṣitatvāc ca na dvaitaṃ bhrāntikalpitam/ na hīśvare sarvasya bhrāntiḥ saṃbhavati/ viśeṣādarśananibandhanatvād bhrānteḥ/ tarhi tadvyapadeśaḥ katham ity atrottaram advaitaṃ paramārthata iti/ paramārthata iti paramārthāpekṣayā/ tena sarvasmād uttamasya viṣṇutattvasya samābhyadhikaśūnyatvam uktaṃ bhavati/ tathā ca paramā śrutiḥ —
div.label: [l. 5.136]

quote.p: mithaś ca jaḍabhedo yaḥ prapañco bhedapañcakaḥ/
so 'yaṃ satyo' py anādiś ca sādiś cen nāśam āpnuyāt//
na ca nāśaṃ prayāty eṣa na cāsau bhrāntikalpitaḥ/
kalpitaś cen nivarteta na cāsau vinivartate//
dvaitaṃ na vidyata iti tasmād ajñānināṃ matam/
mataṃ hi jñāninām etan mitaṃ trātaṃ hi viṣṇunā//
tasmān mātram iti proktaṃ paramo harir eva tu/ ityādi/

div.p: tasmād viṣṇoḥ sarvotkarṣa eva tātparyaṃ sarvāgamānām/
div.label: [l. 5.146]
div.p: etad evābhisaṃdhāyābhihitaṃ bhagavatā —

quote.p: dvāv imau puruṣau loke kṣaraś cākṣara eva ca/
uttamaḥ puruṣas tv anyaḥ paramātmety udāhṛtaḥ/
yo lokatrayam āviśya bibharty avyaya īśvaraḥ//
yasmāt kṣaram atīto 'ham akṣarād api cottamaḥ/
ato 'smi loke vede ca prathitaḥ puruṣottamaḥ//
yo mām evam asaṃmūḍho jānāti puruṣottamam/
sa sarvavid bhajati māṃ sarvabhāvena bhārata//
iti guhyatamaṃ śāstram idam uktaṃ mayānagha/
etad buddhvā buddhimān syāt kṛtakṛtyaś ca bhārata// iti/

div.label: [l. 5.158]
div.p: mahāvarāhe 'pi —

quote.p: mukhyaṃ ca sarvavedānāṃ tātparyaṃ śrīpatau pare/
utkarṣe tu tadanyatra tātparyaṃ syād avāntaram// iti/

div.p: yuktaṃ ca viṣṇoḥ sarvotkarṣe mahātātparyam/ mokṣo hi sarvapuruṣārthottamaḥ/

quote.p: dharmārthakāmāḥ sarve 'pi na nityā mokṣa eva hi/
nityas tasmāt tadarthāya yateta matimān naraḥ//

div.p: iti bhāllaveyaśruteḥ/ mokṣaś ca viṣṇuprasādam antareṇa na labhyate/

quote.p: yasya prasādāt paramārtirūpād asmāt saṃsārān mucyate nāpareṇa/
nārāyaṇo 'sau paramo vicintyo mumukṣubhiḥ karmapāśād amuṣmāt//

div.p: iti nārāyaṇaśruteḥ/
iti viṣṇupurāṇokteś ca/ prasādaś ca guṇotkarṣajñānād eva nābhedajñānād ity uktam/
div.label: [l. 5.176]
div.p: na ca tat tvam asyāditādātmyavyākopaḥ/ śrutitātparyāparijñānavijṛmbhaṇāt/

quote.p: āha nityaparokṣaṃ tu tacchabdo hy aviśeṣataḥ/
tvaṃśabdaś cāparokṣārthaṃ tayor aikyaṃ kathaṃ bhavet//
ādityo yūpa itivat sādṛśyārthā tu sā śrutiḥ/ iti/

div.p: tathā ca paramā śrutiḥ —

quote.p: jīvasya paramaikyaṃ tu buddhisārūpyam eva tu/

div.label: [l. 5.186]
div.p: atha vā tat tvam asīty atra sa evātmā svātantryādiguṇopetatvāt/ atat tvam asi tvaṃ tan na bhavasi tadrahitatvād ity ekatvam atiśayena nirākṛtam/ tad āha —

quote.p: atat tvam iti vā chedas tenaikyaṃ sunirākṛtam/ iti/

div.p: tasmād dṛṣṭāntanavake 'pi sa yathā śakuniḥ sūtreṇa prabaddhaḥ ityādinā bheda eva dṛṣṭāntābhidhānān nāyam abhedopadeśa iti tattvavādarahasyam/
div.label: [l. 5.194]
div.p: tathā ca mahopaniṣat —

quote.p: yathā pakṣī ca sūtraṃ ca nānāvṛkṣarasā yathā/
yathā nadyaḥ samudrāś ca yathā jīvamahīruhau//
yathāṇimā ca dhānā ca śuddhodalavaṇe yathā/
corāpahāryau ca yathā yathā puṃviṣayāv api//
yathājño jīvasaṃghaś ca prāṇādeś ca niyāmakaḥ/
tathāpi sūkṣmarūpatvān na jīvāt paramo hariḥ/
vailakṣaṇyaṃ tayor jñātvā mucyate badhyate 'nyathā/ iti/
brahmā śivaḥ surādyāś ca śarīrakṣaraṇāt kṣarāḥ/
niḥsīmatvena te sarve tadvaśāḥ sarvadaiva ca// iti
tadvaśā eva te sarve sarvadaiva sa īśvaraḥ// iti ca/

div.label: [l. 5.211]
div.p:
ekavijñānena sarvavijñānaṃ ca pradhānatvakāraṇatvādinā yujyate na tu sarvamithyātvena/ na hi satyajñānena mithyājñānaṃ saṃbhavati/ yathā pradhānapuruṣāṇāṃ jñānājñānābhyāṃ grāmo jñāto 'jñāta ity evamādivyapadeśo dṛṣṭa eva/ yathā ca kāraṇe pitari jñāte jānāty asya putram iti/ yathā vā sādṛśyād ekastrījñānād anyastrījñānam iti/ tad eva sādṛśyam atrāpi vivakṣitaṃ yathā somyaikena mṛtpiṇḍena sarvaṃ mṛṇmayaṃ vijñātaṃ syād ityādinā/
tad eva ... syād ityādinā/ ] A, ASS; om. IV. anyathā somyaikena mṛtpiṇḍena sarvaṃ mṛṇmayaṃ vijñātam ity atraikapiṇḍaśabdau vṛthā prasajyeyātām/ mṛdā vijñātam ity etāvataiva vākyasya pūrṇatvāt/ na ca vācārambhaṇaṃ vikāro nāmadheyaṃ mṛttikety eva satyam ity etat kāryasya mithyātvam ācaṣṭa ity eṣṭavyam/ vācārambhaṇaṃ vikāro yasya tad avikṛtaṃ nityaṃ nāmadheyaṃ mṛttiketyādikam ity etad vacanaṃ satyam ity arthasya svīkārāt/ aparathā nāmadheyamitiśabdayor vaiyarthyaṃ prasajyeta/ ato na kutrāpi jagato mithyātvasiddhiḥ/
div.label: [l. 5.224]
div.p: kiṃ ca prapañco mithyety atra mithyātvaṃ tathyam atathyaṃ vā/ prathame satyādvaitabhaṅgaprasaṅgaḥ/ carame prapañcasatyatvāpātaḥ/

nanv anityatvaṃ nityam anityaṃ vā/ ubhayathāpy anupapattir ity ākṣepavad ayam api nityasamajātibhedaḥ syāt/ tad uktaṃ nyāyanirmāṇavedhasā — nityam anityabhāvād anitye nityatvopapatter nityasamaḥ iti/ tārkikarakṣāyāṃ ca —
div.label: [l. 5.232]
div.p: asyāḥ saṃjñāyā upalakṣaṇatvam abhipretyābhihitaṃ prabodhasiddhāv anvarthitvāt tūparañjakadharmasameti/ tasmād asad uttaram etad iti cet —

aśikṣitatrāsanam etat/ duṣṭatvamūlānirūpaṇāt/ tad dvividhaṃ sādhāraṇam asādhāraṇaṃ ca/ tatrādyaṃ svavyāghātakam/ dvitīyaṃ trividhaṃ yuktāṅgahīnatvam ayuktāṅgādhikatvam aviṣayavṛttitvaṃ ceti/ tatra sādhāraṇam asaṃbhāvitam eva/ uktasyākṣepasya svātmavyāpanānupalambhāt/ evam asādhāraṇam api/ ghaṭasya nāstitāyāṃ nāstitoktāv astitvavat prakṛte 'py upapatteḥ/
div.label: [l. 5.239]
div.p: nanu prapañcasya mithyātvam abhyupeyate nāsattvam iti cet tad etat so 'yaṃ śiraśchede 'pi śataṃ na dadāti viṃśatipañcakaṃ tu prayacchatīti śākaṭikavṛttāntam anuharet/ mithyātvāsattvayoḥ paryāyatvād iti alam atiprapañcena/
div.label: [l. 5.242]
div.p: tatrāthāto brahmajijñāsā iti prathamasūtrasyāyam arthaḥ/ tatrāthaśabdo maṅgalārtho 'dhikārānantaryārthaś ca svīkriyate/ ataḥśabdo hetvarthaḥ/ tad uktaṃ gāruḍe —

quote.p: prārabhyante niyatyaiva tat kim atra niyāmakam//
kaś cārthas tu tayor vidvan katham uttamatā tayoḥ/
etad ākhyāhi me brahman yathā jñāsyāmi tattvataḥ//
evam ukto nāradena brahmā provāca sattamaḥ/
athaśabdas tv ataḥśabdo hetvarthe samudīritaḥ/ iti/

div.p: yato nārāyaṇaprasādam antareṇa na mokṣo labhyate prasādaś ca jñānam antareṇa ato brahmajijñāsā kartavyeti siddham/
div.label: [l. 5.254]
div.p: jijñāsyabrahmaṇo lakṣaṇam uktaṃ janmādy asya yataḥ iti/ sṛṣṭisthityādi yato bhavati tad brahmeti vākyārthaḥ/ tathā ca skāndaṃ vacaḥ —

quote.p: bandhamokṣau ca puruṣād yasmāt sa harir ekarāṭ// iti/

div.p: yato vā imānītyādiśrutibhyaś ca/
div.label: [l. 5.260]
div.p: tatra pramāṇam apy uktaṃ śāstrayonitvāt iti/ nāvedavin manute taṃ bṛhantam taṃ tv aupaniṣadam ityādiśrutibhyas tasyānumānikatvaṃ nirākriyate/ na cānumānasya svātantryeṇa prāmāṇyam asti/ tad uktaṃ kaurme —

quote.p: niścayāt sādhayed arthaṃ pramāṇāntaram eva ca//
pramāṇapadavīṃ gacchen nātra kāryā vicāraṇā// iti

div.p: śāstrasvarūpam uktaṃ skānde —

quote.p: yac cānukūlam etasya tac ca śāstraṃ prakīrtitam/
ato 'nyo granthavistāro naiva śāstraṃ kuvartma tat// iti/

div.label: [l. 5.273]
div.p: tad anena ananyalabhyaḥ śāstrārtha iti nyāyena bhedasya prāptatvena tatra na tātparyaṃ kiṃ tv advaita eva vedavākyānāṃ tātparyam — ity advaitavādināṃ pratyāśā pratikṣiptā/ anumānād īśvarasya siddhyabhāvena tadbhedasyāpi tataḥ siddhyabhāvāt/ tasmān na bhedānuvādakatvam iti tatparatvam avagamyate/ ata evoktam —
div.label: [l. 5.281]
div.p: śāstrasya tatra prāmāṇyam upapāditaṃ tat tu samanvayāt iti/ samanvaya upakramādiliṅgam/ uktaṃ bṛhatsaṃhitāyām —
div.label: [l. 5.285]
div.p: evaṃ vedāntatātparyavaśāt tad eva brahma śāstragamyam ity uktaṃ bhavati/ diṅmātram atra prādarśi/ śiṣṭam ānandatīrthabhāṣyavyākhyānādau draṣṭavyam/ granthabahutvabhiyoparamyata iti/
div.label: [l. 5.288]
div.p: etac ca rahasyaṃ pūrṇaprajñena madhyamandireṇa vāyos tṛtīyāvatāraṃmanyena nirūpitam/

quote.p: prathamas tu hanūmān syād dvitīyo bhīma eva ca/

div.p: etad evābhipretya tatra tatra granthasamāptāv idaṃ padyaṃ likhyate —

quote.p: yasya trīṇy uditāni vedavacane divyāni rūpāṇy alaṃ
baṭ tad darśatam ittham eva nihitaṃ devasya bhargo mahat/
vāyo rāmavaconayaṃ prathamakaṃ pṛkṣo dvitīyaṃ vapur
madhvo yat tu tṛtīyam etad amunā granthaḥ kṛtaḥ keśave//

div.p: etatpadyārthas tu baḻ itthā tad vapuṣe dhāyi darśataṃ devasya bhargaḥ sahaso yato jani ityādiśrutiparyālocanayāvagamyata iti/ tasmāt sarvasya śāstrasya viṣṇutattvaṃ sarvottamam ity atra tātparyam iti sarvaṃ niravadyam/
iti sarvadarśanasaṅgrahe pūrṇaprajñadarśanam/
atha nakulīśapāśupatadarśanam //6//
div.label: [l. 6.1]
div.p: tad etad vaiṣṇavamataṃ dāsatvādipadavedanīyaṃ paratantratvaṃ duḥkhāvahatvān na duḥkhāntādīpsitāspadam ity arocayamānāḥ pāramaiśvaryaṃ kāmayamānāḥ parābhimatā muktā na bhavanti paratantratvāt pāramaiśvaryarahitatvād asmadādivat muktātmānaś ca parameśvaraguṇasaṃbandhinaḥ puruṣatve sati samastaduḥkhabījavidhuratvāt parameśvaravat — ityādy anumānaṃ pramāṇaṃ pratipadyamānāḥ kecana māheśvarāḥ paramapuruṣārthasādhanaṃ pañcārthaprapañcanaparaṃ pāśupataśāstram āśrayante/
div.label: [l. 6.8]
div.p: tatredam ādisūtram — athātaḥ paśupateḥ pāśupatayogavidhiṃ vyākhyāsyāma iti/ asyārthaḥ — atrāthaśabdaḥ pūrvaprakṛtāpekṣaḥ/ pūrvaprakṛtaś ca guruṃ prati śiṣyasya praśnaḥ/ gurusvarūpaṃ gaṇakārikāyāṃ nirūpitam —

quote.p: pañcakās tv aṣṭa vijñeyā gaṇaś caikas trikātmakaḥ/
vettā navagaṇasyāsya saṃskartā gurur ucyate// iti/
dīkṣākāribalāny aṣṭau pañcakās trīṇi vṛttayaḥ// iti/

div.p:
tisro vṛttaya iti prayoktavye trīṇi vṛttaya iti cchāndasaḥ prayogaḥ/ tatra vidhīyamānam upāyaphalaṃ lābhaḥ/ jñānatapodevanityatva
°devanityatva° ] IV, v.l. ASS; °nityatva° A. sthitiśuddhibhedāt pañcavidhaḥ/ tad āha haradattācāryaḥ —
div.label: [l. 6.18]

quote.p: jñanaṃ tapo 'tha nityatvaṃ sthitiḥ śuddhiś ca pañcamam// iti/

div.p: ātmāśrito duṣṭabhāvo malaḥ/ sa mithyājñānādibhedāt pañcavidhaḥ/ tad apy āha —

quote.p: mithyājñānam adharmaś ca saktihetuś cyutis tathā/

paśutvaṃ mūlaṃ
paśutvaṃ mūlaṃ ] paśutvamūlam ASS, IV, A. pañcaite tantre heyā viviktitaḥ// iti/

div.p: sādhakasya śuddhihetur upāyo vāsacaryādibhedāt pañcavidhaḥ/ tad apy āha —

quote.p: vāsacaryā japo dhyānaṃ sadā rudrasmṛtis tathā/
prapattiś ceti lābhānām upāyāḥ pañca niścitāḥ// iti/

div.label: [l. 6.26]
div.p: yenārthānusaṃdhānapūrvakaṃ jñānatapovṛddhī prāpnoti sa deśo gurujanādiḥ/ yad āha —

quote.p: gurur jano guhādeśaḥ śmaśānaṃ rudra eva ca/ iti/

div.p: ā lābhaprāpter ekamaryādāvasthitasya yad avasthānaṃ sāvasthā vyaktādiviśeṣaṇaviśiṣṭā/
div.label: [l. 6.31]
div.p: tad uktam —

quote.p:
vyaktāvyaktā jayā chedo
chedo ] Hara 1958: 16-17; dānaṃ ASS, IV, A. niṣṭhā caiva hi pañcamam/ iti/

div.p: mithyājñānādīnām atyantavyapoho viśuddhiḥ/ sā pratiyogibhedāt pañcavidhā/ tad uktam —

quote.p: cyuter hāniḥ paśutvasya śuddhiḥ pañcavidhā smṛtā// iti/

div.p: dīkṣākāripañcakaṃ coktam —

quote.p: dravyaṃ kālaḥ kriyā mūrtir guruś caiva hi pañcamaḥ// iti/

div.p: balapañcakaṃ ca —

quote.p: gurubhaktiḥ prasādaś ca mater dvandvajayas tathā/
dharmaś caivāpramādaś ca balaṃ pañcavidhaṃ smṛtam// iti/

div.p: pañcamalalaghūkaraṇārtham āgamāvirodhino 'nnārjanopāyā vṛttayo bhaikṣyotsṛṣṭayathālabdhābhidhā iti/ śeṣam aśeṣam ākara evāvagantavyam/
div.label: [l. 6.44]
div.p: ataḥśabdena duḥkhāntasya pratipādanam/ ādhyātmikādiduḥkhatrayavyapohapraśnārthatvāt tasya/ paśuśabdena kāryasya/ paratantravacanatvāt tasya/ patiśabdena kāraṇasya/ īśvaraḥ patir īśiteti jagatkāraṇībhūteśvaravacanatvāt tasya/ yogavidhī tu prasiddhau/
div.label: [l. 6.48]
div.p: tatra duḥkhānto dvividhaḥ — anātmakaḥ sātmakaś ceti/ tatrānātmakaḥ sarvaduḥkhānām atyantocchedarūpaḥ/ sātmakas tu dṛkkriyāśaktilakṣaṇam aiśvaryam/ tatra dṛkśaktir ekāpi viṣayabhedāt pañcavidhopacaryate darśanaṃ śravaṇaṃ mananaṃ vijñānaṃ sarvajñatvaṃ ceti/ tatra sūkṣmavyavahitaviprakṛṣṭāśeṣacākṣuṣasparśādiviṣayaṃ jñānaṃ darśanam/ aśeṣaśabdaviṣayaṃ siddhijñānaṃ śravaṇam/ samastacintāviṣayaṃ siddhijñānaṃ mananam/ niravaśeṣaśāstraviṣayaṃ granthato ’rthataś ca siddhijñānaṃ vijñānam/ svaśāstraṃ yenocyate/ uktānuktāśeṣārtheṣu samāsavistaravibhāgaviśeṣataś ca tattvavyāptasadoditasiddhijñānaṃ sarvajñatvam iti/ eṣā dhīśaktiḥ/

kriyāśaktir ekāpi trividhopacaryate manojavitvaṃ kāmarūpitvaṃ vikaraṇadharmitvaṃ ceti/ tatra niratiśayaśīghrakāritvaṃ manojavitvam/ karmādinirapekṣasya svecchayaivānantasalakṣaṇavilakṣaṇasarūpakaraṇādhiṣṭhātṛtvaṃ kāmarūpitvam/ upasaṃhṛtakaraṇasyāpi niratiśayaiśvaryasaṃbandhitvaṃ vikaraṇadharmitvam iti/ esā kriyāśaktiḥ/
div.label: [l. 6.61]
div.p: asvatantraṃ sarvaṃ kāryam/ tat trividhaṃ vidyā kalā paśuś ceti/ eteṣāṃ jñānāt saṃśayādinivṛttiḥ/

tatra paśuguṇo vidyā/ sāpi dvividhā bodhābodhasvabhāvabhedāt/ bodhasvabhāvā vivekāvivekapravṛttibhedād dvividhā/ sā cittam ity ucyate/ cittena hi sarvaḥ prāṇī bodhātmakaprakāśānugṛhītaṃ sāmānyena vivecitam avivecitaṃ cārthaṃ cetayata iti/ tatra vivekapravṛttiḥ pramāṇamātravyaṅgyā/

paśvarthadharmādharmikā punar abodhātmikā vidyā/ cetanaparatantratve saty acetanā kalā/ sāpi dvividhā — kāryākhā kāraṇākhyā ceti/ tatra kāryākhyā daśavidhā pṛthivyādīni pañca tattvāni rūpādayaḥ pañca guṇāś ceti/ kāraṇākhyā trayodaśavidhā — jñānendriyapañcakaṃ karmendriyapañcakam adhyavasāyābhimānasaṃkalpābhidhavṛttibhedād buddhyahaṃkāramanolakṣaṇam antaḥkaraṇatrayaṃ ceti/
paśutvasaṃbandhī paśuḥ/ so ’pi dvividhaḥ — sāñjano nirañjanaś ceti/ tatra sāñjanaḥ śarīrendriyasaṃbandhī/ nirañjanas tu tadrahitaḥ/ tatprapañcas tu pañcārthabhāṣyadīpikādau draṣṭavyaḥ/
div.label: [l. 6.74]
div.p:
samastasṛṣṭisaṃhārānugrahakāri kāraṇam/ tasyaikasyāpi guṇakarmabhedāpekṣayā vibhāgaḥ uktaḥ patiḥ sann ādya
sann ādya ] Hara 1958: 24 n. 105; sādya A. ityādinā/ tatra patitvaṃ niratiśayadṛkkriyāśaktiḥ/ sattvaṃ
śaktiḥ/ sattvam ] Hara 1958: 24 n. 106; śaktimattvam A. tenaiśvaryeṇa nityasaṃbandhitvam/ ādyatvam anāgantukaiśvaryasaṃbandhitvam/ ity ādarśakārādibhis tīrthakarair nirūpitam/
div.label: [l. 6.78]
div.p: cittadvāreṇātmeśvarasaṃbandhahetur yogaḥ/ sa ca dvividhaḥ kriyālakṣaṇaḥ kriyoparamalakṣaṇaś ceti/ tatra japadhyānādirūpaḥ kriyālakṣaṇaḥ/ kriyoparamalakṣaṇas tu niṣṭhāsaṃvidgatyādisaṃjñitaḥ/
div.label: [l. 6.81]
div.p: dharmārthasādhakavyāpāro vidhiḥ/ sa ca dvividhaḥ — pradhānabhūto guṇabhūtaś ca/ tatra pradhānabhūtaḥ sākṣād dharmahetuś caryā/ sā dvividhā vrataṃ dvārāṇi ceti/ tatra bhasmasnānaśayanopahārajapapradakṣiṇāni vratam/ tad uktam bhagavatā nakulīśena — bhasmanā triṣavaṇaṃ snāyīta bhasmani śayīteti/

atropahāro niyamaḥ/ sa ca ṣaḍaṅgaḥ/ tad uktaṃ sūtrakāreṇa — hasitagītanṛtyahuḍukkāranamaskārajapyaṣaḍaṅgopahāreṇopatiṣṭheteti/ tatra hasitaṃ nāma kaṇṭhoṣṭhapuṭavisphūrjanapuraḥsaram ahahety aṭṭahāsaḥ/

gītaṃ gāndharvaśāstrasamayānusāreṇa maheśvarasaṃbandhiguṇadharmādinimittānāṃ cintanam/ nṛtyam api nāṭyaśāstrānusāreṇa hastapādādīnām utkṣepaṇādikam aṅgapratyaṅgopāṅgasahitaṃ bhāvābhāvasametaṃ ca prayoktavyam/ huḍukkāro nāma jihvātālusaṃyogān niṣpādyamānaḥ puṇyo vṛṣanādasadṛśo nādaḥ/ huḍug iti śabdānukāro vaṣaḍ itivat/ yatra laukikā bhavanti tatraitat sarvaṃ gūḍhaṃ prayoktavyam/ śiṣṭaṃ prasiddham/ dvārāṇi tu krāthanaspandanamandanaśṛṅgāraṇāvitatkaraṇāvitadbhāṣaṇāni/ tatrāsuptasyaiva suptaliṅgapradarśanaṃ krāthanam/ vāyvabhibhūtasyeva śarīrāvayavānāṃ kampanaṃ spandanam/ upahatapādendriyasyeva gamanaṃ mandanam/ rūpayauvanasaṃpannāṃ kāminīm avalokyātmānaṃ kāmukam iva yair vilāsaiḥ pradarśayati tac chṛṅgāraṇam/ kāryākāryavivekavikalasyeva lokaninditakarmakaraṇam avitatkaraṇam/ vyāhatāpārthakādiśabdoccāraṇam avitadbhāṣaṇam iti/ guṇabhūtas tu vidhiś caryānugrāhako ’nusnānādir bhaikṣyocchiṣṭādinirmitāyogyatāpratyayanivṛttyarthaḥ/ tad apy uktaṃ sūtrakāreṇa — anusnānanirmālyaliṅgadhārīti/
div.label: [l. 6.101]
div.p: tatra samāso nāma dharmimātrābhidhānam/ tac ca prathamasūtra eva kṛtam/ pañcānāṃ padārthānāṃ pramāṇataḥ pañcābhidhānaṃ vistaraḥ/ sa khalu rāśīkarabhāṣye draṣṭavyaḥ/ eteṣāṃ yathāsaṃbhavaṃ lakṣaṇato ’saṃkareṇābhidhānaṃ vibhāgaḥ/ sa tu vihita eva/ śāstrāntarebhyo ’mīṣāṃ guṇātiśayena kathanaṃ viśeṣaḥ/ tathā hi — anyatra duḥkhanivṛttir eva duḥkhāntaḥ/ iha tu pāramaiśvaryaprāptiś ca/ anyatrābhūtvā bhāvi kāryam/ iha tu nityaṃ paśvādi/ anyatra sāpekṣaṃ kāraṇam/ iha tu nirapekṣo bhagavān eva/ anyatra kaivalyādiphalako yogaḥ/ iha tu pāramaiśvaryaduḥkhāntaphalakaḥ/ anyatra punar āvṛttirūpasvargādiphalako vidhiḥ/ iha punar apunarāvṛttirūpasāmīpyādiphalakaḥ/
div.label: [l. 6.110]
div.p: nanu mahad etad indrajālaṃ yan nirapekṣaḥ parameśvaraḥ kāraṇam iti/ tathātve karmavaiphalyaṃ sarvakāryāṇāṃ samasamayasamutpādaś ceti doṣadvayaṃ prāduḥṣyāt/
div.label: [l. 6.112]
div.p: maivaṃ manyethāḥ/ vyadhikaraṇatvāt/

yadi nirapekṣasya bhagavataḥ kāraṇatvaṃ syāt tarhi karmaṇo vaiphalye kim āyātam/ prayojanābhāva iti cet — kasya prayojanābhāvaḥ karmavaiphalye kāraṇam/ kiṃ karmiṇaḥ kiṃ vā bhagavataḥ/ nādyaḥ/ īśvarecchānugṛhītasya karmaṇaḥ saphalatvopapatteḥ/ tadananugṛhītasya yayātiprabhṛtikarmavat kadācin niṣphalatvasaṃbhavāc ca/ na caitāvatā karmasv apravṛttiḥ/ karṣakādivad upapatteḥ/ īśvarecchāyattatvāc ca paśūnāṃ pravṛtteḥ/ nāpi dvitīyaḥ/ parameśvarasya paryāptakāmatvena karmasādhyaprayojanāpekṣāyā abhāvāt/ yad uktaṃ samasamayasamutpāda iti tad apy ayuktam/ acintyaśaktikasya parameśvarasyecchānuvidhāyinyā avyāhatakriyāśaktyā kāryakāritvābhyupagamāt/ tad uktaṃ saṃpradāyavidbhiḥ —
div.label: [l. 6.122]

quote.p: karmādinirapekṣas tu svecchācārī yato hy ayam/

div.label: [l. 6.124]
div.p: nanu darśanāntare ’pīśvarajñānān mokṣo labhyata eveti kuto ’sya viśeṣa iti cet — maivaṃ vādīḥ/ vikalpānupapatteḥ/ kim īśvaraviṣayajñānamātraṃ nirvāṇakāraṇaṃ kiṃ vā sākṣātkāraḥ atha vā yathāvat tattvaniścayaḥ/ nādyaḥ/ śāstram antareṇāpi prākṛtajanavad devānām adhipo mahādeva iti jñānotpattimātreṇa mokṣasiddhau śāstrābhyāsavaiphalyaprasaṅgāt/ nāpi dvitīyaḥ/ anekamalapracayopacitānāṃ piśitalocanānāṃ paśūnāṃ parameśvarasākṣātkārānupapatteḥ/ tṛtīye ’smanmatāpātaḥ/ pāśupataśāstram antareṇa yathāvat tattvaniścayānupapatteḥ/ tad uktam ācāryaiḥ —

quote.p: jñānamātre vṛthā śāstraṃ sākṣāddṛṣṭis tu durlabhā/
pañcārthād anyato nāsti yathāvat tattvaniścayaḥ// iti/

div.p: tasmāt puruṣārthakāmaiḥ puruṣadhaureyaiḥ pañcārthapratipādanaparaṃ pāśupataśāstram āśrayaṇīyam iti ramaṇīyam//
atha śaivadarśanam
div.label: [l. 7.1]
div.p: tam imaṃ parameśvaraḥ karmādinirapekṣaḥ kāraṇam iti pakṣaṃ vaiṣamyanaighṛṇyadoṣadūṣitatvāt pratikṣipantaḥ kecana māheśvarāḥ śaivāgamasiddhāntatattvaṃ yathāvad īkṣamāṇāḥ karmādisāpekṣaḥ parameśvaraḥ kāraṇam iti pakṣaṃ kaṣīkurvāṇāḥ pakṣāntaram upakṣipanti patipaśupāśabhedāt trayaḥ padārthā iti/
div.label: [l. 7.5]
div.p: tad uktaṃ tantratattvajñaiḥ —

quote.p: sūtreṇaikena saṃkṣipya prāha vistarataḥ punaḥ// iti/

div.p: asyārthaḥ/ uktās trayaḥ padārthā yasmin santi tat tripadārthaṃ vidyākriyāyogacaryākhāś catvāraḥ pādā yasmiṃs tac catuścaraṇaṃ mahātantram iti/ tatra paśūnām asvatantratvāt pāśānām acaitanyāt tadvilakṣaṇasya patyuḥ prathamam uddeśaḥ/ cetanatvasādharmyāt paśūnāṃ tadānantaryam/ avaśiṣṭānāṃ pāśānām ante viniveśa iti kramaniyamaḥ/ dīkṣāyāḥ paramapuruṣārthahetutvāt tasyāś ca paśupāśeśvarasvarūpanirṇayopāyabhūtena mantramantreśvarādimāhātmyaniścāyakena jñānena vinā niṣpādayitum aśakyatvāt tadavabodhakasya vidyāpādasya prāthamyam/ anekavidhasāṅgadīkṣāvidhipradarśakasya kriyāpādasya tadānantaryam/ yogena vinā nābhimataprāptir iti sāṅgayogajñāpakasya yogapādasya taduttaratvam/ vihitācaraṇaniṣiddhavarjanarūpāṃ caryāṃ vinā yogo ’pi na nirvahatīti tatpratipādakasya caryāpādasya caramatvam iti vivekaḥ/
div.label: [l. 7.20]
div.p: tatra patipadārthaḥ śivo ’bhimataḥ/ muktātmanāṃ vidyeśvarādīnāṃ ca yady api śivatvam asti tathāpi parameśvarapāratantryāt svātantryaṃ nāsti/ tataś ca tanukaraṇabhuvanādīnāṃ bhāvānāṃ saṃniveśaviśiṣṭatvena kāryatvam avagamyate/ tena ca kāryatvenaiṣāṃ buddhimatpūrvakatvam anumīyata ity anumānavaśāt parameśvaraprasiddhir upapadyate/
div.label: [l. 7.25]
div.p:
nanu dehasyaiva tāvat kāryatvam asiddham/ na hi kvacit kenacit kadācid dehaḥ kriyamāṇo dṛṣṭacaraḥ/ satyam/ tathāpi na kenacit kriyamāṇatvaṃ dehasya dṛṣṭam iti kartṛdarśanāpahnavo na yujyate/ tasyānumeyatvenāpy upapatteḥ/ tathā hi/ dehādikaṃ kāryaṃ bhavitum arhati saṃniveśaviśiṣṭatvād vinaśvaratvād vā ghaṭādivat/ tena ca kāryatvena buddhimatpūrvakatvam anumātuṃ sukaram eva/ vimataṃ sakartṛkaṃ kāryatvād ghaṭavat/ yad uktasādhanaṃ tad uktasādhyaṃ yathā rathādi
yathā rathādi ] Torella 1980: 387, Brunner 1981: 115 n. 54; yathārthādi A, ASS; om. IV. / na yad evaṃ na tad evaṃ yathātmādi/ parameśvarānumānaprāmāṇyasādhanam anyatrākārīty uparamyate/
div.label: [l. 7.33]

quote.p: īśvaraprerito gacchet svargaṃ vā śvabhram eva vā//

div.p: iti nyāyena prāṇikṛtakarmāpekṣayā parameśvarasya kartṛtvopapatteḥ/ na ca svātantryavihatir iti vācyam/ karaṇāpekṣayā kartuḥ svātantryavihater anupalambhāt/ koṣādhyakṣāpekṣasya rājñaḥ prasādādinā dānavat/
div.label: [l. 7.38]
div.p: yathoktaṃ siddhagurubhiḥ—

quote.p: kartuḥ svātantryam etad dhi na karmādyanapekṣatā// iti/

div.label: [l. 7.41]
div.p: tathā ca tattatkarmāśayavaśād bhogatatsādhanatadupādānādiviśeṣajñaḥ kartānumānādisiddha iti siddham/ tad idam uktaṃ tatrabhavadbhir bṛhaspatibhiḥ —

quote.p: tam ṛte bhaven na hīdaṃ puṃskarmāśayavipākajñam// iti/

div.label: [l. 7.46]
div.p: anyatrāpi —

quote.p: kāryatvād āvayoḥ siddhaṃ kāryaṃ kumbhādikaṃ yathā// iti/

div.label: [l. 7.49]
div.p:
sarvakartṛtvād evāsya sarvajñatvaṃ siddham/ ajñasya karaṇāsaṃbhavāt/ uktaṃ ca śrīmanmṛgendre
°mṛgendre ] A v.l.; °mṛgendraiḥ A, ASS, IV. See also Torella 1980: 387. —

quote.p: yo yaj jānāti kurute sa tad eveti susthitam// iti/

div.label: [l. 7.53]
div.p:
astu tarhi svatantra īśvaraḥ kartā/ sa tu nāśarīraḥ/ ghaṭādikāryasya śarīravatā kulālādinā kriyamāṇatvadarśanāt/ śarīravattve cāsmadādivad īśvaraḥ kleśayukto ’sarvajñaḥ parimitaśaktiṃ prāpnuyād iti cet — maivaṃ maṃsthāḥ/ aśarīrasyāpy ātmanaḥ svaśarīraspandādau kartṛtvadarśanāt/ abhyupagamyāpi brūmahe/ śarīravattve ’pi bhagavato na prāguktadoṣānuṣaṅgaḥ/ parameśvarasya hi malakarmādipāśajālāsaṃbhavena prākṛtaṃ śarīraṃ na bhavati/ kiṃ tu śāktam/ śaktirūpair īśānādibhiḥ pañcabhir mantrair mastakādikalpanāyām īśānamastakas tatpuruṣavaktro ’ghorahṛdayo vāmadevaguhyaḥ sadyojātapāda īśvara iti prasiddhyā yathākramam anugrahatirobhāvādānarakṣaṇotpattilakṣaṇakṛtyapañcakakāraṇam
yathākramam anugrahatirobhāvādānarakṣaṇotpattilakṣa[ṇ]akṛtyapañcakakāraṇaṃ ] Torella 1980: 387; yathākramānugrahatirobhāvādānalakṣaṇasthitilakṣaṇodbhavalakṣaṇakṛtya-pañcakakāraṇaṃ A, ASS, IV.
svecchānirmitaṃ taccharīraṃ na cāsmaccharīrasadṛśam/ tad uktam śrīmanmṛgendraiḥ —

quote.p: malādyasaṃbhavāc chāktaṃ vapur naitādṛśaṃ prabhoḥ iti/

div.label: [l. 7.65]
div.p: anyatrāpi —

quote.p:
īśatatpuruṣāghoravāmājair
°vāmājair° ] Mṛgendrāgama; °vāmādyair A, ASS, IV. mastakādimat// iti/

div.label: [l. 7.68]
div.p: nanu pañcavaktras tripañcadṛg ityādināgameṣu parameśvarasya mukhyata eva śarīrendriyādiyogaḥ śrūyata iti cet — satyam/ nirākāre dhyānapūjādyasaṃbhavena bhaktānugrahakāraṇāya tattadākāragrahaṇāvirodhāt/ tad uktaṃ śrīmatpauṣkare —

quote.p: sādhakasya tu rakṣārthaṃ tasya rūpam idaṃ smṛtam/ iti/

div.label: [l. 7.73]
div.p: anyatrāpi —

quote.p: na vastv anākāram upaiti buddhiḥ/ iti/

div.label: [l. 7.76]
div.p: kṛtyapañcakaṃ ca prapañcitaṃ bhojarājena —
div.label: [l. 7.79]
div.p: etac ca kṛtyapañcakaṃ śuddhādhvaviṣaye sākṣāc chivakartṛkaṃ kṛcchrādhvaviṣaye tv anantādidvāreṇeti vivekaḥ/ tad uktaṃ śrīmatkiraṇe —
div.label: [l. 7.82]
div.p:
evaṃ ca śivaśabdena śivatvayogināṃ mantramantreśvaramantramaheśvara
°mantramaheśvara° ] Torella 1980: 388; °maheśvara° A, ASS, IV. muktātmaśivānāṃ savācakānāṃ śivatvaprāptisādhanena dīkṣādinopāyakalāpena saha patipadārthe saṃgrahaḥ kṛta iti boddhavyam/ tad itthaṃ patipadārtho nirūpitaḥ/
div.label: [l. 7.86]
div.p:
saṃprati paśupadārtho nirūpyate — aṇu
aṇu° ] ASS v.l.; anaṇuḥ A.; anaṇu° IV. kṣetrajñādipadavedaniyo jīvātmā paśuḥ/ na tu cārvākādivad dehādirūpaḥ/ nānyadṛṣṭaṃ smaraty anya iti nyāyena pratisaṃdhānānupapatteḥ/ nāpi naiyāyikādivat prakāśyaḥ/ anavasthānaprasaṅgāt/ tad uktam —

quote.p: ātmā yadi bhaven meyas tasya mātā bhavet paraḥ/
para ātmā tadānīṃ syāt sa paro yadi dṛśyate// iti/

div.label: [l. 7.92]
div.p: na ca jainavad avyāpakaḥ/ nāpi bauddhavat kṣaṇikaḥ/ deśakālābhyām anavacchinnatvāt/ tad apy uktam —

quote.p: tan nityaṃ vibhu cecchantīty ātmano vibhunityatā iti/

div.label: [l. 7.96]
div.p: nāpy advaitavādinām ivaikaḥ/ bhogapratiniyamasya puruṣabahutvajñāpakasya saṃbhavāt/ nāpi sāṃkhyānām ivākartā/ pāśajālāpohane nityaniratiśayadṛkkriyārūpacaitanyātmakaśivatvaśravaṇāt/ tad uktaṃ śrīmanmṛgendraiḥ — pāśānte śivatāśruteḥ — iti/

quote.p: caitanyaṃ dṛkkriyārūpaṃ tad asty ātmani sarvadā/
sarvataś ca yato muktau śrūyate sarvatomukham// iti/

div.label: [l. 7.102]
div.p: tattvaprakāśe ’pi —

quote.p: muktātmāno ’pi śivāḥ kiṃ tv ete yatprasādato muktāḥ/

div.label: [l. 7.105]
div.p: paśus trividhaḥ/ vijñānākalapralayākalasakalabhedāt/ tatra prathamo vijñānayogasaṃnyāsair bhogena vā karmakṣaye sati karmakṣayārthasya kalādibhogabandhasyābhāvāt kevalamalamātrayukto vijñānākala iti vyapadiśyate/ dvitīyas tu pralayena kalāder upasaṃhārān malakarmayuktaḥ pralayākala iti vyavahriyate/ tṛtīyas tu malamāyākarmātmakabandhatrayasahitaḥ sakala iti saṃlapyate/
div.label: [l. 7.111]
div.p: tatra prathamo dviprakāro bhavati samāptakaluṣāsamāptakaluṣabhedāt/ tatrādyān kāluṣyaparipākavataḥ puruṣadhaureyān adhikārayogyān anugṛhyānantādividyeśvarāṣṭapadaṃ prāpayati/ tad vidyeśvarāṣṭakaṃ nirdiṣṭaṃ bahudaivatye —

quote.p: anantaś caiva sūkṣmaś ca tathaiva ca śivottamaḥ/
śrīkaṇṭhaś ca śikhaṇḍī ca proktā vidyeśvarā ime/ iti/

div.label: [l. 7.118]
div.p: antyān saptakoṭisaṃkhyātān mantrān anugrahakaraṇān vidhatte/ tad uktaṃ tattvaprakāśe —

quote.p: malamāyākarmayutaḥ sakalas teṣu dvidhā bhaved ādyaḥ/
ādyān anugṛhya śivo vidyeśatve niyojayaty aṣṭau/
mantrāṃś ca karoty aparāṃs te coktāḥ koṭayaḥ sapta// iti/

div.label: [l. 7.126]
div.p: somaśaṃbhunāpy abhihitam —
div.label: [l. 7.131]
div.p: pralayākalo ’pi dvividhaḥ — pakvapāśadvayas tadvilakṣaṇaś ca/ tatra prathamo mokṣaṃ prāpnoti/ dvitīyas tu puryaṣṭakayutaḥ karmavaśān nānāvidhajanmabhāg bhavati/ tad apy uktaṃ tattvaprakāśe —

quote.p:
pralayākaleṣu yeṣām apakve malakarmaṇī
apakve malakarmaṇī ] ASS v.l.; apakvamalakarmaṇī A, IV. vrajanty ete/

div.label: [l. 7.136]
div.p: puryaṣṭakam api tatraiva nirdiṣṭam —

quote.p: syāt puryaṣṭakam antaḥkaraṇaṃ dhīkarma karaṇāni/ iti/

div.label: [l. 7.138]
div.p: vivṛtaṃ cāghoraśivācāryeṇa — puryaṣṭakaṃ nāma pratipuruṣaṃ niyataḥ sargād ārabhya kalpāntaṃ mokṣāntaṃ vā sthitaḥ pṛthivyādikalāparyantas triṃśattattvātmakaḥ sūkṣmo dehaḥ/ tathā coktaṃ tattvasaṃgrahe —

quote.p: paryaṭati karmavaśād bhuvanajadeheṣv ayaṃ ca sarveṣu// iti/

div.p: tathā cāyam arthaḥ samapadyata — antaḥkaraṇaśabdena manobuddhyahaṃkāravācinānyāny api puṃso bhogakriyāyām antaraṅgāṇi kalākālaniyatividyārāgaprakṛtiguṇākhyāni sapta tattvāny upalakṣyante/ dhīkarmaśabdena jñeyāni pañca bhūtāni tatkāraṇāni ca tanmātrāṇi vivakṣyante/ karaṇaśabdena jñānakarmendriyadaśakaṃ saṃgṛhyate/ nanu śrīmatkālottare —

quote.p: śabdaḥ sparśas tathā rūpaṃ raso gandhaś ca pañcakam/
buddhir manas tv ahaṃkāraḥ puryaṣṭakam udāhṛtam//

div.p:
iti śrūyate/ tat katham anyathā kathyate/ addhā/ ata eva ca tatrabhavatā rāmakaṇṭhena
rāmakaṇṭhena ] ASS v.l., IV, Torella; rāmakāṇḍena A. tat sūtraṃ triṃśattattvaparatayā vyākhyāyīty alam atiprapañcena/
div.label: [l. 7.152]
div.p: tathāpi kathaṃ punar asya puryaṣṭakatvam/ bhūtatanmātrabuddhīndriyakarmendriyāntaḥkaraṇasaṃjñaiḥ pañcabhir vargais tatkāraṇena guṇatattvena tadāpūrakeṇa pradhānena kalādipañcakātmanā vargeṇa cārabdhatvād ity avirodhaḥ/ tatra puryaṣṭakayutān viśiṣṭapuṇyasaṃpannān kāṃścid anugṛhya bhuvanapatitvam atra maheśvaro ’nantaḥ prayacchati/ tad uktam —

quote.p: kāṃścid anugṛhya vitarati bhuvanapatitvaṃ maheśvaras teṣām/ iti/

div.label: [l. 7.158]
div.p: sakalo ’pi dvividhaḥ/ pakvakaluṣāpakvakaluṣabhedāt/ tatrādyān parameśvaras tatparipākaparipāṭyā tadanuguṇaśaktipātena maṇḍalyādyaṣṭādaśottaraśatamantreśvarapadaṃ prāpayati/ tad uktam —

quote.p: śeṣā bhavanti sakalāḥ kalādiyogād aharmukhe kāle/
śatam aṣṭādaśa teṣāṃ kurute svayam eva mantreśān//
tatrāṣṭau maṇḍalinaḥ krodhādyās tatsamāś ca vīreśaḥ/
śrīkaṇṭhaḥ śatarudrāḥ śatam ity aṣṭādaśābhyadhikam// iti/

div.label: [l. 7.165]
div.p: tatparipākādhikyānurodhena śaktyupasaṃhāreṇa dīkṣākaraṇena mokṣaprado bhavaty ācāryamūrtim āsthāya parameśvaraḥ/ tad apy uktam —

quote.p: yojayati pare tattve sa dīkṣayācāryamūrtisthaḥ// iti/

div.label: [l. 7.169]
div.p: śrīmanmṛgendre ’pi —
div.label: [l. 7.171]
div.p: vyākṛtaṃ ca nārāyaṇkaṇṭhena/ tat sarvaṃ tata evāvadhāryam/ asmābhis tu vistarabhiyā na prastūyate/ apakvakaluṣān baddhān aṇūn bhogabhājo vidhatte parameśvaraḥ karmavaśāt/ tad apy uktam —

quote.p: baddhāñ śeṣān aparān viniyuṅkte bhogabhuktaye puṃsaḥ/
tatkarmaṇām anugamād ity evaṃ kīrtitāḥ paśavaḥ// iti/

div.label: [l. 7.176]
div.p: atha pāśapadārthaḥ kathyate/ pāśaś caturvidhaḥ/ malakarmamāyārodhaśaktibhedāt/ nanu —

quote.p: śaivāgameṣu mukhyaṃ patipaśupāśā iti kramāt tritayam/
tatra patiḥ śiva uktaḥ paśavo hy aṇavo ’rthapañcakaṃ pāśāḥ//

div.p: iti pāśaḥ pañcavidhaḥ kathyate/ tat kathaṃ caturvidha iti gaṇyate/ ucyate — bindor māyātmanaḥ śivatattvapadavedanīyasya śivapadaprāptilakṣaṇaparamamuktyapekṣayā pāśatve ’pi tadyogasya vidyeśvarādipadaprāptihetutvenāparamuktitvāt pāśatvenānupādānam ity avirodhaḥ/ ata evoktaṃ tattvaprakāśe — pāśāś caturvidhāḥ syur iti/ śrīmanmṛgendre ’pi —

quote.p: pāśajālaṃ samāsena dharmā nāmnaiva kīrtitāḥ// iti/

div.label: [l. 7.187]
div.p: asyārthaḥ — prāvṛṇoti prakarṣeṇācchādayaty ātmanaḥ svābhāvikyau dṛkkriye iti prāvṛtir aśucir malaḥ/ sa ca īṣṭe svātantryeṇeti īśaḥ/ tad uktam —

quote.p: eko hy anekaśaktir dṛkkriyayoś chādako malaḥ puṃsaḥ/

div.label: [l. 7.192]
div.p: balaṃ rodhaśaktiḥ/ asyāḥ śivaśakteḥ pāśādhiṣṭhānena puruṣatirodhāyakatvād upacāreṇa pāśatvam/ tad uktam —

quote.p: tāsām ahaṃ varā śaktiḥ sarvānugrāhikā śivā/
dharmānuvartanād eva pāśa ity upacaryate// iti/

div.label: [l. 7.196]
div.p: kriyate phalārthibhir iti karma dharmādharmātmakaṃ bījāṅkuravat pravāharūpeṇānādi/ yathoktaṃ śrīmatkiraṇe —

quote.p:
yathānādir malas tasya karmāpy evam
karmāpy evam° ] Torella 1980: 389; karmālpakam° A, ASS, IV. anādikam/
yady anādi na saṃsiddhaṃ vaicitryaṃ kena hetunā// iti/

div.label: [l. 7.200]
div.p: māty asyām śaktyātmanā pralaye sarvaṃ jagat sṛṣṭau vyaktim āyātīti māyā yathoktaṃ śrīmatsaurabheye —

quote.p: vikṛtau vyaktim āyāti sā kāryeṇa kalādinā// iti/

div.label: [l. 7.204]
div.p: yady apy atra bahu vaktavyam asti tathāpi granthabhūyastvabhayād uparamyate/ tad itthaṃ patipaśupāśapadārthās trayaḥ pradarśitāḥ/

quote.p: patividye tathāvidyā paśuḥ pāśaś ca kāraṇam/
tannivṛttāv iti proktāḥ padārthāḥ ṣaṭ samāsataḥ//

div.p: ityādinā prakārāntaraṃ jñānaratnāvalyādau prasiddham/ sarvaṃ tata evāvagantavyam iti sarvaṃ samañjasam//

div.head: [atha pratyabhijñādarśanam //8//]
div.label: [l. 8.1]
div.p:
atrāpekṣāvihīnānāṃ jaḍānāṃ kāraṇatvaṃ duṣyatīty aparituṣyanto matāntaram anviṣyantaḥ parameśvarecchāvaśād eva jagannirmāṇaṃ parighuṣyantaḥ svasaṃvedanopapattyāgamasiddhapratyagātmatādātmyo
°tādātmyo ]; °tādātmye A. Torella's (1980: 390; 2011: 212) translation seems to presuppose this emendation. nānāvidhamānameyādibhedābhedaśāliparameśvaro ’nanyamukhaprekṣitvalakṣaṇasvātantryabhāk svātmadarpaṇe bhāvān pratibimbavad avabhāsayatīti bhaṇanto bāhyābhyantaracaryāprāṇāyāmādikleśaprayāsakalāpavaidhuryeṇa sarvasulabham abhinavaṃ pratyabhijñāmātraṃ parāparasiddhyupāyam abhyupagacchantaḥ pare māheśvarāḥ pratyabhijñāśāstram abhyasyanti/
div.label: [l. 8.9]
div.p: tasyeyattāpi nyarūpi parīkṣakaiḥ —

quote.p: sūtraṃ vṛttir vivṛtir laghvī bṛhatīty ubhe vimarśinyau/

div.label: [l. 8.12]
div.p: tatredaṃ prathamaṃ sūtram —
div.label: [l. 8.17]
div.p: kathaṃcid iti/ parameśvarābhinnagurucaraṇāravindayugalasamārādhanena parameśvaraghaṭitenaivety arthaḥ/ āsādyeti/ ā samantāt paripūrṇatayā sādayitvā svātmopabhogyatāṃ nirargalāṃ gamayitvā/ tad anena viditavedyatvena parārthaśāstrakaraṇe ’dhikāro darśitaḥ/ anyathā pratāraṇam eva prasajyeta/ māyottīrṇā api mahāmāyādhikṛtā viṣṇuviriñcyādyā yadīyaiśvaryaleśeneśvarībhūtāḥ sa bhagavān anavacchinnaprakāśānandasvātantryaparamārtho maheśvaraḥ/tasya dāsyam/ dīyate ’smai svāminā sarvaṃ yathābhilaṣitam iti dāsaḥ/ parameśvarasvarūpasvātantryapātram ity arthaḥ/ janaśabdenādhikāriviṣayaniyamābhāvaḥ prādarśi/ yasya yasya hīdaṃ svarūpakathanaṃ tasya tasya mahāphalaṃ bhavati/ prajñānasyaiva paramārthaphalatvāt/ tathopadiṣṭaṃ śivadṛṣṭau paramagurubhir bhagavatsomānandanāthapādaiḥ —

quote.p: karaṇena nāsti kṛtyaṃ kvāpi bhāvanayāpi vā/
jñāte suvarṇe karaṇaṃ bhāvanāṃ vā parityajet// iti/

div.label: [l. 8.32]
div.p: apiśabdena svātmanas tadabhinnatām āviṣkurvatā pūrṇatvena svātmani parārthasaṃpattyatiriktaprayojanāntarāvakāśaś ca parākṛtaḥ/ parārthaś ca prayojanaṃ bhavaty eva/ tallakṣaṇayogāt/ na hy ayaṃ devaśāpaḥ svārtha eva prayojanaṃ na parārtha iti/ ata evoktam akṣapādena — yam artham adhikṛtya pravartate tat prayojanam iti/ upaśabdaḥ sāmīpyārthaḥ/ tena janasya parameśvarasamīpatākaraṇamātraṃ phalam/ ata evāha — samasteti/ parameśvaratālābhe hi sarvāḥ saṃpadas tanniṣyandamayyaḥ saṃpannā eva rohaṇācalalābhe ratnasaṃpada iva/ evaṃ parameśvaratālābhe kim anyat prārthanīyam/ tad uktam utpalācāryaiḥ —

quote.p: etayā vā daridrāṇāṃ kim anyad apayācitam// iti/

div.label: [l. 8.43]
div.p:
itthaṃ ṣaṣṭhīsamāsapakṣe prayojanaṃ nirdiṣṭam/ bahuvrīhipakṣe tūpāyaḥ
tūpāyaḥ ] ASS v.l., IV; tūpapādayāmaḥ A. / samastasya bāhyābhyantarasya nityasukhāder yā saṃpat siddhis tathātvaprakāśas tasyāḥ samyag avāptir yasyāḥ pratyabhijñāyā hetuḥ sā tathoktā/ tasya maheśvarasya pratyabhijñā prati ābhimukhyena jñānam/ loke hi sa evāyam caitra iti pratisaṃdhānenābhimukhībhūte vastuni jñānaṃ pratyabhijñeti vyavahriyate/ ihāpi prasiddhapurāṇasiddhāgamānumānādiparijñāta
°parijñāta° ] ASS v.l., IV; °jñāta° A. paripūrṇaśaktike parameśvare sati svātmany abhimukhībhūte tacchaktipratisaṃdhānena jñānam udeti nūnaṃ sa eveśvaro ’ham iti/ tām etāṃ pratyabhijñām upapādayāmi/ upapattiḥ saṃbhavaḥ/ saṃbhavatīti tatsamarthācaraṇena prayojaka
prayojaka° ] Torella 1980: 408; prayojana° A. vyāpāreṇa saṃpādayāmīty arthaḥ/
div.label: [l. 8.53]
div.p: yadīśvarasvabhāva evātmā prakāśate tarhi kim anena pratyabhijñāpradarśanaprayāseneti cet — atrāyaṃ samādhiḥ/
svaprakāśatayā satatam avabhāsamāne ’py ātmani māyāvaśād bhāgena prakāśamāne pūrṇatāvabhāsasiddhaye dṛkkriyātmakaśaktyāviṣkaraṇena pratyabhijñā pradarśyate/ tathā ca prayogaḥ —
-ayam ātmā parameśvaro bhavitum arhati/
-jñānakriyāśaktimattvāt/

-yo yāvati jñātā kartā ca sa tāvatīśvaraḥ prasiddha īśvaravad
prasiddha īśvaravad ]; prasiddheśvaravad A, ASS. rājavad vā/
-ātmā ca viśvajñātā kartā ca/
-tasmād īśvaro ’yam iti/

avayavapañcakasyāśrayaṇaṃ māyāpada eva
māyāpada eva ] Torella 1980: 408; māyāvadeva A. naiyāyikamatasya kakṣīkārāt/ tad uktam udayākarasūnunā —

quote.p: ajaḍātmā niṣedhaṃ vā siddhiṃ vā vidadhīta kaḥ//
kiṃ tu mohavaśād asmin dṛṣṭe ’py anupalakṣite/

div.label: [l. 8.66]
div.p: tathā hi —

quote.p: jñānaṃ kriyā ca bhūtānāṃ jīvatāṃ jīvanaṃ matam//
tatra jñānaṃ svataḥsiddhaṃ kriyā kāryāśritā satī/
parair apy upalakṣyeta tathānyajñānam ucyate// iti/
akramānandacidrūpaḥ pramātā sa maheśvaraḥ// iti ca/

div.label: [l. 8.73]
div.p: somānandanāthapādair api —

quote.p: sadāśivātmanā vetti sadā vetti madātmanā/ ityādi/

div.label: [l. 8.75]
div.p: jñānādhikāraparisamāptāv api —

quote.p: tad aikyena vinā nāsti saṃvidāṃ lokapaddhatiḥ/
prakāśaikyāt tadekatvaṃ mātaikaḥ sa iti sthitiḥ//
vimarśa eva devasya śuddhe jñānakriye yataḥ// iti/

div.label: [l. 8.80]
div.p:
vivṛtaṃ cābhinavaguptācāryaiḥ/ tam eva bhāntam anubhāti sarvaṃ tasya bhāsā sarvam idaṃ vibhāti iti śrutyā prakāśacidrūpamahimnā sarvasya bhāvajātasya bhāsakatvam abhyupeyate/ tataś ca viṣayaprakāśasya nīlaprakāśaḥ pītaprakāśa iti viṣayoparāgabhedād bhedaḥ/ vastutas tu deśakālākārasaṃkocavaikalyād abheda eva/ sa eva caitanyarūpaḥ prakāśaḥ pramātety ucyate/ tathā ca paṭhitaṃ śivasūtreṣu — caitanyam ātmeti/ tasya cidrūpatvam anavacchinnavimarśatvam ananyonmukhatvam ānandaikaghanatvaṃ māheśvaryam iti paryāyaḥ/ sa eva hy ahaṃbhāvātmā
ahaṃbhāvātmā ] ASS v.l., Torella 1980: 408; ayaṃ bhāvātmā A. vimarśaḥ śuddhe pāramārthikyau jñānakriye/ tatra prakāśarūpatā jñānam/ svato jagannirmātṛtvaṃ kriyā/ tac ca nirūpitaṃ kriyādhikāre —

quote.p:
bhāvān icchāvaśād eṣā
eṣā ] IV, Torella; eṣāṃ A. kriyā nirmātṛtāsya sā// iti/

div.label: [l. 8.92]
div.p: upasaṃhāre ’pi —

quote.p: tiṣṭhāsor evam icchaiva hetukartṛkṛtā kriyā// iti/

div.label: [l. 8.95]
div.p: iti nyāyena yato jaḍasya na kāraṇatā na vānīśvarasya cetanasyāpi tasmāt tena tena jagadgatajanmasthityādibhāvavikāratattadbhedakriyāsahasrarūpeṇa sthātum icchoḥ svatantrasya bhagavato maheśvarasyecchaivottarottaram ucchūnasvabhāvā kriyā viśvakartṛtvaṃ vocyata iti/
div.label: [l. 8.100]
div.p: icchāmātreṇa jagannirmāṇam ity atra dṛṣṭānto ’pi spaṣṭaṃ nirdiṣṭaḥ —

quote.p:
ghaṭādi jāyate tat tat sthirasvārtha
°svārtha° ] ASS, IV; °bhāva° A. kriyākaram// iti/

div.label: [l. 8.104]
div.p: yadi ghaṭādikaṃ prati mṛdādy eva paramārthataḥ kāraṇaṃ syāt tarhi kathaṃ yogīcchāmātreṇa ghaṭādijanma syāt/ athocyetānya eva mṛdbījādijanyā ghaṭāṅkurādayo yogīcchājanyās tv anya eveti tatrāpi bodhyase — sāmagrībhedāt tāvat kāryabheda iti sarvajanaprasiddham/
div.label: [l. 8.108]
div.p: ye tu varṇayanti nopādānaṃ vinā ghaṭādyutpattir iti yogī tv icchayā paramāṇūn vyāpārayan saṃghaṭayatīti te ’pi bodhanīyāḥ/ yadi paridṛṣṭakāryakāraṇabhāvaviparyayo na labhyeta tarhi ghaṭe mṛddaṇḍacakrādi dehe strīpuruṣasaṃyogādi sarvam apekṣyeta/ tathā ca yogīcchāsamanantarasaṃjātaghaṭadehādisaṃbhavo duḥsamartha eva syāt/ cetana eva tu tathā bhāti bhagavān bhūribhago mahādevo niyatyanuvartanollaṅghanaghanatarasvātantrya iti pakṣe na kācid anupapattiḥ/ ata evoktaṃ vasuguptācāryaiḥ —

quote.p: jagaccitraṃ namas tasmai kalānāthāya śūline// iti/

div.label: [l. 8.117]
div.p: nanu pratyagātmanaḥ parameśvarābhinnatve saṃsārasaṃbandhaḥ katham bhaved iti cet — tatroktam āgamādhikāre —
div.label: [l. 8.121]
div.p: nanu prameyasya pramātrabhinnatve baddhamuktayoḥ prameyaṃ prati ko viśeṣaḥ/ atrāpy uttaram uktaṃ tattvārthasaṃgrahādhikāre —

quote.p: maheśvaro yathā baddhaḥ punar atyantabhedavat// iti/

div.label: [l. 8.125]
div.p: nanv ātmanaḥ parameśvaratvaṃ svābhāvikaṃ cen nārthaḥ pratyabhijñāprārthanayā/ na hi bījam apratyabhijñātaṃ sati sahakārisākalye ’ṅkuraṃ notpādayati/ tasmāt kasmād vātmapratyabhijñāne nirbandha iti cet — ucyate/ śṛṇu tāvad idaṃ rahasyam/ dvividhā hy arthakriyā bāhyāṅkurādikā pramātṛviśrānticamatkārasārā prītyādirūpā ca/ tatrādyā prayabhijñānaṃ nāpekṣate/ dvitīyā tu tad apekṣata eva/ ihāpy aham īśvara ity evaṃbhūtacamatkārasārā parāparasiddhilakṣaṇajīvātmaikatvaśaktivibhūtirūpārthakriyeti svarūpapratyabhijñānam apekṣaṇīyam/
div.label: [l. 8.132]
div.p:
nanu pramātṛviśrāntisārārthakriyā pratyabhijñānena vinā adṛṣṭā sati
sati ] Torella; satī ASS, IV, A. tasmin dṛṣṭeti kva dṛṣṭam/ atrocyate/ nāyakaguṇagaṇasaṃśravaṇapravṛddhānurāgā kācana kāminī madanavihvalā virahakleśam asahamānā madanalekhāvalambanena svāvasthānivedanāni vidhatte/ tathā vegāt tannikaṭam aṭaty
°aṭaty° ] ASS v.l., IV; °aṭanty° A. api tasminn avalokite ’pi tadavalokanaṃ tadīyaguṇaparāmarśābhāve janasādhāraṇatvaṃ prāpte hṛdayaṃgamabhāvaṃ na labhate/ yadā tu dūtīvacanāt tadīyaguṇaparāmarśaṃ karoti tadā tatkṣaṇam eva pūrṇabhāvam abhyeti/ evaṃ svātmani viśveśvarātmanā bhāsamāne ’pi tannirbhāsanaṃ tadīyaguṇaparāmarśavirahasamaye pūrṇabhāvaṃ na saṃpādayati/
yadā tu guruvacanādinā sarvajñatvasarvakartṛtvādilakṣaṇaparameśvarotkarṣaparāmarśo jāyate tadā tatkṣaṇam eva pūrṇātmatālābhaḥ/ tad uktaṃ caturthe vimarśe —

quote.p: tais tair apy upayācitair upanatas tasyāḥ sthito ’py antike
kānto lokasamāna evam aparijñāto na rantuṃ yathā/

naivālaṃ
naivālaṃ ] Torella; naivāyaṃ A. nijavaibhavāya tad iyaṃ tatpratyabhijñoditā// iti/

div.label: [l. 8.148]
div.p: abhinavaguptādibhir ācāryair vihitapratāno ’py ayam arthaḥ saṃgraham upakramamāṇair asmābhir vistarabhiyā na pratānita iti sarvaṃ śivam//

div.head: [atha raseśvaradarśanam //9//]
div.label: [l. 9.1]
div.p: apare māheśvarāḥ parameśvaratādātmyavādino ’pi piṇḍasthairye sarvābhimatā jīvanmuktiḥ setsyatīty āsthāya piṇḍasthairyopāyaṃ pāradādipadavedanīyaṃ rasam eva saṃgirante/
div.label: [l. 9.4]
div.p: rasasya pāradatvaṃ saṃsāraparapāraprāpaṇahetutvena/ tad uktam —

quote.p: saṃsārasya paraṃ pāraṃ datte ’sau pāradaḥ smṛtaḥ/ iti/

div.p: rasārṇave ’pi —

quote.p:
sūto
sūto ] Rasārṇava; supto ASS, A, IV. ’yaṃ matsamo devi mama pratyaṅgasaṃbhavaḥ//
mama deharaso yasmād rasas tenāyam ucyate/ iti/

div.label: [l. 9.10]

p.hi: nanu prakārāntareṇāpi jīvanmuktiyuktau neyaṃ vācoyuktir yuktimatīti cen na/ ṣaṭsv api darśaneṣu dehapātānantaraṃ mukter uktatayā tatra viśvāsānupapattyā nirvicikitsapravṛtter anupapatteḥ/ tad apy uktaṃ tatraiva —

quote.p: tasmāt taṃ rakṣayet piṇḍaṃ rasaiś caiva rasāyanaiḥ// iti/

div.label: [l. 9.16]
div.p: govindabhagavatpādācāryair api —

quote.p: muktau sā ca jñānāt tac cābhyāsāt sa ca sthire dehe// iti/

div.label: [l. 9.19]
div.p: nanu vinaśvaratayā dṛśyamānasya dehasya kathaṃ nityatvam avasīyata iti cet — maivaṃ maṃsthāḥ/ ṣāṭkauśikasya śarīrasyānityatve ’pi rasābhrakapadābhilapyaharagaurīsṛṣṭijātasya nityatvopapatteḥ/
div.label: [l. 9.22]
div.p: tathā ca rasahṛdaye —

quote.p: muktās te rasasiddhā mantragaṇaḥ kiṃkaro yeṣām// iti/

div.label: [l. 9.25]
div.p: tasmāj jīvanmuktiṃ samīhamānena yoginā prathamaṃ divyatanur vidheyā/ haragaurīsṛṣṭisaṃyogajanitatvaṃ ca rasasya harajatvenābhrakasya gaurīsaṃbhavatvena tattadātmakatvam uktam —

quote.p: abhrakas tava bījaṃ tu mama bījaṃ tu pāradaḥ/

div.label: [l. 9.30]
div.p: atyalpam idam ucyate devadaityamunimānavādiṣu bahavo rasasāmarthyād divyaṃ deham āśritya jīvanmuktim āśritāḥ śrūyante raseśvarasiddhānte —

quote.p: etebhyo bahavaḥ siddhā jīvanmuktāś caranti hi/

div.label: [l. 9.38]
div.p: ayam evārthaḥ parameśvareṇa parameśvarīṃ prati prapañcitaḥ —

quote.p: rasaś ca pavanaś ceti karmayogo dvidhā smṛtaḥ//
mūrchito harati vyādhīn mṛto jīvayati svayam/
baddhaḥ khecaratāṃ kuryād raso vāyuś ca bhairavi// iti/

div.label: [l. 9.43]
div.p: mūrchitasvarūpam uktam —

quote.p: lakṣaṇaṃ dṛśyate yasya mūrchitaṃ taṃ vadanti hi//
yasyaitāni na dṛśyante taṃ vidyān mṛtasūtakam// iti/

div.label: [l. 9.48]
div.p: anyatra baddhasvarūpam apy abhyadhāyi —

quote.p: akṣataś ca laghudrāvī tejasvī nirmalo guruḥ/
sphoṭanaṃ punar āvṛttau baddhasūtasya lakṣaṇam/ iti/

div.label: [l. 9.51]
div.p: nanu haragaurīsṛṣṭisiddhau piṇḍasthairyam āsthātuṃ pāryate/ tatsiddhir eva katham iti cet — na aṣṭādaśasaṃskāravaśāt tadupapatteḥ/ tad uktam ācāryaiḥ —
div.label: [l. 9.55]
div.p: te ca saṃskārā nirūpitāḥ —
div.label: [l. 9.60]
div.p: tatprapañcas tu govindabhagavatpādācāryasarvajñarāmeśvarabhaṭṭārakaprabhṛtibhiḥ prācīnair ācāryair nirūpita iti granthabhūyastvabhayād udāsyate/ na ca rasaśāstraṃ dhātuvādārtham eveti mantavyam/ dehavedhadvārā mukter eva paramaprayojanatvāt/ tad uktaṃ rasārṇave —

quote.p: taṃ dehavedham ācakṣva yena syāt khecarī gatiḥ//
yathā lohe tathā dehe kartavyaḥ sūtakaḥ satā/
pūrvaṃ lohe parīkṣeta paścād dehe prayojayet// iti/

div.label: [l. 9.69]
div.p:
nanu saccidānandātmakaparatattvasphuraṇād eva muktisiddhau kim anena divyadehasaṃpādanaprayāseneti cet — tad etad vārttam/ avārttaśarīrālābhe
avārtta° ]; vārtta IV; avārta A, ASS. tadvārttāyā
°vārttāyā ] IV; °vārtāyā A, ASS. ayogāt/ tad uktaṃ rasahṛdaye —

quote.p: sphurito ’py asphuritatanoḥ karoti kiṃ jantuvargasya// iti/
yogyaṃ yan na samādhau pratihatabuddhīndriyaprasaram// iti/
yātaviveko vṛddho martyaḥ katham āpnuyān muktim// iti/

div.label: [l. 9.80]
div.p: nanu jīvatvaṃ nāma saṃsāritvam/ tadviparītatvaṃ muktatvam/ tathā ca parasparaviruddhayoḥ katham ekāyatanatvam upapannaṃ syād iti cet — tad anupapannam/ vikalpānupapatteḥ/ muktis tāvat sarvatīrthakarasaṃmatā/ sā kiṃ jñeyapade niviśate na vā/ carame śaśaviṣāṇakalpā syāt/ prathame na jīvanaṃ varjanīyam/ ajīvato jñātṛtvānupapatteḥ/ tad uktaṃ raseśvarasiddhānte/

quote.p: nājīvañ jñāsyati jñeyaṃ yad ato ’sty eva jīvanam// iti/

div.label: [l. 9.90]
div.p: na cedam adṛṣṭacaram iti mantavyam/ viṣṇusvāmimatānusāribhir nṛpañcāsyaśarīrasya nityatvopapādanāt/ tad uktaṃ sākārasiddhau —
div.label: [l. 9.94]
div.p:
nanv etat sāvayavaṃ rūpavad avabhāsamānaṃ nṛkaṇṭhīravāṅgaṃ sad iti na saṃgacchata ityādinākṣepapuraḥsaraṃ sanakādipratyakṣa
sanakādipratyakṣa ]; sanakādipratyakṣaṃ A, ASS, IV. — sahasraśīrṣā puruṣaḥ ityādiśruti —

quote.p: tam adbhutaṃ bālakam ambujekṣaṇaṃ caturbhujaṃ śaṅkhagadādyudāyudham/

div.p: ityādipurāṇalakṣaṇena pramāṇatrayeṇa siddhaṃ nṛpañcānanāṅgaṃ katham asat syād iti/ sadādīni viśeṣaṇāni garbhaśrīkāntamiśrair viṣṇusvāmicaraṇapariṇatāntaḥkaraṇaiḥ pratipāditāni/ tasmād asmadiṣṭadehanityatvam atyantādṛṣṭaṃ na bhavatīti puruṣārthakāmukaiḥ puruṣair eṣṭavyam/ ata evoktam —

quote.p: śreyaḥ paraṃ kim anyac charīram ajarāmaraṃ vihāyaikam// iti/

div.label: [l. 9.106]
div.p: ajarāmarīkaraṇasamarthaś ca rasendra eva/ tad āha —

quote.p: eko ’sau rasarājaḥ śarīram ajarāmaraṃ kurute/ iti/

div.label: [l. 9.108]
div.p: kiṃ varṇyate rasasya māhātmyam/ darśanasparśanādināpi mahat phalaṃ bhavati/ tad uktaṃ rasārṇave —

quote.p: darśanāt sparśanāt tasya bhakṣaṇāt smaraṇād api//
pūjanād rasadānāc ca dṛśyate ṣaḍvidhaṃ phalam//
tāni dṛṣṭvā tu yat puṇyaṃ tat puṇyaṃ rasadarśanāt/ ityādinā/

div.label: [l. 9.114]
div.p: anyatrāpi —

quote.p: prāpyate yena tal liṅgaṃ bhogārogyāmṛtapradam// iti/

div.label: [l. 9. 117]
div.p: rasanindāyāḥ pratyavāyo ’pi darśitaḥ —

quote.p: pramādād rasanindāyāḥ śrutāv enaṃ smaret sudhīḥ/
drāk tyajen nindakaṃ nityaṃ nindayā pūritāśubham// iti/

div.label: [l. 9.120]
div.p: tasmād asmaduktayā rītyā divyaṃ dehaṃ saṃpādya yogābhyāsavaśāt paratattve dṛṣṭe puruṣārthaprāptir bhavati/ tadā —

quote.p: tasminn ādhāya manaḥ sphurad akhilaṃ cinmayaṃ jagat paśyan/

div.label: [l. 9.129]
div.p: śrutiś ca — raso vai saḥ/ rasaṃ hy evāyaṃ labdhvānandī bhavati iti/ tad itthaṃ bhavadainyaduḥkhabharataraṇopāyo rasa eveti siddham/ tathā ca rasasya parabrahmaṇā sāmyam iti pratipādakaḥ ślokaḥ —

quote.p: yaḥ syāt prāvaraṇāvimocanadhiyāṃ sādhyaḥ prakṛtyā punaḥ
saṃpannaḥ sahate na dīvyati paraṃ vaiśvānare jāgrati/
jñāto yady aparaṃ na vedayati ca svasmāt svayaṃ dyotate

yo brahmaiva
brahmaiva ] ASS, IV; brahmeva A. sa dainyasaṃsṛtibhayāt pāyād asau pāradaḥ// iti//

div.trailer:
iti sarvadarśanasaṃgrahe raseśvaradarśanam
raseśvaradarśanam ]; raseśvaradaṛśanam A.

div.head: [athaulūkyadarśanam //10//]
div.label: [l. 10.1]
div.p: iha khalu nikhilaprekṣāvān nisargapratikūlavedanīyatayā nikhilātmasaṃvedanasiddhaṃ duḥkhaṃ jihāsus taddhānopāyaṃ jijnāsuḥ parameśvarasākṣātkāram upāyam ākalayati/
ityādivacananicayaprāmāṇyāt/ parameśvarasākṣātkāraś ca śravaṇamananabhāvanābhir bhāvanīyaḥ/ yad āha —

quote.p: tridhā prakalpayan prajñāṃ labhate yogam uttamam// iti/

div.label: [l. 10.10]
div.p: tatra mananam anumānādhīnam/ anumānaṃ ca vyāptijñānādhīnam/ vyāptijñānaṃ ca padārthavivekasāpekṣam/ ataḥ padārthaṣaṭkam athāto dharmaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ ityādikāyāṃ daśalakṣaṇyāṃ kaṇabhakṣeṇa bhagavatā vyavasthāpitam/
div.label: [l. 10.14]
div.p: tatrāhnikadvayātmake prathame ’dhyāye samavetāśeṣapadārthakathanam akāri/ tatrāpi prathamāhnike jātimannirūpaṇam/ dvitīyāhnike jātiviśeṣayor nirūpaṇam/ āhnikadvayayukte dvitīye ’dhyāye dravyanirūpaṇam/ tatrāpi prathamāhnike bhūtaviśeṣalakṣaṇam/ dvitīye dikkālapratipādanam/ āhnikadvayayukte tṛtīya ātmāntaḥkaraṇalakṣaṇam/ tatrāpy ātmalakṣaṇaṃ prathame/ dvitīye ’ntaḥkaraṇalakṣaṇam/ āhnikadvayayukte caturthe śarīratadupayogivivecanam/ atrāpi prathame tadupayogivivecanam/ dvitīye śarīravivecanam/ āhnikadvayavati pañcame karmapratipādanam/ tatrāpi prathame śarīrasaṃbandhikarmacintanam/ dvitīye mānasakarmacintanam/ āhnikadvayaśālini ṣaṣṭhe śrautadharmanirūpaṇam/ tatrāpi prathame dānapratigrahadharmavivekaḥ/ dvitīye cāturāśramyocitadharmanirūpaṇam/ tathāvidhe saptame guṇasamavāyapratipādanam/ tatrāpi prathame buddhinirapekṣaguṇapratipādanam/ dvitīye tatsāpekṣaguṇapratipādanaṃ samavāyapratipādanaṃ ca/ aṣṭame nirvikalpakasavikalpakapratyakṣapramāṇacintanam/ navame buddhiviśeṣapratipādanam/ daśame ’numānabhedapratipādanam/
div.label: [l. 10.30]
div.p: tatroddeśo lakṣaṇaṃ parīkṣā ceti trividhāsya śāstrasya pravṛttiḥ/ nanu vibhāgāpekṣayā cāturvidhye vaktavye kathaṃ traividhyam uktam iti cet — maivaṃ maṃsthāḥ/ vibhāgasya viśeṣoddeśarūpatvād uddeśa evāntarbhāvāt/ tatra dravyaguṇakarmasāmānyaviśeṣasamavāyā iti ṣaḍ eva te padārthā ity uddeśaḥ/ kim atra kramaniyame kāraṇam/ ucyate/ samastapadārthāyatanatvena pradhānasya dravyasya prathamam uddeśaḥ/ anantaraṃ guṇatvopādhinā sakaladravyavṛtter guṇasya/ tadanu sāmānyavattvasāmyāt karmaṇaḥ/ paścāt tattritayāśritasya sāmānyasya/ tadanantaraṃ samavāyādhikaraṇasya viśeṣasya/ ante ’vaśiṣṭasya samavāyasyeti/
div.label: [l. 10.39]
div.p: nanu ṣaḍ eva padārthā iti kathaṃ kathyate/ abhāvasyāpi sadbhāvād iti cet — maivaṃ vocaḥ/ nañarthānullikhitadhīviṣayatayā bhāvarūpatayā ṣaḍ eveti vivakṣitatvāt/ tathāpi kathaṃ ṣaḍ eveti niyama upapadyate/ vikalpānupapatteḥ/ tathā hi/ niyamavyavacchedyaṃ pramitaṃ na vā/ pramitatve kathaṃ niṣedhaḥ/ apramitatve kathaṃtarām/ na hi kaścit prekṣāvān mūṣikaviṣāṇaṃ pratiṣeddhuṃ yatate/ tataś cānupapatter na niyama iti cet — maivaṃ bhāṣiṣṭhāḥ/ saptamatayā pramite ’ndhakārādau bhāvatvasya bhāvatayā pramite śaktisādṛśyādau saptamatvasya ca niṣedhād iti kṛtaṃ vistareṇa/
div.label: [l. 10.47]
div.p: tatra dravyāditritayasya dravyatvādijātir lakṣaṇam/ dravyatvaṃ nāma gaganāravindasamavetatve sati nityatve sati gandhāsamavetatvam/ guṇatvaṃ nāma samavāyikāraṇāsamavetāsamavāyikāraṇabhinnasamavetasatttāsākṣād- vyāpyajātiḥ/ karmatvaṃ nāma nityāsamavetatvasahitasattāsākṣādvyāpyajātiḥ/ sāmānyaṃ tu pradhvaṃsapratiyogitvarahitam anekasamavetam/ viśeṣo nāmānyonyābhāvavirodhisāmānyarahitaḥ samavetaḥ/ samavāyas tu samavāyarahitaḥ saṃbandha iti ṣaṇṇāṃ lakṣaṇāni vyavasthitāni/
div.label: [l. 10.54]
div.p: dravyaṃ navavidhaṃ pṛthivyaptejovāyvākāśakāladigātmamanāṃsīti/ tatra pṛthivyādicatuṣṭayasya pṛthivītvādijātir lakṣaṇam/ pṛthivītvaṃ nāma pākajarūpasamānādhikaraṇadravyatvasākṣādvyāpyajātiḥ/ aptvaṃ nāma saritsāgarasamavetatve sati jvalanāsamavetaṃ sāmānyam/ tejastvaṃ nāma candracāmīkarasamavetatve sati salilāsamavetaṃ sāmānyam/ vāyutvaṃ nāma tvagindriyasamavetadravyatvasākṣādvyāpyajātiḥ/ ākāśakāladiśām ekaikatvād aparajātyabhāve pāribhāṣikyas tisraḥ saṃjñā bhavanti ākāśaḥ kālo dig iti/ saṃyogājanyajanyaviśeṣaguṇasamānādhikaraṇaviśeṣādhikaraṇam ākāśam/ vibhutve sati digasamavetaparatvāsamavāyikāraṇādhikaraṇaḥ kālaḥ/ akālatve saty aviśeṣaguṇā mahatī dik/ ātmamanasor ātmatvamanastve/ ātmatvaṃ nāmāmūrtasamavetadravyatvāparajātiḥ/ manastvaṃ nāma dravyasamavāyikāraṇatvarahitāṇusamavetadravyatvāparajātiḥ/
div.label: [l. 10.67]
div.p: rūparasagandhasparśasaṃkhyāparimāṇapṛthaktvasaṃyogavibhāga-paratvāparatvabuddhisukhaduḥkhecchādveṣaprayatnāś ca kaṇṭhoktāḥ saptadaśa caśabdasamuccitā gurutvadravatvasnehasaṃskārādṛṣṭaśabdāḥ saptaivety evaṃ caturviṃśatir guṇāḥ/ tatra rūpādiśabdāntānāṃ rūpatvādijātir lakṣaṇam/ rūpatvaṃ nāma nīlasamavetaguṇatvāparajātiḥ/ anayā diśā śiṣṭānāṃ lakṣaṇāni draṣṭavyāni/
div.label: [l. 10.73]
div.p:
karma pañcavidham/ utkṣepaṇāpakṣepaṇākuñcanaprasāraṇagamanabhedāt/ bhramaṇarecanādīnāṃ gamana evāntarbhāvaḥ/ utkṣepaṇādīnām utkṣepaṇatvādijātir lakṣaṇam/ tatrotkṣepaṇatvaṃ nāmordhvadeśasaṃyogāsamavāyikāraṇasamavetakarmatvāparajātiḥ/ evam apakṣepaṇādīnāṃ
°kṣepaṇādīnāṃ ] IV; °kṣepaṇatvādīnāṃ A, ASS. lakṣaṇaṃ kartavyam/
div.label: [l. 10.77]
div.p: sāmānyaṃ dvividhaṃ param aparaṃ ca/ paraṃ sattā dravyaguṇasamavetā/ aparaṃ dravyatvādi/ tallakṣaṇaṃ prāg evoktam/
div.label: [l. 10.79]
div.p: viśeṣāṇām anantatvāt samavāyasya caikatvād vibhāgo na saṃbhavati/ tallakṣaṇaṃ ca prāg evāvādi/
div.label: [l. 10.81]

quote.p: dvitve ca pākajotpattau vibhāge ca vibhāgaje/
yasya na skhalitā buddhis taṃ vai vaiśeṣikaṃ viduḥ//

div.p: ity ābhāṇakasya sadbhāvād dvitvādyutpattiprakāraḥ pradarśyate/ tatra prathamam indriyārthasaṃnikarṣaḥ (1)/ tasmād ekatvasāmānyajñānam (2)/ tato ’pekṣābuddhiḥ (3)/ tato dvitvotpattiḥ (4)/ tato dvitvatvasāmānyajñānam (5)/ tasmād dvitvaguṇajñānam (6)/ tato dve dravye iti dhīḥ (7)/ tataḥ saṃskāraḥ/ tad āha —

quote.p: ekatvobhayagocarā matir ato dvitvaṃ tato jāyate/
dve dravye iti dhīr iyaṃ nigaditā dvitvodayaprakriyā// iti/

div.p: dvitvāder apekṣābuddhijanyatve kiṃ pramāṇam/ atrāhur ācāryāḥ — apekṣābuddhir dvitvāder utpādikā bhavitum arhati/ vyañjakatvānupapattau tenānuvidhīyamānatvāt/ śabdaṃ prati saṃyogavad iti/ vayaṃ tu brūmaḥ — dvitvādikam ekatvadvayaviṣayānityabuddhivyaṅgyaṃ na bhavati anekāśritaguṇatvāt pṛthaktvādivad iti/
div.label: [l. 10.97]
div.p: nivṛttikramo nirūpyate — apekṣābuddhita ekatvasāmānyajñānasya dvitvotpattisamakālaṃ nivṛttiḥ/ apekṣābuddher dvitvatvasāmānyajñānād dvitvaguṇabuddhisamasamayam/ dvitvasyāpekṣābuddhinivṛtter dravyabuddhisamakālam/ guṇabuddher dravyabuddhitaḥ saṃskārotpattisamakālam/ dravyabuddhes tadanantaraṃ saṃskārād iti/
tathā ca saṃgrahaślokāḥ —

quote.p: dravyabuddhiś ca saṃskārād iti nāśakramo mataḥ// iti/

div.label: [l. 10.108]
div.p: buddher buddhyantaravināśyatve saṃskāravināśyatve ca pramāṇam — vivādādhyāsitāni jñānāny uttarottarakāryavināśyāni kṣaṇikavibhuviśeṣaguṇatvāc chabdavat/ kvacid dravyārambhakasaṃyogapratidvandvivibhāgajanakakarmasamakālam ekatvasāmānyacintayāśrayanivṛtter eva dvitvanivṛttiḥ/ karmasamakālam apekṣābuddhicintanād ubhābhyām iti/ saṃkṣepaḥ/
apekṣābuddhir nāma vināśakavināśapratiyoginī buddhir iti boddhavyam/
div.label: [l. 10.114]
div.p: atha dvyaṇukanāśam ārabhya katibhiḥ kṣaṇaiḥ punar anyad dvyaṇukam utpadya rūpādimad bhavatīti jijñāsāyām utpattiprakāraḥ kathyate — nodanādikrameṇa dvyaṇukanāśaḥ/ naṣṭe dvyaṇuke paramāṇāv agnisaṃyogāc chyāmādīnāṃ nivṛttiḥ/ nivṛtteṣu śyāmādiṣu punar anyasmād agnisaṃyogād raktādīnām utpattiḥ/ utpanneṣu raktādiṣv adṛṣṭavadātmasaṃyogāt paramāṇau dravyārambhaṇāya kriyā/ tayā pūrvadeśād vibhāgaḥ/ vibhāgena pūrvadeśasaṃyoganivṛttiḥ/ tasmin nivṛtte paramāṇvantareṇa saṃyogotpattiḥ/ saṃyuktābhyāṃ paramāṇubhyāṃ dvyaṇukārambhaḥ/ ārabdhe dvyaṇuke kāraṇaguṇādibhyaḥ kāryaguṇādīnāṃ rūpādīnām utpattir iti yathākramaṃ nava kṣaṇāḥ/ daśakṣaṇādiprakārāntaraṃ vistarabhayān neha pratanyate/ itthaṃ pīlupākaprakriyā/ piṭharapākaprakriyā naiyāyikadhīsaṃmatā/
div.label: [l. 10.125]
div.p: vibhāgajavibhāgo dvividhaḥ — kāraṇamātravibhāgajaḥ kāraṇākāraṇavibhāgajaś ca/ tatra prathamaḥ kathyate — kāryavyāpte kāraṇe karmotpannaṃ yadāvayavāntarād vibhāgaṃ vidhatte na tadākāśādideśād vibhāgaḥ/ yadā tv ākāśādideśād vibhāgo na tadāvayavāntarād iti sthitiniyamaḥ/ karmaṇo gaganavibhāgākartṛtvasya dravyārambhakasaṃyogavirodhivibhāgārambhakatvena dhūmasya dhūmadhvajavargeṇeva vyabhicārānupalambhāt/ tataś cāvayavakarmāvayavāntarād eva vibhāgaṃ karoti nākāśādideśāt/ tasmād vibhāgād dravyārambhakasaṃyoganivṛttiḥ/ tataḥ kāraṇābhāvāt kāryābhāva iti nyāyād avayavinivṛttiḥ/ nivṛtte ’vayavini tatkāraṇayor avayavayor vartamāno vibhāgaḥ kāryavināśaviśiṣṭaṃ kālaṃ svatantraṃ vāvayavam apekṣya sakriyasyaivāvayavasya kāryasaṃyuktād ākāśadeśād vibhāgam ārabhate na niṣkriyasya/ kāraṇābhāvāt/

dvitīyas tu haste karmotpannam avayavāntarād vibhāgaṃ akurvad
akurvad ]; kurvad A. ākāśādideśebhyo vibhāgān ārabhate/ te kāraṇākāraṇavibhāgāḥ karma yāṃ diśaṃ prati kāryārambhābhimukhaṃ tām apekṣya kāryākāryavibhāgam ārabhante/ yathā hastākāśavibhāgāc charīrākāśavibhāgaḥ/ na cāsau śarīrakriyākāryaḥ/ tadā tasya niṣkriyatvāt/ nāpi hastakriyākāryaḥ vyadhikaraṇasya karmaṇo vibhāgakartṛtvānupapatteḥ/ ataḥ pāriśeṣyāt kāraṇākāraṇavibhāgas tasya kāraṇam aṅgīkaraṇīyam/
div.label: [l. 10.144]
div.p: yad avādy andhakārādau bhāvatvaṃ niṣidhyata iti tad asaṃgatam/ tatra caturdhā vivādasaṃbhavāt/ tathā hi/ dravyaṃ tama iti bhāṭṭā vedāntinaś ca bhaṇanti/ āropitaṃ nīlarūpam iti śridharācāryāḥ/ ālokajñānābhāvaḥ iti prābhāraikadeśinaḥ/ ālokābhāva iti naiyāyikādaya iti cet

tatra dravyatvapakṣo na ghaṭate/ vikalpānupapatteḥ/ dravyaṃ bhavadandhakārākhyaṃ pṛthivyādyanyatamam anyad vā/ nādyaḥ/ yatrāntarbhāvo 'sya tasya yāvanto guṇās tāvadguṇakatvaprasaṅgāt/ na dvitīyaḥ/ nirguṇasya tasya dravyatvāsaṃbhavena dravyāntaratvasya sutarām asaṃbhavāt/
nanu tamālaśyāmalatvenopalabhyamānaṃ tamaḥ kathaṃ nirguṇaṃ syād iti cet
tad asāram/
div.label: [l. 10.153]
div.p: gandhādivyāptasya nīlarūpasya tannivṛttau nivṛtteḥ/
atha nīlaṃ tama iti gateḥ kā gatir iti cet

nīlaṃ nabha itivad bhrāntir evety alaṃ vṛddhavīvadhayā/ ata eva nāropitarūpaṃ tamaḥ/ adhiṣṭhānapratyayam antareṇāropāyogāt/ bāhyālokasahakārirahitasya cakṣuṣo rūpārope sāmarthyānupalambhāc ca/ na cāyam acākṣuṣaḥ pratyayaḥ/ tadanuvidhānasyānanyathāsiddhatvāt/ ata eva nālokajñānābhāvaḥ/ abhāvasya pratiyogigrāhakendriyagrāhyatvaniyamena mānasatvaprasaṅgāt/ tasmād ālokābhāva eva tamaḥ/

na ca vidhipratyayavedyatvenābhāvatvāyoga iti sāmpratam/ pralayavināśāvasānādiṣu vyabhicārāt/ na cābhāve bhāvadharmādhyāropo durupapādaḥ/ duḥkhābhāve sukhatvāropasya saṃyogābhāve vibhāgatvābhimānasya ca dṛṣṭatvāt/

na cālokābhāvasya ghaṭādyabhāvavad rūpavadabhāvatvenālokasāpekṣacakṣurjanyajñānaviṣayatvaṃ syād ity eṣitavyam/ yadgrahe yadapekṣaṃ cakṣus tadabhāvagrahe 'pi tad apekṣata iti nyāyenālokagraha ālokāpekṣāyā abhāvena tadabhāvagrahe 'pi tadapekṣāyā abhāvāt/

na cādhikaraṇagrahaṇāvaśyaṃbhāvaḥ/ abhāvapratītāv adhikaraṇagrahaṇāvaśyaṃbhāvānaṅgīkārāt/ aparathā nivṛttaḥ kolāhala iti śabdapradhvaṃsaḥ pratyakṣo na syād iti aprāmāṇikaṃ paravacanam/ tat sarvam abhisaṃdhāya bhagavān kaṇādaḥ praṇināya sūtraṃ dravyaguṇakarmaniṣpattivaidharmyād abhāvas tamaḥ iti
div.label: [l. 10.172]
div.p: abhāvas tu niṣedhamukhapramāṇagamyaḥ saptamo nirūpyate — sa cāsamavāyatve saty asamavāyaḥ/ saṃkṣepato dvividhaḥ/ saṃsargābhāvānyonyābhāvabhedāt/ saṃsargābhāvo 'pi trividhaḥ/ prākpradhvaṃsātyantābhāvabhedāt/ tatrānityo 'nāditamaḥ prāgabhāvaḥ/ utpattimān avināśī pradhvaṃsaḥ/ pratiyogyāśrayo 'bhāvo 'tyantābhāvaḥ/ atyantābhāvavyatiriktatve saty anavadhir abhāvo anyonyābhāvaḥ/
nanv anyonyābhāva evātyantābhāva iti cet

aho rājamārga eva bhramaḥ/ anyonyābhāvo hi tādātmyapratiyogikaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ/ yathā ghataḥ paṭātmā na bhavatīti/ saṃsargapratiyogikaḥ pratiṣedho 'tyantābhāvaḥ/ yathā vāyau rūpasaṃbandho nāstīti/ na cāsya puruṣārthaupayikatvaṃ nāstīty āśaṅkanīyam/ duḥkhātyantocchedāparaparyāyaniḥśreyasarūpatvena paramapuruṣārthatvāt//
div.label: [l. 10.183]

div.head: [athākṣapādadarśanam //11//]
div.label: [l. 11.1]
div.p: tattvajñānād duḥkhātyantocchedalakṣaṇaṃ niḥśreyasaṃ bhavatīti samānatantre 'pi pratipāditam/ tad āha sūtrakāraḥ — pramāṇaprameyetyāditattvajñānān niḥśreyasādhigama iti/ idaṃ nyāyaśāstrasyādimaṃ sūtram/ nyāyaśāstraṃ ca pañcādhyāyātmakam/ tatra pratyadhyāyam āhnikadvayam/ tatra prathamādhyāyasya prathamāhnike bhagavatā gautamena pramāṇādipadārthanavakalakṣaṇanirūpaṇaṃ vidhāya dvitīye vādādisaptapadārthalakṣaṇanirūpaṇaṃ kṛtam/ dvitīyasya prathame saṃśayaparīkṣaṇaṃ pramāṇacatuṣṭayāprāmāṇyaśaṅkānirākaraṇam/ dvitīye 'rthāpattyāder antarbhāvanirūpaṇam/ tṛtīyasya prathama ātmaśarīrendriyārthaparīkṣaṇam/ dvitīye buddhimanaḥparīkṣaṇam/ caturthasya prathame pravṛttidoṣapretyabhāvaphaladuḥkhāpavargaparīkṣaṇam/ dvitīye doṣanimittakatvanirūpaṇam avayavyādinirūpaṇaṃ ca/ pañcamasya prathame jātibhedanirūpaṇam/ dvitīye nigrahasthānabhedanirūpaṇam/
div.label: [l. 11.14]
div.p: mānādhīnā meyasiddhir iti nyāyena pramāṇasya prathamam uddeśe tadanusāreṇa lakṣaṇasya kathanīyatayā prathamoddiṣṭasya pramāṇasya prathamaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ kathyate — sādhanāśrayāvyatiriktatve sati pramāvyāptaṃ pramāṇam/ evaṃ ca pratitantrasiddhāntasiddhaṃ parameśvaraprāmāṇyaṃ saṃgṛhītaṃ bhavati/ yad acakathat sūtrakāraḥ — mantrāyurvedaprāmāṇyavac ca tatprāmāṇyam āptaprāmāṇyāt iti/ tathā ca nyāyanayapārāvārapāradṛśvā viśvavikhyātakīrtir udayanācāryo 'pi nyāyakusumāñjalau caturthe stabake —

quote.p: śaṅkonmeṣakalaṅkibhiḥ kim aparais tan me pramāṇaṃ śivaḥ// iti/

div.p: tac caturvidhaṃ pratyakṣānumānopamānaśabdabhedāt/
div.label: [l. 11.30]
div.p: pramāyāṃ yad dhi pratibhāsate tat prameyam/ tac ca dvādaśaprakāram — ātmaśarīrendriyārthabuddhimanaḥpravṛttidoṣapretyabhāvaphala-duḥkhāpavargabhedāt/
div.label: [l. 11.33]
div.p: anavadhāraṇātmakaṃ jñānaṃ saṃśayaḥ/ sa trividhaḥ/ sādhāraṇadharmāsādhāraṇadharmavipratipattilakṣaṇabhedāt/
div.label: [l. 11.35]
div.p: yam adhikṛtya pravartante puruṣās tat prayojanam/ tad dvividham/ dṛṣṭādṛṣṭabhedāt/
div.label: [l. 11.37]
div.p: vyāptisaṃvedanabhūmir dṛṣṭāntaḥ/ sa dvividhaḥ/ sādharmyavaidharmyabhedāt/
div.label: [l. 11.38]
div.p: prāmāṇikatvenābhyupagato 'rthaḥ siddhāntaḥ/ sa caturvidhaḥ/ sarvatantrapratitantrādhikaraṇābhyupagamabhedāt/
div.label: [l. 11.40]
div.p: parārthānumānavākyaikadeśo 'vayavaḥ/ sa pañcavidhaḥ/ pratijñāhetūdāharaṇopanayanigamanabhedāt/
div.label: [l. 11.42]
div.p: vyāpyāropeṇa vyāpakāropas tarkaḥ/ sa caikādaśavidhaḥ/ vyāghātātmāśrayetaretarāśrayacakrakāśrayānavasthāpratibandhikalpanākalpa-nālāghavakalpanāgauravotsargāpavādavaijātyabhedāt/
div.label: [l. 11.45]
div.p: yathārthānubhavaparyāyā pramitir nirṇayaḥ/ sa caturvidhaḥ/ sākṣātkṛtyanumityupamitiśābdabhedāt/
div.label: [l. 11.47]
div.p: tattvanirṇayaphalaḥ kathāviśeṣo vādaḥ/ ubhayasādhanavatī vijigīṣukathā jalpaḥ/ svapakṣasthāpanahīnaḥ kathāviśeṣo vitaṇḍā/ kathā nāma vādiprativādinoḥ pakṣapratipakṣaparigrahaḥ/
div.label: [l. 11.50]
div.p: asādhako hetutvenābhimato hetvābhāsaḥ/ sa pañcavidhaḥ/ savyabhicāraviruddhaprakaraṇasamasādhyasamātītakālabhedāt/
div.label: [l. 11.52]
div.p: śabdavṛttivyatyayena pratiṣedhahetuś chalam/ tat trividham/ abhidhānatātparyopacāravṛttivyatyayabhedāt/
div.label: [l. 11.54]
div.p:
svavyāghātakam uttaraṃ jātiḥ/ sā caturviṃśatividhā/ sādharmyavai-dharmyotkarṣāpakarṣavarṇyāvarṇyavikalpasādhyaprāptyaprāptiprasaṅgaprati-dṛṣṭāntānutpattisaṃśayaprakaraṇāhetv
°prakaraṇāhetv° ] IV; °prakaraṇahetv° A. arthāpattyaviśeṣopapattyupalabdhy-anupalabdhinityānityakāryasamabhedāt/
div.label: [l. 11.58]
div.p: parājayanimittaṃ nigrahasthānam/ tad dvāviṃśatiprakāram/ pratijñāhāni-pratijñāntarapratijñāvirodhapratijñāsaṃnyāsahetvantarārthāntara-nirarthakāvijñātārthāpārthakāprāptakālanyūnādhika-punaruktānanubhāṣaṇājñānāpratibhāvikṣepamatānujñāparyanuyojyopekṣaṇa-niranuyojyānuyogāpasiddhāntahetvābhāsabhedāt/
div.label: [l. 11.63]
div.p: atra sarvāntargaṇikas tu viśeṣas tatra śāstre vispaṣṭo 'pi vistarabhiyā na prastūyate/
div.label: [l. 11.65]
div.p: nanu pramāṇādipadārthaṣoḍaśake pratipādyamāne katham idaṃ nyāyaśāstram iti vyapadiśyate/ satyam/ tathāpy asādhāraṇyena vyapadeśā bhavantīti nyāyena nyāyasya parārthānumānāparaparyāyasya sakalavidyānugrāhakatayā sarvakarmānuṣṭhānasādhanatayā pradhānatvena tathā vyapadeśo yujyate/ tathābhāṇi sarvajñena so 'yaṃ paramo nyāyo vipratipannapuruṣaṃ prati pratipādakatvāt/ tathā pravṛttihetutvāc ca iti/ pakṣilasvāminā ca seyam ānvīkṣikī vidyā pramāṇādibhiḥ padārthaiḥ pravibhajyamānā —
div.label: [l. 11.76]
div.p:
nanu tattvajñānān niḥśresayaṃ bhavatīty uktam/ tatra kiṃ tattvajñānād anantaram eva niḥśresayaṃ saṃpadyate/ nety ucyate/ kiṃ tu tattvajñānād duḥkhajanmapravṛttidoṣamithyājñānānām uttarottarāpāye tadanantarāpāyād apavarga iti/ tatra mithyājñānaṃ nāmānātmani dehādāv ātmabuddhiḥ/ tadanukūleṣu rāgaḥ/ tatpratikūleṣu dveṣaḥ/ vastutas tv ātmanaḥ pratikūlam anukūlaṃ vā na kiṃcid vastv asti/ parasparānubandhitvāc ca rāgādīnāṃ mūḍho rajyati rakto muhyati mūḍhaḥ kupyati kupito muhyatīti/ tatas tair doṣaiḥ preritaḥ prāṇī pratiṣiddhāni śarīreṇa hiṃsāsteyādīny ācarati/ vācā anṛtādīni/ manasā paradrohādīni/ seyaṃ pāparūpā pravṛttir adharmaḥ/ śarīreṇa praśastāni dānaparaparitrāṇādīni/ vācā hitasatyādīni/ manasā ajighāṃsādīni/ seyaṃ puṇyarūpā pravṛttir dharmaḥ/ seyam ubhayī pravṛttiḥ/ tataḥ svānurūpaṃ praśastaṃ ninditaṃ vā janma punaḥ śarīrādeḥ prādurbhāvaḥ/ tasmin sati pratikūlavedanīyatayā bādhanātmakaṃ duḥkhaṃ bhavati/ [na hy apravṛttasya duḥkhaṃ pratyāpadyata iti kaścit prapadyate/]
This sentence is missing in IV p. 115. ta ime mithyājñānādayo duḥkhāntā avicchedena pravartamānāḥ saṃsāraśabdārtho ghaṭīcakravan niravadhir anuvartate/ yadā kaścit puruṣadhaureyaḥ purākṛtasukṛtaparipākavaśād ācāryopadeśena sarvam idaṃ duḥkhāyatanaṃ duḥkhānuṣaktaṃ ca paśyati tadā tat sarvaṃ heyatvena budhyate/ tatas tannirvartakam avidyādi nivartayitum icchati/ tannivṛttyupāyaś ca tattvajñānam iti/ kasyacic catasṛbhir vibhaktaṃ prameyaṃ bhāvayataḥ samyagdarśanapadavedanīyatayā tattvajñānaṃ jāyate/ tattvajñānān mithyājñānam apaiti/ mithyājñānāpāye doṣā apayānti/ doṣāpāye pravṛttir apaiti/ pravṛttyapāye janmāpaiti/ janmāpāye duḥkham atyantaṃ nivartate/ sātyantikī duḥkhanivṛttir apavargaḥ/ nivṛtter ātyantikatvaṃ nāma nivartyasajātīyasya punas tatrānutpāda iti/ tathā ca pāramarṣaṃ sūtram — duḥkhajanmapravṛttidoṣamithyājñānānām uttarottarāpāye tadanantarāpāyād apavargaḥ iti/
div.label: [l. 11.103]
div.p: nanu duḥkhātyantocchedo 'pavarga ity etad adyāpi kaphoṇiguḍāyitaṃ vartate/ tat kathaṃ siddhavatkṛtya vyavahriyate iti cet —
maivam/ sarveṣāṃ mokṣavādinām apavargadaśāyām ātyantikī duḥkhanivṛttir astīty asyārthasya sarvatantrasiddhāntasiddhatayā ghaṇṭāpathatvāt/

tathā hi — ātmocchedo mokṣa iti mādhyamikamate duḥkhocchedo 'stīty etāvat tāvad avivādam/ atha manyethāḥ — śarīrādivad ātmāpi duḥkhahetutvād ucchedya iti tan na saṃgacchate/ vikalpānupapatteḥ/ kim ātmā jñānasaṃtāno vivakṣitas tadatirikto vā/ prathame na vipratipattiḥ/ kaḥ khalv anukūlam ācarati pratikūlam ācaret/ dvitīye tasya nityatve nivṛttir aśakyavidhānaiva/ anityatve pravṛttyanupapattiḥ/ vyavahārānupapattiś cādhikaṃ dūṣaṇam/ na khalu kaścit prekṣāvān ātmanas tu kāmāya sarvaṃ priyaṃ bhavatīti sarvataḥ priyatamasyātmanaḥ samucchedāya prayatate/ sarvo hi prāṇī sati dharmiṇi mukta iti vyavaharati nanu/

dharminivṛttau nirmalajñānodayo mahodaya iti vijñānavādivāde sāmagryabhāvaḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyānupapattiś ca/ bhāvanācatuṣṭayaṃ hi tasya kāraṇam abhīṣṭam/ tac ca kṣaṇabhaṅgapakṣe sthiraikādhārāsaṃbhavāl laṅghanābhyāsādivad anāsāditaprakarṣaṃ na sphuṭam abhijñānam abhijanayituṃ prabhavati/ sopaplavasya jñānasaṃtānasya baddhatve nirupaplavasya ca muktatve yo baddhaḥ sa eva mukta iti sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ na saṃgacchate/

āvaraṇamuktir muktir iti jainajanābhimato 'pi mārgo na nisargato nirargalaḥ/ aṅga bhavān pṛṣṭo vyācaṣṭām kim āvaraṇam/ dharmādharmabhrāntaya iti cet — iṣṭam eva/ atha deham evāvaraṇam/ tathā ca tannivṛttau pañjarān muktasya śukasyevātmanaḥ satatordhvagamanaṃ muktir iti cet — tadā vaktavyam/ kim ayam ātmā mūrto 'mūrto vā/ prathame niravayavaḥ sāvayavo vā/ niravayavatve niravayavo mūrtaḥ paramāṇur iti paramāṇulakṣaṇāpattyā paramāṇudharmavad ātmadharmāṇām atīndriyatvaṃ prasajyeta/ sāvayavatve yat sāvayavaṃ tad anityam iti pratibandhabalenānityatvāpattau kṛtapraṇāśākṛtābhyāgamau niṣpratibandhau prasaretām/ amūrtatve gamanam anupapannam eva/ calanātmikāyāḥ kriyāyā mūrtatvapratibandhāt/
pāratantryaṃ bandhaḥ svātantryaṃ mokṣa iti cārvākapakṣe 'pi svātantryaṃ duḥkhanivṛttiś cet — avivādaḥ/ aiśvaryaṃ cet — sātiśayatayā sadṛkṣatayā ca prekṣāvatāṃ nābhimatam/

prakṛtipuruṣānyatvakhyātau prakṛtyuparame puruṣasya svarūpeṇāvasthānaṃ muktir iti sāṃkhyākhyāte 'pi pakṣe duḥkhocchedo 'sty eva/ vivekajñānaṃ puruṣāśrayaṃ prakṛtyāśrayaṃ vety etāvad avaśiṣyate/ tatra puruṣāśrayam iti na śliṣyate/ puruṣasya kauṭasthyāvasthānanirodhāpātāt/ nāpi prakṛtir āśrayaḥ
prakṛtir āśrayaḥ ]; prakṛtyāśrayaḥ ASS, IV, A. The masculine compound prakṛtyāśrayaḥ (in all editions) makes no sense. The preceding context favors neuter prakṛtyāśrayam. However, since there is a back reference to feminine prakṛti in the immediately following sentence, I have accepted the reading prakṛtirāśrayaḥ. / acetanatvāt tasyāḥ/ kiṃ ca prakṛtiḥ pravṛttisvabhāvā nivṛttisvabhāvā vā/ ādye 'nirmokṣaḥ/ svabhāvasyānapāyāt/ dvitīye saṃprati saṃsāro 'stam iyāt/

nityaniratiśayasukhābhivyaktir muktir iti bhaṭṭasarvajñādyabhimate 'pi duḥkhanivṛttir abhimataiva/ paraṃ tu nityasukhaṃ na pramāṇapaddhatim adhyāste/ śrutis tatra pramāṇam iti cet — na/ yogyānupalabdhibādhite tadanavakāśāt/ avakāśe vā grāvaplave 'pi tathābhāvaprasaṅgāt/
div.label: [l. 11.144]
div.p: nanu sukhābhivyaktir muktir iti pakṣaṃ parityajya duḥkhanivṛttir eva muktir iti svīkāraḥ kṣīraṃ vihāyārocakagrastasya sauvīrarucim anubhāvayatīti cet — tad etan nāṭakapakṣapatitaṃ tvadvaca ity upekṣyate/ sukhasya sātiśayatayā sadṛkṣatayā bahupratyanīkākrāntatayā sādhanaprārthanaparikliṣṭatayā ca duḥkhāvinābhūtatvena viṣānuṣaktamadhuvad duḥkhapakṣanikṣepāt/ nanv ekam anusaṃdhitsato 'paraṃ pracyavata iti nyāyena duḥkhavat sukham apy ucchidyata ity akāmyo 'yam pakṣa iti cet — maivaṃ maṃsthāḥ/ sukhasaṃpādane duḥkhasādhanabāhulyānuṣaṅganiyamena taptāyaḥpiṇḍe tapanīyabuddhyā pravartamānena sāmyāpātāt/ tathā hi nyāyopārjiteṣu viṣayeṣu kiyantaḥ sukhakhadyotāḥ kiyanti duḥkhadurdināni/ anyāyopārjiteṣu tu yad bhaviṣyati tan manasāpi cintayituṃ na śakyam iti/ etat svānubhavam apracchādayantaḥ santo vidāṃkurvantu vidāṃ varā bhavantaḥ/ tasmāt pariśeṣāt parameśvarānugrahavaśāc chravaṇādikrameṇātmatattvasākṣātkāravataḥ puruṣadhaureyasya duḥkhanivṛttir ātyantikī niḥśreyasam iti niravadyam/
div.label: [l. 11.159]
div.p: nanv īśvarasadbhāve kiṃ pramāṇaṃ pratyakṣam anumānam āgamo vā/ na tāvad atra pratyakṣaṃ kramate/ rūpādirahitatvenātīndriyatvāt/ nāpy anumānam/ tadvyāptaliṅgābhāvāt/ nāgamaḥ/ vikalpāsahatvāt/ kiṃ nityo 'vagamayaty anityo vā/ ādye 'pasiddhāntāpātaḥ/ dvitīye parasparāśrayāpātaḥ/ upamānādikam aśakyaśaṅkam/ niyataviṣayatvāt/ tasmād īśvaraḥ śaśaviṣāṇāyata iti cet —
tad etan na caturacetasāṃ cetasi camatkāram āviṣkaroti/ vivādāspadaṃ nagasāgarādikaṃ sakartṛkaṃ kāryatvāt kumbhavat/ na cāyam asiddho hetuḥ/ sāvayavatvena tasya susādhanatvāt/
nanu kim idaṃ sāvayavatvam avayavasaṃyogitvam avayavasamavāyitvaṃ vā/ nādyaḥ/ gaganādau vyabhicārāt/ na dvitīyaḥ/ tantutvādāv anaikāntyāt/ tasmād anupapannam iti cet —
maivaṃ vādīḥ/ samavetadravyatvaṃ sāvayavatvam iti nirukter vaktuṃ śakyatvāt/ avāntaramahattvena vā kāryatvānumānasya sukaratvāt/
nāpi viruddho hetuḥ/ sādhyaviparyayavyāpter abhāvāt/ nāpy anaikāntikaḥ/ pakṣād anyatra vṛtter adarśanāt/ nāpi kālātyayāpadiṣṭaḥ/ bādhakānupalambhāt/ nāpi satpratipakṣaḥ/ pratibhaṭādarśanāt/
div.label: [l. 11.174]
div.p: nanu nagādikam akartṛkaṃ śarīrājanyatvād gaganavad iti cet —
naitat parīkṣākṣamam īkṣyate/ na hi kaṭhorakaṇṭhīravasya kuraṅgaśāvaḥ pratibhaṭo bhavati/ ajanyatvasyaiva samarthatayā śarīraviśeṣaṇavaiyarthyāt/
tarhy ajanyatvam eva sādhanam iti cet —

na/ asiddheḥ/ nāpi sopādhikatvaśaṅkākalaṅkāṅkuraḥ saṃbhavī/ anukūlatarkasaṃbhavāt/ yady ayam akartṛkaḥ syāt kāryam api na syāt/ iha jagati nāsty eva tat kāryaṃ nāma yatkārakacakram avadhīryātmānam āsādayed ity etad avivādam/ tac ca sarvaṃ kartṛviśeṣopahitamaryādam/ kartṛtvaṃ cetarakārakāprayojyatve sati sakalakārakaprayoktṛtvalakṣaṇaṃ jñānacikīrṣāprayatnādhāratvam/ evaṃ ca kartṛvyāvṛttes tadupahitasamastakārakavyāvṛttāv akāraṇakakāryotpādaprasaṅga iti sthūlaḥ pramādaḥ/ tathā niraṭaṅki śaṃkarakiṃkareṇa —
div.label: [l. 11.188]
div.p: yadīśvaraḥ kartā syāt tarhi śarīrī syād ityādipratikūlatarkajātaṃ jāgartīti cet —
īśvarasiddhyasiddhibhyāṃ vyāghātaḥ/ tad uditam udayanena —

quote.p: ābhāsatve tu saiva syād āśrayāsiddhir uddhatā/

div.p: na ca viśeṣavirodhaḥ śakyaśaṅkaḥ/ jñātatvājñātatvavikalpaparāhatatvāt/
div.label: [l. 11.194]
div.p: syād etat/ parameśvarasya jagannirmāṇe pravṛttiḥ kimarthā/ svārthā parārthā vā/ ādye 'pīṣtaprāptyarthāniṣṭaparihārārthā vā/ nādyaḥ/ avāptasakalakāmasya tadanupapatteḥ/ ata eva na dvitīyaḥ/ dvitīye pravṛttyanupapattiḥ/ kaḥ khalu parārthaṃ pravartamānaṃ prekṣāvān ity ācakṣīta/ atha karuṇayā pravṛttyupapattir ity ācakṣīta kaścit taṃ pratyācakṣīta/ tarhi sarvān prāṇinaḥ sukhina eva sṛjed īśvaraḥ/ na duḥkhaśabalān/ karuṇāvirodhāt/ svārtham anapekṣya paraduḥkhaprahāṇecchā hi kāruṇyam/ tasmād īśvarasya jagatsarjanaṃ na yujyate/
tad uktaṃ bhaṭṭācāryaiḥ —
div.label: [l. 11.202]

p.hi: jagac cāsṛjatas tasya ] ASS v.l., IV; jagac ca sṛjatas tasya A.
nāmeṣṭaṃ na sidhyati ] Ślokavārttika; nāma na kṛtaṃ bhavet ASS, IV, A.

div.label: [l. 11.204]
div.p: atrocyate/ nāstikaśiromaṇe tāvad īrṣyākaṣāyite cakṣuṣī nimīlya paribhāvayatu bhavān/ karuṇayā pravṛttir asty eva/ na ca nisargataḥ sukhamayasargaprasaṅgaḥ/ sṛjyaprāṇikṛtasukṛtaduṣkṛtaparipākaviśeṣād vaiṣamyopapatteḥ/ na ca svātantryabhaṅgaḥ śaṅkanīyaḥ/ svāṅgaṃ svavyavadhāyakaṃ na bhavatīti nyāyena pratyuta tannirvāhāt/ eka eva rudro na dvitīyo 'vatasthe ityādir āgamas tatra pramāṇam/ yady evaṃ tarhi parasparāśrayabādhavyādhiṃ samādhatsveti cet —

tasyānutthānāt/ kim utpattau parasparāśrayaḥ śaṅkyate jñaptau vā/ nādyaḥ/ āgamasyeśvarādhīnotpattikatve 'pi parameśvarasya nityatvenotpatter anupapatteḥ/ nāpi jñaptau/ parameśvarasyāgamādhīnajñaptikatve 'pi tasyānyato 'vagamāt/ nāpi tadanityatvajñaptau/ āgamānityatvasya tīvrādidharmopetatvādinā sugamatvāt/ tasmān nivartakadharmānuṣṭhānavaśād īśvaraprasādasiddhāv abhimateṣṭasiddhir iti sarvam avadātam//

div.head: [atha jaiminidarśanam //12//]
div.label: [l. 121]
div.p: nanu dharmānuṣṭhānavaśād abhimatadharmasiddhir iti jegīyate bhavatā/ tatra dharmaḥ kiṃlakṣaṇaḥ kiṃpramāṇaka iti cet —

ucyate/ śrūyatām avadhānena asya praśnasya prativacanaṃ prācyāṃ mīmāṃsāyāṃ prādarśi jaimininā muninā/ sā hi mīmāṃsā dvādaśalakṣaṇī/ tatra prathame 'dhyāye vidhyarthavādamantrasmṛtināmadheyārthakasya śabdarāśeḥ prāmāṇyam/ dvitīya upodghātakarmabhedapramāṇāpavādaprayogabhedarūpo 'rthaḥ/ tṛtīye śrutiliṅgavākyādivirodhapratipattikarmānārabhyādhītabahupradhānopakāraka-prayājādiyājamānacintanam/ caturthe pradhānaprayojakatvāpradhānaprayojakatvajuhūparṇatādiphalarājasūyagata-jaghanyāṅgākṣadyūtādicintā/ pañcame śrutyādikramatadviśeṣavṛddhyavardhanaprābalyacintā/ ṣaṣṭhe 'dhikāritaddharmadravyapratinidhyarthalopanaprāyaścittasatradeyavahni-vicāraḥ/ saptame pratyakṣavacanātideśaśeṣanāmaliṅgātideśavicāraḥ/ aṣṭame spaṣṭāspaṣṭaprabalaliṅgātideśāpavādavicāraḥ/ navame ūhavicārārambhasāmohamantrohatatprasaṅgāgatavicāraḥ/ daśame bādhahetudvāralopavistārabādhakāraṇakāryaikatvasamuccayagrahādisāma-prakīrṇanañarthavicāraḥ/ ekādaśe tantropodghātatantrāvāpatantraprapañcanāvāpaprapañcanacintanāni/ dvādaśe prasaṅgatantrinirṇayasamuccayavikalpavicāraḥ/
div.label: [l. 12.18]
div.p: tatrāthāto dharmajijñāsā iti prathamam adhikaraṇaṃ pūrvamīmāsārambhopapādanaparam/ adhikaraṇaṃ ca pañcāvayavam ācakṣate parīkṣakāḥ/ te ca pañcāvayavā viṣayasaṃśayapūrvapakṣasiddhāntasaṃgatirūpāḥ/
div.label: [l. 12.22]
div.p: tatrācāryamatānusāreṇādhikaraṇaṃ nirūpyate/ svādhyāyo 'dhyetavya ity etad vākyaṃ viṣayaḥ/ codanālakṣaṇo 'rtho dharmaḥ ity ārabhyānvāhārye ca darśanāt ity etadantaṃ jaiminīyaṃ dharmaśāstram anārabhyam ārabhyaṃ veti saṃdehaḥ/ adhyayanavidher adṛṣṭārthatvadṛṣṭārthatvābhyāṃ tatrānārabhyam iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ/ adhyayanavidher arthāvabodhalakṣaṇadṛṣṭaphalakatvānupapatteḥ/ arthāvabodhārtham adhyayanavidhir iti vadan vādī praṣṭavyaḥ — kim atyantam aprāptam adhyayanaṃ vidhīyate kiṃ vā pākṣikam avaghātavan niyamyata iti/ na tāvad ādyaḥ/ vivādapadaṃ vedādhyayanam arthāvabodhahetur adhyayanatvād bhāratādhyayanavad ity anumānena vidhyanapekṣatayā prāptatvāt/ astu tarhi dvitīyo yathā nakhavidalanādinā taṇḍulaniṣpattisaṃbhavāt pākṣiko 'vaghāto 'vaśyam kartavya iti vidhinā niyamyate tathā likhitapāṭhenārthajñānasaṃbhavāt pākṣikam adhyayanaṃ vidhinā niyamyata iti cet —

naitac caturasram/ dṛṣṭāntadārṣṭānikayor vaidharmyasaṃbhavāt/ avaghātaniṣpannair eva taṇḍulaiḥ piṣṭapuroḍāśādikaraṇe 'vāntarāpūrvadvārā darśapūrṇamāsau paramāpūrvam utpādayato nāparathā/ ato 'pūrvam avaghātasya niyamahetuḥ/ prakṛte likhitapāṭhajanyenādhyayanajanyena vārthāvabodhena kratvanuṣṭhānasiddher adhyayanasya niyamahetur nāsty eva/ tasmād arthāvabodhahetuvicāraśāstrasya vaidhatvaṃ nāstīti/
