tarhi śrūyamāṇasya vidheḥ kā gatir iti cet svargaphalako 'kṣaragrahaṇamātravidhir iti bhavān parituṣyatu/ viśvajinnyāyenāśrutasyāpi svargasya kalpayituṃ śakyatvāt/ yathā sa svargaḥ sarvān praty aviśiṣṭatvāt iti viśvajity aśrutam apy adhikāriṇaṃ saṃpādayatā tadviśeṣaṇaṃ svargaḥ phalaṃ yuktyā niraṇāyi tadvad adhyayane 'py astu/ tad uktam —
div.label: [l. 12.46]

quote.p: vināpi vidhinā dṛṣṭalābhān na hi tadarthatā/
kalpyas tu vidhisāmarthyāt svargo viśvajidādivat// iti/

div.p: evaṃ ca sati vedam adhītya snāyād iti smṛtir anugṛhītā bhavati/ atra hi vedādhyayanasamāvartanayor avyavadhānam avagamyate/ tāvake mate tv adhīte 'pi vede dharmavicārāya gurukule vastavyam/ tathā saty avyavadhānaṃ bādhyeta/ tasmād vicāraśāstrasya vaidhatvābhāvāt pāṭhamātreṇa svargasiddheḥ samāvartanaśāstrāc ca dharmavicāraśāstram anārambhaṇīyam iti pūrvapakṣasaṃkṣepaḥ/
div.label: [l. 12.54]
div.p: siddhāntas tv anyataḥ prāptatvād aprāptavidhitvaṃ māstu/ niyamavidhitvapakṣas tu vajrahastenāpi nāpahastayituṃ pāryate/ tathā hi svādhyāyo 'dhyetavya iti tavyapratyayaḥ preraṇāparaparyāyāṃ puruṣapravṛttirūpārthabhāvanābhāvyām abhidhābhāvanāṃ pratyāyayati/ sā hy arthabhāvanā bhāvyam ākāṅkṣati/ na tāvat samānapadopāttam adhyayanaṃ bhāvyatvena pariramate/ adhyayanaśabdārthasya svādhīnoccāraṇakṣamatvasya vāṅmanasavyāpārasya kleśārthakasya bhāvyatvāsaṃbhavāt/ nāpi samānavākyopāttaḥ svādhyāyaḥ/ svādhyāyaśabdārthasya varṇarāśer nityatvena vibhutvena cotpattyādīnāṃ caturṇāṃ kriyāphalānām asaṃbhavāt/ tasmāt sāmarthyaprāpto 'vabodho bhāvyatvenāvatiṣṭhate/ arthī samartho vidvān adhikriyata iti nyāyena darśapūrṇamāsādividhayaḥ svaviṣayāvabodham apekṣamāṇāḥ svārthabodhe svādhyāyaṃ viniyuñjate/ adhyayanavidhiś ca likhitapāṭhādivyāvṛttādhyayanasaṃskṛtatvaṃ svādhyāyasyāvagamayati/ tathā ca yathā darśapūrṇamāsādijanyaṃ paramāpūrvam avaghātādijanyasyāvāntarāpūrvasya kalpakaṃ tathā samastakratujanyam apūrvajātaṃ kratujñānasādhanādhyayananiyamajanyam apūrvaṃ kalpayiṣyati/ niyamādṛṣṭāniṣṭau vidhiśravaṇavaiphalyam āpadyeta/ na ca viśvajinnyāyena phalakalpanāvakalpyate/ arthāvabodhe dṛṣṭe phale sati phalāntarakalpanāyā ayogāt/
div.label: [l. 12.71]
div.p: tad uktam —

quote.p: vidhes tu niyamārthatvān nānarthakyaṃ bhaviṣyati// iti/

div.label: [l. 12.74]
div.p: nanu vedamātrādhyāyino 'rthāvabodhānudaye 'pi sāṅgavedādhyāyinaḥ puruṣasyārthāvabodhasaṃbhavād vicāraśāstrasya vaiphalyam iti cet —

tad asamañjasam/ bodhamātrasaṃbhave 'pi nirṇayasya vicārādhīnatvāt/ tad yathā — aktāḥ śarkarā upadadhāti ity atra ghṛtenaiva na tailādinety ayaṃ nirṇayo vyākaraṇena nigamena niruktena vā na labhyate/ vicāraśāstreṇa tu tejo vai ghṛtam iti vākyaśeṣavaśād arthanirṇayo labhyate/ tasmād vicāraśāstrasya vaidhatvaṃ siddham/ na ca vedam adhītya snāyād iti śāstraṃ gurukulanivṛttiparaṃ vyavadhānapratibandhakaṃ bādhyeteti mantavyam/ snātvā bhuṅkta itivat pūrvāparībhāvasamānakartṛkatvamātrapratipattyādhyayanasamāvartanayor nairantaryāpratipatteḥ/ tasmād vidhisāmarthyād evādhikaraṇasahasrātmakaṃ pūrvamīmāṃsāśāstram ārambhaṇīyam/
div.label: [l. 12.85]
div.p: idaṃ cādhikaraṇaṃ śāstreṇopodghātatvena saṃbadhyate/ tad āha —
div.label: [l. 12.87]
div.p: idam evādhikaraṇaṃ gurumatam anusṛtyopanyasyate/ aṣṭavarṣaṃ brāhmaṇam upanayīta tam adhyāpayītety atrādhyāpanaṃ niyogaviṣayaḥ pratibhāsate/ niyogaś ca niyojyam apekṣate/ kaś cātra niyojya iti cet — ācāryakakāma eva/ saṃmānana ityādinā pāṇinyanuśāsanenācāryake gamyamāne nayater dhātor ātmanepadasya vidhānāt/ upanayane yo niyojyaḥ sa evādhyāpane 'pi/ tayor ekaprayojanatvāt/ ata evoktaṃ manunā muninā —

quote.p: upanīya tu yaḥ śiṣyaṃ vedam adhyāpayed dvijaḥ/
sāṅgaṃ ca sarahasyaṃ ca tam ācāryaṃ pracakṣate// iti/

div.label: [l. 12.97]
div.p: tataś cācāryakartṛkam adhyāpanaṃ māṇavakakartṛkeṇādhyayanena vinā na sidhyatīty adhyāpanavidhiprayuktyaivādhyayanānuṣṭhānaṃ setsyati/ prayojyavyāpāram antareṇa prayojakavyāpārasyānirvāhāt/ tarhy adhyetavyaḥ ity asya vidhitvaṃ na sidhyatīti cet — mā saitsīt kā no hāniḥ/ pṛthag adhyayanavidher abhyupagame prayojanābhāvāt/ vidhivākyasya nityānuvādatvenāpy upapatteḥ/ tasmād adhyayanavidhim upajīvya pūrvam upanyastau pūrvottarapakṣau prakārāntareṇa pradarśanīyau/
div.label: [l. 12.104]
div.p:
vicāraśāstram avaidhatvenānārabdhavyam iti pūrvapakṣo vaidhatvenārabdhavyam iti rādhāntaḥ/ tatra vaidhatvaṃ vadatā vaditavyaṃ kim adhyāpanavidhir māṇavakasyārthāvabodham api prayuṅkte kiṃ vā pāṭhamātram/ nādyaḥ/ vināpy arthāvabodhenādhyāpanasiddheḥ/ na dvitīyaḥ/ pāṭhamātre vicārasya viṣayaprayojanayor asaṃbhavāt/ āpātataḥ pratibhātaḥ saṃdigdho 'rtho vicāraśāstrasya viṣayo bhavati/ tathā sati yatrārthāvagatir eva nāsti tatra saṃdehasya kā kathā/ vicāraphalasya nirṇayasya pratyāśā dūrata eva/ tathā ca yad asaṃdigdham prayojanaṃ
yad asaṃdigdhaṃ prayojanaṃ ] IV; yad asaṃdigdham aprayojanaṃ na ca A, ASS. tat prekṣāvatpratipatsāgocaraḥ/ yathā samanaskendriyasaṃnikṛṣṭaḥ spaṣṭālokamadhyam adhyāsīno ghaṭa iti nyāyena viṣayaprayojanayor asaṃbhavena vicāraśāstram anārabhyam iti pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ/
div.label: [l. 12.115]
div.p: adhyāpanavidhinārthāvabodho mā prayoji/ tathāpi sāṅgavedādhyāyino gṛhītapadapadārthasaṃgatikasya puruṣasya pauruṣeyeṣv iva prabandheṣv āmnāye 'py arthāvabodhaḥ prāpnoty eva/

nanu yathā viṣaṃ bhuṅkṣvety atra pratīyamāno 'py artho na vivakṣyate māsya gṛhe bhukthā iti bhojanapratiṣedhasya mātṛvākyatātparyaviṣayatvāt/ tathāmnāyārthasyāvivakṣāyāṃ viṣayādyabhāvadoṣaḥ prācīnaḥ prāduṣyād iti cet

maivaṃ vocaḥ/ dṛṣṭāntadārṣṭāntikayor vaiṣamyasaṃbhavāt/ viṣabhojanavākyasyāptapraṇītatvena mukhyārthaparigrahe bādhaḥ syād iti vivakṣā nāśrīyate/ apauruṣeye tu vede pratīyamāno 'rthaḥ kuto na vivakṣyate/ vivakṣite ca vedārthe yatra yatra puruṣasya saṃdehaḥ sa sarvo 'pi vicāraśāstrasya viṣayo bhaviṣyati/ tan nirṇayasya prayojanam/ tasmād adhyāpanavidhiprayuktenādhyayanenāvagamyamānasyārthasya vicārārhatvād vicāraśāstrasya vaidhatvena vicāraśāstram ārambhaṇīyam iti rādhāntasaṃgrahaḥ/
div.label: [l. 12.128]
div.p: syād etat/ vedasya katham apauruṣeyatvam abhidhīyate/ tatpratipādakapramāṇābhāvāt/ atha manyethā apauruṣeyā vedāḥ saṃpradāyāvicchede saty asmaryamāṇakartṛkatvād ātmavad iti/ tad etan mandam/ viśeṣaṇāsiddheḥ/ pauruṣeyavedavādibhiḥ pralaye saṃpradāyavicchedasya kakṣīkaraṇāt/ kiṃ ca kim idam asmaryamāṇakartṛkatvaṃ nāmāpramīyamāṇakartṛkatvam asmaraṇagocarakartṛkatvaṃ vā/ na prathamaḥ kalpaḥ/ parameśvarasya kartuḥ pramiter abhyupagamāt/ na dvitīyaḥ/ vikalpāsahatvāt/ tathā hi/ kim ekenāsmaraṇam abhipretya sarvair vā/ nādyaḥ/ yo dharmaśīlo jitamānaroṣa ityādiṣu muktakoktiṣu vyabhicārāt/ na dvitīyaḥ/ sarvāsmaraṇasyāsarvajñadurjñānatvāt/ pauruṣeyatve pramāṇasaṃbhavāc ca/ vedavākyāni pauruṣeyāṇi vākyatvāt kālidāsādivākyavat/ vedavākyāny āptapraṇītāni pramāṇatve sati vākyatvān manvādivākyavad iti/ nanu
div.label: [l. 12.140]
div.p: ity anumānaṃ pratisādhanaṃ pragalbhata iti cet —
tad api na pramāṇakoṭiṃ praveṣṭum īṣṭe/
div.label: [l. 12.144]
div.p: ity ābhāsasamānayogakṣematvāt/ nanu tatra vyāsaḥ karteti smaryate/

quote.p: ko hy anyaḥ puṇḍarīkākṣān mahābhāratakṛd bhavet/

div.p: ityādāv iti cet —

tad asāram/ ṛcaḥ sāmāni jajñire/ chandāṃsi jajñire tasmād yajus tasmād ajāyata iti puruṣasūkte vedasya sakartṛkatāpratipādanāt/ kiṃ cānityaḥ śabdaḥ sāmānyavattve saty asmadādibāhyendriyagrāhyatvād ghaṭavat/
nanv idam anumānaṃ sa evāyaṃ gakāra iti pratyabhijñāpramāṇapratihatam iti cet —
tad atiphalgu/ lūnapunarjātakeśadalitakundādāv iva pratyabhijñāyāḥ sāmānyaviṣayatvena bādhakatvābhāvāt/
nanv aśarīrasya parameśvarasya tālvādisthānābhāvena varṇoccāraṇāsaṃbhavāt kathaṃ tatpraṇītatvaṃ vedasya syād iti cet —
na tad bhadram/ svabhāvato 'śarīrasyāpi tasya bhaktānugrahārthaṃ līlāvigrahaṇasaṃbhavāt/ tasmād vedasyāpauruṣeyatvavācoyuktir na yukteti cet —
div.label: [l. 12.158]
div.p: tatra samādhānam abhidhīyate/ kim idaṃ pauruṣeyatvaṃ sisādhayiṣitam/ puruṣād utpannatvamātraṃ yathāsmadādibhir ahar ahar uccāryamāṇasya vedasya/ pramāṇāntareṇārtham upalabhya tatprakāśanāya racitatvaṃ vā yathāsmadādibhir eva nibadhyamānasya prabandhasya/ prathame na vipratipattiḥ/ carame kim anumānabalāt tatsādhanam āgamabalād vā/ nādyaḥ/ mālatīmādhavādivākyeṣu savyabhicāratvāt/ atha pramāṇatve satīti viśiṣyata iti cet — tad api na vipaścito manasi vaiśadyam āpadyate/ pramāṇāntarāgocarārthapratipādakaṃ hi vākyaṃ vedavākyam/ tat pramāṇāntaragocarārthapratipādakam iti sādhyamāne mama mātā vandhyetivad vyāghātāpātāt/
div.label: [l. 12.167]
div.p: kiṃ ca parameśvarasya līlāvigrahaparigrahābhyupagame 'py atīndriyārthadarśanaṃ na saṃjāghaṭīti/ deśakālasvabhāvaviprakṛṣṭārthagrahaṇopāyābhāvāt/ na ca taccakṣurādikam eva tādṛkpratītijananakṣamam iti mantavyam/ dṛṣṭānusāreṇaiva kalpanāyā āśrayaṇīyatvāt/ tad uktaṃ gurubhiḥ sarvajñanirākaraṇavelāyām —

quote.p: dūrasūkṣmādidṛṣṭau syān na rūpe śrotravṛttitā// iti/

div.label: [l. 12.174]
div.p: ata eva nāgamabalāt tatsādhanam/ yathā tena proktam iti pāṇinyanuśāsane jāgraty api kāṭhakakālāpataittirīyam ityādisamākhyādhyayanasaṃpradāyapravartakaviṣayatvenopapadyate tadvad atrāpi saṃpradāyapravartakaviṣayatvenāpy upapadyate/
div.label: [l. 12.178]
div.p: na cānumānabalāc chabdasyānityatvasiddhiḥ/ pratyabhijñavirodhāt/ na cāsaty apy ekatve sāmānyanibandhanaṃ tad iti sāṃpratam/ sāmānyanibandhanatvam asya balavadbādhakopanipātād āsthīyate kvacid vyabhicāradarśanād vā/ tatra kvacid vyabhicāradarśane tadutprekṣāyām uktaṃ svataḥprāmāṇyavādibhiḥ —

quote.p: utprekṣeta hi yo mohād ajñātam api bādhakam/

div.p: nanv idaṃ pratyabhijñānaṃ gatvādijātiviṣayaṃ na gādivyaktiviṣayam/ tāsāṃ pratipuruṣaṃ bhedopalambhāt/ anyathā somaśarmādhīta iti vibhāgo na syād iti cet —

tad api śobhāṃ na bibharti/ gādivyaktibhede pramāṇābhāvena gatvādijātiviṣayakalpanāyāṃ pramāṇābhāvāt/ yathā gotvam ajānata ekam eva bhinnadeśaparimāṇasaṃsthānavyaktyupadhānavaśād bhinnadeśam ivālpam iva mahad iva dīrgham iva vāmanam iva prathate tathā gavyaktim ajānata ekāpi vyañjakabhedāt tattaddharmānubandhinī pratibhāsate/ etena viruddhadharmādhyāsād bhedasiddhir iti pratyuktam/ tatra kiṃ svābhāviko viruddhadharmādhyāso bhedasādhakatvenābhimataḥ prātītiko vā/ prathame 'siddhiḥ/ aparathā svābhāvikabhedābhyupagame daśa gakārān udacārayac caitra iti pratipattiḥ syān na tu daśakṛtvo gakāra iti/ dvitīye tu na svābhāvikabhedasiddhiḥ/ na hi paropādhibhedena svābhāvikam aikyaṃ vihanyate/ mā bhūn nabhaso 'pi kumbhādyupādhibhedāt svābhāviko bhedaḥ/ tatra vyāvṛttavyavahāro nādanidānaḥ/ tad uktaṃ ācāryaiḥ —
div.label: [l. 12.200]

quote.p: prayojanaṃ tu yaj jātes tad varṇād eva lapsyate/
vyaktilabhyaṃ tu nādebhya iti gatvādidhīr vṛthā// iti/

div.p: tathā ca —
div.label: [l. 12.205]
div.p: etenedam apāstaṃ yad avādi vāgīśvareṇa mānamanohare anityaḥ śabda indriyagrāhyaviśeṣaguṇatvāc cakṣūrūpavad iti/ śabdadravyatvavādinaṃ praty asiddheḥ dhvanyaṃśe siddhasādhanatvāc ca/ aśrāvaṇatvopādhibādhitatvāc ca/ udayanas tu āśrayāpratyakṣatve 'py abhāvasya pratyakṣatāṃ mahatā prabandhena pratipādayan nivṛttaḥ kolahala utpannaḥ śabda iti vyavahārācaraṇe kāraṇaṃ pratyakṣaṃ śabdānityatve pramāṇayati sma/ so 'pi viruddhadharmasaṃsargasyaupādhikatvopapādananyāyena dattaraktabalivetālasamaḥ/ yo hi nityatve sarvadopalabdhyanupalabdhiprasaṅgo nyāyabhūṣaṇakāroktaḥ so 'pi dhvanisaṃskṛtasvopalambhābhyupagamāt pratikṣiptaḥ/ yat tu yugapad indriyasaṃbandhitvena pratiniyatasaṃskārakasaṃskāryatvābhāvānumānaṃ tad ātmany anaikāntikam ity alam atikalahena/ tataś ca vedasyāpauruṣeyatayā nirastasamastaśaṅkākalaṅkāṅkuratvena svataḥsiddhaṃ dharme prāmāṇyam iti susthitam/
div.label: [l. 12.218]
div.p: syād etat/

quote.p: naiyāyikās te parataḥ saugatāś caramaṃ svataḥ//

div.p: iti vādivivādadarśanāt kathaṃkāraṃ svataḥ dharme prāmāṇyam iti siddhavatkṛtya svīkriyate/
div.label: [l. 12.224]
div.p: kiṃ ca kim idaṃ svataḥ prāmāṇyaṃ nāma/ kiṃ svata eva prāmāṇyasya janma/ āhosvit svāśrayajñānajanyatvam/ kim uta svāśrayajñānasāmagrījanyatvam/ utāho jñānasāmānyasāmagrījanyajñānaviśeṣāśritatvam/ kiṃ vā jñānasāmānyasāmagrīmātrajanyajñānaviśeṣāśritatvam/
tatrādyaḥ sāvadyaḥ/ kāryakāraṇabhāvasya bhedasamānādhikaraṇatvenaikasminn asaṃbhavāt/
nāpi dvitīyaḥ/ guṇasya sato jñānasya prāmāṇyaṃ prati samavāyikāraṇatayā dravyatvāpātāt/

nāpi tṛtīyaḥ/ prāmāṇyasyopādhitve jātitve vā janmāyogāt/ smṛtitvānadhikaraṇasya jñānasya bādhātyantābhāvaḥ prāmāṇyopādhiḥ/ na ca tasyotpattisaṃbhavaḥ/ atyantābhāvasya nityatvābhyupagamāt/ ata eva na jāter api janir yujyate/

nāpi caturthaḥ/ jñānaviśeṣo hy apramā/ viśeṣasāmagryāṃ ca sāmānyasāmagry anupraviśati śiṃśapāsāmagryām iva vṛkṣasāmagrī/ aparathā tasyākasmikatvaṃ prasajyeta/ tasmāt paratastvena svīkṛtāprāmāṇyaṃ vijñānasāmānyasāmagrījanyāśritam ity ativyāptir āpadyeta/
pañcamavikalpaṃ vikalpayāmaḥ/ kiṃ doṣābhāvasahakṛtajñānasāmagrījanyatvam eva jñānasāmagrīmātrajanyatvaṃ kiṃ vā doṣābhāvāsahakṛtajñānasāmagrījanyatvam/
nādyaḥ/ doṣābhāvasahakṛtajñānasāmagrījanyatvam eva parataḥprāmāṇyam iti parataḥprāmāṇyavādibhir urarīkaraṇāt/
div.label: [l. 12.242]
div.p: nāpi dvitīyaḥ/ doṣābhāvasahakṛtatvena sāmagryāṃ sahakṛtatve siddhe 'nanyathāsiddhānvayavyatirekasiddhatayā doṣābhāvasya kāraṇatāyā vajralepāyamānatvāt/ abhāvaḥ kāraṇam eva na bhavatīti cet

tadā vaktavyam abhāvasya kāryatvam asti na vā/ yadi nāsti tadā ghaṭapradhvaṃsānutpattyā ghaṭasya nityatāprasaṅgaḥ/ athāsti kim aparāddhaṃ kāraṇatveneti seyam ubhayataspāśā rajjuḥ/ tad uditam udayanena —
div.label: [l. 12.248]
div.p: bhāvo yathā tathābhāvaḥ kāraṇaṃ kāryavan mataḥ/ iti/
tathā ca prayogaḥ — vimataṃ prāmāṇyaṃ jñānahetvatiriktahetvadhīnaṃ kāryatve sati tadviśeṣāśritatvād aprāmāṇyavat/
prāmāṇyaṃ parato jñāyate anabhyāsadaśāyāṃ sāṃśayikatvād aprāmāṇyavat/
tasmād utpattau jñaptau ca paratastve pramāṇasaṃbhavāt svataḥsiddhaṃ prāmāṇyam ity etat pūtikūṣmāṇḍāyata iti cet —
div.label: [l. 12.254]
div.p: tad etad ākāśamuṣṭihananāyate/ vijñānasāmagrījanyatve sati tadatiriktahetvajanyatvaṃ pramāyāḥ svatastvam iti niruktisaṃbhavāt/
asti cātrānumānam/
-vimatā pramā vijñānasāmagrījanyatve sati tadatiriktajanyā na bhavati/
-apramātvānadhikaraṇatvāt/
-ghaṭādipramāvat/
na caudayanam anumānaṃ paratastvasādhakam iti śaṅkanīyam/
-pramā doṣavyatiriktajñānahetvatiriktajanyā na bhavati
-jñānatvād
-apramāvad

iti pratisādhanagrahagrastatvāt/ jñānasāmagrīmātrād eva pramotpattisaṃbhave tadatiriktasya guṇasya doṣābhāvasya vā kāraṇatvakalpanāyāṃ kalpanāgauravaprasaṅgāc ca/ nanu doṣasyāpramāhetutvena tadabhāvasya pramāṃ prati hetutvaṃ durnivāram iti cet —
na/ doṣābhāvasyāpramāpratibandhakatvenānyathāsiddhatvāt/
div.label: [l. 12.265]
[l. 12.267]
div.p: tathā pramājñaptir api jñānajñāpakasāmagrīta eva jāyate/ na ca saṃśayānudayaprasaṅgo bādhaka iti yuktaṃ vaktum/ saty api pratibhāsapuṣkalakāraṇe pratibandhakadoṣādisamavadhānāt tadupapatteḥ/ kiṃ ca tāvakam anumānaṃ svataḥpramāṇaṃ na vā/ ādye 'naikāntikatā/ dvitīye tasyāpi parataḥprāmāṇyam evaṃ tasya tasyāpīty anavasthā duravasthā syāt/
div.label: [l. 12.272]
div.p: yad atra kusumāñjalāv udayanena jhaṭ iti pracurapravṛtteḥ prāmāṇyaniścayādhīnatvābhāvam āpādayatā praṇyagādi/

quote.p: pravṛttir hīcchām apekṣate/ tatprācuryaṃ cecchāprācuryam/ icchā ceṣṭasādhanatājñānam/ tac ceṣṭajātīyatvaliṅgānubhavam/ so 'pīndriyārthasaṃnikarṣam/ prāmāṇyagrahaṇaṃ tu na kvacid upayujyata iti/

div.p: tad api taskarasya purastāt kakṣe suvarṇam upetya sarvāṅgodghāṭanam iva pratibhāti/ yataḥ samīhitasādhanatājñānam eva pramāṇatayāvagamyamānam icchāṃ janayatīty atraiva sphuṭa eva prāmāṇyagrahaṇasyopayogaḥ/ kiṃ ca kvacid api cen nirvicikitsā pravṛttiḥ saṃśayād upapadyeta tarhi sarvatra tathābhāvasaṃbhavāt prāmāṇyaniścayo nirarthakaḥ syāt/ tathoktam — aniścitasya sattvam eva durlabham iti/ yadi sattvaṃ sulabhaṃ bhavet tadā prāmāṇyaṃ dattajalāñjalikaṃ bhaved ity alam atiprapañcena/ yasmād uktam —
div.label: [l. 12.286]
div.p: tasmād dharme svataḥsiddhapramāṇabhāve jyotiṣṭomena svargakāmo yajetetyādividhyarthavādamantranāmadheyātmake vede yajetety atra tapratyayaḥ prakṛtyarthoparaktāṃ bhāvanām abhidhatta iti siddhe vyutpattim abhyupagacchatām abhihitānvayavādināṃ bhaṭṭācāryāṇaṃ siddhāntaḥ/ yāgaviṣayaṃ niyogam iti kārye vyutpattim anusaratām anvitābhidhānavādināṃ prabhākaragurūṇāṃ siddhānta iti sarvam avadātam//
atha pāṇinidarśanam
div.label: [l. 13.1]
div.p: nanv ayaṃ prakṛtibhāgo ’yaṃ pratyayabhāga iti prakṛtipratyayavibhāgaḥ katham avagamyata iti cet:

pītapātañjalajalānām etac codyaṃ camatkāraṃ na karoti/ vyākaraṇaśāstrasya prakṛtiprayayavibhāgapratipādanaparatāyāḥ prasiddhatvāt/ tathā hi patañjaler bhagavato mahābhāṣyakārasyedam ādimaṃ vākyam: atha śabdānuśāsanam iti/ asyārthaḥ: athety ayaṃ śabdo ’dhikārārthaḥ prayujyate/ adhikāraḥ prastāvaḥ/ prārambha iti yāvat/ śabdānuśāsanaśabdena ca pāṇinipraṇītaṃ vyākaraṇaśāstraṃ vivakṣyate/ śabdānuśāsanam ity etāvaty abhidhīyamāne saṃdehaḥ syāt/ kiṃ śabdānuśāsanaṃ prastūyate na veti/ tathā mā prasāṅkṣīd ity athaśabdaṃ prāyuṅkta/ athaśabdaprayogabalenārthāntaravyudāsena prastūyata ity asyābhidhīyamānatvāt/ anena hi vaidikāḥ śabdāḥ śaṃ no devīr abhiṣṭaye ityādayas tadupakāriṇo laukikāḥ śabdā gaur aśvaḥ puruṣo hastī śakunir ityādayaś cānuśiṣyante vyutpādya saṃskriyante prakṛtipratyayavibhāgavattayā bodhyanta iti śabdānuśāsanam/
div.label: [l. 13.15]
div.p:
atra kecit paryanuyuñjate: anuśāsikriyāyāḥ sakarmakatvāt karmabhūtasya śabdasya kartṛbhūtasyācāryasya prāptau satyām ubhayaprāptau karmaṇi ity anuśāsanabalāt karmaṇy eṣā ṣaṣṭhī vidhātavyā/ tathā ca karmaṇi ca iti samāsapratiṣedhasaṃbhavāc chabdānuśāsanaśabdo na pramāṇapatham avataratīti/ atrāyaṃ samādhir abhidhīyate yasmin kṛtpratyaye kartṛkarmaṇor ubhayoḥ prāptir asti tatra karmaṇy eva ṣaṣṭhīvibhaktir bhavati na kartarīti bahuvrīhivijñānabalān niyamyate/ tad yathāścaryo gavāṃ doho ’śikṣitena gopālakeneti/ śabdānuśāsanam ity atra tu śabdānām anuśāsanaṃ nārthānām ity etāvato vivakṣitasyārthasyācāryasya kartur upādānena vināpi supratipādyatvād
supratipādyatvād ]; supratipādatvād A, ASS, IV. ācāryopādānam akiṃcitkaram/ tasmād ubhayaprāpter abhāvād ubhayaprāptau karmaṇīty eṣā ṣaṣṭhī na bhavati/ kiṃ tu kartṛkarmaṇoḥ kṛti (Pā° sū° 2.3.65) iti kṛdyoge kartari karmaṇi ca ṣaṣṭhī vibhaktir bhavatīti kṛdyogalakṣaṇā ṣaṣṭhī bhaviṣyati/ tathā cedhmapravraścanapalāśaśātanādivat samāso bhaviṣyati/ kartary api ṣaṣṭhī bhavatīti kecid bruvate/ ata eva evoktaṃ kāśikāvṛttau: kecid aviśeṣeṇaiva vibhāṣām icchanti śabdānām anuśāsanam ācāryeṇācāryasya veti/ atha vā śeṣalakṣaṇeyaṃ ṣaṣṭhī/ tatra kim api codyaṃ nāvataraty eva/ yady evaṃ tarhi śeṣalakṣaṇāyāḥ ṣaṣṭhyāḥ sarvatra suvacatvāt ṣaṣṭḥīsamāsapratiṣedhasūtrāṇām ānarthakyaṃ prāpnuyād iti cet,
satyam/ teṣāṃ svaracintāyām upayogo vākyapadīye hariṇā prādarśi/ tad āha mahopādhyāyavardhamānaḥ:

quote.p: janikartur iti brūte tatprayojaka ity api// iti/

div.p: tathā ca śabdānuśāsanāparanāmadheyaṃ vyākaraṇaśāstram ārabdhaṃ veditavyam iti vākyārthaḥ saṃpadyate/
div.label: [l. 13.41]
div.p: tasyārthasya jhaṭ iti pratipattaye atha vyākaraṇam ity evābhidhīyatām/ atha śabdānuśāsanam ity adhikākṣaraṃ mudhābhidhīyata iti/ maivam/ śabdānuśāsanam ity anvarthasamākhyopādāne tadīyavedāṅgatvapratipādakaprayojanānvākhyānasiddheḥ/ anyathā prayojanānabhidhāne vyākaraṇādhyayane ’dhyetṝṇāṃ pravṛttir eva na prasajyet/ nanu niṣkāraṇo dharmaḥ ṣaḍaṅgo vedo ’dhyetavya ity adhyetavyatvavidhānād eva pravṛttiḥ setsyatīti cet,
maivam/ tathā vidhāne ’pi tadīyavedāṅgatvapratipādakaprayojanānabhidhāne teṣāṃ pravṛtter anupapatteḥ/ tathā hi purā kila vedam adhītyādhyetāras tvaritaṃ vaktāro bhavanti/

quote.p: vedān no vaidikāḥ śabdāḥ siddhā lokāc ca laukikāḥ/

div.p: tasmād anarthakaṃ vyākaraṇam iti/ tasmād vedāṅgatvaṃ manyamānās tadadhyayane pravṛttim akārṣuḥ/ tataś cedānīṃtanānām api tatra pravṛttir na sidhyet/ sā mā prasāṅkṣīd iti tadīyavedāṅgatvapratipādakaṃ prayojanam anvākhyeyam eva/ yady anvākhyāte ’pi prayojane na pravarteraṃs tarhi laukikaśabdasaṃskārajñānarahitās te yājñe karmaṇi pratyavāyabhājo bhaveyuḥ/ dharmād dhīyeran/ ata eva yājñikāḥ paṭhanti: āhitāgnir apaśabdaṃ prayujya prāyaścittīyāṃ sārasvatīm iṣṭiṃ nirvaped iti/ atas tadīyavedāṅgatvapratipādakaprayojanānvākhyānārtham atha śabdānuśāsanam ity eva kathyate nātha vyākaraṇam iti/ bhavati ca śabdasaṃskāro vyākaraṇaśāstrasya prayojanam/ tasya taduddeśena pravrtteḥ/ yathā svargoddeśena pravṛttasya yāgasya svargaḥ prayojanam/ tasmāc chabdānuśiṣṭiḥ saṃskārapadavedanīyā śabdānuśāsanasya prayojanam/
div.label: [l. 13.63]
div.p: nanv evam apy abhimataṃ prayojanaṃ na labhyate/ tadupāyābhāvāt/ atha pratipadapāṭha evabhyupāya iti manyethās tarhi sa hy anabhyupāyaḥ śabdānāṃ pratipattau pratipadapāṭho bhavet/ śabdāpaśabdabhedenānantyāc chabdānām/ evaṃ hi samāmnāyate bṛhaspatir indrāya divyaṃ varṣasahasraṃ pratipadapāṭhavihitānāṃ śabdānāṃ śabdapārāyaṇaṃ provāca nāntaṃ jagāma/ bṛhaspatiś ca pravaktā indro ’dhyetā divyaṃ varṣasahasram adhyayanakālaḥ/ na ca pārāvāptir abhūt/ kim utādya yaś ciraṃ jīvati sa varṣaśataṃ jīvati/ adhītibodhācaraṇapracāraiś caturbhir hy upāyair vidyopayuktā bhavati/ tatrādhyayanakālenaiva sarvam āyur upayuktaṃ syāt/ tasmād anabhyupāyaḥ śabdānāṃ pratipattau pratipadapāṭha iti prayojanaṃ na sidhyed iti cet

maivam/ śabdapratipatteḥ pratipadapāṭhasādhyatvānaṅgīkārāt/ prakṛtyādivibhāgakalpanāvatsu lakṣyeṣu sāmānyaviśeṣarūpāṇāṃ lakṣaṇānāṃ parjanyavat sakṛd eva pravṛttau bahūnāṃ śabdānām anuśāsanopalambhāc ca/ tathā hi/ karmaṇy aṇ (Pā° sū° 3.2.1) ity ekena sāmānyarūpeṇa lakṣaṇena karmopapadād dhātumātrād aṇpratyaye kṛte kumbhakāraḥ kāṇḍalāva ityādīnāṃ bahūnāṃ śabdānām anuśāsanam upalabhyate/ evam āto ’nupasarge kaḥ (Pā° sū° 3.2.18) ity ekena viśeṣalakṣaṇenākārāntād dhātoḥ kapratyaye kṛte dhānyado dhanada ityādīnāṃ bahūnāṃ śabdānām anuśāsanam upalabhyate/ bṛhaspatir indrāyeti pratipadapāṭhasyāśakyatvapratipādanaparo ’rthavādaḥ/
div.label: [l. 13.83]
div.p: nanv anyeṣv apy aṅgeṣu satsu kim ity etad evādriyate/ ucyate: pradhānaṃ ca ṣaṭsv aṅgeṣu vyākaraṇam/ pradhāne ca kṛto yatnaḥ phalavān bhavati/ tad uktam:

quote.p: āsannaṃ brahmaṇas tasya tapasām uttamaṃ tapaḥ/
prathamaṃ chandasām aṅgam āhur vyākaraṇaṃ budhāḥ//

div.p: iti/ tasmād vyākaraṇaśāstrasya śabdānuśāsanaṃ bhavati sākṣāt prayojanam/ pāraṃparyeṇa tu vedarakṣādīni/ ata evoktaṃ bhagavatā bhāṣyakāreṇa: rakṣohāgamalaghvasaṃdehāḥ prayojanam iti/
div.label: [l. 13.91]
div.p: sādhuśabdaprayogavaśād abhyudayo ’pi bhavati/ tathā ca kathitaṃ kātyāyanena: śāstrapūrvake prayoge ’bhyudayas tat tulyaṃ vedaśabdeneti / anyair apy uktam: ekaḥ śabdaḥ samyag jñātaḥ suṣṭhu prayuktaḥ svarge loke kāmadhuk bhavatīti/ tathā
div.label: [l. 13.97]
div.p: nanv acetanasya śabdasya katham īdṛśaṃ sāmarthyam upapadyata iti cet:
maivaṃ manyethāḥ/ mahatā devena sāmyaśravaṇāt/ tad āha śrutiḥ:

quote.p: catvāri śṛṅgā trayo asya pādā dve śīrṣe sapta hastāso asya/
tridhā baddho vṛṣabho roravīti maho devo martyāṃ āviveśa/

div.p: vyācakāra ca bhāṣyakāraḥ: catvāri śṛṅgāṇi catvāri padajātāni nāmākhyātopasarganipātāḥ/ trayo asya pādā laḍādiviṣayās trayo bhūtabhaviṣyadvartamānakālāḥ/ dve śīrṣe dvau śabdātmānau nityaḥ kāryaś ca/ vyaṅgyavyañjakabhedāt/ sapta hastāso asya tiṅā saha sapta subvibhaktayaḥ/ tridhā baddhas triṣu sthāneṣu urasi kaṇṭhe śirasi ca baddhaḥ/ vṛṣabha iti prasiddhavṛṣabhatvena rūpaṇaṃ kriyate/ varṣaṇāt/ varṣaṇaṃ ca jñānapūrvakānuṣṭhānena phalapradatvam/ roravīti śabdaṃ karoti/ rautiḥ śabdakarmā/ iha śabdaśabdena prapañco vivakṣitaḥ/ maho devo martyāṃ āviveśa/ mahān devaḥ śabdo martyā maraṇadharmāṇo manuṣyās tān āviveśeti/ mahatā devena pareṇa brahmaṇā sāmyam uktaṃ syāt iti/
div.label: [l. 13.113]
div.p: jagannidānaṃ sphoṭākhyo niravayavo nityaḥ śabdo brahmaiveti hariṇābhāṇi brahmakāṇḍe:
div.label: [l. 13.117]
div.p: nanu nāmākhyātabhedena padadvaividhyapratīteḥ kathaṃ cāturvidhyam uktam iti cet:
maivam/ prakārāntarasya prasiddhatvāt/ tad uktam prakīrṇake:

quote.p: dvidhā kaiścit padaṃ bhinnaṃ caturdhā pañcadhāpi vā/

div.p: karmapravacanīyena vai pañcamena saha padasya pañcavidhatvam iti helārājo vyākhyātavān/ karmapravacanīyās tu kriyāviśeṣopajanitasaṃbandhāvacchedahetava iti saṃbandhaviśeṣadyotanadvāreṇa kriyāviśeṣadyotanād upasargeṣv evāntarbhavantīty abhisaṃdhāya padacāturvidhyaṃ bhāṣyakāreṇoktam yuktam iti vivektavyam/
div.label: [l. 13.126]
div.p: nanu bhavatā sphoṭātmā nityaḥ śabda iti nijāgadyate/ tan na mṛṣyāmahe/ tatra pramāṇābhāvād iti kecit/

atrocyate: pratyakṣam evātra pramāṇam/ gaur ity ekaṃ padam iti nānāvarṇātiriktaikapadāvagateḥ sarvajanīnatvāt/ na hy asati bādhake padānubhavaḥ śakyo mithyeti vaktum/ padārthapratītyanyathānupapattyāpi sphoṭo ’bhyupagantavyaḥ/ na ca varṇebhya eva tatpratyayaḥ prādurbhavatīti parīkṣākṣamam/ vikalpāsahatvāt/ kiṃ varṇāḥ samastā vyastā vārthapratyayaṃ janayanti/ nādyaḥ/ varṇānāṃ kṣaṇikānāṃ samūhāsaṃbhavāt/ nāntyaḥ/ vyastavarṇebhyo ’rthapratyayāsaṃbhavāt/ na ca vyāsasamāsābhyām anyaḥ prakāraḥ samastīti/ tasmād varṇānāṃ vācakatvānupapattau yadbalād arthapratipattiḥ sa sphoṭaḥ/ varṇātirikto varṇābhivyaṅgyo ’rthapratyāyako nityaḥ śabdaḥ sphoṭa iti tadvido vadanti/ ata eva sphuṭyate vyajyate varṇair iti sphoṭo varṇābhivyaṅgyaḥ sphuṭati sphuṭībhavaty asmād artha iti sphoṭo ’rthapratyāyaka iti sphoṭaśabdārtham ubhayathā nirāhuḥ/ tathā coktaṃ bhagavatā patañjalinā mahābhāṣye: atha gaur ity atra kaḥ śabdo yenoccāritena sāsnālāṅgūlakakudakhuraviṣāṇināṃ saṃpratyayo bhavati sa śabdaḥ iti/ vivṛtaṃ ca kaiyaṭena: vaiyākaraṇā varṇavyatiriktasya padasya vācakatvam icchanti/ varṇānāṃ vācakatve dvitīyādivarṇoccāraṇānarthakyaprasaṅgād ityādinā tadvyatiriktaḥ sphoṭo nādābhivyaṅgyo vācako vistareṇa vākyapadīye vyavasthāpita ityantena prabandhena/
div.label: [l. 13.147]
div.p: nanu sphoṭasyāpy arthapratyāyakatvaṃ na ghaṭate/ vikalpāsahatvāt/ kim abhivyaktaḥ sphoṭo ’rthaṃ pratyāyayaty anabhivyakto vā/ na caramaḥ/ sarvapadārthapratyayalakṣaṇakāryotpādaprasaṅgāt/ sphoṭasya nityatvābhyupagamena nirapekṣasya hetoḥ sadā sattvena kāryasya vilambāyogāt/ athaitaddoṣaparijihīrṣayābhivyaktaḥ sphoṭo ’rthaṃ pratyāyayatīti kakṣīkriyate tathāpy abhivyañjayanto varṇāḥ kiṃ pratyekam abhivyañjayanti saṃbhūya vā/ pakṣadvaye ’pi varṇānāṃ vācakatvapakṣe bhavatā ye doṣā bhāṣitās ta eva sphoṭābhivyañjakatvapakṣe vyāvartanīyāḥ/ tad uktaṃ bhaṭṭācāryair mīmāṃsāślokavārtike:

vibhaktyanteṣv eva varṇeṣu suptiṅantaṃ padam iti pāṇininā te vibhaktyantāḥ padam iti gautamena ca padasaṃjñāyā vihitatvāt saṃketagraheṇānugrahavaśād varṇeṣv eva padabuddhir bhaviṣyati/ tarhi sara ity etasmin pade yāvanto varṇās tāvanta eva rasa ity atrāpi/ evaṃ vanaṃ navaṃ nadī dīnā rāmo māro rājā jāretyādiṣv arthabhedapratītir na syād iti cen
na/ kramabhedena bhedasaṃbhavāt/ tad uktam tautātitaiḥ:
div.label: [l. 13.165]
div.p: tasmād yaś cobhayoḥ samo doṣo na tenaikaś codyo bhavatīti nyāyād varṇānām eva vācakatvopapattau nātiriktasphoṭakalpanāvakalpata iti cet

tad etat kāśakuśāvalambanakalpam/ vikalpānupapatteḥ/ kiṃ varṇamātraṃ padapratyayāvalambanaṃ varṇasamūho vā/ nādyaḥ/ parasparavilakṣaṇavarṇamālāyām abhinnaṃ nimittaṃ puṣpeṣu vinā sūtraṃ mālāpratyayavad ity ekaṃ padam iti pratipatter anupapatteḥ/ nāpi dvitīyaḥ/ uccaritapradhvastānāṃ varṇānāṃ samūhabhāvāsaṃbhavāt/ tatra hi samūhavyapadeśo ye padārthā ekasmin pradeśe sahāvasthitatayā bahavo ’nubhūyante/ yathaikasmin pradeśe sahāvasthitatayānubhūyamāneṣu dhavakhadirapalāśādiṣu samūhavyapadeśo yathā vā gajanaraturagādiṣu/ na ca te varṇās tathānubhūyante/ utpannapradhvastatvāt/ abhivyaktipakṣe ’pi krameṇaivābhivyaktiḥ/ samūhāsaṃbhavāt/ nāpi varṇeṣu kālpanikaḥ samūhaḥ kalpanīyaḥ/ parasparāśrayaprasaṅgāt/ ekārthapratyāyakatvasiddhau tadupādhinā varṇeṣu padatvapratītis tatsiddhāv ekārthapratyāyakatvasiddhir iti/ tasmād varṇānāṃ vācakatvāsaṃbhavāt sphoṭo ’bhyupagantavyaḥ/
div.label: [l. 13.182]
div.p: nanu sphoṭavyañjakatāpakṣe ’pi prāguktavikalpaprasareṇa ghaṭṭakuṭīprabhātāyitam iti cet,

tad etan manorājyavijṛmbhaṇam/ vaiṣamyasaṃbhavāt/ tathā hi/ abhivyañjako ’pi prathamo dhvaniḥ sphoṭam asphuṭam abhivyanakti/ uttarottarābhivyañjakakrameṇa sphuṭaṃ sphuṭataraṃ sphuṭatamam/ yathā svādhyāyaḥ sakṛt paṭhyamāno nāvadhāryate/ abhyāsena tu sphuṭāvasāyaḥ/ yathā vā ratnatattvaṃ prathamapratītau sphuṭaṃ na cakāsti/ carame cetasi yathāvad abhivyajyate/

iti prāmāṇikokteḥ/ tasmād asmāc chabdād arthaṃ pratipadyāmaha iti vyavahāravaśād varṇānām arthavācakatvānupapatteḥ prathame kāṇḍe tatrabhavadbhir bhartṛharibhir abhihitatvān niravayavam arthapratyāyakaṃ śabdatattvaṃ sphoṭākhyam abhyupagantavyam iti/ etat sarvaṃ paramārthasaṃvillakṣaṇasattājātir eva sarveṣāṃ śabdānām artha iti pratipādanapare jātisamuddeśe pratipāditam/
div.label: [l. 13.197]
div.p: yadi sattaiva sarveṣāṃ śabdānām arthas tarhi sarveṣāṃ śabdānāṃ paryāyatā syāt/ tathā ca kvacid api yugapat tricaturapadaprayogāyoga iti mahac cāturyam āyuṣmataḥ/ tad uktam:

quote.p: paryāyeṇaiva te yasmād vadanty arthaṃ na saṃhatāḥ// iti/

div.p: tasmād ayaṃ pakṣo na kṣodakṣama iti cet

tad etad gaganaromanthakalpam/ nīlalohitapītādyuparañjakadravyabhedena sphaṭikamaṇer iva saṃbandhibhedāt sattāyās tadātmanābhedena pratipattisiddhau gosattādirūpagotvādibhedanibandhanavyavahāravailakṣaṇyopapatteḥ/ tathā cāptavākyam:

quote.p: sphaṭikaṃ vimalaṃ dravyaṃ yathā yuktaṃ pṛthak pṛthak/

div.p: tathā hariṇāpy uktam:

quote.p: jātir ity ucyate tasyāṃ sarve śabdā vyavasthitāḥ//
tāṃ prātipadikārthaṃ ca dhātvarthaṃ ca pracakṣate/
sā nityā sā mahān ātmā tām āhus tvatalādayaḥ// iti/

div.p: āśrayabhūtaiḥ saṃbandhibhir bhidyamānā kalpitabhedā gavāśvādiṣu sattaiva mahāsāmānyam eva jātiḥ/ gotvādikam aparaṃ sāmānyaṃ paramārthatas tato bhinnaṃ na bhavati/ gosattaiva gotvaṃ nāparam anvayi pratibhāsate/ evam aśvasattāśvatvam ityādi vācyam/ evaṃ ca tasyām eva gavādibhedabhinnāyāṃ sattāyāṃ jātau sarve gośabdādayo vācakatvena vyavasthitāḥ/ prātipadikārthaś ca satteti prasiddham/ bhāvavacano dhātur iti pakṣe bhāvaḥ sattaiveti dhātvarthaḥ sattā bhavaty eva/ kriyāvacano dhātur iti pakṣe ’pi

iti kriyāsamuddeśe kriyāyā jātirūpatvapratipādanād dhātvarthaḥ sattā bhavaty eva/ tasya bhāvas tvatalau (P. 5.1.119) iti bhāvārthe tvatalādīnāṃ vidhānāt sattāvācitvaṃ yuktam/ sā ca sattodayavyayavaidhuryān nityā/ sarvasya prapañcasya tadvivartatayā deśataḥ kālato vastutaś ca paricchedarāhityāt sā sattā mahān ātmeti vyapadiśyata iti kārikādvayārthaḥ/
div.label: [l. 13.228]
div.p: dravyapadārthavādino ’pi naye saṃvillakṣaṇaṃ tattvam eva sarvaśabdārtha iti saṃbandhasamuddeśe samarthitam:
bhāṣyakāreṇāpi siddhe śabdārthasaṃbandha ity etad vārtikavyākhyāvasare dravyaṃ hi nityam ity anena granthenāsatyopādhyavacchinnaṃ brahmatattvaṃ dravyaśabdavācyaṃ sarvaśabdārtha iti nirūpitam/
div.label: [l. 13.237]
div.p: jātiśabdārthavācino vājapyāyanasya mate gavādayaḥ śabdā bhinnadravyasamavetajātim abhidadhati/ tasyām avagāhyamānāyāṃ tatsaṃbandhāt dravyam avagamyate/ śuklādayaḥ śabdā guṇasamavetāṃ jātim ācakṣate/ guṇe tatsaṃbandhāt pratyayaḥ/ dravye saṃbandhisaṃbandhāt/ saṃjñāśabdānām utpattiprabhṛty ā vināśāc chaiśavakaumārayauvanādyavasthādibhede ’pi sa evāyam ity abhinnapratyayabalāt siddhā devadattatvādijātir abhyupagantavyā/ kriyāsv api jātir ālakṣyate/ saiva dhātuvācyā/ pacatītyādāv anuvṛttapratyayasya prādurbhāvāt/ dravyapadārthavādivyāḍinaye śabdasya vyaktir evābhidheyatayā pratibhāsate/ jātis tūpalakṣaṇatayeti nānantyādidoṣāvakāśaḥ/ pāṇinyācāryasyobhayaṃ saṃmatam/ yato jātipadārtham abhyupagamya jātyākhyāyām ekasmin bahuvacanam anyatarasyām ityādivyavahāraḥ/ dravyapadārtham aṅgīkṛtya sarūpāṇām ekaśeṣa ekavibhaktau ityādiḥ/ vyākaraṇasya sarvapārṣadatvān matadvayābhyupagame na kaścid virodhaḥ/ tasmād advayaṃ satyaṃ paraṃ brahmatattvaṃ sarvaśabdārtha iti sthitam/ tad uktam:
satyasvarūpam api hariṇoktaṃ saṃbandhasamuddeśe:

quote.p: yatra draṣṭā ca dṛśyaṃ ca darśanaṃ cāvikalpitam/

div.p: dravyasamuddeśe ’pi:

quote.p: vikārāpagamo yatra tām āhuḥ prakṛtiṃ parām// iti/

div.label: [l. 13.260]
div.p: abhyupagatādvitīyatvanirvāhāya vācyavācakayor avibhāgaḥ pradarśitaḥ:

quote.p: vācyā sā sarvaśabdānāṃ śabdāc ca na pṛthak tataḥ/
apṛthaktve ’pi saṃbandhas tayor jīvātmanor iva// iti/

div.p: tattadupādhiparikalpitabhedabahulatayā vyavahārasyāvidyāmātrakalpitatvena pratiniyatākāropadhīyamānarūpabhedaṃ brahmatattvaṃ sarvaśabdaviṣayaḥ/ abhede ca pāramārthike saṃvṛtivaśād vyavahāradaśāyāṃ svapnāvasthāvad uccāvacaḥ prapañco vivartata iti kārikārthaḥ/ tad āhur vedāntavādanipuṇāḥ:

tad itthaṃ kūṭasthe parasmin brahmaṇi saccidānandarūpe pratyag abhinne ’vagate ’nādyavidyānivṛttau tādṛgbrahmātmanāvasthānalakṣaṇaṃ
tādṛgbrahmātmāvasthānalakṣaṇaṃ ]; tādṛgbrahmātmanāvasthānalakṣaṇaṃ A. niḥśreyasaṃ setsyati/
div.label: [l. 13.274]
div.p: śabdabrahmaṇi niṣṇātaḥ paraṃ brahmādhigacchati ity abhiyuktokteḥ/ tathā ca śabdānuśāsanaśāstrasya niḥśreyasasādhanatvaṃ siddham/ tad uktam:
tathā

quote.p: iyaṃ sā mokṣamāṇānām ajihmā rājapaddhatiḥ// iti/

div.p: tasmād vyākaraṇaśāstraṃ paramapuruṣārthasādhanatayādhyetavyam iti siddham//

div.head: [atha sāṃkhyadarśanaṃ //14//]
div.label: [l. 14.1]
div.p: atha sāṃkhyair ākhyāte pariṇāmavāde paripanthini jāgarūke kathaṃkāraṃ vivartavāda ādaraṇīyo bhavet/ eṣa hi teṣām āghoṣaḥ/
saṃkṣepeṇa hi sāṃkhyaśāstre catasro vidhāḥ saṃbhāvyante/ kaścid arthaḥ prakṛtir eva kaścid vikṛtiḥ prakṛtiś ca kaścid vikṛtir eva kaścid anubhaya iti/
div.label: [l. 14.5]
div.p: tatra kevalā prakṛtiḥ pradhānapadena vedanīyā mūlaprakṛtiḥ/ nāsāv anyasya kasyacid vikṛtiḥ/ prakarotīti prakṛtir iti vyutpattyā sattvarajastamoguṇānāṃ sāmyāvasthāyā abhidhānāt/ tad uktaṃ mūlaprakṛtir avikṛtiḥ iti/ mūlaṃ cāsau prakṛtiś ca mūlaprakṛtiḥ/ mahadādeḥ kāryakalāpasyāsau mūlaṃ na tv asya pradhānasya mūlāntaram asti/ anavasthāpātāt/ na ca bījāṅkuravad anavasthādoṣo na bhavatīti vācyam/ pramāṇābhāvād iti bhāvaḥ/
div.label: [l. 14.12]
div.p: vikṛtayaś ca prakṛtayaś ca mahadahaṃkāratanmātrāṇi/ tad apy uktaṃ mahadādyāḥ prakṛtivikṛtayaḥ sapta iti/ asyārthaḥ/ prakṛtayaś ca tā vikṛtayaś ceti prakṛtivikṛtayaḥ sapta mahadādīni tattvāni/ tatrāntaḥkaraṇādipadavedanīyaṃ mahattattvam ahaṃkārasya prakṛtiḥ/ mūlaprakṛtes tu vikṛtiḥ/ evam ahaṃkāratattvam abhimānāparanāmadheyaṃ mahato vikṛtiḥ/ prakṛtiś ca tad evāhaṃkāratattvaṃ tāmasaṃ sat pañcatanmātrāṇāṃ sūkṣmābhidhānam/ tad eva sāttvikaṃ sat prakṛtir ekādaśendriyāṇāṃ buddhīndriyāṇāṃ cakṣuḥśrotraghrāṇarasanātvagākhyānāṃ karmendriyāṇāṃ vākpāṇipādapāyūpasthākhyānām ubhayātmakasya manasaś ca/ rajasas tūbhayatra kriyotpādanadvāreṇa kāraṇatvam astīti na vaiyarthyam/ tad uktam īśvarakṛṣṇena —

quote.p: bhūtādes tanmātraḥ sa tāmasas taijasād ubhayam//
ubhayātmakam atra manaḥ saṃkalpakam indriyaṃ ca sādharmyāt/ iti/

div.p: vivṛtaṃ ca tattvakaumudyām ācāryavācaspatibhiḥ/
div.label: [l. 14.32]
div.p: kevalā vikṛtis tu viyadādīni pañca mahābhūtāni ekādaśendriyāṇi ca/ tad uktaṃ ṣoḍaśakas tu vikāraḥ iti/ ṣoḍaśasaṃkhyāvacchinno gaṇaḥ ṣoḍaśako vikāra eva na prakṛtir ity arthaḥ/ yady api pṛthivyādayo goghaṭādīnāṃ prakṛtis tathāpi na te pṛthivyādibhyas tattvāntaram iti na prakṛtiḥ/ tattvāntaropādānatvaṃ ceha prakṛtitvam abhimatam/ goghatādīnāṃ sthūlatvendriyagrāhyatvayoḥ samānatvena tattvāntaratvābhāvaḥ/ tatra śabdasparśarūparasagandhatanmātrebhyaḥ pūrvapūrvasūkṣmabhūtasahitebhyaḥ pañca mahābhūtāni viyadādīni krameṇaikadvitricatuṣpañcaguṇāni jāyante/ indriyasṛṣṭis tu prāg evoktā/ tad uktam —

quote.p: prakṛter mahāṃs tato 'haṃkāras tasmād gaṇaś ca ṣoḍaśakaḥ/
tasmād api ṣoḍaśakāt pañcabhyaḥ pañca bhūtāni// iti/

div.label: [l. 14.45]
div.p: anubhayātmakaḥ puruṣaḥ/ tad uktaṃ na prakṛtir na vikṛtiḥ puruṣaḥ iti/ puruṣas tu kūṭasthanityo 'pariṇāmī na kasyacit prakṛtir nāpi vikṛtiḥ kasyacid ity arthaḥ/
div.label: [l. 14.48]
div.p: etatpañcaviṃśatitattvasādhakatvena pramāṇatrayam abhimatam/ tad apy uktam —

quote.p: trividhaṃ pramāṇam iṣṭaṃ prameyasiddhiḥ pramāṇād dhi// iti/

div.label: [l. 14.53]
div.p: iha kāryakāraṇabhāve caturdhā vipratipattiḥ prasarati/ asataḥ saj jāyata iti saugatāḥ saṃgirante/ naiyāyikādayaḥ sato 'saj jāyata iti/ vedāntinaḥ sato vivartaḥ kāryajātaṃ na vastusad iti/ sāṃkhyāḥ punaḥ sataḥ saj jāyata iti/
div.label: [l. 14.57]
div.p: tatrāsataḥ saj jāyata iti na prāmāṇikaḥ pakṣaḥ/ asato nirupākhyasya śaśaviṣāṇavat kāraṇatvānupapatteḥ/ tucchātucchayos tādātmyānupapatteś ca/
div.label: [l. 14.60]
div.p: nāpi sato 'saj jāyate/ kārakavyāpārāt prāg asataḥ śaśaviṣāṇavat sattāsaṃbandhalakṣaṇotpattyanupapatteḥ/ na hi nīlaṃ nipuṇatamenāpi pītaṃ kartuṃ pāryate/ nanu sattvāsattve ghaṭasya dharmāv iti cet — tad acāru/ asati dharmiṇi taddharma iti vyapadeśānupapattyā dharmiṇaḥ sattvāpatteḥ/
div.label: [l. 14.64]
div.p: tasmāt kārakavyāpārāt prāg api kāryaṃ sad eva/ sataś cābhivyaktir upapadyate/ yathā pīḍanena tileṣu tailasya dohanena saurabheyīṣu payasaḥ/ asataḥ kāraṇe kim api nidarśanaṃ na dṛśyate/ kiṃ ca kāryeṇa kāraṇaṃ saṃbaddhaṃ tajjanakam asaṃbaddhaṃ vā/ prathame kāryasya sattvam āyātam/ sator eva saṃbandha iti niyamāt/ carame sarvaṃ kāryajātaṃ sarvasmāj jāyeta/ asaṃbaddhatvāviśeṣāt/ tad ākhyāyi sāṃkhyācāryaiḥ —

quote.p: asaṃbaddhasya cotpattim icchato na vyavasthitiḥ// iti/

div.label: [l. 14.72]
div.p: athaivam ucyetāsaṃbaddham api tat tad eva janayati yatra yacchaktam/ śaktiś ca kāryadarśanonneyeti/ tan na saṃgacchate/ tileṣu tailajananaśaktir ity atra tailasyāsattve saṃbaddhatvāsaṃbaddhatvavikalpena tacchaktir iti nirūpaṇāyogāt/ kāryakāraṇayor abhedāc ca kāraṇāt pṛthak kāryasya sattvaṃ na bhavati/ paṭas tantubhyo na bhidyate/ taddharmatvāt/ na yad evaṃ na tad evaṃ yathā gor aśvaḥ/ taddharmaś ca paṭaḥ/ tasmān nārthāntaram/
tarhi pratyekaṃ ta eva prāvaraṇakāryaṃ kuryur iti cen na/

saṃsthānabhedenāvirbhūtapaṭabhāvānāṃ prāvaraṇārthakriyākāritvopapatteḥ/ yathā hi kūrmasyāṅgāni kūrmaśarīre niviśamānāni tirobhavanti niḥsaranti cāvirbhavanti evaṃ kāraṇasya tantvādeḥ paṭādayo viśeṣā niḥsaranta āvirbhavanta utpadyanta ity ucyante/ niviśamānās tirobhavanto vinaśyantīty ucyante/ na punar asatām utpattiḥ satāṃ vā vināśaḥ/ yathoktaṃ bhagavadgītāyām —

quote.p: nāsato vidyate bhāvo nābhāvo vidyate sataḥ/ iti/

div.label: [l. 14.86]
div.p: tataś ca kāryānumānāt tatpradhānasiddhiḥ/ tad uktam —

quote.p: śaktasya śakyakaraṇāt kāraṇabhāvāc ca sat kāryam/ iti/

div.label: [l. 14.90]
div.p: nāpi sato brahmatattvasya vivartaḥ prapañcaḥ/ bādhānupalambhāt/ adhiṣṭhānāropyayoś cijjaḍayoḥ kaladhautaśuktyādivat sārūpyābhāvenāropāsaṃbhavāc ca/
div.label: [l. 14.93]
div.p: tataś ca sukhaduḥkhamohātmakasya prapañcasya tathāvidhakāraṇam avadhāraṇīyam/ tathā ca prayogaḥ: vimataṃ bhāvajātaṃ sukhaduḥkhamohātmakakāraṇakaṃ tadanvitatvāt/ yad yenānvīyate tat tatkāraṇakaṃ yathā rucakādikaṃ suvarṇānvitaṃ suvarṇakāraṇakam/ tathā cedaṃ tasmāt tatheti/ tatra jagatkāraṇe yeyaṃ sukhātmakatā tat sattvaṃ yā duḥkhātmakatā tad rajo yā ca mohātmakatā tat tama iti triguṇātmakakāraṇasiddhiḥ/ tathā hi/ pratyekaṃ bhāvās traiguṇyavanto ’nubhūyante/ yathā maitradāreṣu satyavatyāṃ maitrasya sukham āvirasti/ taṃ prati sattvaguṇaprādurbhāvāt/ tatsapatnīnāṃ duḥkham/ tāḥ prati rajoguṇaprādurbhāvāt/ tām alabhamānasya caitrasya moho bhavati/ taṃ prati tamoguṇasamudbhavāt/ evam anyad api ghaṭādikaṃ labhyamānaṃ sukhaṃ karoti/ parair apahriyamāṇaṃ duḥkhākaroti/ udāsīnasyopekṣāviṣayatvenopatiṣṭhate/ upekṣāviṣayatvaṃ nāma mohaḥ/ muha vaicittye ity asmād dhātor mohaśabdaniṣpatteḥ/ upekṣaṇīyeṣu cittavṛttyanudayāt/ tasmāt sarvaṃ bhāvajātaṃ sukhaduḥkhamohātmakaṃ triguṇapradhānakāraṇakam avagamyate/ tathā śvetāśvataropaniṣadi śrūyate :
atra lohitaśuklakṛṣṇaśabdā rañjakatvaprakāśakatvāvarakatvasādharmyād rajaḥsattvatamoguṇatrayapratipādanaparāḥ/
div.label: [l. 14.114]
div.p: nanv acetanaṃ pradhānaṃ cetanānadhiṣṭhitaṃ mahadādikārye na vyāpriyate/ ataḥ kenacic cetanenādhiṣṭhātrā bhavitavyam/ tathā ca sarvārthadarśī parameśvaraḥ svīkartavyaḥ syād iti cet — tad asaṃgatam/ acetanasyāpi pradhānasya prayojanavaśena pravṛttyupapatteḥ/ dṛṣṭaṃ cācetanaṃ cetanānādhiṣṭhitaṃ puruṣārthāya pravartamānaṃ yathā vatsavivṛddhyartham acetanaṃ kṣīraṃ pravartate yathā ca jalam acetanaṃ lokopakārāya pravartate tathā prakṛtir acetanāpi puruṣavimokṣāya pravartsyati/ tad uktam —
div.label: [l. 14.124]
div.p: yas tu parameśvaraḥ karuṇayā pravartaka iti parameśvarāstitvavādināṃ ḍiṇḍimaḥ sa garbhasrāveṇa gataḥ/ vikalpānupapatteḥ/ sa kiṃ sṛṣṭeḥ prāk pravartate sṛṣṭyuttarakālaṃ vā/ ādye śarīrādyabhāvena duḥkhānutpattau jīvānāṃ duḥkhaprahāṇecchānupapattiḥ/ dvitīye parasparāśrayaprasaṅgaḥ/ karuṇayā sṛṣṭiḥ sṛṣṭyā ca kāruṇyam iti/ tasmād acetanasyāpi cetanānadhiṣṭhitasya pradhānasya mahadādirūpeṇa pariṇāmaḥ puruṣārthaprayuktaḥ pradhānapuruṣasaṃyoganimittaḥ/ yathā nirvyāpārasyāpy ayaskāntasya saṃnidhānena lohasya vyāpāras tathā nirvyāpārasya puruṣasya saṃnidhānena pradhānavyāpāro yujyate/ prakṛtipuruṣasaṃbandhaś ca paṅgvandhavat parasparāpekṣānibandhanaḥ/ prakṛtir hi bhogyatayā bhoktāraṃ puruṣam apekṣate/ puruṣo 'pi bhedāgrahād buddhicchāyāpattyā tadgataṃ duḥkhatrayaṃ vārayamāṇaḥ kaivalyam apekṣate/ tat prakṛtipuruṣavivekanibandhanaṃ na ca tadantareṇa yuktam iti kaivalyārthaṃ puruṣaḥ pradhānam apekṣate/ yathā khalu kaucit paṅgvandhau pathi sārthena gacchantau daivakṛtād upaplavāt parityaktasārthau mandamandam itaḥ tataḥ paribhramantau bhayākulau daivavaśāt saṃyogam upagacchetām/ tatra cāndhena paṅguḥ skandham āropitaḥ/ tataḥ paṅgudarśitena mārgeṇāndhaḥ samīhitaṃ sthānaṃ prāpnoti paṅgur api skandhādhirūḍhaḥ/ tathā parasparāpekṣapradhānapuruṣanibandhanaḥ sargaḥ/ yathoktam —

quote.p: paṅgvandhavad ubhayor api saṃbandhas tatkṛtaḥ sargaḥ// iti/

div.label: [l. 14.145]
div.p: nanu puruṣārthanibandhanā bhavatu prakṛteḥ pravṛttiḥ/ nivṛttis tu katham upapadyata iti cet — ucyate/ yathā bhartrā dṛṣṭadoṣā svairiṇī bhartāraṃ punar nopaiti yathā vā kṛtaprayojanā nartakī nivartate tathā prakṛtir api/ yathoktam:

quote.p: raṅgasya darśayitvā nivartate nartakī yathā nṛtyāt/
puruṣasya tathātmānaṃ prakāśya vinivartate prakṛtiḥ// iti/

div.label: [l. 14.152]
div.p: etac ca nirīśvarasāṃkhyaśāstrapravartakakapilādimatānusāriṇāṃ matam upanyastam//

div.head: [atha pātañjaladarśanam //15//]
div.label: [l. 15.1]
div.p: sāṃprataṃ seśvarasāṃkhyapravartakapatañjaliprabhṛtimunimatam anuvartamānānāṃ matam upanyasyate/
div.label: [l. 15.3]
div.p: tatra sāṃkhyapravacanāparanāmadheyaṃ yogaśāstraṃ patañjalipraṇītaṃ pādacatuṣṭayātmakam/ tatra prathame pāde — atha yogānuśāsanam iti yogaśāstrārambhapratijñāṃ vidhāya yogaś cittavṛttinirodhaḥ ityādinā yogalakṣaṇam abhidhāya samādhiṃ saprapañcaṃ niradikṣad bhagavān patañjaliḥ/ dvitīye tapaḥsvādhyāyeśvarapraṇidhānāni kriyāyogaḥ ityādinā vyutthitacittasya kriyāyogaṃ yamādīni ca pañca bahirāṅgāṇi sādhanāni/ tṛtīye deśabandhaś cittasya dhāraṇā ityādinā dhāraṇādhyānasamādhitrayam antaraṅgaṃ saṃyamapadavācyaṃ tadavāntaraphalaṃ vibhūtijātam/ caturthe janmauṣadhimantratapaḥsamādhijāḥ siddhayaḥ ityādinā siddhipañcakaprapañcanapuraḥsaraṃ paramaṃ prayojanaṃ kaivalyam/ pradhānādīni pañcaviṃśatitattvāni prācīnāny eva saṃmatāni/ ṣaḍviṃśas tu parameśvaraḥ kleśakarmavipākāśayair aparāmṛṣṭaḥ puruṣaḥ svecchayā nirmāṇakāyam adhiṣṭhāya laukikavaidikasaṃpradāyapravartakaḥ saṃsārāṅgāre tapyamānānāṃ prāṇabhṛtām anugrāhakaś ca/
div.label: [l. 15.18]
div.p: nanu puṣkarapalāśavan nirlepasya tasya tapyabhāvaḥ katham upapadyate yena parameśvaro 'nugrāhakatayā kakṣīkriyata iti cet — ucyate/ tāpakasya rajasaḥ sattvam eva tapyaṃ buddhyātmanā pariṇatam iti sattve paritapyamāne tadāropavaśena tadabhedāvagāhipuruṣo 'pi tapyata ity ucyate/ tad uktam ācāryaiḥ —

quote.p: sattvaṃ tapyaṃ buddhibhāvena vṛttaṃ bhāvā ye vā rājasās tāpakās te/
tapyābhedagrāhiṇī tāmasī yā vṛttis tasyāṃ tapya ity ukta ātmā//

div.p: iti/ pañcaśikhenāpy uktam — apariṇāminī hi bhoktṛśaktir apratisaṃkramā ca pariṇāminy arthe pratisaṃkrānteva tadvṛttim anupatatīti/ bhoktṛśaktir iti cicchaktir ucyate/ sā cātmaiva/ pariṇāminy arthe buddhitattve pratisaṃkrānteva pratibimbiteva tadvṛttim anupatatīti buddhau pratibimbitā sā cicchaktir buddhicchāyāpattyā buddhivṛttyanukāravatīti bhāvaḥ/ tathā śuddho 'pi puruṣaḥ pratyayaṃ bauddham anupaśyati tam anupaśyann atadātmāpi tadātmaka iva pratibhāsata iti/ itthaṃ tapyamānasya puruṣasyādaranairantaryadīrghakālānubandhiyamaniyamādyaṣṭāṅgayogānu-ṣṭhānena parameśvarapraṇidhānena ca sattvapuruṣānyatākhyātāv anupaplavāyāṃ jātāyām avidyādayaḥ pañca kleśāḥ samūlakāṣaṃ kaṣitā bhavanti/ kuśalākuśalāś ca karmāśayāḥ samūlaghātaṃ hatā bhavanti/ tataś ca puruṣasya nirlepasya kaivalyenāvasthānaṃ kaivalyam iti siddham/
div.label: [l. 15.37]
div.p: tatrātha yogānuśāsanam iti prathamasūtreṇa prekṣāvatpravṛttyaṅgaṃ viṣayaprayojanasaṃbandhādhikārirūpam anubandhacatuṣṭayaṃ pratipādyate/
div.label: [l. 15.40]
div.p: atrāthaśabdo 'dhikārārthaḥ svīkriyate/ athaśabdasyānekārthatve saṃbhavati katham ārambhārthatvapakṣe pakṣapātaḥ saṃbhavet/ athaśabdasya maṅgalādyanekārthatvaṃ nāmaliṅgānuśāsanenānuśiṣṭaṃ
iti/ atra praśnakārtsnyayor asaṃbhave 'pi ānantaryamaṅgalapūrvaprakṛtāpekṣārambhalakṣaṇānāṃ caturṇām arthānāṃ saṃbhavād ārambhārthatvānupapattir iti cet —
div.label: [l. 15.46]
div.p: maivaṃ maṃsthāḥ/ vikalpāsahatvāt/ ānantaryam athaśabdārtha iti pakṣe yataḥ kutaścid ānantaryaṃ pūrvavṛttaśamādyasādhāraṇāt kāraṇād ānantaryaṃ vā/ na prathamaḥ/

quote.p: na hi kaścit kṣaṇam api jātu tiṣṭhaty akarmakṛt/

div.p: iti nyāyena sarvo jantur avaśyaṃ kiṃcit kṛtvā kiṃcit karoty eveti tasyābhidhānam antareṇāpi prāptatayā tadarthāthaśabdaprayogavaiyarthyaprasakteḥ/ na caramaḥ/ śamādyanantaraṃ yogasya pravṛttāv api tasyānuśāsanapravṛtyanubandhatvenopāttatayā śabdataḥ prādhānyābhāvāt/ na ca śabdataḥ pradhānabhūtasyānuśāsanasya śamādyānantaryam athaśabdārthaḥ kiṃ na syād iti vaditavyam/ anuśāsanam iti hi śāstram āha/ anuśiṣyate vyākhyāyate lakṣaṇabhedopāyaphalasahito yogo yena tad anuśāsanam iti vyutpatteḥ/ anuśāsanasya ca tattvajñānacikhyāpayiṣānantarabhāvitvena śamadamādyānantaryaniyamābhāvāt/ jijñāsājñānayos tu śamādyānantaryam āmnāyate — tasmāc chānto dānta uparatas titikṣuḥ samāhito bhūtvātmany evātmānaṃ paśyet ityādinā/

nāpi tattvajñānacikhyāpayiṣānantaryam athaśabdārthaḥ/ tasya saṃbhave 'pi śrotṛpratipattipravṛttyor anupayogenānabhidheyatvāt/ tavāpi niḥśreyasahetutayā yogānuśāsanaṃ pramitaṃ na vā/ ādye tadabhāve 'py upādeyatvaṃ bhavet/ dvitīye tadbhāve 'pi heyatvaṃ syāt/ pramitaṃ cāsya niḥśreyasanidānatvam/

quote.p: adhyātmayogādhigamena devaṃ matvā dhīro harṣaśokau jahāti/

div.p: iti śruteḥ/
samādhāv acalā buddhis tadā yogam avāpsyasi/

iti smṛteś ca/ ata eva śiṣyapraśnatapaścaraṇarasāyanopayogādyānantaryaṃ parākṛtam/ athāto brahmajijñāsā ity atra tu brahmajijñāsāyā anadhikāryatvenādhikārārthatvaṃ parityajya sādhanacatuṣṭayasaṃpattiviśiṣṭādhikārisamarpaṇāya śamadamādivākyavihitāc chamāder ānantaryam athaśabdārtha iti śaṃkarācāryair niraṭaṅki/
div.label: [l. 15.73]
div.p: atha mā nāma bhūd ānantaryārtho 'thaśabdaḥ/ maṅgalārthaḥ kiṃ na syāt/ na syāt/ maṅgalasya vākyārthe samanvayābhāvāt/ agarhitābhīṣṭāvāptir maṅgalam/ abhīṣṭaṃ ca sukhāvāptiduḥkhaparihārarūpatayeṣṭam/ yogānuśāsanasya ca sukhaduḥkhanivṛttyor anyataratvābhāvān na maṅgalatā/ tathā ca yogānuśāsanaṃ maṅgalam iti na saṃpanīpadyate/ mṛdaṅgadhvaner ivāthaśabdaśravaṇasya kāryatayā maṅgalasya vācyatvalakṣyatvayor asaṃbhavāc ca/ yathārthikārtho vākyārthe na niviśate tathā kāryam api na niviśeta/ apadārthatvāviśeṣāt/ padārtha eva hi vākyārthe samanvīyate/ anyathā śabdapramāṇakānāṃ śābdī hy ākāṅkṣā śabdenaiva pūryata iti mudrābhaṅgaḥ kṛto bhavet/

nanu prāripsitaprabandhaparisamāptiparipanthipratyūhavyūhapraśamanāya śiṣṭācāraparipālanāya ca śāstrārambhe maṅgalācaraṇam anuṣṭheyam/ maṅgalādīni maṅgalamadhyāni maṅgalāntāni ca śāstrāṇi prathante āyuṣmatpuruṣakāṇi vīrapuruṣakāṇi ca bhavanti ity abhiyuktokteḥ/ bhavati ca maṅgalārtho 'thaśabdaḥ —
div.label: [l. 15.87]

quote.p: oṃkāraś cāthaśabdaś ca dvāv etau brahmaṇaḥ purā/
kaṇṭhaṃ bhittvā viniryātau tasmān māṅgalikāv ubhau//

div.p: iti smṛtisaṃbhavāt/ tathā ca vṛddhir ādaic ityādau vṛddhyādiśabdavad athaśabdo maṅgalārthaḥ syād iti cet — maivaṃ bhāṣiṣṭhāḥ/ arthāntarābhidhānāya prayuktasyāthaśabdasya vīṇāveṇvādidhvanivad chravaṇamātreṇa maṅgalaphalatvopapatteḥ/ athārthāntarārambhavākyārthadhīphalakasyāthaśabdasya katham anyaphalakateti cen na/ anyārthaṃ nīyamānodakumbhopalambhavat tatsaṃbhavāt/ na ca smṛtivyākopaḥ/ māṅgalikāv iti maṅgalaprayojanatvavivakṣayā pravṛtteḥ/
div.label: [l. 15.96]
div.p: nāpi pūrvaprakṛtāpekṣo 'thaśabdaḥ/ phalata ānantaryāvyatirekeṇa prāg uktadūṣaṇānuṣaṅgāt/ kim ayam athaśabdo 'dhikārārtho 'thānantaryārtha ityādivimarśavākye pakṣāntaropanyāse tatsaṃbhave 'pi prakṛte tadasaṃbhavāc ca/
div.label: [l. 15.99]
div.p: tasmāt pāriśeṣyād adhikārapadavedanīyaprārambhārtho 'thaśabda iti viśeṣo bhāṣyate/ yathāthaiṣa jyotir athaiṣa viśvajyotir ity atrāthaśabdaḥ kratuviśeṣaprārambhārthaḥ parigṛhīto yathā cātha śabdānuśāsanam ity atrāthaśabdo vyākaraṇaśāstrādhikārārthas tadvat/ tad abhāṣi vyāsabhāṣye yogasūtravivaraṇapare athety ayam adhikārārthaḥ prayujyata iti/ tad vyācakhyau vācaspatiḥ/ tad ittham — amuṣyāthaśabdasyādhikārārthatvapakṣe śāstreṇa prastūyamānasya yogasyopavartanāt samastaśāstratātparyārthavyākhyānena śiṣyasya sukhāvabodhapravṛttir bhavatīty athaśabdasyādhikārārthatvam upapannam/
div.label: [l. 15.108]
div.p: nanu

iti yājñavalkyasmṛteḥ patañjaliḥ kathaṃ yogasya śāsiteti cet — addhā/ ata eva tatra tatra purāṇādau viśiṣya yogasya viprakīrṇatayā durgrāhyārthatvaṃ manyamānena bhagavatā kṛpāsindhunā phaṇipatinā sāraṃ saṃjighṛkṣuṇānuśāsanam ārabdhaṃ na tu sākṣāc chāsanam/ yadāyam athaśabdo 'dhikārārthas tadaivaṃ vākyārthaḥ saṃpadyate — yogānuśāsanaṃ śāstram adhikṛtaṃ veditavyam iti/
A and ASS add: tasmād ayam athaśabdo 'dhikāradyotako maṅgalārthaś ceti siddham "It is therefore established that this word atha suggests ‘beginning’ and means ‘auspicious’". Since it is absent from IV (p. 158) and contradicts the preceding discussion, it has here been dropped.
div.label: [l. 15.117]
div.p: tatra śāstre vyutpādyamānatayā yogaḥ sasādhanaḥ saphalo viṣayaḥ/ tadvyutpādanam avāntaraphalam/ vyutpāditasya yogasya kaivalyaṃ paramaprayojanam/ śāstrayogayoḥ pratipādyapratipādakabhāvalakṣaṇaḥ saṃbandhaḥ/ yogasya kaivalyasya ca sādhyasādhanabhāvalakṣaṇaḥ saṃbandhaḥ/ sa ca śrutyādiprasiddha iti prāg evāvādiṣam/ mokṣam apekṣamāṇā evādhikāriṇa ity arthasiddham/ na cāthāto brahmajijñāsā ityādāv adhikāriṇo 'rthataḥ siddhir āśaṅkanīyā/ tatrāthaśabdenānantaryābhidhānapraṇāḍikayādhikārisamarpaṇasiddhāv ārthikatvaśaṅkānudayāt/ ata evoktaṃ śrutiprāpte prakaraṇādīnām anavakāśa iti/ asyārthaḥ — yatra hi śrutyārtho na labhyate tatraiva prakaraṇādayo 'rthaṃ samarpayanti netaratra/ yatra tu śabdād evārthasyopalambhas tatra netarasya saṃbhavaḥ/ śīghrabodhinyā śrutyā viniyogasya bodhanena nirākāṅkṣatayetareṣām anavakāśāt/ kiṃ ca śrutyā bodhite 'rthe tadviruddhārthaṃ prakaraṇādi samarpayaty aviruddhaṃ vā/ na prathamaḥ/ viruddhārthabodhakasya tasya bādhitatvāt/ na caramaḥ/ vaiyarthyāt/ tad āha — śrutiliṅgavākyaprakaraṇasthānasamākhyānāṃ samavāye pāradaurbalyam arthaviprakarṣāt iti/

quote.p: bādhikaiva śrutir nityaṃ samākhyā bādhyate sadā/
madhyamānāṃ tu bādhyatvaṃ bādhakatvam apekṣayā// iti ca/

div.p: tasmād viṣayādimattvād brahmavicārakaśāstravad yogānuśāsanaṃ śāstram ārambhaṇīyam iti sthitam/
div.label: [l. 15.138]
div.p: nanu vyutpādyamānatayā yoga evātra prastuto na śāstram iti cet — satyam/ pratipādyatayā yogaḥ prādhānyena prastutaḥ/ sa ca tadviṣayeṇa śāstreṇa pratipādyata iti tatpratipādane karaṇaṃ śāstram/ karaṇagocaraś ca kartṛvyāpāro na karmagocaratām ācarati/ yathā chettur devadattasya vyāpārabhūtam udyamananipātanādikarma karaṇabhūtaparaśugocaraṃ na karmabhūtavṛkṣādigocaram/ tathā ca vaktuḥ patañjaleḥ pravacanavyāpārāpekṣayā yogaviṣayasyādhikṛtatā karaṇasya śāstrasya/ abhidhānavyāpārāpekṣayā tu yogasyaiveti vibhāgaḥ/ tataś ca yogaśāstrasyārambhaḥ saṃbhāvanāṃ bhajate/
div.label: [l. 15.147]
div.p: atra cānuśāsanīyo yogaś cittavṛttinirodha ity ucyate/ nanu yujir yoga iti saṃyogārthatayā paripaṭhitād yujer niṣpanno yogaśabdaḥ saṃyogavacana eva syān na tu nirodhavacanaḥ/ ata evoktaṃ yājñavalkyena —

quote.p: saṃyogo yoga ity ukto jīvātmaparamātmanoḥ/ iti/

div.label: [l. 15.152]
div.p:
tad etad vārttam
°vārttam ]; °vārtam A. / jīvaparayoḥ saṃyoge kāraṇasyānyatarakarmāder asaṃbhavāt/ ajasaṃyogasya kaṇabhakṣākṣacaraṇādibhiḥ pratikṣepāc ca/ mīmāṃsakamatānusāreṇa tadaṅgīkāre 'pi nityasiddhasya tasya sādhyatvābhāvena śāstravaiphalyāpatteś ca/ dhātūnām anekārthatvena yujeḥ samādhyarthatvopapatteś ca/ tad uktam —

quote.p: nipātāś copasargāś ca dhātavaś ceti te trayaḥ/
anekārthāḥ smṛtāḥ sarve pāṭhas teṣāṃ nidarśanam// iti/

div.label: [l. 15.159]
div.p: ata eva kecana yujiṃ samādhāv api paṭhanti yuja samādhāv iti/ nāpi yājñavalkyavacanavyākopaḥ/ tatrasthasyāpi yogaśabdasya samādhyarthatvāt/

quote.p: brahmaṇy eva sthitir yā sā samādhiḥ pratyagātmanaḥ//

div.p: iti tenaivoktatvāc ca/ tad uktaṃ bhagavatā vyāsena yogaḥ samādhir iti/
div.label: [l. 15.166]
div.p: nanv evam aṣṭāṅgayoge caramasyāṅgasya samādhitvam uktaṃ patañjalinā yamaniyamāsanaprāṇāyāmapratyāhāradhāraṇādhyānasamādhayo 'ṣṭāv aṅgāni yogasyeti/ na cāṅgy evāṅgatām gantum utsahate/ upakāryopakārakabhāvasya darśapūrṇamāsaprayājādau bhinnāyatanatvenātyantabhedāt/ ataḥ samādhir api na yogaśabdārtho yujyata iti cet — tan na yujyate/ vyutpattimātrābhidhitsayā tad evārthamātranirbhāsaṃ svarūpaśūnyam iva samādhiḥ iti nirūpitacaramāṅgavācakena samādhiśabdenāṅgino yogasyābhedavivakṣayā vyapadeśopapatteḥ/ na ca vyutpattibalād eva sarvatra śabdaḥ pravartate/ tathātve gacchatīti gaur iti vyutpattes tiṣṭhan gaur na syāt/ gacchan devadattaś ca gauḥ syāt/
div.label: [l. 15.176]
div.p: pravṛttinimittaṃ ca prāg uktam eva cittavṛttinirodha iti/ tad uktaṃ yogaś cittavṛttinirodhaḥ iti/
div.label: [l. 15.178]
div.p: nanu vṛttīnaṃ nirodhaś ced yogo 'bhimatas tāsāṃ jñānatvenātmāśrayatayā tannirodho 'pi pradhvaṃsapadavedanīyas tadāśrayo bhavet/ prāgabhāvapradhvaṃsayoḥ pratiyogisamānāśrayatvaniyamāt/ tataś ca

quote.p: upayann apayan dharmo vikaroti hi dharmiṇam/

div.p: iti nyāyenātmanaḥ kauṭasthyaṃ vihanyeteti cet — tad api na ghaṭate/ nirodhapratiyogibhūtānāṃ pramāṇaviparyayavikalpanidrāsmṛtisvarūpāṇāṃ vṛttīnām antaḥkaraṇādyaparaparyāyacittadharmatvāṅgīkārāt/ kūṭasthanityā cicchaktir apariṇāminī vijñānadharmāśrayo bhavituṃ nārhaty eva/ na ca citiśakter apariṇāmitvam asiddham iti mantavyam/ citiśaktir apariṇāminī sadā jñātṛtvāt/ na yad evaṃ na tad evaṃ yathā cittādi — ityādyanumānasaṃbhavāt/ tathā yady asau puruṣaḥ pariṇāmī syāt tadā pariṇāmasya kādācitkatvāt tāsāṃ cittavṛttīnāṃ sadā jñātatvaṃ nopapadyeta/ cidrūpasya puruṣasya sadaivādhiṣṭhātṛtvenāvasthitasya yad antaraṅgaṃ nirmalaṃ sattvaṃ tasyāpi sadaiva sthitatvāt yena yenārthenoparaktaṃ bhavati tasya dṛśyasya sadaiva cicchāyāpattyā bhānopapattyā puruṣasya niḥsaṅgatvaṃ saṃbhavati/ tataś ca siddhaṃ tasya sadā jñātṛtvam iti na kadācit pariṇāmitvaśaṅkāvatarati/ cittaṃ punar yena viṣayeṇoparaktaṃ bhavati sa viṣayo jñātaḥ yenoparaktaṃ na bhavati tad ajñātam iti vastuno 'yaskāntamaṇikalpasya jñānājñānakāraṇabhūtoparāgānuparāgadharmitvād ayaḥsadharmakaṃ cittaṃ pariṇāmīty ucyate/
div.label: [l. 15.198]
div.p:
nanu cittasyendriyāṇāṃ cāhaṃkārikāṇāṃ sarvagatatvāt sarvaviṣayair asti sadā saṃbandhaḥ/ tathā ca sarveṣāṃ sarvadā sarvatra jñānaṃ prasajyeteti cet — na/ sarvagatatve 'pi cittaṃ yatra śarīre vṛttimat tena śarīreṇa saha saṃbandho yeṣāṃ viṣayāṇāṃ teṣv evāsya jñānaṃ bhavati netareṣv atyatiprasaṅgābhāvāt/ ata evāyaskāntamaṇikalpā viṣayā ayaḥsadharmakaṃ cittam indriyapraṇālikayābhisaṃbadhyo
°bhisaṃbadhyo° ] IV; °bhisaṃbandhyo° A. parañjayantīty uktam/ tasmāc cittasya dharmā vṛttayo nātmanaḥ/ tathā ca śrutiḥ — kāmaḥ saṃkalpo vicikitsā śraddhāśraddhā dhṛtir adhṛtir hrīr dhīr bhīr ity etat sarvaṃ mana eva iti/ cicchakter apariṇāmitvaṃ pañcaśikhācāryair ākhyāyi — apariṇāminī bhoktṛśaktir iti/ patañjalināpi sadā jñātāś cittavṛttayas tatprabhoḥ puruṣasyāpariṇāmitvāt iti/ cittapariṇāmitve 'numānam ucyate — cittaṃ pariṇāmi jñātājñātaviṣayatvāt śrotrādivad iti/
div.label: [l. 15.210]
div.p:
pariṇāmaś ca trividhaḥ prasiddho dharmalakṣaṇāvasthābhedāt/
°bhedāt/ ] ASS; °bhedāt IV, A. dharmiṇaś cittasya nīlādyālocanaṃ dharmapariṇāmaḥ/ yathā kanakasya kaṭakamukuṭakeyūrādi/ dharmasya vartamānatvādir lakṣaṇapariṇāmaḥ/ nīlādyālocanasya sphuṭatvādir avasthāpariṇāmaḥ/ kaṭakādes tu navapurāṇatvādir avasthāpariṇāmaḥ/ evam anyatrāpi yathāsaṃbhavaṃ pariṇāmatritayam ūhanīyam/ tathā ca pramāṇādivṛttīnaṃ cittadharmatvāt tannirodho 'pi tadāśraya eveti na kiṃcid anupapannam/
div.label: [l. 15.217]
div.p: nanu vṛttinirodho yoga ity aṅgīkāre suṣuptyādau kṣiptamūḍhādicittavṛttīnāṃ nirodhasaṃbhavād yogatvaprasaṅgaḥ/ na caitad yujyate/ kṣiptādyavasthāsu kleśaprahāṇāder asaṃbhavān niḥśreyasaparipanthitvāc ca/ tathā hi — kṣiptaṃ nāma teṣu teṣu viṣayeṣu kṣipyamāṇam asthiraṃ cittam ucyate/ tamaḥsamudre magnaṃ nidrāvṛttibhāvitaṃ mūḍham iti gīyate/ kṣiptād viśiṣṭaṃ cittaṃ vikṣiptam iti gīyate/ viśeṣo nāma

quote.p: cañcalaṃ hi manaḥ kṛṣṇa pramāthi balavad dṛḍham/

div.p: iti nyāyenāsthirasyāpi manasaḥ kādācitkasamudbhūtaviṣayasthairyasaṃbhavena sthairyam/ asthiratvaṃ ca svābhāvikaṃ vyādhyādyanuśayajanitaṃ vā/ tad āha — vyādhistyānasaṃśayapramādālasyāviratibhrāntidarśanālabdha-bhūmikatvānavasthitatvāni cittavikṣepās te 'ntarāyāḥ iti/ tatra doṣatrayavaiṣamyanimitto jvarādir vyādhiḥ/ cittasyākarmaṇyatvaṃ styānam/ viruddhakoṭidvayāvagāhi jñānaṃ saṃśayaḥ/ samādhisādhanānām abhāvanaṃ pramādaḥ/ śarīravākcittagurutvād apravṛttir ālasyam/ viṣayābhilāṣo 'viratiḥ/ atasmiṃs tadbuddhir bhrāntidarśanam/ kutaścin nimittāt samādhibhūmer alābho 'labdhabhūmikatvam/ labdhāyām api tasyām cittasyāpratiṣṭhānavasthitatvam ity arthaḥ/ tasmān na vṛttinirodho yogapakṣanikṣepam arhatīti cet — maivaṃ vocaḥ/ heyabhūtakṣiptādyavasthātraye vṛttinirodhasya yogatvāsaṃbhave 'py upādeyayor ekāgraniruddhāvasthayor vṛttinirodhasya yogatvasaṃbhavāt/ ekatānaṃ cittam ekāgram ucyate/ niruddhasakalavṛttikaṃ saṃskāramātraśeṣaṃ cittaṃ niruddham iti bhaṇyate/
div.label: [l. 15.239]
div.p: sa ca samādhir dvividhaḥ/ saṃprajñātāsaṃprajñātabhedāt/ tatraikāgracetasi yaḥ pramāṇādivṛttīnāṃ bāhyaviṣayāṇāṃ nirodhaḥ sa saṃprajñātaḥ samādhiḥ/ samyak prajñāyate 'smin prakṛter viviktatayā dhyeyam iti vyutpatteḥ/ sa caturvidhaḥ/ savitarkādibhedāt/ samādhir nāma bhāvanā/ sā ca bhāvyasya viṣayāntaraparihāreṇa cetasi punaḥ punar niveśanam/ bhāvyaṃ ca dvividham — īśvaras tattvāni ca/ tāny api dvividhāni jaḍājaḍabhedāt/ jaḍāni prakṛtimahadahaṃkārādīni caturviṃśatiḥ/ ajaḍaḥ puruṣaḥ/ tatra yadā pṛthivyādīni sthūlāni viṣayatvenādāya pūrvāparānusaṃdhānena śabdārthollekhasaṃbhedena ca bhāvanā pravartate sa samādhiḥ savitarkaḥ/ yadā tanmātrāntaḥkaraṇalakṣaṇaṃ sūkṣmaṃ viṣayam ālambya deśādyavacchedena bhāvanā pravartate tadā savicāraḥ/ yadā rajastamoleśānuviddhaṃ cittaṃ bhāvyate tadā sukhaprakāśamayasya sattvasyodrekāt sānandaḥ/ yadā rajastamoleśānabhibhūtaṃ śuddhaṃ sattvam ālambanīkṛtya yā pravartate bhāvanā tadā tasyāṃ sattvasya nyagbhāvāc citiśakter udrekāc ca sattāmātrāvaśeṣatvena sāsmitaḥ samādhiḥ/ tad uktaṃ patañjalinā — vitarkavicārānandāsmitārūpānugamāt saṃprajñātaḥ iti/ sarvavṛttinirodhe tv asaṃprajñātaḥ samādhiḥ/ nanu sarvavṛttinirodho yoga ity ukte saṃprajñāte vyāptir na syāt/ tatra sattvapradhānāyāḥ sattvapuruṣānyatākhyātilakṣaṇāyā vṛtter anirodhād iti cet — tad etad vārtam/ kleśakarmavipākāśayaparipanthicittavṛttinirodho yoga ity aṅgīkārāt/
div.label: [l. 15.260]
div.p: kleśāḥ punaḥ pañcadhā prasiddhā avidyāsmitārāgadveṣābhiniveśāḥ kleśāḥ iti/
div.label: [l. 15.262]
div.p:
nanv avidyety atra kim āśrīyate pūrvapadārthaprādhānyam amakṣikaṃ vartata itivat/ uttarapadārthaprādhānyaṃ vā rājapuruṣa itivat/
itivat/ ] ASS; itivat IV, A. anyapadārthaprādhānyaṃ vā amakṣiko deśa itivat/ tatra na pūrvaḥ/ pūrvapadārthaprādhānye avidyāyāṃ prasajyapratiṣedhopapattau kleśādikārakatvānupapatteḥ/ avidyāśabdasya strīliṅgatvābhāvāpatteś ca/ na dvitīyaḥ/ kasyacid abhāvena viśiṣṭāyā vidyāyāḥ kleśādiparipanthitvena tadbījatvānupapatteḥ/ na tṛtīyaḥ/ naño 'styarthānāṃ bahuvrīhir vā cottarapadalopaś ceti vṛttikāravacanānusāreṇāvidyamānā vidyā yasyāḥ sā avidyā buddhir iti samāsārthasiddhau tasyā avidyāyāḥ kleśādibījatvānupapatteḥ/ vivekakhyātipūrvakasarvavṛttinirodhasaṃpannāyās tasyās tathātvaprasaṅgāc ca/ uktaṃ cāsmitādīnāṃ kleśānām avidyānidānatvam — avidyā kṣetram
avidyā kṣetram° ] ASS; avidyākṣetram° A, avidyā kṣetratvam° IV. uttareṣāṃ prasuptatanuvicchinnodārāṇām iti/ tatra prasuptatvaṃ prabodhasahakāryabhāvenānabhivyaktiḥ/ tanutvaṃ pratipakṣabhāvanayā śithilīkaraṇam/ vicchinnatvaṃ balavatā kleśenābhibhavaḥ/ udāratvaṃ sahakārisaṃnidhivaśāt kāryakāritvam/ tad uktaṃ vācaspatimiśreṇa vyāsabhāṣyavyākhyāyām —
dvandvavat svatantrapadārthadvayānavagamād ubhayapadārthapradhānatvaṃ nāśaṅkitam/ tasmāt pakṣatraye 'pi kleśādinidānatvam avidyāyāḥ prasiddhaṃ hīyeteti cet —
div.label: [l. 15.282]
div.p: tad api na śobhanaṃ vibhāti/ paryudāsaśaktim āśrityāvidyāśabdena vidyāviruddhasya viparyayajñānasyābhidhānam iti vṛddhair aṅgīkārāt/ tad āha —

quote.p: vṛddhaprayogagamyo hi śabdārthaḥ sarva eva naḥ/
tena yatra prayukto yo na tasmād apanīyate// iti/

div.p: vācaspatimiśrair apy uktaṃ lokādhīnāvadhāraṇo hi śabdārthayoḥ saṃbandhaḥ/ loke cottarapadārthapradhānasyāpi naña uttarapadābhidheyopamardakasya tadviruddhatayā tatra tatropalabdher ihāpi tadviruddhe pravṛttir iti/
div.label: [l. 15.292]
div.p: etad evābhipretyoktam — anityāśuciduḥkhānātmasu nityaśucisukhātmakhyātir avidyā iti/ atasmiṃs tadbuddhir viparyaya ity uktaṃ bhavati/ tad yathā — anitye ghaṭādau nityatvābhimānaḥ/ aśucau kāyādau śucitvapratyayaḥ —

quote.p: sthānād bījād upaṣṭambhān niṣyandān nidhanād api/
kāyam ādheyaśaucatvāt paṇḍitā hy aśuciṃ viduḥ// iti/

div.p:
pariṇāmatāpasaṃskāraduḥkhair guṇavṛttivirodhāc
°guṇavṛttivirodhāc° ] IV; °guṇavṛttyavirodhāc° A. Vijñānabhikṣu's Yogavārttika has (and defends) the reading °guṇavṛttyavirodhāc°. ca duḥkham eva sarvaṃ vivekinaḥ iti nyāyena duḥkhe srakcandanavanitādau sukhatvāropaḥ/ anātmani dehādāv ātmabuddhiḥ/ tad uktam —

quote.p: anātmani ca dehādāv ātmabuddhis tu dehinām/
avidyā tatkṛto bandhas tannāśo mokṣa ucyate// iti/

div.p: evam iyam avidyā catuṣpadā bhavati/ nanv eteṣv avidyāviśeṣeṣu kiṃcid anugataṃ sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ varṇanīyam/ anyathā viśeṣasyāsiddheḥ/ tathā coktaṃ bhaṭṭācāryaiḥ —

quote.p: na śakyaṃ kevalaṃ vaktum ato 'py asya na vācyatā// iti/

div.p: tad api na vācyam/ atasmiṃs tadbuddhir iti sāmānyalakṣaṇābhidhānena dattottaratvāt/
div.label: [l. 15.310]
div.p: sattvapuruṣayor aham asmīty ekatābhimāno 'smitā/ tad apy uktaṃ — dṛgdarśanaśaktyor ekātmatevāsmitā iti/
div.label: [l. 15.312]
div.p: sukhābhijñasya sukhānusmṛtipūrvakaḥ sukhasādhaneṣu tṛṣṇārūpo gardho rāgaḥ/ duḥkhābhijñasya tadanusmṛtipurassaraṃ tatsādhaneṣu nivṛttir dveṣaḥ/ tad uktaṃ — sukhānuśayī rāgaḥ duḥkhānuśayī dveṣaḥ iti/
div.label: [l. 15.316]
div.p: kim atrānuśayiśabde tācchīlyārthe ṇinir inir vā matvarthīyo 'bhimataḥ/ nādyaḥ/ supy ajātau ṇinis tācchīlye ity atra supīti vartamāne punaḥ subgrahaṇasyopasarganivṛttyarthatvena sopasargād dhātor ṇiner anutpatteḥ/ yathākathaṃcit tadaṅgīkāre 'py aco ñṇiti iti vṛddhiprasaktāv atiśāyyādipadavad anuśāyipadasya prayogaprasaṅgāt/ na dvitīyaḥ/

quote.p: ekākṣarāt kṛto jāteḥ saptamyāṃ ca na tau smṛtau/

div.p: iti tatpratiṣedhāt/ atra cānuśayaśabdasyājantatvena kṛdantatvāt/ tasmād anuśayiśabdo durupapāda iti cet — naitad bhadram/ bhāvānavabodhāt/ prāyikābhiprāyam idaṃ vacanam/ ata evoktaṃ vṛttikāreṇa — itikaraṇo vivakṣārthaḥ sarvatrābhisaṃbadhyate iti/ tena kvacid bhavati kāryī kāryikas taṇḍulī taṇḍulika iti/ tathā ca kṛdantāj jāteś ca pratiṣedhasya prāyikatvam/ anuśayaśabdasya kṛdantatayener upapattir iti siddham/
div.label: [l. 15.330]
div.p: pūrvajanmānubhūtamaraṇaduḥkhānubhavavāsanābalāt sarvasya prāṇabhṛnmātrasyā kṛmer ā ca viduṣaḥ saṃjāyamānaḥ śarīraviṣayāder mama viyogo mā bhūd iti pratyahaṃ nimittaṃ vinā pravartamāno bhayarūpo 'bhiniveśaḥ pañcamaḥ kleśaḥ/ mā na bhūvaṃ hi bhūyāsaṃ iti prārthanāyāḥ pratyātmam anubhavasiddhatvāt/ tad āha — svarasavāhī viduṣo 'pi tathā rūḍho 'bhiniveśaḥ iti/
te cāvidyādayaḥ pañca sāṃsārikavividhaduḥkhopahārahetutvena puruṣaṃ kliśnantīti kleśāḥ prasiddhāḥ/
div.label: [l. 15.337]
div.p: karmāṇi vihitapratiṣiddharūpāṇi jyotiṣṭomabrahmahatyādīni/ vipākāḥ karmaphalāni jātyāyurbhogāḥ/ ā phalavipākāc cittabhūmau śerata ity āśayā dharmādharmasaṃskārāḥ/

tatparipanthicittavṛttinirodho yogaḥ/ nirodho nābhāvamātram abhimatam/ tasya tucchatvena bhāvarūpasākṣātkārajananakṣamatvāsaṃbhavāt/ kiṃ tu tadāśrayo madhumatīmadhupratīkāviśokāsaṃskāraśeṣāvyapadeśyaś cittasyāvasthāviśeṣaḥ/ nirudhyante 'smin pramāṇādyāś cittavṛtaya iti vyutpatter upapatteḥ/
div.label: [l. 15.343]
div.p: abhyāsavairāgyābhyāṃ vṛttinirodhaḥ/ tatra sthitau yatno 'bhyāsaḥ/ vṛttirahitasya cittasya svarūpaniṣṭhaḥ praśāntavāhitārūpaḥ pariṇāmaviśeṣaḥ sthitiḥ/ taṃ nimittīkṛtya yatnaḥ punaḥ punas tathātvena cetasi niveśanam abhyāsaḥ/ carmaṇi dvīpinam hantītivan nimittārtheyaṃ saptamīty uktaṃ bhavati/ dṛṣṭānuśravikaviṣayavitṛṣṇasya vaśīkārasaṃjñā vairāgyam/ aihikapāratrikaviṣayādau doṣadarśanān nirabhilāṣasya mamaite viṣayā vaśyā nāham eteṣāṃ vaśya iti vimarśo vairāgyam ity uktaṃ bhavati/
div.label: [l. 15.352]
div.p: samādhiparipanthikleśatanūkaraṇārthaṃ samādhilābhārthaṃ ca prathamaṃ kriyāyogavidhānapareṇa yoginā bhavitavyam/ kriyāyogasaṃpādane 'bhyāsavairāgyayoḥ saṃbhavāt/ tad uktaṃ bhagavatā —

quote.p: ārurukṣor muner yogaṃ karma kāraṇam ucyate/
yogārūḍhasya tasyaiva śamaḥ kāraṇam ucyate// iti/

div.label: [l. 15.357]
div.p: kriyāyogaś copadiṣṭaḥ patañjalinā — tapaḥsvādhyāyeśvarapraṇidhānāni kriyāyogaḥ iti/ tapaḥsvarūpaṃ nirūpitaṃ yājñavalkyena —

quote.p: śarīraśoṣaṇaṃ prāhus tapasāṃ tapa uttamam// iti/

div.p: praṇavagāyatrīprabhṛtīnāṃ mantrāṇām adhyayanaṃ svādhyāyaḥ/
div.label: [l. 15.363]
div.p: te ca mantrā dvividhā vaidikās tāntrikāś ca/ vaidikāś ca dvividhāḥ pragītā apragītāś ca/ tatra pragītāḥ sāmāni/ apragītāś ca dvividhāḥ/ chandobaddhās tadvilakṣaṇāś ca/ tatra prathamā ṛco dvitīyā yajūṃṣi/ tad uktaṃ jaimininā — teṣām ṛg yatrārthavaśena pādavyavasthā/ gītiṣu sāmākhyā/ śeṣe yajuḥśabdaḥ iti/ tantreṣu kāmikakāraṇaprapañcādyāgameṣu ye ye varṇitās te tāntrikāḥ/ te punar mantrās trividhāḥ strīpuṃnapuṃsakabhedāt/ tad āha —

quote.p: śeṣāḥ pumāṃsas te śastāḥ siddhā vaśyādikarmaṇi/ iti/

div.p: jananādisaṃskārābhāve 'pi nirastasamastadoṣatvena siddhihetutvāt siddhatvam/
div.label: [l. 15.374]
div.p: sa ca saṃskāro daśavidhaḥ kathitaḥ śāradātilake —

quote.p: nirdoṣatāṃ prayānty āśu te mantrāḥ sādhu saṃskṛtāḥ//
jananaṃ jīvanaṃ caiva tāḍanaṃ bodhanaṃ tathā/

div.label: [l. 15.384]

quote.p:
tanmantrākṣarasaṃkhyātair
tanmantrākṣarasaṃkhyātair ] Śāradātilaka; mantrākṣareṇa saṃkhyātair A. hanyāt tad bodhanaṃ matam//
saṃcintya manasā mantraṃ jyotir mantreṇa nirdahet/
mantre malatrayaṃ mantrī vimalīkaraṇaṃ hi tat//
mantreṇa vāriṇā mantre tarpaṇaṃ tarpaṇaṃ smṛtam//
yat kṛtvā saṃpradāyena mantrī vāñchitam aśnute//
mantradoṣāḥ praṇaśyanti saṃskārair ebhir uttamaiḥ// iti/

div.p: tad alam akāṇḍatāṇḍavakalpena mantraśāstrarahasyodghoṣaṇena/
div.label: [l. 15.402]
div.p: īśvarapraṇidhānaṃ nāmābhihitānām anabhihitānāṃ ca sarvāsāṃ kriyāṇāṃ parameśvare paramagurau phalānapekṣayā samarpaṇam/ yatredam uktam —

quote.p: tat sarvaṃ tvayi vinyastaṃ tvatprayuktaḥ karomy aham// iti/

div.label: [l. 15.407]
div.p: kriyāphalasaṃnyāso 'pi bhaktiviśeṣāparaparyāyaṃ praṇidhānam eva/ phalānabhisaṃdhānena karmakaraṇāt/ tathā ca gīyate gītāsu bhagavatā —

quote.p: karmaṇy evādhikāras te mā phaleṣu kadācana/
mā karmaphalahetur bhūr mā te saṅgo 'stv akarmaṇi// iti/

div.label: [l. 15.412]
div.p: phalābhisaṃdher upaghātakatvam abhihitaṃ bhagavadbhir nīlakaṇṭhabhāratīśrīcaraṇaiḥ —

quote.p: na tuṣṭaye maheśasya śvalīḍham iva pāyasam// iti/

div.label: [l. 15.416]
div.p: sā ca tapaḥsvādhyāyeśvarapraṇidhānātmikā kriyā yogasādhanatvād yoga iti śuddhasāropalakṣaṇāvṛttyāśrayaṇena nirūpyate yathāyur ghṛtam iti/
div.label: [l. 15.419]
div.p: śuddhasāropalakṣaṇā nāma lakṣaṇāprabhedaḥ/ mukhyārthabādhatadyogābhyām arthāntarapratipādanaṃ lakṣaṇā/ sā dvividhā/ rūḍhimūlā prayojanamūlā ca/ tad uktam kāvyaprakāśe —

quote.p: anyo 'rtho lakṣyate yat sā lakṣaṇāropitā kriyā// iti/

div.p: yacchabdena lakṣyata ity ākhyāte guṇībhūtaṃ pratipādanamātraṃ parāmṛśyate/ sā lakṣaṇeti pratinirdiśyamānāpekṣayā tacchabdasya strīliṅgatopapattiḥ/ tad uktaṃ kaiyaṭaiḥ — nirdiśyamānapratinirdiśyamānayor aikyam āpādayanti sarvanāmāni paryāyeṇa tattalliṅgam upādadata iti/ tatra karmaṇi kuśala ityādi rūḍhilakṣaṇāyā udāharaṇam/ kuśāṃl lātīti vyutpattyā darbhādānakartari yaugikaṃ kuśalapadaṃ vivecakatvasārūpyāt pravīṇe pravartamānam anādivṛddhavyavahāraparamparānupātitvenābhidhānavat prayojanam anapekṣya pravartate/ tad āha —

quote.p: nirūḍhā lakṣaṇāḥ kāścit sāmarthyād abhidhānavat/ iti/

div.label: [l. 15.435]
div.p: tasmād rūḍhilakṣaṇāyāḥ prayojanāpekṣā nāsti/ yady api prayuktaḥ śabdaḥ prathamaṃ mukhyārthaṃ pratipādayati tenārthenārthāntaraṃ lakṣyata ity arthadharmo 'yaṃ lakṣaṇā tathāpi tatpratipādake śabde samāropitaḥ sañ śabdavyāpāra iti vyapadiśyate/ etad evābhipretyoktaṃ lakṣaṇāropitā kriyeti/ prayojanalakṣaṇā tu ṣaḍvidhā/ upadānalakṣaṇā lakṣaṇalakṣaṇā gauṇasāropā gauṇasādhyavasānā śuddhasāropā śuddhasādhyavasānā ceti/ kuntāḥ praviśanti mañcāḥ krośanti gaur vāhīkaḥ gaur ayam āyur ghṛtam āyur evedam — iti yathākramam udāharaṇāni draṣṭavyāni/ tad uktam —

quote.p: upādānaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ cety uktā śuddhaiva sā dvidhā//
sāropānyā tu yatroktau viṣayī viṣayas tathā/
bhedāv imau ca sādṛśyāt saṃbandhāntaratas tathā/
gauṇau śudhau ca vijñeyau lakṣaṇā tena ṣaḍvidhā// iti/

div.p: tad alaṃ kāvyamīmāṃsāmarmanirmanthanena/
div.label: [l. 15.451]
div.p: sa ca yogo yamādibhedavaśād aṣṭāṅga iti nirdiṣṭaḥ/ tatra yamā ahiṃsādayaḥ/ tad āha patañjaliḥ — ahiṃsāsatyāsteyabrahmacaryāparigrahā yamāḥ/ iti/ niyamāḥ śaucādayaḥ/ tad apy āha — śaucasaṃtoṣatapaḥsvādhyāyeśvarapraṇidhānāni niyamāḥ iti/ ete ca yamaniyamā viṣṇupurāṇe darśitāḥ —

quote.p: seveta yogī niṣkāmo yogyatāṃ svaṃ mano nayan//
kurvīta brahmaṇi tathā parasmin pravaṇaṃ manaḥ//
ete yamāḥ saniyamāḥ pañca pañca prakīrtitāḥ/

div.label: [l. 15.463]
div.p: sthirasukham āsanaṃ padmāsanabhadrāsanavīrāsanasvastikāsanadaṇḍakāsanasopāśrayaparyaṅka-krauñcaniṣadanoṣṭraniṣadanasamasaṃsthānabhedād daśavidham/

quote.p: ūrvor upari viprendra kṛtvā pādatale ubhe//

div.p: ityādinā yājñavalkyaḥ padmāsanādisvarūpaṃ nirūpitavān/ tat sarvaṃ tata evāvagantavyam/

tasminn āsanasthairye sati prāṇāyāmaḥ pratiṣṭhito bhavati/ sa ca śvāsapraśvāsayor gativicchedasvarūpaḥ/ tatra śvāso nāma bāhyasya vāyor antarānayanam/ praśvāsaḥ punaḥ koṣṭhyasya bahirniḥsāraṇam/ tayor ubhayor api saṃcaraṇābhāvaḥ prāṇāyāmaḥ/ nanu nedaṃ prāṇāyāmasāmānyalakṣaṇam/ tadviśeṣeṣu recakapūrakakumbhakaprakāreṣu tadanugater ayogād iti cet — naiṣa doṣaḥ/ sarvatrāpi śvāsapraśvāsagativicchedasaṃbhavāt/ tathā hi/ koṣṭhyasya vāyor bahirniḥsaraṇaṃ recekaḥ prāṇāyāmo yaḥ praśvāsatvena prāg uktaḥ/ bāhyasya vāyor antardhāraṇaṃ pūrako yaḥ śvāsarūpaḥ/ antaḥstambhavṛttiḥ kumbhakaḥ/ yasmiñ jalam iva kumbhe niścalatayā prāṇākhyo vāyur avasthāpyate/ tatra sarvatra śvāsapraśvāsadvayagativicchedo 'sty eveti nāsti śaṅkāvakāśaḥ/ tad uktaṃ tasmin sati śvāsapraśvāsayor gativicchedaḥ prāṇāyāmaḥ iti/
div.label: [l. 15.482]
div.p: sa ca vāyuḥ sūryodayam ārabhya sārdhaghaṭikādvayaṃ ghaṭīyantrasthitaghaṭabhramaṇanyāyenaikasyāṃ nāḍyāṃ bhavati/ evaṃ saty aharniśaṃ śvāsapraśvāsayoḥ ṣaṭśatādhikaikaviṃśatisahasrāṇi jāyante/ ata evoktaṃ mantrasamarpaṇarahasyavedibhir ajapāmantrasamarpaṇe —

quote.p: sahasram ātmane caivam arpayāmi kṛtaṃ japam// iti/

div.label: [l. 15.490]
div.p: tathā nāḍīsaṃcāraṇadaśāyāṃ vāyoḥ saṃcaraṇe pṛthivyādīni tattvāni varṇaviśeṣavaśāt puruṣārthābhilāṣukaiḥ puruṣair avagantavyāni/ tad uktam abhiyuktaiḥ —

quote.p: sā velā maruto nāḍyantare saṃcarato bhavet//
pratyekaṃ pañca tattvāni nāḍyoś ca vahamānayoḥ/
ūrdhvaṃ vahnir adhas toyaṃ tiraścīnaḥ samīraṇaḥ/
bhūmim ardhapuṭe vyoma sarvagaṃ pravahet punaḥ//
vāyor vahner apāṃ pṛthvyā vyomnas tattvaṃ vahet kramāt/
vahantyor ubhayor nāḍyor jñātavyo 'yam kramaḥ sadā//
agnes triṃśat punar vāyor viṃśatir nabhaso daśa//
triguṇo dviguṇo vāyur viyad ekaguṇaṃ bhavet/
guṇaṃ prati daśa palāny urvyāṃ pañcāśad ity ataḥ//
ekaikahānis toyādes tathā pañca guṇāḥ kṣiteḥ/
gandho rasaś ca rūpaṃ ca sparśaḥ śabdaḥ kramād amī//
tattvābhyāṃ bhūjalābhyāṃ syāc chāntiḥ kārye phalonnatiḥ/
ādye sthairyaṃ svacittasya śaitye kāmodbhavo bhavet//

div.label: [l. 15.523]
div.p: yathāvad vāyutattvam avagamya tanniyamane vidhīyamāne vivekajñānāvaraṇakarmakṣayo bhavati/ tapo na paraṃ prāṇāyāmād iti/

quote.p: dahyante dhmāyamānānāṃ dhātūnāṃ hi yathā malāḥ/
prāṇāyāmais tu dahyante tadvad indriyajā malāḥ// iti ca/

div.label: [l. 15.527]
div.p: tad evaṃ yamādibhiḥ saṃskṛtamanaskasya yoginaḥ saṃyamāya pratyāhāraḥ kartavyaḥ/ cakṣurādīnām indriyāṇāṃ pratiniyatarañjanīyakopanīyamohanīyapravaṇatvaprahāṇenāvikṛtasvarūpa-pravaṇacittānukāraḥ pratyāhāraḥ/ indriyāṇi viṣayebhyaḥ pratīpam āhriyante 'sminn iti vyutpatteḥ/ nanu tadā cittam abhiniviśate nendriyāṇi/ teṣāṃ bāhyaviṣayatvena tatra sāmarthyābhāvāt/ ataḥ kathaṃ cittānukāraḥ/ addhā/ ata eva vastutas tasyāsaṃbhavam abhisaṃdhāya sādṛśyārtham ivaśabdaṃ cakāra sūtrakāraḥ — svaviṣayāsaṃprayoge cittasvarūpānukāra ivendriyāṇāṃ pratyāhāraḥ iti/ sādṛśyaṃ ca cittānukāranimittaṃ viṣayāsaṃprayogaḥ/ yadā cittaṃ nirudhyate tadā cakṣurādīnāṃ nirodhe prayatnāntaraṃ nāpekṣaṇīyam/ yathā madhukararājaṃ madhumakṣikā anuvartate tathendriyāṇi cittam iti/ tad uktaṃ viṣṇupūrāṇe —

quote.p: indriyāṇām avaśyais tair na yogī yogasādhakaḥ// iti/

div.label: [l. 15.544]
div.p: nābhicakrahṛdayapuṇḍarīkanāsāgrādāv ādhyātmike hiraṇyagarbhavāsavaprajāpatiprabhṛtike bāhye vā deśe cittasya viṣayāntaraparihāreṇa sthirīkaraṇaṃ dhāraṇā/ tad āha — deśabandhaś cittasya dhāraṇā iti/ paurāṇikāś ca —

quote.p: vaśīkṛtya tataḥ kuryāc cittasthānaṃ śubhāśraye// iti/

div.label: [l. 15.551]
div.p: tasmin deśe dhyeyāvalambanasya pratyayasya visadṛśapratyayaprahāṇena pravāho dhyānam/ tad uktaṃ — tatra pratyayaikatānatā dhyānam iti/ anyair apy uktam —

quote.p: tad dhyānaṃ prathamair aṅgaiḥ ṣaḍbhir niṣpādyate nṛpa// iti/

div.p: prasaṅgāc caramam aṅgaṃ prāg eva pratyapīpadāma/
div.label: [l. 15.558]
div.p: tad anena yogāṅgānuṣṭhānenādaranairantaryadīrghakālasevitena samādhipratipakṣakleśaprakṣaye 'bhyāsavairāgyavaśān madhumatyādisiddhilābho bhavati/
div.label: [l. 15.560]
div.p: atha kim evam akasmād asmān ativikaṭābhir atyantāprasiddhābhiḥ karṇāṭagauḍalāṭabhāṣābhir bhīṣayate bhavān/ na hi vayaṃ bhavantaṃ bhīṣayāmahe/ kiṃ tu madhumatyādipadārthavyutpādanena toṣayāmaḥ/ tataś cākutobhayena bhavatā śrūyatām avadhānena/

tatra madhumatī nāmābhyāsavairāgyādivaśād apāstarajastamoleśasukhaprakāśamayasattvabhāvanayānavadyavaiśāradyavidyotanarūpaṛtaṃbharaprajñākhyā samādhisiddhiḥ/ tad uktam ṛtaṃbharā tatra prajñā iti/ ṛtaṃ satyaṃ bibharti kadācid api na viparyayeṇācchādyate/ tatra sthitau dārḍhye sati dvitīyasya yoginaḥ sā prajñā bhavatīty arthaḥ/

catvāraḥ khalu yoginaḥ prasiddhāḥ prāthamakalpiko madhubhūmikaḥ prajñājyotir atikrāntabhāvanīyaś ceti/ tatrābhyāsī pravṛttamātrajyotiḥ prathamaḥ/ na tv anena paracittādigocarajñānarūpaṃ jyotir vaśīkṛtam ity uktaṃ bhavati/ ṛtaṃbharaprajño dvitīyaḥ/ bhūtendriyajayī tṛtīyaḥ/ paravairāgyasaṃpannaś caturthaḥ/

manojavitvādayo madhupratīkasiddhayaḥ/ tad uktaṃ — manojavitvaṃ vikaraṇabhāvaḥ pradhānajayaś ca iti/ manojavitvaṃ nāma kāyasya manovad anuttamo gatilābhaḥ/ vikaraṇabhāvaḥ kāyanirapekṣāṇām indriyāṇām abhimatadeśakālaviṣayāpekṣavṛttilābhaḥ/ pradhānajayaḥ prakṛtivikāreṣu sarveṣu vaśitvam/ etāś ca siddhayaḥ karaṇapañcakarūpajayāt tṛtīyasya yoginaḥ prādurbhavanti/ yathā madhuna ekadeśo 'pi svadate tathā pratyekam eva tāḥ siddhayaḥ svadanta iti madhupratīkāḥ/ sarvabhāvādhiṣṭhātṛtvādirūpā viśokā siddhiḥ/ tad āha — sattvapuruṣānyatākhyātimātrasya sarvabhāvādhiṣṭhātṛtvaṃ sarvajñatvaṃ ca iti/ sarveṣāṃ vyavasāyāvyavasāyātmakānāṃ guṇapariṇāmarūpāṇāṃ bhāvanānāṃ svāmivad ākramaṇaṃ sarvabhāvādhiṣṭhātṛtvam/ teṣām eva śāntoditāvyapadeśyadharmitvena sthitānāṃ vivekajñānaṃ sarvajñātṛtvam/ tad uktaṃ — viśokā vā jyotiṣmatī iti/ sarvavṛttipratyastamaye paraṃ vairāgyam āśritya jātyādibījānāṃ kleśānāṃ nirodhasamartho nirbījaḥ samādhir asaṃprajñātapadavedanīyaḥ saṃskāraśeṣatāvyapadeśyaś cittasyāvasthāviśeṣaḥ/ tad uktaṃ — virāmapratyayābhyāsapūrvaḥ saṃskāraśeṣo 'nyaḥ iti/ evaṃ ca sarvato virajyamānasya tasya puruṣadhaureyasya kleśabījāni nirdagdhaśālibījakalpāni prasavasāmarthyavidhurāṇi manasā sārdhaṃ pratyastaṃ gacchanti/
div.label: [l. 15.592]
div.p: tad eteṣu pralīneṣu nirupaplavavivekakhyātiparipākavaśāt kāryakāraṇātmakānāṃ pradhāne layaḥ citiśaktiḥ svarūpapratiṣṭhā punarbuddhisattvābhisaṃbandhavidhurā vā kaivalyaṃ labhata iti siddham/

dvayī ca muktir uktā patañjalinā — puruṣārthaśūnyānāṃ guṇānāṃ pratiprasavaḥ kaivalyaṃ svarūpapratiṣṭhā vā citiśaktiḥ iti/ na cāsmin saty api kasmān na jāyate jantur iti vaditavyam/ kāraṇābhāvāt kāryābhāva iti pramāṇasiddhārthe niyogānuyogayor ayogāt/ aparathā kāraṇābhāve 'pi kāryasaṃbhave maṇivedhādayo 'ndhādibhyo bhaveyuḥ/ tathā cānupapannārthatāyām ābhāṇako laukika upapannārtho bhavet/ tathā ca śrutiḥ — andho maṇim avindat/ tam anaṅgulir āvayat/ agrīvaḥ pratyamuñcat/ tam ajihvā asaścata/ avindad avidhyata/ āvayat gṛhītavān/ pratyamuñcat pinaddhavān/ asaścatābhyapūjayat stutavān iti yāvat/ evaṃ ca cikitsāśāstravad yogaśāstraṃ caturvyūham/ yathā cikitsāśāstraṃ rogo rogahetur ārogyaṃ bheṣajam iti tathedam api saṃsāraḥ saṃsārahetur mokṣo mokṣopāya iti/ tatra duḥkhamayaḥ saṃsāro heyaḥ/ pradhānapuruṣayoḥ saṃyogo heyabhogahetuḥ/ tasyātyantikī nivṛttir hānam/ tadupāyaḥ samyagdarśanam/ evam anyad api śāstraṃ yathāsaṃbhavaṃ caturvyūham ūhanīyaṃ iti sarvam avadātam/ (itaḥ paraṃ sarvadarśanaśiromaṇibhūtaṃ śāṃkaradarśanam anyatra likhitam ity atropekṣitam)
div.label: [l. 15.610]

div.head: [atha śāṃkaradarśanam //16//]
div.label: [l. 16.1]
div.p: so ’yaṃ pariṇāmavādaḥ prāmāṇikagarhaṇam arhati/ na hy acetanaṃ pradhānaṃ cetanānadhiṣṭhitaṃ pravartate/ suvarṇādau rucakādyupādāne hemakārādicetanādhiṣṭhānopalambhena nityatvasādhakakṛtakatvavat/ sukhaduḥkhamohātmanā'nvitatvādeḥ sādhanasya sādhyaviparyayavyāptatayā viruddhatvāt/ svarūpasiddhatvāc ca/ āntarāḥ khalv amī sukhaduḥkhamohā bāhyebhyaś candanādibhyo vibhinnaprat thatyayavedanīyebhyo vyatiriktā adhyakṣam īkṣyante/ yady amī sukhādisvabhāvā bhaveyus tadā hemante ’pi candanaḥ sukhaḥ syāt/ na hi candanaḥ kadācid acandanaḥ/ tathā nidāgheṣv api kuṅkumapaṅkaḥ sukho bhavet/ na hy asau kadācid akuṅkumapaṅka iti/ evaṃ kaṇṭakaḥ kramelakasyeva manuṣyādīnām api prāṇabhṛtāṃ sukhaḥ syāt/ na hy asau kāṃścit praty eva kaṇṭaka iti/ tasmāc candanakuṅkumādayo viśeṣāḥ kālaviśeṣādyapekṣayā sukhādihetavo na tu sukhādisvabhāvā iti ramaṇīyam/ tasmād dhetur asiddha iti siddham/
div.label: [l. 16.14]
div.p: nāpi śrutiḥ pradhānakāraṇatvavāde pramāṇam/ yataḥ: yad agne rohitaṃ rūpaṃ tejasas tad rūpaṃ yac chuklaṃ tad apām yat kṛṣṇaṃ tad annasya iti cchāndogyaśākhāyāṃ tejobannātmikāyāḥ prakṛter lohitaśuklakṛṣṇarūpāṇi samāmnātāni tāny evātra pratyabhijñāyante/ tatra śrautapratyabhijñāyāḥ prābalyāl lohitādiśabdānāṃ mukhyārthasaṃbhavāc ca tejobannātmikā jarāyujāṇḍajasvedajodbhijjacatuṣṭayasya bhūtagrāmasya prakṛtir avasīyate/ yady api tejobannānāṃ prakṛter jātatvena yogavṛttyā na jāyata ity ajatvaṃ na sidhyati tathāpi rūḍhivṛttyāvagatam ajātatvam uktaprakṛtau sukhāvabodhāya prakalpyate/ yathā asau vādityo devamadhu ityādivākyenādityasya madhutvaṃ parikalpyate tathā tejobannātmikā prakṛtir evājeti/ ato ’jām ekām ityādikā śrutir api na pradhānapratipādikā/
div.label: [l. 16.26]
div.p: yad avādi nidarśanaṃ pūrvavādinā kṣīrādikam acetanaṃ cetanānadhiṣṭhitam eva vatsavivṛddhyarthaṃ pravartata iti/ naitad ramaṇīyam/ buddhiviśeṣaśālinaḥ parameśvarasya tatrāpy adhiṣṭhātṛtvābhyupagamāt/ na ca parameśvarasya karuṇayā pravṛttyaṅgīkāre prāguktavikalpāvasaraḥ/ sṛṣṭeḥ prāk prāṇināṃ duḥkhasaṃbandhāsaṃbhave ’pi tannidānādṛṣṭasaṃbandhasaṃbhavena tatprahāṇecchayā pravṛttyupapatteḥ/ kiṃ ca puruṣārthaprayuktā pradhānapravṛttir ity uktaṃ tad vivektavyam/ kiṃ pradhānaṃ kevalaṃ bhogārthaṃ pravartate kiṃ vā kevalamokṣārtham āhosvid ubhayārtham/ na tāvad ādyaḥ kalpo ’vakalpate/ anādheyātiśayasya kūṭasthanityasya puruṣasya tāttvikabhogāsaṃbhavāt/ anirmokṣaprasaṅgāc ca/ yena hi prayojanena pradhānaṃ pravartitaṃ tad anena vidhātavyam/ bhogena caitat pravartitam iti tam eva vidadhyān na mokṣam iti/ nāpi dvitīyaḥ/ ciddhātor nityaśuddhabuddhamuktasvabhāvatayā karmānubhavavāsanānām asaṃbhavena pradhānapravṛtteḥ prāg api muktatayā tadarthaṃ pravṛttyanupapatteḥ/ śabdādyupabhogārtham apravṛttatvena pradhānasya tadajanakatvaprasaṅgāc ca/ nāpi tṛtīyaḥ/ prāguktadūṣaṇalaṅghanālaṅghitatvāt/ pravṛttisvabhāvāyāḥ prakṛter audāsinyāyogāc ca/
div.label: [l. 16.41]
div.p: nanu sattvapuruṣānyatākhyātiḥ puruṣārthaḥ/ tasyām jātāyāṃ sā nivartate kṛtakāryatvād iti cet
tad asamañjasam/ acetanāyāḥ prakṛter vicārya kāryakāritvāyogāt/ yatheyaṃ kṛte ’pi śabdādyupalambhe tadarthaṃ punaḥ pravartata evam atrāpi punaḥ pravarteta/ svabhāvasyānapāyāt/
div.label: [l. 16.45]
