div.p: kiṃ ca sā prakṛtir vivekakhyātivaśād ucchidyate na vā/ ucchede sarvasya saṃprati saṃsāro ’stam iyāt/ anucchede na kasya cin mokṣaḥ/
div.label: [l. 16.46]
div.p: nanu pradhānābhede ’pi tattatpuruṣāvivekakhyātilakṣaṇāvidyāsadasattvanibandhanau bandhamokṣāv upapadyeyātām iti cet
hanta tarhi kṛtaṃ prakṛtyā/ avidyāsadasadbhāvābhyām eva tadupapatteḥ/
div.label: [l. 16.49]
div.p: nanv avidyāpakṣe ’py eṣa doṣaḥ prāduḥṣyād iti cet

tad etat pratyavasthānam asthāne/ na hi vayaṃ pradhānavad avidyāṃ sarveṣu jīveṣv ekām ācakṣmahe yenaivam upālabhyemahi/ api tv iyaṃ pratijīvaṃ bhidyate/ tena yasyaiva jīvasya vidyotpadyate tasyaivāvidyā samucchidyate nānyasya/ bhinnāyatanayos tayor virodhābhāvāt/ ato na samastasaṃsārocchedaprasaṅgadoṣaḥ/ tasmāt pariṇāmaḥ parityaktavyaḥ/ svīkartavyaś ca vivartavādaḥ/
div.label: [l. 16.55]
div.p: nanu jīvajaḍayoḥ sārūpyābhāvena cidvivartatvaṃ prapañcasya na saṃparipadyata iti prāg avādiṣmeti cet

naitat sādhu/ na hi sārūpyanibandhanāḥ sarve vibhramā iti vyāptir asti/ asarūpād api kāmādeḥ kāntāliṅganādiṣv iva svapnavibhramasyopalambhāt/ kiṃ ca kādācitke vibhrame sārūpyāpekṣā nānādyavidyānibandhane prapañce/ tad avocad ācāryavācaspatiḥ :
tad etat sarvaṃ vedāntaśāstrapariśramaśālināṃ sugamaṃ sughaṭaṃ ca/
div.label: [l. 16.64]
div.p: tac ca vedāntaśāstraṃ caturlakṣaṇam/ bhagavatā bādarāyaṇena praṇītasya vedāntaśāstrasya pratyagbrahmaikyaṃ viṣaya iti śaṃkarācāryāḥ pratyapīpadan/ tatra prathame samanvayādhyāye sarveṣāṃ vedāntānāṃ brahmaṇi tātparyeṇa paryavasānam/ dvitīye ’virodhādhyāye sāṃkhyāditarkavirodhanirākaraṇam/ tṛtīye sādhanādhyāye brahmavidyāsādhanam/ caturthe phalādhyāye vidyāphalam/ tatra pratyadhyāyaṃ pādacatuṣṭayam/ tatra prathamasyādhyāyasya prathame pāde spaṣṭabrahmaliṅgaṃ vākyajātaṃ mīmāṃsyate/ dvitīye ’spaṣṭabrahmaliṅgam upāsyaviṣayam/ tṛtīye tādṛśaṃ jñeyaviṣayam/ caturthe ’vyaktājāpadādi saṃdigdhaṃ padajātam iti/ avirodhasya dvitīyasya prathame sāṃkhyayogakaṇādādismṛtivirodhaparihāraḥ/ dvitīye sāṃkhyādimatānāṃ duṣṭatvam/ tṛtīye pañcamahābhūtaśrutīnāṃ jīvaśrutīnāṃ ca parasparavirodhaparihāraḥ/ caturthe liṅgaśarīraśrutīnāṃ virodhaparihāraḥ/
div.label: [l. 16.76]
div.p: tṛtīyasya prathame jīvasya paralokagamanāgamanavicārapuraḥsaraṃ vairāgyam/ dvitīye tvaṃpadatatpadārthapariśodhanam/ tṛtīye saguṇavidyāsu guṇopasaṃhāraḥ/ caturthe nirguṇabrahmavidyāyā bahiraṅgāntaraṅgāśramayajñaśamādisādhanajātam/ caturthasya prathame brahmasākṣātkāreṇa jīvataḥ pāpapuṇyakleśavaidhuryalakṣaṇā muktiḥ/ dvitīye maraṇotkramaṇaprakāraḥ/ tṛtīye saguṇabrahmopāsakasyottaramārgaḥ/ caturthe nirguṇasaguṇabrahmavido videhakaivalyabrahmalokāvasthānāni/ tad itthaṃ brahmavicāraśāstrādhyāyapādārthasaṃgrahaḥ/
div.label: [l. 16.84]
div.p:
tatra prathamam adhikaraṇam athāto brahmajijñāsā iti brahmamīmāṃsārambhopapādanaparam/ adhikaraṇaṃ ca pañcāvayavaṃ prasiddham/ te ca viṣayādayaḥ pañcāvayavā nirūpyante/ ātmā vā are
ātmā vā are ] ASS; ātmā vāre A. draṣṭavyaḥ ity etad vākyaṃ viṣayaḥ/ brahma jijñāsitavyaṃ na veti saṃdehaḥ/ jijñāsyatvavyāpakayoḥ saṃdehaprayojanayoḥ saṃbhavāsaṃbhavābhyām/
div.label: [l. 16.90]
div.p: tatra kasyedaṃ jijñāsyatvam avagamyate/ ahamanubhavagamyasya śrutigamyasya vā/
-nādyaḥ/ sarvajanīnenāhamanubhavenedamāspadadehādibhyo vivekenātmanaḥ spaṣṭaṃ pratibhāsamānatvāt/
nanu sthūlo ’haṃ kṛśo ’ham ityādidehadharmasāmānādhikaraṇyānubhavād adhyastātmabhāvadehālambano ’yam ahaṃkāra iti cen na/
bālyādyavasthāsu bhinnaparimāṇatayā badarāmalakādivat parasparabhedena śarīrasya pratyabhijñānānupapatteḥ/

athocyeta yathā pīlupākapakṣe piṭharapākapakṣe vā kālabhedenaikasmin vastuni pākajabhedo yujyate tathaikasmiñ śarīrābhidhe vastuni kālabhedena parimāṇabhedaḥ/ ata eva laukikāḥ śarīram ātmanaḥ sakāśād abhinnaṃ pratipadyamānāḥ pratyabhijānate ceti/

na tad bhadram/ maṇimantrauṣadhādyupāyabhedena bhūmikādhānavan nānāvidhān dehān pratipadyamānasyāhamālambanasya bhinnasyātmanaḥ śarīrād bhedena bhāsamānatvāt/ ata eva cakṣurādīnām apy ahamālambanatvam aśakyaśaṅkam/ nānyadṛṣṭam smaraty anyaḥ iti nyāyena cakṣurādau naṣṭe ’pi rūpādipratisaṃdhānānupapatteḥ/ nāpy antaḥkaraṇasyāhamālambanatvam āstheyam/ ayam eva bhedo bhedahetur vā yad viruddhadharmādhyāsaḥ kāraṇabhedaś ceti nyāyena kartṛkaraṇabhūtayor ātmāntaḥkaraṇayos takṣavāsivat saṃbhedāsaṃbhavāt/ yady abheda eva nādriyate tarhi sthūlo ’haṃ kṛśo ’haṃ kṛṣṇo ’ham ityādi saṃkhyānam utsannasaṃkathaṃ syāt/
na syāt/ evaṃ loke śāstre cobhayathā śabdaprayogadarśanena mukhyārthatvānupapattau mañcāḥ krośantītyādivad aupacārikatvenopapatteḥ/

-na dvitīyaḥ/ ahamanubhavagamyasyaiva śrutigamyatvāt/ satyaṃ jñānam anantaṃ brahma ityādiśrutibhyo hi brahmāvagamyate/ brahmabhāvaś cāham ātmā brahma tat tvam asi ityādiśrutiṣv ahaṃpratyayagamyasyaiva bodhyate/ tathā cedam anumānaṃ samasūci/ vimatam ajijñāsyam asaṃdigdhatvāt karatalāmalakavat/
div.label: [l. 16.116]
div.p: tathā phalaṃ na phalabhāvam īkṣate/ puruṣair arthyata iti vyutpattyā niḥśeṣaduḥkhopaśamalakṣitaṃ paramānandaikarasaṃ ca puruṣārthaśabdasyārthaḥ sakalapuruṣadhaureyaiḥ prepsyate naitat sāṃsārikaṃ sukhajātam/ tasyaihikasya pāralaukikasya ca sātiśayatayā ca sadṛkṣatayā ca prekṣāvadbhir arthyamānatvānupapatteḥ/ yat tatparipanthi duḥkhajātaṃ taj jihāsyate/ tac cāvidyāparaparyāyasaṃsāra eva/ kartṛtvādisakalānarthakaratvād avidyāyāḥ/ sam ity ekīkaraṇe vartate/ saṃbhedādau tathā copalambhāt/ tathā cātmānaṃ dehenaikīkṛtya svarganarakamārgayoḥ sarati yena puruṣaḥ sa saṃsāro ’vidyāśabdārthaḥ/ tannivṛttiḥ phalaṃ phalavatām abhimatam/ tathā kathitam :

quote.p: avidyāstamayo mokṣaḥ sā ca bandha udāhṛtaḥ/ iti

div.label: [l. 16.127]
div.p: tac ca kāśakuśāvalambanakalpam/ ātmayāthātmyānubhavena saha vartamānasya saṃsārasya rūparasavad virodhābhāvena nivartyanivartakabhāvābhāvāt/
nanu sahānuvartamāno bodhaḥ saṃsāraṃ mā bādhiṣṭa/ sahāvartamānas tu bodhaḥ prakāśas tamovad bādhiṣyata iti cet
tad etad riktaṃ vacaḥ/ ahamanubhavād anyasyātmajñānasya mūṣikaviṣāṇāyamānatvāt/
div.label: [l. 16.132]
div.p: nanv anyo ’yam anubhavaḥ pāmarāṇāṃ mā sma bhavan nāma/ vedāntavacananicayaparyālocanakṣamāṇāṃ parīkṣakāṇāṃ saṃbhavaty evety api na vaktavyam/ abādhitānubhavavirodhena vedāntavākyānāṃ grāvaplavanādivākyakalpatvāt/ na hy āgamāḥ paraḥśataṃ ghaṭaṃ paṭayitum utsahante/ na cādhyayanavidhivyākopaḥ/ gurumatānusāreṇa huṃphaḍādivākyavaj japamātropayogitvenācāryamatānusāreṇa vā yajamānaḥ prastara ityādivākyavat stāvakatvena vedāntasiddhāntasyādhyetavyatvasaṃbhavāt/
tathā ca prayogaḥ :
vivādāspadaṃ brahma vicāryapadaṃ na bhavaty aphalatvāt kākadantavad iti/ tad āhur ācāryāḥ:

quote.p: tajjñānān muktyabhāvāc ca jijñāsā nāvakalpate// iti/

div.label: [l. 16.142]
div.p: na ca bhedenādhyastadehādinivṛttiḥ phalam ity aphalahetur asiddha iti veditavyam/ bhedagraho hi vyāpakanivṛttyā vyāpyanivṛttir iti nyāyena bhedāgrahaparipathinaṃ bhedasaṃskāram apekṣate/ anākalitakaladhautasya śuktiśakale tatsamāropānupalambhāt/ saṃskāraś ca pramitim ākāṅkṣati/ ananubhūte saṃskārānudayāt/ na ca bhrāntirūpo ’nubhavas tatkaraṇam iti bhaṇitavyam/ bhrānter abhrāntipūrvakatvena kvacit pramiter avaśyābhyupagamayitavyatvāt/ prayogaś ca: vimatāv ātmānātmānau bhedena pramitāv abhedāyogyatvāt/ tamaḥprakāśavat/ na cātmānātmanor abhedāyogyatvalakṣaṇo hetur asiddha iti śaṅkanīyam/ vikalpāsahatvāt/ tathā hi: anātmātmapariśeṣaḥ syād ātmānātmapariśeṣo vā/ ādye muktidaśāyām iva paridṛśyamānaṃ jagad astam iyāt/ dvitīye jagadāndhyaṃ prasajyeta/ tamaḥprakāśavad viruddhasvabhāvatvāc ca dṛgdṛśyayor ātmānātmanor abhedāyogyatvam avadheyam/ tataś cārthādhyāsānupapattau tatpūrvakasya jñānādhyāsasyāsaṃbhavena brahmaṇo vicāryatvāsaṃbhavād vicārātmikā caturlakṣaṇaśārīrakamīmāṃsā nārambhaṇīyeti pūrvapakṣe prāpte siddhānto ’bhidhīyate/
div.label: [l. 16.158]
div.p: ahaṃpadādhigamyād anyad ātmatattvaṃ nāstīti na vaktavyam/ nirastasamastopādhikasyātmatattvasya śrutyādiṣu prasiddhatvāt/ na ca teṣām upacaritārthatā/ upakramopasaṃhārādiṣaḍvidhatātparyaliṅgavattayā tattvaṃ bodhayatām upacaritārthatvānupapatteḥ/ liṅgaṣaṭkaṃ ca pūrvācāryair darśitam:
div.label: [l. 16.164]
div.p:
tatra sad eva saumyedam agra āsīd ity upakramaḥ/ aitadātmyam idaṃ sarvaṃ tat satyaṃ sa ātmā tat tvam asi śvetaketo ity upasaṃhāraḥ/ tayor brahmaviṣayatvenaikarūpyam
°aikarūpyam ]; °aikyarūpyam ASS, A. ekaliṅgam/ asakṛt tat tvam asīty uktir abhyāsaḥ/ mānāntarāgamyatvam apūrvatvam/ ekavijñānena sarvavijñānaṃ phalam/ sṛṣṭisthitipralayapraveśaniyamanāni pañcārthavādāḥ/ mṛdādidṛṣṭāntā upapattayaḥ/ tasmād etair liṅgair vedāntānāṃ nityaśuddhabuddhamuktasvabhāvabrahmātmaparatvaṃ niścetavyam/ tad ittham aupaniṣadasyātmatattvasyāhamanubhave ’navabhāsamānatvāt tasyānubhavasyādhyastātmaviṣayatvaṃ siddham/
div.label: [l. 16.172]
div.p: kaṇabhakṣākṣacaraṇādikakṣīkṛtasyātmano bhānābhāvād ahamanubhavasyādhyastātmaviṣayatvam eṣitavyam/ na tāvad ahamanubhavaḥ sarvagatatvam ātmano ’vagamayitum īṣṭe/ aham ihāsmi sadane jānāna iti prādeśikatvagrahaṇāt/ na cedaṃ dehasya prādeśikatvaṃ pratibhāsata iti veditavyam/ aham ity ullekhāyogāt/
nanu yathā rājñaḥ sarvaprayojanavidhātari bhṛtye mamātmā bhadrasena ity upacāras tadvad ātmavacanasyāhaṃśabdasya deha upacāra iti cet
maivaṃ vocaḥ/ upacaritātmabhāvasya dehādeḥ svasamānākṛtiśilāputrakādivaj jñātṛtvāyogāt/

na ca jñātṛtvam apy upacaritam/ prayoktuḥ svapratipattiprakāśake prayoge pratipattṛtvopacārānupapatteḥ/ atha dehadharmaḥ prādeśikatvam ātmany upacaryeta tadā dehātmanor bhedena bhavitavyam/ prasiddhabhede māṇavake siṃhaśabdavat sāṃpratikagauṇatve tirohitabhedena sārṣapādau rase tailaśabdavan nirūḍhagauṇatve vā gauṇamukhyayor bhedādhyavasāyasya niyatatvāt/

atha mama śarīram iti bhedabhānasaṃbhavād gauṇatvaṃ manyethās tad ayuktam/ ahaṃśabdārthasya dehādibhyo niṣkṛṣyāsādhāraṇadharmavattvena pratibhāsamānatvābhāvāt/ aparathā lokāyatikamataṃ nodayam āsādayet/ mama śarīram ity uktis tu rāhoḥ śira itivad aupacārikī/ mama śarīram iti bruvāṇenāpi kas tvam iti pṛṣṭena vakṣasthalanyastahastena śṛṅgagrāhikayāyam aham iti prativacanasya dīyamānatvena dehātmapratyayasya sakalānubhavasiddhatvāt/ tad uktam :
div.label: [l. 16.191]

quote.p: laukikaṃ tadvad evedaṃ pramāṇaṃ tv ātmaniścayāt// iti//

div.p: tathā ca vyāpakasya bhedabhānasya nivṛtter vyāpyasya gauṇatvasya nivṛttir iti niravadyam/
div.label: [l. 16.195]
div.p: nanv abhijñayā bhedasiddhir mā saṃbhūn nāma/ pratyabhijñayā tu so ’ham ity evaṃrūpayā tatsiddhiḥ saṃbhaviṣyatīti cen

na/ vikalpāsahatvāt/ kim iyaṃ pratyabhijñā pāmarāṇāṃ syāt parīkṣakāṇāṃ vā/ nādyaḥ/ dehavyatiriktātmaikyam avagāhamānāyāḥ pratyabhijñāyā anudayāt/ pratyuta śyāmasya lauhityavat kāraṇaviśeṣād alpasyāpi mahāparimāṇatvam aviruddham anubhavatāṃ taddeha eva tasyāḥ saṃbhavāc ca/ na dvitīyaḥ/ vyavahārasamaye pāmarasāmyānatirekāt/ aparokṣabhramasya parokṣajñānavināśyatvānupapatteś ca/ yad uktaṃ bhagavatā bhāṣyakāreṇa paśvādibhiś cāviśeṣāt iti/ bhāmatīkārair apy uktaṃ śāstracintakāḥ khalv evaṃ vicārayanti na pratipattāra iti/ tathā cātmagocarasyādhyāsātmarūpatvaṃ sustham/
div.label: [l. 16.206]
div.p: na cārhatamatānusāreṇāhaṃpratyayaprāmāṇyāyātmano dehaparimāṇatvam aṅgīkaraṇīyam iti sāṃpratam/ madhyamaparimāṇasya sāvayavatvena dehādivad anityatve kṛtahānākṛtābhyāgamaprasaṅgāt/ athaitaddoṣaparijihīrṣayāvayavasamudāya ātmety abhyupagamyeta tadā vaktavyam/ kiṃ pratyekam avayavānāṃ caitanyaṃ saṃghātasya vā/ nādyaḥ/ bahūnāṃ cetanānām ahamahamikayā pradhānabhāvam anubhavatām aikamatyābhāvena samasamayaṃ viruddhadikkriyatayā śarīrasyāpi viśaraṇaniṣkriyatvayor anyatarāpātāt/ dvitīye ’pi saṃghātāpattiḥ kiṃ śarīropādhikī svābhāvikī yādṛcchikī vā/ nādyaḥ/ ekasminn avayave chinne cidātmano ’py avayavaś chinna ity acetanatvāpātāt/ na dvitīyaḥ/ anekeṣām avayavānām anyonyasāhityaniyamādarśanāt/ na tṛtīyaḥ/ saṃśleṣavad viśleṣasyāpi yādṛcchikatvena sukhena vasatām akasmād acetanatvaprasaṅgāt/
div.label: [l. 16.218]
div.p: na cāṇuparimāṇatvam ātmanaḥ śaṅkanīyam/ sthūlo ’haṃ dīrgho ’ham iti pratyayānupapatteḥ/
div.label: [l. 16.220]
div.p: na ca vijñānātmabhāṣiṇāṃ naiṣa doṣaḥ/ viśuddhasāvayavatvābhāvād iti gaṇanīyam/ yaḥ suṣuptaḥ so ’haṃ jāgarmīti sthiragocarasyāhamullekhasya kṣaṇabhaṅgivijñānagocaratve atasmiṃstadbuddhirūpamithyādhyāsasya tadavasthānāt/ tad anena kṛśo ’haṃ kṛṣṇo ’ham ityādīnāṃ prakhyātānānāṃ buddhyā sarūpatākhyānenaupacārikatvaṃ pratyākhyātam/ tadvyāpakabhedabhānāsaṃbhavasya prāg eva prapañcitatvāt/ tathā ca prayogaḥ:
vimataṃ śāstraṃ viṣayaprayojanasahitam
āvidyakabandhanivartakatvāt
suptothitabodhavat/

yathā svapnāvasthāyāṃ māyāparikalpitayoṣādikṛtabandhanivartakasya suptotthitabodhasya mandiramadhye sukhena śayyāyām avatiṣṭhamāno deho viṣayaḥ/ tasya suptabodhenāniścayāt/ svapnamāyāvijṛmbhitānarthanivṛttiḥ prayojanam/ evaṃ mananādijanyaparokṣajñānadvāreṇādhyāsikakartṛtva-bhoktṛtvādyanarthaniṣedhakasya śāstrasya saccidānandaikarasaṃ pratyagātmabhūtaṃ brahma viṣayaḥ/ tasyāhamanubhavenāniścayāt/ adhyāsanivṛttiḥ prayojanam/ tathā cāphalatvād iti hetur asiddha iti siddham/ tad uktam :
div.label: [l. 16.234]

quote.p: api khe kāmato mohā nātmany astaviparyaye// iti/

div.p: ito ’yam asaṃdigdhatvād iti hetur apy asiddha iti siddham/
div.label: [l. 16.237]
div.p: yady api sarvaḥ prāṇī pratyagātmāstitvaṃ pratyety aham asmīti/ na hi kaścid api nāham asmīti vipratipadyate/ pratyagātmaiva brahma tat tvam asi iti sāmānādhikaraṇyāt/ tasmād ātmatattvam asaṃdigdhaṃ siddham/ tathāpi dharmaṃ prati vipratipannā bahuvidhā iti nyāyena viśeṣapratipattir upapadyata eva/ tathā hi/ caitanyaviśiṣṭaṃ deham ātmeti lokāyatā manyante/ indriyāṇy ātmety anye/ antaḥkaraṇam ātmety apare/ kṣaṇabhaṅguraṃ saṃtanyamānaṃ vijñānam ātmeti bauddhā budhyante/ dehaparimāṇa ātmeti jainā jināḥ pratijānate/ kartṛtvādiviśiṣṭaḥ parameśvarād bhinno jīvātmeti naiyāyikādayo varṇayanti/ dravyabodhasvabhāvam ātmety ācāryāḥ paricakṣate/ bhoktaiva kevalaṃ na karteti sāṃkhyāḥ saṃgirante/ cidrūpaḥ kartṛtvādirahitaḥ parasmād abhinnaḥ pratyagātmety aupaniṣadā bhāṣante/ evaṃ prasiddhe dharmiṇi viśeṣato vipratipattau tadviśeṣasaṃśayo yujyate/ tathā ca saṃdehasaṃbhavāj jijñāsyatvaṃ brahmaṇaḥ siddham/ tad itthaṃ brahmaṇo vicāryatvasaṃbhavena tadvicārātmakaṃ brahmamīmāṃsāśāstram āraṃbhaṇīyam iti yuktam/ janmādy asya yataḥ ityādisarvasya śāstrasyaitadvicārāpekṣatvāc chāstraprathamādhyāyasaṃgatam idam adhikaraṇam/
div.label: [l. 16.254]
div.p: nanv itthaṃbhūte brahmaṇi kiṃ pramāṇaṃ pratyakṣam anumānam āgamo vā/ na kadācit tatra pratyakṣaṃ śramate/ atīndriyatvāt/ nāpy anumānam/ vyāptasya liṅgasyābhāvāt/ nāpy āgamaḥ/ yato vāco nivartante iti śrutyaivāgamagamyatvaniṣedhāt/ upamānādikam aśakyaśaṅkam/ niyataviṣayatvāt/ tasmād brahmaṇi pramāṇaṃ na saṃbhavatīti cet
maivaṃ vocaḥ/ pratyakṣādyasaṃbhave ’py āgamasya sattvāt/
yato vāco nivartante iti vāggocaratvaniṣedhāt katham etad iti cet

śrutir eva niṣedhati vedāntavedyatvaṃ brahmaṇaḥ śrutir eva vidhatte/ na hi vedapratipādite ’rthe ’nupapanne vaidikānāṃ buddhiḥ khidyate/ api tu tadupapādanamārgam eva vicārayati/ tasmād ubhayam api pratipādanīyam/ viṣayatvaniṣedhakāni vākyāni/ vākyajanyavṛttivyaktasphuraṇalakṣaṇaphalāsaṃbhavavivakṣayā pravṛttāni/ viṣayatvabodhakāni tu vṛttijanyāvaraṇabhaṅgalakṣaṇaphalasaṃbhavavivakṣayā/ tad uktaṃ bhagavadbhiḥ :

quote.p: prameyaṃ pramitau tu syād ātmākārasamarpaṇāt// iti/
na prakāśyaṃ pramāṇena prakāśo brahmaṇaḥ svayam/
tajjanyāvṛtibhaṅgatvāt prameyam iti gīyate// iti ca/

div.label: [l. 16.271]
div.p:
nanu syād eṣa manoratho yadi siddhe ’rthe vedasya prāmāṇyaṃ sidhyet/ saṃgatigrahaṇāyattatvāt/ vṛddhavyavahārasya ca loke kāryaikaniyatatvāt/ na hy asti saṃbhavaḥ śabdānāṃ kārye ’rthe saṃgatigrahe
saṃgatigrahe ]; saṃgatigrahaḥ ASS, A. siddhārthābhidhāyakatvaṃ tatra vā prāmāṇyam iti/ na hi turaṅgatve gṛhītasaṃgatikaṃ turaṅgapadaṃ gotvam ācaṣṭe tatra vā prāmāṇyaṃ bhajate/ tasmāt kāryagṛhītasaṃgatikānāṃ śabdānāṃ kārya eva prāmāṇyam/
nanu mukhavikāsādiliṅgād dharṣahetuṃ prasiddhārtham anumāya yatra śabdasya saṃgatigraho yathā putras te jāta ityādiṣu tatrāvaśyaṃ kāryam antareṇaiva śabdasya siddhe ’rthe prāmāṇyam āśrīyata iti cen

na/ putrajanmavad eva priyāsukhaprasavāder anekasya harṣahetor upasthīyamānatvena pariśeṣāvadhāraṇānupapatteḥ/ putras te jāta ityādiṣu siddhārthapareṣu prayogeṣu dvāraṃ dvāram ityādivat kāryādhyāhāreṇa prayogopapatteś ca/ śāstratvaprasiddhyā ca na vedāntānāṃ siddhārthatvaparatvam/ pravṛttinivṛttiparāṇām eva vākyānāṃ śāstratvaprasiddheḥ/ tad uktaṃ bhaṭṭācāryaiḥ :
div.label: [l. 16.286]

quote.p: pravṛttir vā nivṛttir vā nityena kṛtakena vā/
puṃsāṃ yenopadiśyeta tac chāstram abhidhīyate// iti/

div.p: na caiteṣāṃ svarūpaparatve prayojanam asti/ śrutavedāntārthasyāpi puṃsaḥ sāṃsārikadharmāṇām anivṛtteḥ/ tasmād vedāntānām apy ātmā jñātavya iti samāmnātena vidhinaikavākyatām āśritya kāryaparataivāśrayaṇīyeti siddham/ tataś ca kevalasiddharūpe brahmaṇi vedāntānāṃ prāmāṇyaṃ na sidhyatīti cet/
div.label: [l. 16.293]
div.p:
atra pratividhīyate: na tāvad siddhe vyutpattyasiddhiḥ/ prāg unnītayā nītyā putras te jāta iti vākyāt siddhaparād api vyutpattisiddheḥ/ na ca pariśeṣāvadhāraṇānupapattiḥ/ priyāsukhaprasavāder api saṃbhavād iti bhaṇitavyam/ putrapadāṅkitapaṭapradarśanavat priyāsukhaprasavādisūcakābhāvāt/ putrajanmaiva tatsūcakam iti cen na
cen na ]; cet ASS, A.
prathamapratītaputrajanmaparityāge kāraṇābhāvāt/ putrajananasyaivādhikānandahetutvāc ca/
iti vidyamānatvāt/ tathā cācakathac citsukhācāryaḥ:
div.label: [l. 16.304]
div.p: yad uktaṃ siddhārthapareṣu kāryādhyāhāra iti tad ayuktam/ mukhyārthaviṣayatayā siddhe ’pi prayogasiddhāv adhyāhārānupapatteḥ/ yad uktaṃ śāstratvaprasiddhyā ca na svarūpaparatvam iti tad apy ayuktam/ hitaśāsanād api śāstratvopapatteḥ/ na ca prayojanābhāvaḥ/ śrutamatavedāntajanyādvitīyātmavijñānābhyāsena vidyodaye saṃsāranidānāvidyānivṛttyupalakṣitabrahmātmatālakṣaṇaparamapuruṣārtha-siddheḥ/ na cātra vidhiḥ saṃbhavati/ vikalpāsahatvāt/ tathā hi : kiṃ śābdajñānaṃ vidheyaṃ kiṃ vā bhāvanātmakam āhosvit sākṣātkārarūpam/ nādyaḥ/ viditapadārthasaṃgatikasyādhītaśabdanyāyatattvasyāntareṇāpi vidhiṃ śabdād evopapatteḥ/ nāpi dvitīyaḥ/ bhāvanāyā jñānaprakarṣahetubhāvasyānvayavyatirekasiddhatayā prāptatvenāvidheyatvāt/ aprāptaprāpakasyaiva vidhitvāṅgīkārāt/ tṛtīye sākṣātkāraḥ kiṃ brahmasvarūpaḥ kiṃ vāntaḥkaraṇapariṇāmabhedaḥ/ nādyaḥ/ tasya nityatvenāvidheyatvāt/ nāpi dvitīyaḥ/ ānandasākṣātkārarūpatayā phalatvenāvidheyatvāt/ tasmāj jñātavya ityādīnām avidhāyakatvād arhe kṛtyatṛcaś ca iti kṛtyapratyayānām arhārthe vidhānād arhārthataiva vyākhyeyā/ tathā ca sarveṣāṃ vedāntavākyānām upakramopasaṃhārādiṣaḍvidhatātparyopetatvān nityaśuddhabuddhamuktasvabhāvabrahmātmaparatvam āstheyam/
div.label: [l. 16.322]
div.p: niṣpradeśe paramāṇau pradeśavṛttitvenābhimatasya saṃyogasya durupapādanatayā tannibandhanasya dvyaṇukasyāsiddhau dvyaṇukādikrameṇārambhavādāsaṃbhavād acetanāyāḥ prakṛter mahadādirūpeṇa pariṇāmavādāsaṃbhavāc ca khyātibādhānyathānupapattyānirvacanīyaḥ prapañcaś cidvivarta iti siddham/ svarūpāparityāgena rūpāntarāpattir vivarta iti satyamithyākhyāvabhāsa iti/ avabhāso ’dhyāsa iti paryāyaḥ/ sa cādhyāso dvividhaḥ : arthādhyāso jñānādhyāsaś ceti/ tad uktam :

quote.p: taddhīś cādhyāsa iti hi dvayam iṣṭaṃ manīṣibhiḥ// iti/

div.label: [l. 16.331]
div.p: punar api dvividho ’dhyāsaḥ/ nirupādhikasopādhikabhedāt/ tad apy uktam :
tatra svarūpeṇa kalpitāhamādyadhyāso nirupādhikaḥ/ tad apy uktam :

quote.p: nīlimeva viyaty eṣā bhrāntyā brahmaṇi saṃsṛtiḥ/
ghaṭavyomeva bhoktāyaṃ bhrānto bhedena na svataḥ// iti/

div.p: ata eva bhāṣyakāraḥ śuktikā rajatavad avabhāsata ekaś candraḥ sadvitīyavad iti nidarśanadvayam udājahāra/ śiṣṭaṃ śāstra eva spaṣṭam iti vistarabhiyoparamyate/ evaṃ ca dṛgdṛśyau dvāv eva padārthāv iti vedāntināṃ siddhānta iti sarvam avadātam/
div.label: [l. 16.344]
div.p: atra prabhākaraḥ : śuktikā rajatavad avabhāsata iti dṛṣṭānto neṣṭaḥ/ rajatapratyayasya śuktikālambanatvānupapatteḥ/ tathā hi : idaṃ rajatam iti pratītau śukter ālambanatvaṃ purodeśasattāmātreṇāvalambyate kāraṇatvena bhāsamānatvena vā/ nādyaḥ/ purovartināṃ loṣṭādīnām apy ālambanatvaprasaṅgāt/ atha kaladhautabodhakaraṇasaṃskārodbodhakāraṇatvena taddvārā rajatajñānakāraṇatvād ālambanatvaṃ manyase/ tad api na saṃgacchate/ cakṣurādīnām api kāraṇatvena viṣayatvāpātāt/ atha bhāsamānatayā viṣayatvam iṣyate tad apy aśliṣṭam/ rajatanirbhāsasya śuktikālambanatvānupapatteḥ/ yasmin vijñāne yad avabhāsate tat tadālambanam/ atra ca kaladhautānubhavaḥ śuktikālambanatvakalpanāyāṃ virudhyate/ tathā cācakathan nyāyavīthyāṃ śālikanāthaḥ :

quote.p: atra brūmo ya evārtho yasyāṃ saṃvidi bhāsate/
vedyaḥ sa eva nānyad dhi vedyāvedyatvalakṣaṇam//
idaṃ rajatam ity atra rajataṃ tv avabhāsate/
tad eva tena vedyaṃ syān na tu śuktir avedanāt//
anyasmin bhāsamāne hi na paraṃ bhāsate yataḥ// iti/

div.label: [l. 16.362]
div.p: kiṃ ca mithyājānānotpattau sāmagrī na samasti/ kiṃ kevalānīndriyādīni kāraṇāni doṣadūṣitāni vā/ nādyaḥ/ teṣāṃ samīcīnajñānajananasāmarthyopalambhāt/ anyathā samīcīnaṃ rajatajñānaṃ kadācid udayam āsādayet/ na dvitīyaḥ/ doṣāṇām autsargikakāryaprasavaśaktipratibandhamātraprabhāvatvāt/ na hi duṣṭaṃ kuṭajabījaṃ vaṭāṅkuraṃ janayitum īṣṭe/ na vā tailakaluṣitaṃ śālibījam aśālyaṅkurajananāyālam/ kiṃ tu svakāryaṃ na karoti/
nanu dāvadahanadagdhasya vetrabījasya kadalīkāṇḍajanakatvaṃ dṛṣṭam iti cet

tan na sthāne/ dagdhasyāvetrabījatvena doṣāṇāṃ viparītakāryakāritvaṃ praty anudāharaṇāt/ na ca bhasmakadoṣadūṣitasya kaukṣeyasyāśuśukṣaṇer bahvannapacanasāmarthyaṃ dṛṣṭam ity eṣṭavyam/ aśitapītādyāhārapariṇatau jāṭharasya jātavedasaḥ śaktatvāt/ tad uktam :

quote.p: doṣāś cen na hi doṣāṇāṃ kāryaśaktivighātatā//

div.label: [l. 16.379]
div.p: api cāsaty apy arthe jñānaprādurbhāvābhyupagame samīcīnasthale ’pi jñānānāṃ svagocaravyabhicāraśaṅkāṅkurasaṃbhavena niraṅkuśo vyavahāro lupyate/ tad āha:

quote.p: yadi cārthaṃ parityajya kācid buddhiḥ prakāśate/

div.label: [l. 16.385]
div.p: nanu rajatagocaraikaviśiṣṭajñānānaṅgīkāre viśiṣṭavyavahāro na sidhyet/ atas tatsiddhaye ’pi viparyayo ’ṅgīkārya iti cen

na/ idaṃ rajatam iti grahaṇasmaraṇābhidhasya bodhadvayasya vyavahārakāraṇatvāṅgīkārāt/ yady evaṃ idaṃ śuktikāśakalaṃ tad rajatam ity ato ’pi viśiṣṭavyavahāraḥ syād iti/ tan na/ tatredam iti purovartidravyamātragrahaṇasya doṣadūṣitacakṣurjanyatvenānākalitaśuktitvādiviśeṣitasya sāmānyamātragrahaṇarūpatvād rajatam iti jñānasyāsaṃnihitaviṣayasya saṃprayogaliṅgādyaprasūtatayā sadṛśāvabodhitasaṃskāramātraprabhavatvena pariśeṣaprāptasmṛtibhāvasya doṣahetukatayā gṛhītatattāṃśapramoṣād grahaṇamātratvopapatteḥ/ tad apy uktam :

quote.p: nanv atra rajatābhāsaḥ katham eṣa ghaṭiṣyate/
te na jñātā abhibhavāj jñātā sāmānyarūpatā//
anantaraṃ ca rajatasmṛtir jātā tayāpi ca/
na hy asaṃnihitaṃ tāvat pratyakṣaṃ rajataṃ bhavet/
pariśeṣāt smṛtir iti niścayo jāyate punaḥ/

div.label: [l. 16.408]
div.p: nanu kim idam ekaikaṃ vyavahārakāraṇam uta saṃbhūya/ na prathamaḥ/ deśabhedena pravṛttiprasaṅgāt/ na caramaḥ/ prayatnāyaugapadyāj jñānāyaugapadyāt ityādinā jñānayaugapadyaniṣedhāt/ ato jñānadvayaṃ hetur ity ayuktaṃ vaca iti cet
maivaṃ vocaḥ/ avinaśyatoḥ sahāvasthānaniṣedhe ’pi vinaśyadavinaśyatoḥ sahāvasthānasyāniṣiddhatvena nirantarotpannayos tadupapatteḥ/
nanu rajatajñānād rajatārthī rajate pravartatāṃ nāma/ paurastye vastuni kathaṃ pravṛttiḥ syād iti cen
na/ svarūpato viṣayataś cāgṛhītabhedayor grahaṇasmaraṇayoḥ saṃnihitarajatagocarajñānasārūpyeṇa vastutaḥ parasparaṃ vibhinnayor apy abhedocitasāmānādhikaraṇyavyapadeśahetutvopapatteḥ/
grahaṇasmaraṇayoḥ saṃnihitarajatajñānasārūpyaṃ katham/

yathā caitat tathā niśamyatām/ saṃnihitarajatagocaraṃ hi vijñānam idamaṃśarajatāṃśayor asaṃsargaṃ nāvagāhate/ tayoḥ saṃsṛṣṭatvenāsaṃsargasyaivābhāvāt/ nāpi svagataṃ bhedam/ ekajñānatvāt/ evaṃ grahaṇasmaraṇe api doṣavaśād vidyamānam apīdamaṃśarajatāṃśayor asaṃsargaṃ bhedaṃ nāvagāhete
nāvagāhete ]; nāvagāhata ASS, A. iti/ bhedāgrahaṇam eva sārūpyam/ tad uktaṃ gurumatānusāribhiḥ :
div.label: [l. 16.424]

quote.p: samyagrajatabodhāc ca bhinne yady api tattvataḥ//
tato bhinne abuddhvā ca grahaṇasmaraṇe ime/

div.label: [l. 16.434]
div.p: evam agṛhītavivekam āpannasaṃnihitarūpyajñānasārūpyaṃ grahaṇasmaraṇadvayam ayathāvyavahārahetur iti siddham/
yady evam ayathāvyavahāro grahaṇasmaraṇajanyas tarhi pītaḥ śaṅkha ityādau sa na siddhas tatra tayor abhāvād iti cen

na/ agṛhītavivekayoḥ prāptasamīcīnasaṃsargajñānasārūpyatve grahaṇayor eva vyavahārasaṃpādakatvopapatteḥ/ nayanaraśmivartinaḥ pittadravyasya pītimā doṣavaśād dravyarahito gṛhyate/ śaṅkho ’py akalitaśuklaguṇaḥ svarūpato gṛhyate/ tad anayor guṇaguṇinoḥ saṃsargayogyayor asaṃsargāgrahasārūpyāt pītatapanīyapiṇḍapratyayāvailakṣaṇyād vyavahāra upapadyate/ yathoktam :
div.label: [l. 16.442]

quote.p: guṇe dravyavyapekṣe ca dravye ca guṇakāṅkṣiṇi/
bhāsamāne tayor buddhir asaṃbandhaṃ na budhyate//
vyavahāro ’pi tattulya evam atrāpi yujyate// iti/

div.label: [l. 16.451]
div.p: nanv idaṃ rajatam iti bhrāntijñānānabhyupagame rajataprasakter asattvān nedaṃ rajatam iti niṣedhaḥ kathaṃ kaladhautābhāvaṃ bodhayatīti cet
naiṣa doṣaḥ/bhedāgrahaprasañjitasya śuktau rajatavyavahārasya niṣedhasvīkāreṇa kalpanālāghavasadbhāvāt/ tad uktaṃ pañcikāprakaraṇe :
tad anena prācīnayor jñānayoḥ satyatve kathaṃ bhramatvaprasiddhir iti śaṅkā parākṛtā/ ayathāvyavahārapravartakatvena tadupapatteḥ/
div.label: [l. 16.462]
div.p: kiṃ ca nedaṃ rajatam iti bādhakāvabodho nābhāvam avagāhate/ bhāvavyatirekeṇābhāvasya durgrahaṇatvāt/

yady evam aṅga nāstīti pratyayasya kim ālambanam/ aparathā māhāyānikapakṣānupraveśa
māhāyānika° ]; māhābhānika° ASS, A. iti cet

maivaṃ bhāṣiṣṭhāḥ/ abhāvasya dharmipratiyoginirūpaṇādhīnanirūpyatvenāvaśyābhyupagamanīye dṛśye pratiyoginy adṛśye vā smaryamāṇe ’dhikaraṇamātrabuddher eva nāstīti vyavahāropapattāv atiriktābhāvakalpanāyāṃ pramāṇābhāvāt/ tad uktam amṛtakalāyām :

quote.p: pratiyoginy adṛśye ca dṛśye ca pratiyogini//
tatra tanmātradhīr yeyaṃ smṛte ca pratiyogini/

div.label: [l. 16.476]
div.p: ata eva ca prābhākaramatānusāribhiḥ pramāṇapārāyaṇe pratyakṣādīni pañcaiva pramāṇāni prapañcitāni/
nanv evam abhāvasyābhāve nakārasya vaiyarthyam āpadyeta/ anuśāsanavirodhaś cāpated iti cet

tad etad vārtam/ ekonapañcāśad varṇānāṃ madhye kasyāpi varṇasyābhāvārthatvādarśanena varṇasya sato nakārasya tadarthatvānupapatteḥ/ na caivam anuśāsanavirodhaḥ/ tadanyatadabhāvatadviruddheṣv artheṣv anuśāsanasyaivam arthaḥ syāt/ tathā hi : cetanānāṃ madhye kaścana kasyacic chatruḥ kaścana kasyacin mitraṃ kaścana kasyacid udāsīnas tathaivācetanānām api/ tadanyapadena tadudāsīno nakārārthaḥ/ viruddhapadena śatrur nakārārthaḥ/ tadabhāvapadena mitraṃ nakārārthaḥ/ tathā cābrāhmaṇapada evaitat trayaṃ pratīyate śūdra ity udāsīno yavana iti śatruḥ kṣatriya iti mitram/ evaṃ sarvatra nañprayogasthale draṣṭavyam iti na kaścid abhāvo bhāvavyatiriktaḥ saṃbhavati/ tasmād uktayā rītyā bhramabādhaprasiddhyā vivādādhyāsitāḥ pratyayā yathārthāḥ pratyayatvād daṇḍīti pratyayavad iti siddham/
div.label: [l. 16.490]
div.p: tad apare na kṣamante/ iha khalu nikhilaprekṣāvān samīhitatatsādhanayor anyatarapravedane pravartate/ na ca rajatam arthayamānasya śuktikāśakalajñānaṃ tadrūpam anubhāvayituṃ prabhavati/ śuktikāśakalasya samīhitatatsādhanayor anyatarabhāvābhāvāt/ nāpi rajatasmaraṇaṃ purovartini pravṛttikāraṇam/ tasyānubhavapāratantryatayānubhavadeśa eva pravartakatvāt/ nāpi bhedāgraho vyavahārakāraṇam/ grahaṇanibandhatvāc cetanavyavahārasya/

nanu na vayam ekaikasya kāraṇatvaṃ brūmahe yenaivam upālabhyemahi/ kiṃ tv agṛhītavivekasya jñānadvayasya prāptasamīcīnapuraḥsthitarajatajñānasārūpyasyety ayukto
°ayukto° ]; °anukto° ASS, A. pālambho ’yam iti cet

tad apy ayuktam/ vikalpāsahatvāt/ tathā hi: samīcīnarajatāvabhāsasārūpyaṃ bhāsamānaṃ pravartakaṃ sattāmātreṇa vā/ ādye vikalpe bhedāgrahāparaparyāyasya sārūpyasya samīcīnasaṃnibhe ime jñāne iti viśeṣākāreṇa gṛhyamāṇasya pravṛttikāraṇatvaṃ kiṃ vānayor eva svarūpato viṣayataś ca mitho bhedāgraho vidyata iti sāmānyākāreṇa gṛhyamāṇasya sārūpyasya/ nādyaḥ/ samīcīnajñānavat tatsaṃnibhajñānasya taducitavyavahārapravartakatvānupapatteḥ/ na khalu gosaṃnibho gavaya ity avabhāso gavārthinaṃ gavaye pravartayati/ na dvitīyaḥ/ vyāhatatvāt/ na khalv anākalitabhedasyānayor iti anayor iti grahe bhedāgraha iti ca pratipattir bhavati/ ataḥ pariśeṣāt sattāmātreṇa bhedāgraharūpasya sārūpyasya vyavahārakāraṇatvam aṅgīkartavyam/ evam evāstv iti cet, tarhīdam iha saṃpradhāryam: kim ayaṃ bhedāgrahaḥ samāropotpādanakrameṇa vyavahārakāraṇam astūtānutpāditāropa eva svayam iti/ na ca dvitīyaḥ pakṣa eva śreyān/ tāvataiva vyavahārotpattāv āropasya gauravadoṣaduṣṭatvād iti mantavyam/ viśiṣṭavyavahārasya viśiṣṭajñānapūrvakatvaniyamenājñānapūrvakatvānupapatteḥ/
div.label: [l. 16.514]
div.p: nanv ayaṃ vyavahāro nājñānapūrvaka ity anākalitaparābhisaṃdhiḥ svasiddhāntasiddhārthād yadi kaścic chaṅketa sa prativaktavyaḥ/ śuktikāviṣayasya grahaṇasyāsamīhitaviṣayatvena rajatārthipravṛttihetutvāsaṃbhavād anvayavyatirekābhyāṃ rajatajñānasya samīhitaviṣayatvena pravṛttihetutvasaṃbhavāc cedamarthābhisaṃbhinnagrahaviviktasyāpi rajatasmaraṇasya kāraṇatvaṃ vaktavyam/ tac ca vaktuṃ na śakyate/ jānāti icchati tataḥ pravartata iti nyāyena jñānecchāpravṛttīnāṃ samānaviṣayatvena bhāvyam/ tathā cedaṃkārāspadābhimukhapravṛttasya rajatārthinas tadicchā nibandhanam/ anyathānyad icchann anyad vyavaharatīti vyāhanyeta/ tathā ca yadīdaṃkārāspadaṃ rajatāvabhāsagocaratāṃ nācaret kathaṃ rajatārthī tad icchet/ yady arajatatvāgrahaṇād iti brūyāt/ rajatatvāgrahāt kasmād ayaṃ nopekṣeteti/ yugapat tadbhavabhedāgrahābhedāgrahanibandhanābhyāṃ purataḥ pṛṣṭhataś cākṛṣyamāṇaḥ puruṣo dolāyamānatayā rūpyāropam antareṇopādānapakṣa eva na vyavasthāpyata ity anicchatāpy acchamatinā samāropaḥ samāśrayaṇīyaḥ/ yathāha: bhedāgrahād idaṃkārāspade rajatatvam āropya tajjātīyasyopakārahetubhāvam anusmṛtya tajjātīyatvenāsyāpi tad anumāya tadarthī pravartata iti prathamaḥ pakṣaḥ praśasyaḥ/
div.label: [l. 16.531]
div.p: na ca taṭastharajatasmaraṇapakṣe ’pi hetor gṛhītatvenāyaṃ mārgaḥ samāna iti vācyam/ rajatatvasya hetoḥ pakṣadharmatvābhāvāt/ na ca pakṣadharmatāyā abhāve ’pi vyāptibalād gamakatvaṃ śaṅkyam/ vyāptipakṣadharmatāvalliṅgasyaiva gamakatvāṅgīkārāt/ tad āhuḥ śabarasvāminaḥ: jñātasaṃbandhasyaiva puṃso liṅgaviśiṣṭadharmyekadeśadarśanāl liṅgiviśiṣṭadharmyekadeśabuddhir anumānam iti/ ācāryo ’pi avocat :

quote.p: sa eṣa cobhayātmā yo gamye gamaka iṣyate/

div.label: [l. 16.539]
div.p: nanu bhavatpakṣe ’pi puraḥsthitasyedamarthasya paramārthato rajatatvaṃ nāstīti na rajatatvaṃ dharmyekadeśa iti cen na/
yakṣānurūpo balir iti nyāyenānumityābhāsānuguṇasyaikadeśasya vidyamānatvāt/ tathā ca prayogaḥ:
vivādādhyāsitaṃ rajatajñānaṃ purovartiviṣayaṃ
rajatārthinas tatra niyamena pravartakatvāt/
yad uktasādhanaṃ tad uktasādhyaṃ yathobhayavādisaṃmataṃ satyarajatajñānam/
vivādapadaṃ śuktiśakalaṃ rajatajñānaviṣayo
’vyavadhānena rajatārthipravṛttiviṣayatvād rajatapadasamānādhikaraṇapadāntaravācyatvād vā
vasturajatavat/
div.label: [l. 16.547]
div.p: yad uktaṃ rajatajñānasya śuktikālambanatve ’nubhavavirodha iti tad apy ayuktam/ vikalpāsahatvāt/ tathā hi: tatra kiṃ rajatākārapratītiṃ prati śukter ālambanatve ’nubhavavirodha udbhāvyata idamaṃśasya vā/ nādyaḥ/ anaṅgīkāraparāhatatvāt/ na dvitīyaḥ/ idaṃtāniyatadeśādhikaraṇasya cākacakyaviśiṣṭasya vastuno rajatajñānālambanatvam anavalambamānasya bhavata evānubhavavirodhāt/ idaṃ rajatam iti sāmānādhikaraṇyena purovartiny aṅgulinirdeśapūrvakam upādānādivyavahāradarśanāc ca/
div.label: [l. 16.554]
div.p: yac coktam : doṣāṇām autsargikakāryaprasavaśaktipratibandhakatayā viparītakāritvaṃ nāstīti/ tad apy ayuktam/ dāvadagdhavetrabījādau tathā darśanāt/ na ca dagdhasya vetrabījatvaṃ nāstīti mantavyam/ śyāmasya ghaṭasya raktatāmātreṇa ghaṭatvanivṛttiprasaṅgāt/
nanu ghaṭo ’yam ity anuvṛttayoḥ pratyayaprayogayoḥ sadbhāvād ghaṭatvasya sadbhāva iti cen

na/ atrāpīdaṃ vetrabījam iti tayoḥ samānatvāt/ tathā bhasmakadoṣadūṣitasya jāṭharāgner bahvannapacanasāmarthyaṃ dṛśyate/ na ca bahvannapacanasāmartyaṃ jāṭharasyaiva jātavedaso na bhasmakavyādher iti vaktuṃ yuktam/ tasya mandam alpapacanasāmarthye ’pi sahasā mahatpacanasya bhasmakavyādhisāhāyakam antareṇānupapatteḥ/ anyathā sarveṣāṃ tathāpatteḥ/
tathāpatteḥ/ ] ASS; tathāpatteḥ A. kiṃ ca jñānānāṃ yathārthavyavahārakāraṇatve ’pi doṣavaśād ayathārthavyavahārakāraṇatvam aṅgīkurvāṇo bhavān eva paryanuyojyo bhavati/ tad uktaṃ bhāṣye: yaś cobhayoḥ samāno doṣo dyotate tatra kaś codyo bhavatīti/ atrāpy uktam:
div.label: [l. 16.568]

quote.p: yaś cobhayoḥ samo doṣaḥ parihāro ’pi va samaḥ/

div.p: tathāpi māmakasyānumānasya kiṃ dūṣaṇaṃ dattam āsīt/ yady anumānadūṣaṇaṃ vinā na parituṣyati hanta kālātyayāpadiṣṭatā/ kṛṣṇavartmānuṣṇatvānumānavat/ etāvantaṃ kālaṃ yad idaṃ rajatam ity abhād asau śuktir iti pratyakṣeṇa prācīnapratyayasyāyathārthatvaṃ pravedayatā yathārthatvānumānasyāpahṛtaviṣayatvād bādhyatvasaṃbhavāt/
div.label: [l. 16.575]
div.p: yac coktaṃ svagocaravyabhicāre sarvānāśvāsaprasaṅga iti/ tad asāmpratam/ saṃvidāṃ kvacit saṃvādivyavahārajanakatve ’pi na sarvatra tacchaṅkayā pravṛttyuccheda iti yathā tāvake mate tathā māmake ’py asau panthā na vārita iti samānayogakṣematvāt/ tautātitamatam avalambya vidhivivekaṃ vyākurvāṇair ācāryavācaspatimiśrair bodhakatvena svataḥ prāmāṇyaṃ nāvyabhicāreṇeti nyāyakaṇikāyāṃ pratyapādi/ tasmād aviśvāsaśaṅkānavakāśaṃ labhate/
div.label: [l. 16.582]
div.p: nanu mādhyamikamatāvalambanena rajatādivibhramālambanam asad iti cet

tad ayuktam
°ayuktam ] ASS; °uktam A. / asato ’parokṣapratibhāsāyogyatvāt/ tadupāditsayā pravṛttyanupapatteś ca/

nanu vijñānam eva vāsanādisvakāraṇasāmarthyāsāditadṛṣṭāntasiddhasvabhāvaviśeṣam asatprakāśanasamarthanam upajātam/ asatprakāśanaśaktir avidyā saṃvṛtir iti paryāyāḥ/ tasmād avidyāvaśād asanto bhāntīti cet
tad api vaktum aśakyam/ śakyasya durnirūpyatvāt/

kim atra śakyaṃ kāryaṃ jñāpyaṃ vā/ nādyaḥ/ asataḥ kāraṇatvānupapatteḥ/ na dvitīyaḥ/ śakyasya kāraṇatvenāṅgīkṛtatvāt/ jñānād anyasya jñānasyānupalabdheś ca/ upalabdhau vā tasyāpi jñāpyatvena jñāpakāntarāpekṣāyām anavasthāpatteś ca/
athaitaddoṣaparijihīṣayā vijñānaṃ sadrūpam evāsataḥ prakāśakam iti pakṣīkriyata iti cet

atra devānāṃpriyaḥ praṣṭavyaḥ punaḥ/ asau sadasatoḥ saṃbandho nirūpyanirūpakabhāvo ’vinābhāvo vā/ nādyaḥ/ asata upakārādhāratvāyogenānupakṛtatayā nirūpyatvānupapatteḥ/ na caramaḥ/ dhūmadhūmadhvajayor iva tadutpattilakṣaṇasya śiṃśapāvṛkṣayor iva tādātmyalakṣaṇasya vā avinābhāvanidānasya sadasator asaṃbhavāt/ tasmād vijñānam evāsatprakāśakam ity asadvādinām ayam asatpralāpa ity āropyamāṇaṃ nāsat/
div.label: [l. 16.600]
div.p: nanu vijñānavādinayānusāreṇa pratīyamānaṃ rajataṃ jñānātmakam/ tatra ca yuktir abhidhīyate: yad yathānubhūyate tat tathā/ anyathātvaṃ tu balavadbādhakopanipātād āsthīyata ity ubhayavādisaṃmato ’rthaḥ/ tatra ca nedaṃ rajatam iti niṣiddhedaṃbhāvaṃ rajatam arthād āntarajñānarūpam avatiṣṭhate/ na cedaṃtayā niṣedhe saty anidaṃtayā ca bahir api vyavasthopapatteḥ kutaḥ saṃvidākārateti vācyam/ vyavahitasyāparokṣatvānupapattāv aparokṣasya vijñānasya kakṣīkartavyatvāt/ tathā ca prayogaḥ:
vivādapadaṃ vijñānākāraḥ
saṃprayogam antareṇāparokṣatvād
vijñānavad iti/

tad anupapannam/ vikalpāsahatvāt/ bādhako ’vabodhaḥ kiṃ sākṣāj jñānākāratāṃ bodhayaty arthād vā/ nādyaḥ/ nedaṃ rajatam iti pratyayasya rajatavivekamātragocarasya jñānābhedagocaratāyām anubhavavirodhāt/ nedaṃ rajatam iti rajatasya purovartitvapratiṣedho jñānākāratāṃ kalpayatīti cet — tad etad vārtam/ prasaktapratiṣedhātmano bādhakāvabodhasya tatraiva sattvāt pratiṣedhopapatteḥ/ vijñānākāratvasādhanam apy avijñānākāre bahiṣṭhe sākṣipratyakṣe bhāvarūpājñāne vartata iti savyabhicāraḥ/
div.label: [l. 16.615]
div.p: nanv anyathākhyātivādimatānusāreṇa rajatasya deśāntarasattvena bhāvyam/ anyathā tasya pratiṣedhapratiyogitvānupapatteḥ/ na hi kaścit prekṣāvāñ śaśaviṣāṇaṃ pratiṣeddhuṃ prabhavati/ tad uktam :
tathā ca tasya deśāntarasattvam āśrayaṇīyam iti cet
tad api na pramāṇapaddhatim adhyāste/ asataḥ saṃsargasyeva kaladhautasya niṣedhapratiyogitvopapatteḥ/
div.label: [l. 16.624]
div.p:
nanv idaṃ rajatam iti jñānam ekam anekaṃ vā/ na tāvad ādyaḥ/ apasiddhāntāpatter asaṃbhavāc ca/ tathā hi/ śuktīdamaṃśendriyasaṃprayogād idamākārāntaḥkaraṇa
°rāntaḥkaraṇa° ]; °rāntaḥ° A. pariṇāmarūpam ekaṃ jñānaṃ jāyate/ na ca tatra kaladhautaṃ viṣayabhāvam ākalpayitum utsahate/ asaṃprayuktatvāt tasya/ viṣayatvāṅgīkāre sarvajñatvāpatteḥ/ na ca cakṣuranvayavyatirekānuvidhāyitayā tajjñānasya tajjanyatvaṃ vācyam/ idamaṃśajñānotpattau tadupakṣayopapatteḥ/ na cāpi saṃskārād rajatajñānasya janma/ smṛtitvāpatteḥ/ athendriyadoṣasya tatkaraṇatvam/ tad apy ayuktam/ svātantryeṇa tasya jñānahetutvānupapatteḥ/ na hi grahaṇasmaraṇābhyām anyaḥ prakāraḥ samasti/ tasmād idamaṃśarajatatādātmyaviṣayam ekaṃ vijñānaṃ na ghaṭate/ nāpy anekam akhyātimatāpatter iti cet —
div.label: [l. 16.635]
div.p: ucyate/ prathamaṃ doṣakaluṣitena cakṣuṣedaṃtāmātraviṣayāntaḥkaraṇavṛttir utpadyate/ anantaraṃ tayā vṛttyā caitanyāvaraṇābhibhave sati tac caitanyam abhivyajyate/ paścād idamaṃśacaitanyaniṣṭhā avidyā rāgādidoṣakaluṣitā kaladhautākāreṇa pariṇamate/ idamākārāntaḥkaraṇapariṇāmāvacchinnacaitanyaniṣṭhā kaladhautagocarapariṇāmasaṃskārasacivā kaladhautajñānābhāsākāreṇa pariṇamate/ tau ca rajatavṛttipariṇāmau svādhiṣṭhānena sākṣicaitanyenāvyavadhānena bhāsyete/ tathā ca savṛttikāyā avidyāyāḥ sākṣibhāsyatvābhyupagame vṛttyantaravedyatvābhāvān nānavasthā/ yady apy antaḥkaraṇavṛttir avidyāvṛttiś ceti dve ime jñāne tathāpi viṣayādhīnaṃ phalam/ jñāto ghaṭa iti viṣayāvacchinnatayā phalapratīteḥ[/] tadviṣayaś ca satyamithyābhūtayor idamaṃśarajatāṃśayor anyonyātmakatayaikatvam āpannaḥ/ tasmād viṣayāvacchinnaphalasyāpy ekatvāj jñānaikyam upacaryate/ tad uktam:
div.label: [l. 16.648]
[l. 16.654]
div.p: pañcapādikāyām api phalaikyāj jñānaikyam upacaryata ity abhiprāyeṇa “sā caikam eva jñānam ekaphalaṃ janayati” ity uktam/
div.label: [l. 16.656]
div.p: nanu śuktikāmastake bhāvyamānasya kaladhautasya tatraiva satyatvābhyupagame nedaṃ rajatam iti niṣedhaḥ kathaṃ prabhaved iti cen na/ prātibhāsikasatyatve ’pi vyāvahārikasatyatvābhāvena pratipannopādhau pratiyogitvasaṃbhavāt/ tad uktaṃ pañcapādikāvivaraṇe: trividhaṃ sattvam/ paramārthasattvaṃ brahmaṇaḥ/ arthakriyāsāmarthyaṃ sattvaṃ māyopādhikam ākāśādeḥ/ avidyopādhikaṃ sattvaṃ rajatāder iti/
div.label: [l. 16.662]
div.p: anyatrāpy uktam:

quote.p: tat prātibhāsikaṃ sattvaṃ bādhyaṃ saty eva mātari//
tad vyāvahārikaṃ sattvaṃ bādhyaṃ mātrā sahaiva tat// iti ca/

div.label: [l. 16.671]
div.p:
tataḥ khyātibādhānyathānupapattyā bhrāntigocarasya māyāmayasya rajatādeḥ sadasadvilakṣaṇatvalakṣaṇam anirvacanīyatvaṃ siddham/ tad
tad ]; tam ASS, A. avocac citsukhācāryaḥ :

quote.p: gāhate tad anirvācyam āhur vedāntavādinaḥ// iti/

div.label: [l. 16.677]
div.p: nanu māyāvidyayoḥ svāśrayavyāmohahetutvatadabhāvābhyāṃ bhedasya jāgarūkatvenāvidyāmayatve vaktavye māyāmayatvoktir āropyasyāyukteti cet —

tad ayuktam/ anirvacanīyatvatattvābhāsapratibandhakatvādilakṣaṇajātasya māyāvidyayoḥ samānatvāt/ kiṃ cāśrayaśabdena draṣṭocyate kartā vā/ nādyaḥ/ mantrauṣadhādinimittamāyādarśinas tasya vyāmohadarśanāt/ na dvitīyaḥ/ viṣṇoḥ svāśritamāyayaiva rāmāvatāre mohitatvena tatra māyāvitvasyāprayojakatvāt/ bādhaniścayamantrādipratīkārabodhayor eva prayojakatvāt/ aparathā paṅgvandhavat kartāpi vyāmuhyeta/ na cecchānuvidhānānanuvidhānābhyāṃ tayor bheda iti bhaṇitavyam/ māyāsthale maṇimantrauṣadhādiprayogavad avidyāsthale ’pi dvicandrakeśoṇḍrakādivibhramanimittāṅgulyavaṣṭambhādāv api svātantryopalambhāt/ ata eva tatra tatra śrutismṛtibhāṣyādiṣu māyāvidyayor abhedena vyavahāraḥ saṃgacchate/ kvacid vikṣepaprādhānyenāvaraṇaprādhānyena ca māyāvidyayor bhede tadvyavahāro na virudhyate/ tad uktam :
div.label: [l. 16.691]
[l. 16.693]
div.p: nanv avidyāsadbhāve kiṃ pramāṇam/ aham ajño mām anyaṃ ca na jānāmīti pratyakṣapratibhāsa eva/ nanu jñānābhāvaviṣayo ’yaṃ nābhipretam arthaṃ gamayatīti cet — na tāvad anupalabdhivādinaś codyam etat/ parokṣapratibhāsahetutvāt tasyāḥ/ ayam api parokṣapratibhāsa eveti cet — na tāval liṅgaśabdānupapadyamānārthajanyaḥ/ jñātakaraṇatvāt teṣām/ na caitat sāmagrīkāle jñānam asti/ anubhūyate vā/ anupalabdhyā janyata iti cet — na tāvad iyam ajñātā karaṇam/ pratyakṣetarasya jñātakaraṇatvaniyamāt/ nāpi jñātaiva karaṇam/ anupalabdhyanavasthānāt/ na ca yathā pareṣām abhāvagrahaṇe yogyānupalabdhiḥ sahakāriṇī tathā naḥ karaṇam iti śaṅkyam/ jñānakaraṇa iva sahakāriṇi jñātatvaniyamābhāvāt/ astu vā tathā jñeyābhāvagrahaṇe karaṇam/ jñānābhāvagrahaṇe karaṇaṃ na bhavaty eveti vakṣyate/
div.label: [l. 16.705]
div.p: pratyakṣābhāvavāde tu pratyakṣeṇa tāvad dharmipratiyogijñānayoḥ sator ātmani jñānamātrābhāvagrahaṇaṃ na brūyāt/ ghaṭavati bhūtale ghaṭābhāvasyeva jñānamātrābhāvasya grahītum aśakyatvāt/ tayor asatos tu sutarām/ kāraṇābhāvāt/ ato ’pi yogyānupalabdhyā vā phalaliṅgādyabhāvena vātmani jñānamātrābhāvagrahaṇaṃ durlabham iti paramate ’py ayaṃ nyāyaḥ samānaḥ/ tad evam ātmani pratyakṣeṇa vānyena vā jñānamātrābhāvasya grahaṇam aśakyam iti sthitam/
div.label: [l. 16.712]
div.p: nanu jñānaviśeṣābhāvaḥ pratyakṣeṇa gṛhyatām/ na tāvat smaraṇābhāvaḥ/ abhāvagrahaṇe pratiyogismaraṇasya kāraṇatvāt/ nāpy anubhavābhāvaḥ/ tasyāvarjanīyatvāt/ nanv ātmani ghaṭānubhavābhāvaḥ pratyakṣaviṣayas tarhy aham ajña iti jñānasāmānyavacano jānātir jñānaviśeṣe ’nubhave lakṣaṇayā vartanīyaḥ/ lakṣaṇā ca saṃbandhe ’nupapattau ca satyāṃ vartate/ saṃbandhas tāvad anubhavatvajñānatvayor ekavyaktisamāveśo vyāpyavyāpakabhāvo vā vidyata eva/ anupapattiṃ tu na paśyāmaḥ/
nanv anubhavābhāve pratyakṣasya prameyalābhas tenaiva tasyārthavattā sidhyati/
satyam/ prayojanam etan nānupapattiḥ/ anyonyāśrayāt/

nanv aham ajña ity atra nañ ātmani jñānamātrābhāvaṃ na brūte/ jñānavati tasmiṃs tadabhāvāt/ nāpy anubhavābhāvam/ jñānoktes tadanabhidhāyakatvāt/ nairarthakyaṃ ca na yuktam ity anayaivānupapattyā lakṣaṇeti cet —
uktalakṣaṇaivāvidyā tadartho ’stu/
saṃdeha iti cen na/

asamatvāt koṭidvayasya/ anyatra hi pratiyoginivṛttir nañarthaḥ/ atra tu pratiyogivyāpyanivṛttir iti/ jānātisamabhivyāhṛtasya nañaḥ kvacid uktalakṣaṇāvidyāviṣayatvasiddhim antareṇa na saṃdeha ity avaśyaṃbhāvena saiva jānātisamabhivyāhṛtasya nañaḥ sarvatra tadviṣayatvam avagamayati vilumpati jñānābhāvakoṭyantaram iti kva saṃdehāvakāśaḥ/ tad evaṃ lakṣaṇāhetvabhāve ’nubhavābhāvo ’py ātmani na pratyakṣeṇa gṛhyata iti pariśeṣād uktalakṣaṇāvidyaivājña iti pratibhāsasya viṣaya iti sthitam/
div.label: [l. 16.732]
div.p: astu vā jñānābhāvapratibhāsaḥ/ ayam abhāvaś ca pratiyogī yatra niṣidhyate na tatas tattvāntaram anyadadhikaraṇabhāvāt/ mā bhūd anyabhāvatvam anyābhāvatvaṃ tu syāt/ nanu tad api viruddham/ satyaṃ sati bhede/ sa ca pramāṇāt/ tac ca sati pratiyogyabhāvādhikaraṇatas tattvāntare/ nanu ghaṭavati bhūtale ghaṭābhāvamitivyavahṛtī syātām iti cet — mā bhūtām ete pratiyoginā sahānubhūyamāne ’dhikaraṇe/ pratiyogismaraṇe saty anubhūyamāne ’dhikaraṇe tu syātām/ evam apy upapattau na tattvāntaraviṣayatvaṃ kalpyam/ kānupapattir iti ced bādhakābhāvas tāvad ukta eva/ bādhakaṃ tu kalpanāgauravam eva/ tathā hi tattvāntaratvaṃ tāvad ekaṃ kalpyam/ tasyāparokṣatvāyendriyasaṃnikarṣaḥ kalpyaḥ/ sa ca saṃyogādir na bhavatīti saṃyuktaviśeṣaṇatvādiḥ kalpya ity ato varam uktalakṣaṇasyādhikaraṇasya vyavahāraviṣaye ’ṅgīkāraḥ/ sati caivaṃ jñānābhāvenāpi pratiyogismṛtau satyām anubhūyamānam adhikaraṇaṃ jñātaiva/ sa ca na kevalam antaḥkaraṇam/ jaḍatvāt/ nāpi kevala ātmaiva/ apariṇāmitvād aguṇatvāc ca/ ata ubhayor abhedādhyāsaḥ/ ātmādhyāsaś coktalakṣaṇāvidyātmety āyātam avidyāyām evāham ajña iti pratibhāsaḥ pramāṇam iti/
div.label: [l. 16.749]
div.p: anumānaṃ ca — vivādapadaṃ pramāṇajñānaṃ svaprāgabhāvavyatirikta-svaviṣayāvaraṇasvanivartyasvadeśagatavastvantarapūrvakam aprakāśitārthaprakāśakatvāt/ andhakāre prathamotpannapradīpaprabhāvad iti/ vastupūrvakam ity ukta ātmavastupūrvakatvenārthāntaratā/ tadarthaṃ vastvantareti/ tathāpi viṣayabhūte vastvantare ’rthāntaratā/ tadarthaṃ svadeśagateti/ adṛṣṭādikaṃ pratyādeṣṭuṃ svanivartyeti/ uttarajñānanivartyaṃ prathamajñānaṃ nivartayituṃ svaviṣayāvaraṇeti/ prāgabhāvaṃ pratikṣeptuṃ svaprāgabhāvavyatirikteti/ svaprāgabhāvavyatiriktapūrvakam ity ukte viṣayeṇārthāntaratā/ tadarthaṃ viṣayāvaraṇeti/ tādṛśam andhakāraṃ vyāseddhuṃ svanivartyeti/ viṣayagatām ajñātatāṃ nirākartuṃ svadeśagateti/ mithyājñānam apohituṃ vastvantareti/ dhārāvāhikavijñāne vyabhicāraṃ vyāseddhum aprakāśiteti/ madhyavartipradīpaprabhāyāṃ sādhyasādhanavaidhuryapratirodhāya prathamotpannaviśeṣaṇam/ saurālokavyāptadeśasthapradīpaprabhāpratikṣepāyāndhakāreti/

na ca jñānasādhake pramāṇe vyabhicāraḥ śaṅkanīyaḥ/ vipratipannaṃ praty asattvanivṛttimātrasya pramāṇakṛtyatvāt/ tad uktaṃ devatādhikaraṇe kalpatarukārair anumānādibhir asattvanivṛttiḥ kriyata iti/ nanu sādhanavikalo dṛṣṭānta iti cen na/ prakāśaśabdena tamovirodhyākārasya vivakṣitatvāt/ tad uktaṃ vivaraṇavivaraṇe sahajasarvajñaviṣṇubhaṭṭopādhyāyaiḥ — na cātra pakṣadṛṣṭāntayor ekaprakāśarūpānanvayaḥ śaṅkanīyaḥ/ tamovirodhyākāro hi prakāśaśabdavācyaḥ/ tenākāreṇaikyam ubhayatrāstīti/ narendragiriśrīcaraṇais tv ittham uktam — aprakāśitaprakāśavyavahārahetutvaṃ hetvarthaḥ/ tasya cobhayatrānugatatvān nāsiddhyādir iti/
div.label: [l. 16.771]
div.p: śruteś ca/ bhūyaś cānte viśvamāyānivṛttiḥ ityādikā śrutiḥ/

quote.p: taraty avidyāṃ vitatāṃ hṛdi yasmin niveśite/
yogī māyām ameyāya tasmai vidyātmane namaḥ// iti ca/

div.p: etenaitat pratyuktaṃ yad uktaṃ bhāskareṇa kṣapaṇakacaraṇaṃ pramāṇaśaraṇe bhedābhedavādināṃ bhāvarūpam ajñānaṃ nāsti kiṃ tu jñānābhāva iti/ tathā ca bhāskarapraṇītaśārīrakamīmāṃsābhāṣyagranthaḥ/ yad eva pararūpādarśanaṃ saivāvidyeti bhāvarūpājñānānabhyupagame jīveśvarādivibhāgānupapatteḥ/ na ca bhāvikaḥ paramātmano ’ṃśo jīva iti vācyam/
ityādiśrutivirodhāt/
div.label: [l. 16.781]
div.p: kecana śāktāḥ — śaktiṃ māyāśabdārthabhūtāṃ jagatkāraṇatvenāṅgīkṛtāṃ satyām abhyupetya mātuliṅgagadākheṭavidhāriṇī mahālakṣmīs tasyāḥ prathamāvatāra iti varṇayanti/ sā ca kālarātriḥ sarasvatīti dve śaktī utpādya brahmāṇaṃ puruṣaṃ śriyaṃ ca striyam utpādayām āsa/ svayaṃ mithunaṃ janayitvā svasute apy āha — aham iva yuvām api mithunam utpādayatam iti/ tataḥ kālarātrir mahādevaṃ puruṣaṃ svarāṃ striyaṃ ca janayām āsa/ sarasvatī ca viṣṇuṃ puruṣaṃ gaurīṃ ca striyam udapādayat/ tataś cādir vivāham akarod akārayac ca/ evaṃ brahmaṇe svarāṃ viṣṇave śriyaṃ śivāya gaurīṃ dattvā śaktiyuktānāṃ teṣāṃ sṛṣṭisthitisaṃhārākhyāni karmāṇi pratyapādayad iti/ tad etanmataṃ śrutyādimūlapramāṇavidhuratayā svotprekṣāmātraparikalpitam iti svarūpavyākriyaiva nirākriyety upekṣaṇīyam/ tataś cānirvacanīyānādyavidyālasitaḥ pratyagātmani pratīyamānaḥ pramātṛtvādiprapañca ity alam atiprasaṅgena/
div.label: [l. 16.794]
div.p: nanu kimarthaṃ pramātṛtvādīnām āvidyakatvaṃ nigadyate/ brahmajñānena nivartanāya jīvasya brahmabhāvāya vā/
na prathamaḥ/ śāstraprāmāṇyād eva satyasyāpi jñānena nivṛtter upapatteḥ/ upalambhāc ca/ tathā hi —
ityādinā pāpaṃ sanīsrasyate/ viṣayadoṣadarśanena rāgo dandahyate/ tārkṣyadhyānena viṣaṃ śamyate/ evaṃ kartṛtvādibandhaḥ pāramārthiko ’pi tattvajñānena nivartyeta/
na caramaḥ/ aupādhikasya jīvabhāvasyopādhinivṛttyā nivṛttau brahmabhāvasaṃbhavāt/ tasmād bandhasyāvidyakatvavācoyuktiḥ sāvadyeti cet —
naitad anavadyam/ satyasyātmavaj jñānanivartyatvānupapatteḥ/ bandhasya mithyātvam antareṇa śāstraprāmāṇyād api tadasiddheś ca/ śāstram api
div.label: [l. 16.805]
div.p:
it nyāyena lokāvalokitāṃ padaśaktiṃ padārthayogyatāṃ corarīkṛtya pracaratīti/ aparathā ādityo yūpaḥ yajamānaḥ prastaraḥ ityādivākyastomasya yathāśrute ’rthe prāmāṇyāpatteḥ/ vaidikyāḥ kriyāyāḥ samakṣakṣayitayā pāratrikaphalakaraṇatvānyathānupapattyā apūrvāṅgīkaraṇānupapatteś
apūrvāṅgīkaraṇānupapatteś° ] ASS; apūrvāṅgīkaraṇānupapattiś° A. ca/ loke ca śuktivyaktitattvābhivyaktāv apanīyamānasyāropitasya mithyātvadṛṣṭau taddṛṣṭāntāvaṣṭambhenātmatattvasākṣātkāravidyāpanodyasyāvidyakasya bandhasya mithyātvānumānasaṃbhavāt/ vimataṃ mithyā adhiṣṭhānatattvajñānanivartyatvāc chuktikārūpyavad iti/ na ca vimataṃ satyaṃ bhāsamānatvād iti pratiprayoge samānabalatayā bādhapratirodhaḥ/ pratirodhabhiyānyataradoṣatvasaṃbhavād iti vaditavyam/ marumarīcikodakādau savyabhicārāt/ abādhitatvena viśeṣaṇān na doṣa iti cet — maivaṃ bhāṣiṣṭhāḥ/ viśeṣaṇāsiddheḥ/
tatredaṃ bhavān pṛṣṭo vyācaṣṭām/ katipayapuruṣakatipayakālābādhitatvaṃ hetuviśeṣaṇaṃ kriyate sarvathā bādhavaidhuryaṃ vā/ na prathamaḥ/
div.label: [l. 16.820]
div.p: iti nyāyena tricaturapratipattṛpratipāditasyāpi pratipattrantareṇa prakārāntaram urarīkṛtya pratipādanāt/ nāpi caramaḥ/ sarvathā bādhavaidhuryasyāsarvajñadurjñeyatvāt/ yady evaṃ hanta tarhi jñānātmano ’pi satyatvaṃ nāvagamyata iti cet — maivaṃ maṃsthāḥ/ tat satyaṃ sa ātmā ity āgamasaṃvādagateḥ/ na ca prapañce ’py ayaṃ nyāya iti mantavyam/ tādṛśasyāgamasyānupalambhāt/ pratyutādvitīyatvaṃ śrāvayantyāḥ śruteḥ prapañcamithyātva eva pakṣapātāt/ nanu kalpanāmātraśarīrasya pakṣasapakṣavipakṣādeḥ sarvasulabhatvena jayaparājayavyavasthayā kathaṃ kathā pratheta/ kātra kathaṃtā/
div.label: [l. 16.831]
div.p: evaṃ tricaturajñānajanmano nādhikā matiḥ iti nyāyena tricaturakakṣyāviśrāntasya tattadābhāsalakṣaṇānāliṅgitasya dūṣaṇabhūṣaṇādes tatra kathāṅgatvāṅgīkārāt/ ata evoktaṃ khaṇḍanakāreṇa — vyāvahārikīṃ pramāṇasattām ādāya vicārārambhaḥ iti/ na ca bhedagrāhibhiḥ pramāṇair advaitaśruter jaghanyateti śaṅkyam/ brahmaṇi pāramārthikasatyatvena tadāvedikāyās tattvāvedanalakṣaṇaprāmāṇyāyāḥ śruter vyāvahārikapramāṇabhāvānāṃ pratyakṣādīnāṃ ca vibhinnaviṣayatayā parasparaṃ bādhyabādhakabhāvāsaṃbhavāt/ tad apy uktaṃ tenaiva —

quote.p: nānumānādi taṃ kartuṃ tavāpi kṣamate mate//

div.p: tasmāt tattvajñānena nivartanāyāsya bandhasyājñānakalpitatvam aṅgīkartavyam/ yata uktaṃ yato jñānam ajñānasya nivartakam iti/
div.label: [l. 16.846]
div.p: yad uktaṃ satyasyāpi duritasya setudarśanena nivṛttir upalabhyata iti/ tad ayuktam/ vihitakriyānuṣṭhānena janitasya dharmasyādharmanivartakatvadhrauvyāt/ dharmeṇa pāpam apanudanti iti śruteḥ/ pramāṇavastuparatantraśālinyā darśanakriyāyāś coditapuruṣaprayatnatantratvābhāvena vidhānāsaṃbhavāt/

ityādismṛtivihitabrahmacaryāṅgasahitadūrataradeśagamanasādhyabrahma-hanananivṛttiphalakasetusnānapraśaṃsārthatvāt/ yasya hi darśanamātreṇaiva duritopaśamaḥ kim uta snānena/ anyathā dūragamanānarthakyaṃ prasajjeta/ tatra kharādīnām apy anarthanivṛttir āpatet/ andhasya na syāc ca/
nanu —

quote.p: agnicit kapilā rājā satī bhikṣur mahodadhiḥ/
dṛṣṭamātrāḥ punanty ete tasmāt paśyeta nityaśaḥ//

div.p: iti kvacid darśanakriyāyā api vidhānaṃ darīdṛśyata iti cet —

maivaṃ vocaḥ/ tatrāpy anayaivānupapattyāgnicidādyarghaparicaryādāv eva tātparyāvadhāraṇāt/ yac coktaṃ viṣayadoṣadarśanād rāgo dandahyata iti/ tatra viṣayadoṣadarśanena virodhabhūtānabhiratisaṃjñakavairāgyaikaprādurbhāvād rāganivṛttau tadadarśanamātram iti na vyabhicāraḥ/ yad api tārkṣyadhyānādinā viṣādi satyaṃ vinaśyatīti/ tan na śliṣyate/ tatrāpi mantraprayogādikriyāyā eva viṣādyapanodakatvāt/ dhyānasya pramātvābhāvāc ca/ yad avādy aupādhikasya jīvabhāvasyopādhinivṛttyā nivṛttau brahmabhāvopapatter na tadartham arthavaitathyakathanam iti/ tad api kāśakuśāvalambanakalpam/ vikalpāsahatvāt/ kim upādheḥ satyatvam abhipretya mithyātvaṃ vā/ na prathamaḥ/ pramāṇābhāvāt/ nāparaḥ/ iṣṭāpatteḥ/ tasmād āvidyako bheda iti śrutāv advitīyatvopapattaye ’bhidhīyate na tu vyasanitayā/
div.label: [l. 16.871]
div.p: yadi vastutaḥ sarvopadravarahitam ātmatattvaṃ tarhi kathaṃkāraṃ dehādirūpaṃ kārāgāraṃ kāraṃkāraṃ punaḥ punas tatra praviśati/ tad atiphalgu/ avidyāyā anāditvena dattottaratvāt/ ato nivṛttyupāya evānveṣaṇīyaḥ prekṣāvatā/ na tu vismayaḥ kartavyaḥ/ tataś ca tattvamasādividyayā tadavidyānivṛttau niratiśayānandātmalābharūpaparamapuruṣārthaḥ setsyati/ tathā cāpastambasmṛtiḥ — ātmalābhān na paraṃ vidyata iti/
nanv asau nityalabdhaḥ/ na hi svayam eva svasyālabdho bhavati/

satyam/ kiṃ tv anādimāyāsaṃbandhāt kṣīrodakavat samudācāravṛttitāṃ na labhate/ tathā ca yathā śabarādibhir bālyāt svasutaiḥ saha vardhito rājaputras tajjātīyam ātmānam avagacchan bandhubhir ya evaṃbhūto rājā sa tvam asīti bodhite svarūpe labdhasvarūpa iva bhavati tathā veśyāsthānīyayānādyavidyayā svabhāvāntaraṃ nīta ātmā mātṛsthānīyayā tat tvam asītyādikayā śrutyā svabhāvaṃ nīyate/ etad āhus traividyavṛddhāḥ —
div.label: [l. 16.884]

quote.p: nīcānāṃ vasatau tadīyatanayaiḥ sārdhaṃ ciraṃ vardhitas
tajjātīyam avaiti rājatanayaḥ svātmānam apy añjasā/
saṃvāde mahadādibhiḥ saha vasaṃs tadvad bhavet pūruṣaḥ
dātā bhogaparaḥ samagravibhavo yaḥ śāsitā duṣkṛtām
rājā sa tvam asīti rakṣitṛmukhāc chrutvā yathāvat sa tu/
rājībhūya jayārtham eva yatate tadvat pumān bodhitaḥ/
śrutyā tat tvam asīty apāsya duritaṃ brahmaiva saṃpadyate//

div.p: etenaitat pratyuktaṃ yad uktaṃ paraiḥ kiṃ dvayos tādātmyam ekasya vā/ nādyaḥ/ advaitabhaṅgaprasaṅgāt/ na dvitīyaḥ/ asaṃbhavād iti/
tan na/ avidyāparikalpitabhedanivṛttiparatvena tat tvam asyāditādātmyavādaprāmāṇyopapatteḥ/ tau ca paryanuyogaparihārāv agrāhiṣātāṃ manīṣibhiḥ/
div.label: [l. 16.896]

quote.p: na dvayor asti tādātmyaṃ na caikasyādvayatvataḥ/

div.p: tataś ca tat tvam asīti tattvaṃpadārthaśravaṇamananabhāvanābalabhuvā sākṣātkāreṇānādyavidyānivṛttau saccidānandaikarasabrahmāvirbhāvaḥ saṃpatsyata iti brahmaṇo jijñāsyatvaṃ prathamasūtroktaṃ yuktam/
div.label: [l. 16.901]

quote.p: ajñātaṃ viṣayo brahma jñātaṃ tac ca prayojanam/
mumukṣur adhikārī syāt saṃbandhaḥ śaktitaḥ sruteḥ// iti/

div.p: janmādy asya yataḥ iti dvitīyasūtre brahma svarūpalakṣaṇataṭasthalakṣaṇābhyāṃ nyarūpi/ tatra svarūpāntargatatve sati vyāvartakaṃ svarūpalakṣaṇaṃ satyaṃ jñānam anantaṃ brahma ityādivedāntaiḥ pratipāditam/ tasya satyajñānādyātmakasvarūpāntargatatve sati vyāvartakatvāt/ taṭasthalakṣaṇaṃ yato vā imāni ityādīni vākyāni nirūpayanti jagajjanmādikāraṇatvena/ tad uktaṃ vivaraṇe —
div.label: [l. 16.912]
div.p: śāstrayonitvāt iti tṛtīyasūtre prathamavarṇakena ṣaṣṭhīsamāsam āśritya sarvajñatvaṃ pratyapādi/ dvitīyavarṇakena bahuvrīhisamāsam abhyupagamya brahmaṇo vedāntapramāṇakatvaṃ pratyajñāyi/
div.label: [l. 16.915]
div.p: tat tu samanvayāt iti caturthe sūtre prathamavarṇakena vedāntānāṃ brahmaṇi tātparyaṃ pratyapādi/ dvitīyavarṇakena vedāntānāṃ pratipattividhiśeṣatayā brahmapratipādakatvaṃ pratyakṣe 'pi/ diṅmātram atra pradarśitam/ śiṣṭaṃ śāstra eva spaṣṭam iti sakalaṃ samañjasam//
śrīr astu//
div.label: [l. 16.920]
